name: JVN Complete Pre-Wash Scalp Oil 50ml JVN Complete Pre-Wash Scalp Oil 50ml
description: Healthy hair starts with a happy scalp. Made with a growth-boosting blend of ingredients, JVN Pre-Wash Scalp Oil is an essential step in your wash-day routine for longer, stronger strands and a flake-free scalp. Carefully designed to balance pH and moisture levels, this 'skin care for hair' treatment restores calm to dry, itchy scalps, while boosting hair growth and health. Trending-for-a-reason rosemary extract helps to stimulate healthy circulation, promoting stronger strands and reducing hair fall and breakage. Turmeric extract and neem seed oil soothe irritated scalps, while JVN's patented and sustainable sugarcane-derived hemi-squalane instantly improves hair health. Making an extra step in your wash-day routine all the more worthwhile, this multitasking oil also lifts away dirt and product build up - without leaving the hair and scalp feeling stripped or tight.
how_to_use: Before washing hair, apply 2-3 droppers full directly to the scalp, adding more if needed. Gently massage into the scalp and leave on for 10-15 minutes. Shampoo hair as normal, using a second wash if needed. Use up to twice per week.

name: Le Labo Santal 33 Shampoo 237ml Le Labo Santal 33 Shampoo 237ml
description: Turn wash day into a sensorial experience with Le Labo Bergamote 22 Shampoo. Combining gentle cleansing ingredients with Le Labo’s most iconic (and seductive) fragrance, this rich lather leaves locks perfectly clean and beautifully scented. With extracts of aloe vera and soybean oil, this replenishing shampoo lifts away build-up to leave locks silky soft and shiny. An easy way to layer up your favourite scent, this luxe shampoo infuses hair with the beguiling scent of Santal 33 — featuring notes of cardamom, iris, amber and leather.

name: Briogeo Colour Me Brilliant Mushroom and Bamboo Colour Protect Primer 100ml Briogeo Colour Me Brilliant Mushroom and Bamboo Colour Protect Primer 100ml
description: A must-have for those with colour-treated hair and wanting to hang onto vivid, freshly-dyed colour for as long as possible, this brand new Color Me Brilliant range from Briogeo is here to help. Infused with Briogeo’s special active and natural colour-lock complex, this colour protection formula locks in colour as it protects against fade while turkey tail mushroom (a vegan keratin protein alternative) protects against colour fade, vitamin E nourishes and supports healthy hair production and growth and finally, natural oils enhances your natural shine to reinforce healthy lustre. After shampooing, work this through the mid-lengths and ends for added shine and protected colour. Boasting a vegan and cruelty-free formula that also contains zero sulfates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, DEA or artificial dyes, you can be sure that this Briogeo range is strand-friendly.
how_to_use: Dispense a small amount into hands and work through clean, damp hair from root to tip prior to air drying or heat styling. Do not rinse out. For best results, use after Color Me Brilliant™ Mushroom + Bamboo Color Protect Shampoo & Conditioner.

name: Hair Gain Leave-in Scalp Treatment 50ml Hair Gain Leave-in Scalp Treatment 50ml
description: Designed to beat the clogged scalp allegations with a re-energising, caffeine-infused blend, the Hair Gain Scalp Foam stimulates healthy new growth. What’s the fuss over foam, you ask? Well, for starters, it’s totally vegan, incredibly lightweight and powered by biotin, betanine and the brand’s very own AnaGain Technology which all work together to strengthen your strands from the inside out. Soothing your scalp with a cooling effect, this density-boosting formula promotes thicker tresses without leaving a trail of build-up.
how_to_use: Use on dry or towel-dried hair. Apply directly onto the scalp and hair line. Massage evenly into the scalp by dividing hair into sections. Do not rinse, use once per day. Style hair as normal, leaves zero sticky or greasy residue. Use 5 to 10 pumps of foam per day, enough to cover your full scalp.

name: K18 Leave-in Molecular Repair Hair Mask (Various Sizes) K18 Leave-in Molecular Repair Hair Mask (Various Sizes)
description: Does your hair need some TLC and a little... shaping? To the salon! Treat your locks to this at-home, leave-in formula that's infused with their unique patented K18Peptide that works on molecular level to repair even the most extreme damage! Let's pop on our lab coats for a quick second and give you the science-y low-down on this Leave-In Molecular Repair Mask. The patented peptide boasts a unique sequence of amino acids through the struggling strands to reconnect. The result? Stronger, softer, smoother and bouncier hair that's full of life. Boasting salon-like results in just 4 minutes, this concentrated formula is brimming with moisture magnets and protectors to leave your hair feeling prepped, primed and voluminous. Did someone say luscious locks alert?
how_to_use: Shampoo and rinse. Do not use conditioner, towel dry hair thoroughly, apply Leave-In Molecular Repair Mask and wait 4 minutes. Do not rinse out. After 4 minutes, apply styling products if desired and dry/style as usual.

name: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 45ml Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 45ml
description: The future of hair repair is here in the form of Living Proof's Triple Bond Complex. Think of this as your healthy hair architect that works within your tresses to fortify every strand and help you achieve all your hair care dreams. Used weekly, this intensive reparative treatment is clinically proven to reconstruct damaged hair, while protecting it against future damage to keep your mane in optimal condition. Chemical treatments, bleach and heat-induced damage all take their toll, but thankfully, the Triple Bond Complex is on hand to deliver immediate repair and lasting protection so your hair is restored to a healthy state. Harnessing the powers of a breakthrough, patent-pending technology, this hair saviour repairs and replenishes ionic, hydrogen and covalent bonds. After just one use you'll see immediate results (the impatient amongst us can rejoice), as it will look and feel healthier, with significant improvements being made inside your strands too. Not forgetting about the element of protection, encapsulated cellular oil can be found within this little bottle of gold dust to protect your hair from thermal and UV damage. All of this in a once a week treatment? Our hair care routine is getting upgraded asap!
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.

This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.

name: K18 Peptide Prep Detox Shampoo 250ml K18 Peptide Prep Detox Shampoo 250ml
description: Next in line to K18’s groundbreaking product line-up is the Peptide Prep Detox Shampoo — formulated to nourish hair while removing build-up and grime to create a healthy hair canvas. Think: more vibrant colour, optimised performance of your styling products and nourished strands… It all started with the Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask — a unique leave-in formula that has shaken up the hair care industry and left the tresses of countless beauty mavens stronger, softer, smoother and bouncier than ever. Now it’s time to meet the Peptide Prep Detox Shampoo and extend your K18 collection for even better results. Engineered for less frequent, heavy duty washing, this colour-safe shampoo is microdosed with the patented ‘K18Peptide’ to reduce protein loss and leave your hair softer and healthier. A blend of salicylic acid and activated charcoal unite in this non-stripping lather to unclog hair follicles and banish oils, metals and dirt, leaving you with a clear path for your K18 Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask to get to work. It’s not just your styling products that will benefit from this cleanser though — chemical treatments will perform better and hair colour will apply more vibrantly thanks to this clarifying shampoo. Inhale this clean citrus scent and get ready to welcome in a new era of even healthier swish-worthy tresses…
how_to_use: 1. Swap out your regular shampoo for this power wash 1x weekly or as needed. 2. Massage into hair + scalp to remove excess build-up. 3. Thoroughly rinse. 4. Repeat as needed.

name: Coco & Eve Super Nourishing Coconut & Fig Hair Masque (Various Sizes) Coco & Eve Super Nourishing Coconut & Fig Hair Masque (Various Sizes)
description: Like treating your tresses to a tropical holiday (in just 10 minutes) Coco & Eves Super Nourishing Coconut & Fig Hair Masque utilises natural wonders to swiftly and deeply condition stressed-out strands. A 5-in-1 treatment, the formula replenishes dryness and intensely hydrates, locking moisture into the cuticle to give luminous shine and repair hair from the inside out, taming frizz and minimising split ends. Raw virgin coconuts from Bali strengthen and repair hair to reduce breakage, penetrating deep into follicles to promote a healthy scalp, while conditioning fig and shea butter work in harmony to moisturise and detangle locks without weighing them down. Argan and linseed oils reduce frizz to make hair more manageable, while also boosting shine for silky-soft, gorgeously glossy results. Completely free from sulphates and parabens, gluten-free, cruelty-free and 100% vegan, this miraculous mask does only good. The full-size miracle mask even comes with a free Coco & Eve tangle tamer, which features special two-tiered bristle technology to detangle hair with minimal breakage and damage and ensure that the rich cream is evenly distributed through each and every strand. You have to see the results yourself to believe them and now you finally can.

name: Briogeo Destined for Density MegaStrength+ Caffeine and Biotin Peptide Density Serum 45ml Briogeo Destined for Density MegaStrength+ Caffeine and Biotin Peptide Density Serum 45ml
description: If your tresses are looking limp and lacklustre, then you can look no further than Briogeo’s density-boosting serum to boost circulation and leave your hair fuller, healthier and more lustrous than ever before. Healthy, bouncy hair is on all of our beauty wishlists. No amount of root-lifting spray or backcombing can make up for a lack of prep, so make sure you give your hair exactly what it needs with the Destined For Density MegaStrength+ Caffeine + Biotin Peptide Density Serum. Briogeo’s latest lightweight strand-loving formulation works to leave your hair healthy and fine tresses volumised. A unique energy complex — made up of caffeine, CoQ10 and Green Coffee Oil — stimulates the scalp to boost microcirculation while delivering a much-needed dose of antioxidant protection (hello healthy locks). The hair hero, Biotin, nourishes and strengthens each and every strand and follicle to support elasticity, while an infusion of copper peptides ensures a healthy hair life cycle. A fuller, more voluminous head of hair is coming your way (and quickly).

name: Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub
description: Want to know the secret to a healthy and happy scalp? Let us introduce you to Drunk Elephant's T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub, a supercharged AHA and BHA acid blend scrub designed to break down and dissolve dead skin cells as well as styling product build up. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. The rest just grew from there. An intelligent AHA/BHA scalp scrub, this has been specifically designed to work its magic within a short period of time (5 - 10 minutes to be exact). Blended with glycolic, tartaric, lactic and citric acids to dissolve dead cells and buildup as well as marula, mongongo, baobab seed and passionfruit oils to moisturise, nourish, rejuvenate and soothe, this multi-tasking marvel will revive scalp health for a happier head of hair.

name: Amika The Chameleon 5 Barrel Interchangeable Curling Kit Amika The Chameleon 5 Barrel Interchangeable Curling Kit
description: With five barrels, The Chameleon 5 Barrel Interchangeable Curling Kit is a must-have for any curl creatives looking to transform their tresses - without overworking hair. The ultimate multi-tasker, the curler's five easy-to-assemble barrels can create looks from tight pin curls through to big, blow dry-esque waves - and everything in between. Worried about causing heat damage to your strands? You needn't be. The lightweight titanium barrels have an ultra-smooth surface that creates extra silky, smooth curls. They also use far-infrared heat that instantly penetrates the cortex of the hair cuticle, reducing damage by heating hair in just half the time of traditional curlers. And to protect your delicate fingers, the kit comes with a heat-resistant three-fingered glove for extra flexibility, without the burn.
how_to_use: To turn on: Press and hold the On/Off button located between the – and the + buttons. To change the temperature: Press the + button to increase the temperature and the – button to decrease the temperature. Changing the barrel heads: the 32mm/1.25"" curler; i.e ""the bump"" - best for creating the round-brush, straight look with movement on long hair. bend the ends of a voluminous 'do, giving it more life. curl and set in large sections using the amika touchable hair spray to get a rounder, bouncier look or curl in different directions to show layers.  The 25mm/1"curler; i.e. "glamour" - the most popular curl size for creating anything from classic or retro looks to modern voluminous styles. curl and set, wait 10 minutes for the curls to cool, release, brush and style for the biggest, bounciest curl. let hair air dry and curl the hair in alternating directions for a classic beachy look. The 25-18mm/.75-1"curler; i.e. "au natural"- curls that are tighter at the bottom, looser on the top with less uniformity. for even more of a natural look, alternate the size of hair sections being curled and between wrapping the curls at the base or mid-length of hair. The 19mm/.75" curler; i.e. "texture" - ideal for creating textured and vintage looks, as well as curls that need to last from day to night. curl entire head of hair as the foundation for a beautifully messy chignon. take a short bob from sleek and pin straight to fun and beachy. The 9-19mm/.35-.75"curler; for bouncy, defined ringlets and tight waves.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. 110-240V.

description: An innovative must-have for protecting porous, colour-treated hair, Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. Introducing Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray, which 'shrinkwraps' every strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak to prevent frizz and flyaways. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish. Unlike typical 'humidity-guard' serums, Dream Coat will not build up, weigh hair down or make it greasy - and it comes in a handbag-compatible size so you never fall foul of the weather.

Completely silicone-free, this styling cream is made with JVN's patented hemi-squalane to boost hair health instantly and over time - making heat-free days even better for your tresses. name: Color WOW Extra Strength Dream Coat Ultra Moisturizing Anti Frizz Treatment 200ml Color WOW Extra Strength Dream Coat Ultra Moisturizing Anti Frizz Treatment 200ml
description: The innovative must-have for protecting porous, colour-treated hair is back, better and stronger than ever before… Meet Color Wow’s Dream Coat Extra Strength, a moisture-rich sealant spray that locks hydration whilst locking out humidity to keep strands smooth and sleek come rain or shine. Going above and beyond to keep your hair salon-fresh through three shampoos (yes, you read that right!), this heat-activated formula forms an invisible, waterproof cloak that shields against frizz and flyaways. With results that make you say “wow”, what’s not to love about this sheen-restoring staple? Pssst… did we mention that it comes in a handbag-friendly size so you never fall foul of the weather?
how_to_use: Shampoo, condition. Towel dry hair; divide into sections. Spray each section liberally, comb through. Blow-dry each section using tension. Dryer heat required to activate. If using a straightener, heat should not exceed 380°F (190°C). Long lasting, use every 3-4 shampoos.

name: Olaplex No.6 100ml Olaplex No.6 100ml
description: Betraying its chic, minimalist appearance, this brilliant bottle holds miracles. Equipped with an airless pump that makes for easy application, the No.6 Bond Smoother sends waves of optimal hydration lifeless-looking locks as it conditions and strengthens your strands from root to tip. This concentrated leave-in treatment is an excellent addition to any hair care routine as well as being a must-try for those with bleached, coloured or chemically-treated hair. As much a hair styling product as it is an intensive hair treatment, this also promises to speed up blow-drying time and control flyaways for up to 72 hours as well!
how_to_use: Apply product from mid-lengths to the ends. Start with 1/2 pump for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair. Less for fine or short hair. Comb through and style as desired.

name: OUAI Detox Shampoo 300ml OUAI Detox Shampoo 300ml
description: The detox your locks have been longing for, OUAI Haircare’s Detox Shampoo works to quickly eliminate build-up (we’re looking at you, Dry Shampoo) to deep clean your hair and ‘unblock’ your clogged follicles. Consider it the hair equivalent of ‘turn it off and on again’. A once-a-week option for those who're suffering from dry shampoo-dependency, this gentle (but thorough!) shampoo boasts apple cider vinegar to ‘cut through’ product build-up and neutralise shine-compromising hard water deposits. Like ‘descaling’ your strands, this deep-cleansing formula also boasts hydrolysed keratin – great for rebuilding and strengthening brittle or heat-weakened hair – while chelating agents attract heavy metals to leave your hair soft, silky and ready for the week ahead. With the brand's signature 'Melrose Place' fragrance – an intoxicating harmony of rose, lychee, bergamot, cedarwood and white musk – this envelops your headspace with heavenly perfume to keep your head happy while lifting your spirits. Plus, it now comes in a whopping 946ml refill pouch to minimise unnecessary waste.
how_to_use: Thoroughly wet your hair from roots to trips with lukewarm water. Squeeze out any excess moisture and lather a coin-sized 'dollop' of Detox Shampoo in your hands. Part hair using fingers and apply Detox shampoo as close to the scalp as possible. Let it work its magic for one to three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: Color Wow Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer 195ml Color Wow Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer 195ml
description: Answering the wishes of limp-haired beauties, Color Wow's Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer transforms fine tresses into beautifully thick, full hair for days. Granting major, long-lasting volume without weighing down your strands, this futuristic foam adds texture, body and instant grip to flimsy hair. Safe for colour-treated and chemically treated hair, this non-dehydrating foam thickens your strands without the likes of alcohol, salt or resins that typically create volume by forcing up the cuticle. Instead, it harnesses a proprietary polymer and fortifying bamboo blend to surround each strand, creating volume while allowing your cuticles to remain closed and intact. Giving hard-to-style, limp locks some much-needed texture (think: natural and supple, never stiff or crispy), this essential styler delivers big bombshell drama that lasts for days.
how_to_use: Apply to damp hair. Dispense 2-3 pumps worth of foam into hands and pull through a section of hair from top to ends, continue until all hair is covered. Comb through to distribute evenly. Style. Can be blow dried or air dried.

name: The Ordinary Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density 60ml The Ordinary Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density 60ml
description: Having already transformed our skin care regimes, we could only dream that The (extraordinary…) Ordinary would branch out into hair care – and, with this Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density, they have! According to the brand itself, this concentrated formula ‘is designed to support hair health so that it looks thicker, denser, fuller and healthier’ – all words we’d very much like to use to describe our own (occasionally lacklustre) locks. So, how does it reap these miraculous results? A combination of potent natural extracts (Larix Europaea Wood Extract and Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract), peptide complexes and caffeine power this ultra-lightweight formulation, united in an emollient base so that it can effectively penetrate your scalp and work deep within hair follicles. Ideally, use it at bedtime, applying it to a clean, dry scalp before massaging in thoroughly and leaving it on (some may prefer to rinse in the morning).
how_to_use: Apply a few drops or as needed once daily, ideally at bedtime, to clean, dry scalp. Massage into scalp thoroughly. This formula is a leave on/in treatment. Do not wash hair or scalp after application. (You may wish to rinse/wash your hair the next day to remove residue).

So much more than a hair treatment, OLAPLEX’s three-step ritual is a system that permanently rebuilds the damaged disulphide bonds in your hair – which are compromised as a result of colouring, heat styling and everyday wear and tear. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. name: Olaplex Repair and Moisture Set Olaplex Repair and Moisture Set
description: Look no further than this 4-piece kit of overachievers to turn the tide on damaged, dry hair. Featuring the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo, No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner and 30ml sizes of the No 3 Hair Perfector and No 8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask, this powerhouse kit brings together the brand’s the best beloved products into one easy-to-follow routine. As your first step, discover the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair. On days when you need a more intensive treatment, reach for the No 3 Hair Perfector which stars the patented bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching, breakages and split ends. Lastly, the No 8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask: deliciously rich in good-for-you ingredients alongside a patented blend of their Bond Building Technology, this 4-in-1 mask boosts shine, movement and adds a dash (well, way more than a dash) of silky softness.
how_to_use: No 3 Hair Perfector: Apply generously to damp hair, combing through from scalp to ends, and leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes before washing as normal, or leave on for longer if desired. Use once a week or 2-3 times a week for very damaged hair. No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo: Apply to damp hair, work through hair from root to tip creating a lather. Wash off then follow with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner. No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner: Apply to damp hair, following the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo and work through hair from root to tip and then wash off. No 8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask: Apply to clean, damp hair mid-length to ends. Use sparingly on the roots. Work through with fingers. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse fully and style as usual. Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair. Less for fine or short hair.

name: HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head
description: A hero for skin and hair, the HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head tackles the drying effects of hard water - no plumbing qualification or water softening system required. Simply switch out with your existing shower head to save water, boost pressure and filter out unwanted metals, chlorine and impurities. Featuring an advanced two-step filtration system powered by amino acids, activated carbon fibre and KDF 55, this clever shower head removes water-soluble metals (including lead, iron, mercury and nickel), trihalomethane (THMs) and odour. This softer water is kinder on skin and hair, and the boosted pressure makes short work of rinsing out suds for lightweight locks and happier skin.

Deep Conditioning Mask restores essential hydration and natural vibrancy to dry, brittle, over-processed and lacklustre locks. description: Powered by Living Proof's Triple-Action Cleaning Technology to address how hair looks, feels and smells, the brand's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo boasts a fast-absorbing powder that soaks up oil and sweat while the patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA) also helps you remove the powders easily from hair, resulting in truly clean hair. name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo 198ml Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo 198ml
description: Designed to rival your go-to rinse-out shampoo, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo not only keeps hair clean between washes, but it even cares for it too. No really, the shine and softness are unreal... It's made with fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil and sweat, which the brand's advanced powder removal system then easily eliminates for a fresh start. A helping of conditioning agents then adds softness, shine and manageability in between washes, while the refreshing spray neutralises odours and balances the scalp's sebum levels to keep your hair clean for longer. The cherry on top of the length-loving formula? It leaves no visible or textured residue so it won't look like you've dunked flour over your head! Stock up on the full size (198ml) to add to your at-home hair care collection, or throw the travel size (92ml) in your handbag for an on-the-go refresh.
how_to_use: Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results. Hold can 6-10” away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply the product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more as needed, shake can again. Style as desired. Perfect hair Day™ Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo can be used on most hair types. For thicker, coarser hair, section more thoroughly upon application. For curly hair, remove powders with a blow dryer on low and directed at the roots where the product was applied (vs. fingers or brush, which will deconstruct the curl).

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist Hair by Sam McKnight Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist
description: The ultimate secret for achieving sexily tousled, oh-so insouciant texture effortlessly, Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist from Hair by Sam McKnight is the coolest texturising spray youre likely to come across. The culmination of McKnights iconic expertise and experience in the industry, his irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional (yet pleasingly laid-back) standards of styling at home in mere minutes. This go-to texturiser couldnt be much easier to use simply spritz it in, mess it up and, hey presto, youll be channelling Sam McKnights signature done, undone look. Making it a real pleasure to use, the spray is scented with a fresh, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood, crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.

name: JVN Embody Volumising Shampoo 295ml JVN Embody Volumising Shampoo 295ml
description: JVN knows a thing or two about building body confidence. Using a blend of thickening plant-based actives (rather than positive affirmations) to amp up fine or flat strands, Embody Volumizing Shampoo leaves you hair with feel-good fullness, bounce and shine. Gentle enough for daily use, this kind-to-hair blend thoroughly cleanses away dirt and build up, without over-drying strands. Stimulating caffeine wakes up hair follicles, while aloe leaf juice hydrates and soothes to keep the scalp healthy, promote natural growth and reduce hair fall. JVN's patented (and sustainable!) sugarcane-derived hemi-squalane instantly improves hair health and strengthens for naturally bouncier, thicker-feeling tresses.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and gently massage into the scalp with your fingertips, adding more if needed to lather up the entire scalp. Rinse.

name: Olaplex No.4P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo 250ml Olaplex No.4P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo 250ml

Enriched with the brand’s original Bond-Builder System, the formula works to transform dry, brittle areas into a soft, visibly shiny finish. It helps to enhance manageability, while delivering an illuminating effect. Saturated with highly-concentrated pigments, the best-selling purple shampoo allows you to choose your toning level: the longer you treat, the brighter the results. name: Color Wow One Minute Transformation Styling Cream 120ml Color Wow One Minute Transformation Styling Cream 120ml
description: A quick fix for hair that’s been bent out of shape, Color Wow’s One Minute Transformation works to swiftly smooth frizz, tame your bedhead and counteract crimps from your hairband. A cocktail of nourishing extracts to polish your locks, rein in strays and tame flyaways, this silky crème can be raked through dry hair to fight ‘fluff’ and leave lengths with a mirror-like shine. Or, for a salon-worthy blow-dry, apply to dry hair in small section and then use a round brush with a quick blast of heat to achieve a sleek ‘swish’. Packed with omega to nourish, hydrate and protect with weight that can compromise volume, this balm is a boon when you want to look fabulous, fast.

name: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Sunset Tie Dye Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Sunset Tie Dye
description: In a pretty ‘Sunset Tie Dye’ pattern, the Satin Heatless Curling Set will help make all your big, bouncy curl dreams a reality — without causing dryness, frizziness or split ends. Yep, this unusual device, complete with satin finish to prevent unwanted breakage to your strands, sets your hair into place (whether that’s voluminous, ‘fresh from a blow dry’ curls, or texture, beachy waves) without the need for heat. The set includes a foam curling rod, around which you curl your hair, and two scrunchies to gently secure it in place. Once you’re hair is in position, enjoy a good night’s rest (trust us, this is more than comfy enough to snooze in) and release your perfectly curled mane come morning. Curling tongs, who?
how_to_use: 1. Place curling ribbon on top of damp or dry hair and use your favourite Kitsch claw clip to secure in place. 2. name: Amika Perk Up Dry Shampoo Amika Perk Up Dry Shampoo
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Tired of your lengths looking limp once you hit the second-day mark? Allow us to introduce you to the Perk Up Dry Shampoo! The closest thing to washing your hair without water, this Holy Grail spray actually helps to make your hair look (and feel!) beautifully clean. Dissatisfied with the formulas on offer, the minds behind amika set out to create a dry shampoo that ticked all of their boxes, and here it is! Invisible when used correctly, this super-fine mist is the key to a freshly washed look withoutanywhite residue, period. Plus, it's infused with rice starch to add some extra 'oomph!' to your style (no more lengths lying limp!). Never powdery, itchy or sticky, you can layer this mist for days and days to keep your style looking fresh and clean! Psst, did we mention it's safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.

(Sd Alcohol 40-B), Oryza Sativa (Rice/Riz) Starch, Fragrance/Parfum, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cyclopentasiloxane, Water/Eau/Aqua, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Citronellol.

name: Aesop Shampoo 500ml Aesop Shampoo 500ml
description: A staple in any bathing ritual, Aesop’s earth-slash-citrusy-scented Shampoo works into a low-foaming lather that hydrates your hair as it cleanses. Both beautiful and practical, Aesop’s ethos is all about marrying old world wisdom with new tech disciplines — harnessing the finest botanical extracts and fusing them with the latest and greatest scientific discoveries — to bring out the best of your hair. This mild formulation is infused with a blend of nourishing oils to deeply refresh your strands and cloak them with an enlivening scent that lingers even after you rinse the lather away. It’s also saturated with panthenol to deliver a wave of stand-softening hydration: this way for sleek and silky hair!

name: Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 250ml Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 250ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by discerning celebrities and beauty buffs all over the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.

name: Briogeo Superfoods Avocado and Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfoods Hair Mask 240ml Briogeo Superfoods Avocado and Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfoods Hair Mask 240ml
description: A feast for all hair types, Briogeo's Be Gentle, Be Kind Avocado + Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask boasts a buffet of nourishing extracts to swiftly replenish stressed, damaged or heat-weakened lengths so your locks become shiny and smooth. With green smoothie-inspired phytonutrients - we're talking spirulina, chia seeds and cocoa - to seal moisture into your compromised strands, this rich and replenishing treatment resuscitates hair without dragging it down (great if your mane's fine or flyaway). Packed with fatty acids, avocado deeply conditions, while kiwi - a rich source of vitamin C and antioxidants - deflects the aggressors to keep your hair strong and resilient. Spinach then helps to promote your hair's overall health so your mane becomes gorgeously glossy within just a fortnight of regular use. Plus, it smells delectable...

name: The INKEY List Vitamin C Brightening Hair Treatment 50ml The INKEY List Vitamin C Brightening Hair Treatment 50ml

Boasting 0.5% VCIP to repair damaged, compromised lengths, alongside 2% Lustreplex (it increases hairs Humidity Resistance Factor to minimise frizz and optimise shine) and 1% Betaine to soften and nourish, this helps to rebuild ravaged, heat-weakened tresses spinning straw into silk (without silicones).

description: Tame tangles and replenish rebellious strands with JVN Conditioning Mist. name: Olaplex No.0 Intensive Bond Builder 155ml Olaplex No.0 Intensive Bond Builder 155ml
description: You may want to cancel that salon appointment after all... Introducing the No.0 Intensive Bond Builder, a potent strand-strengthening treatment that's designed to reverse the visible signs of damage and revive enviably soft tresses. Working it's priming magic across all hair types, this easy-to-use nozzle streamlines application to ensure all of your hair is saturated. Celebrating strength with a scientifically proven formula powered by a patented bond building technology known to reverse the effects of hair damage, this at-home salon-like experience repairs broken shafts and boosts hydration.

name: K18 Peptide Prep Ph-Maintenance Shampoo 250ml K18 Peptide Prep Ph-Maintenance Shampoo 250ml
description: Next in line to K18’s groundbreaking product line-up is the Peptide Prep pH-Maintenance Shampoo — gentle enough for daily use (should you so choose) but strong enough to break down and dispel dirt and oil. It all started with the Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask — a unique leave-in formula that has shaken up the hair care industry and left the tresses of countless beauty mavens stronger, softer, smoother and bouncier than ever. Now it’s time to meet the Peptide Prep pH-Maintenance Shampoo and extend your K18 collection for even better results. Engineered for frequent, everyday washing, this cleanser features plant-based surfactants so you can achieve an optimal cleanse without compromising on a satisfying foam or stripping your strands. Carefully formulated with an optimised pH of 4.5-5.5, to ensure minimal swelling of the hair cuticle while you wash, meaning a smoother style and protected moisture levels. Inhale this clean citrus scent and get ready to welcome in a new era of even healthier swish-worthy tresses…

name: OUAI Fine Hair Shampoo 300ml OUAI Fine Hair Shampoo 300ml
description: Bottling their beloved hair-plumping shampoo in a design more than to fit to grace your bathroom shelfie, look to the Fine Hair Shampoo to bring bounce and brilliant shine into your strands’ future. name: Larry King Hair Care A Social Life for Your Hair Larry King Hair Care A Social Life for Your Hair
description: A super-charged finishing cream for all hair types, Larry Kings A Social Life for Your Hair has a heavenly fragrance (inspired by lazy days spent watching clouds blown away on a warm, balmy breeze), and works to enhance definition, lend shine, control frizz and add texture. With a looooong list of prestigious nominations, this light, flexible cra¨me is ideal for all hair lengths and textures from short crops to tumbling curls and helps to improve manageability (just rake through dry lengths) or protect from heat styling (apply to damp hair before drying). Just a pea-sized amount goes a long way towards the soft, perfectly rumpled effect youve been striving to emulate.

name: Aveda Sun Care Protective Hair Veil 100ml Aveda Sun Care Protective Hair Veil 100ml
description: As much as we love to savour every ray of sunlight, we know that our strands need to be protected, just as we do our skin. That's where Aveda's Sun Care Protective Hair Veil comes in! Acting as an invisible shield against the drying effects of UV rays, be sure to keep one of these mists close at hand when you're on holiday or simply sunbathing in the garden - we'll take what we can get! Effortless to apply, this lightweight spray casts an undetectable screen over your strands to provide effective protection against sun exposure that often leads to damage and dryness. It's crafted with UVA/UVB filters, derived from wintergreen and cinnamon bark oils, that help to prevent straw-like damage. A member of a three-part defence and recovery system, simply spritz the water-resistant formula over your lengths before you go out to keep them looking happy and healthy. name: Augustinus Bader The Shampoo 200ml Augustinus Bader The Shampoo 200ml
description: Inspired by over 30 years of scientific innovation, Augustinus Bader’s The Shampoo with TFC8 works into a gentle foaming lather that thoroughly cleanses and supports root-to-tip renewal, while boosting volume and shine. Fusing the TFC8 technology (a complex of natural amino acids and vitamins) with a holistic selection of complementary active ingredients, this game-changing range brings the same excellence of their skin care to the world of hair care; each formula is centred around protecting and supporting the hair’s rejuvenating abilities, as well as creating the optimal environment for strong, healthy hair and scalp. In the case of the shampoo, your hair with feel nourished and hydrated from the first use, and over time it promotes stronger, thicker hair that’s less prone to breakage and shedding. How? Watercress and Indian cress extracts support keratin production to strengthen strands from the root; maca root extract stimulates the follicles and bolsters strand resilience; vitamin B5 moisturises from root to tip, boosting manageability and shine; shikakai extract gently refreshes and detangles as it prevents scalp flakiness; finally, neem extract helps to optimise your scalp heath and encourage growth.

description: JVN knows a thing or two about building body confidence. JVN's patented (and sustainable!) sugarcane-derived hemi-squalane instantly improves hair health and strengthens for naturally bouncier, more resilient locks. The easy rinsing formula ensures hair is left smooth and replenished - but free from residues that can weigh fine strands down.

name: OUAI Fine Hair Conditioner 300ml OUAI Fine Hair Conditioner 300ml
description: Formulating a conditioner so featherweight it replenishes moisture without weighing down your fine hair, meet the Fine Hair Conditioner 2.0. This velveteen conditioner boosts the body of your hair as it softens and smooths each strand, so you can spend less time scrunching or teasing and more time chilling. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin and biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a beautiful scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: The INKEY List Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 150ml The INKEY List Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 150ml
description: If hairs stubbornly oily then help is at hand: THE INKEY LISTs Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Scalp Treatment swiftly eliminates build-up and lift-inhibiting grime as it gently eradicates flakes to help minimise itching. With 2% salicylic acid to exfoliate and help to purge embedded impurities, alongside 2.5% FluidPure 8G which soothes redness and calms irritation, this balancing formula also stars 1% panthenol to maintain moisture levels for silky smooth lengths. Great for those susceptible to stressed-out scalps or flakes, this normalising pre-wash serum works to swiftly re-establish equilibrium - in clinical trials, 100% of testers felt their hair and scalp was less oily after 28 days of use, while 95% said that their scalp was less itchy.
how_to_use: We recommend shaking the bottle well before use. Use as pre shampoo treatment. Shake into the palm of your hand, massage hands together and use fingertrips to rub into scalp. Apply enough to cover entire scalp. Leave on for 10 minutes then wash hair as normal. Use 1-2 times a week.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Clean 2-in-1 Scalp Scrub & Clarifying Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Clean 2-in-1 Scalp Scrub & Clarifying Shampoo
description: An invigorating, build-up-eliminating exfoliant, NatureLab TOKYOs Perfect Shine Clarifying Scrub is a 3-in-1 treatment that gently clears shine-dulling debris while leaving your scalp feeling fresh (and flake free!). Clearing your head (and your headspace), this lightly-foaming scrub boasts sugar crystals to exfoliate dead cells and clear the debris that accumulates and compromises volume, alongside probiotic sake water (to feed your scalps natural flora and fauna which helps to maintain equilibrium) and strand-plumping hyaluronic acid (it absorbs up to 1000 times it own weight in water). A once-a-week MOT to boost oomph and help stimulate follicles, this heavenly spa-in-a-jar has a delicate perfume of almond and violet (without and parabens, sulphates or cruelty). Sufficiently gentle for bleached, coloured or chemically treated hair, this scrub is a must if you've misplaced your radiance
how_to_use: Once a week, in lieu of Shine Shampoo, apply scrub on damp hair from roots to ends using circular motions to stimulate scalp and eliminate debris. Rinse thoroughly and follow with Perfect Shine Conditioner.

name: Kitsch Creaseless Clips 4 Piece Set - Black Terrazzo Kitsch Creaseless Clips 4 Piece Set - Black Terrazzo
description: A make up maven’s must-have, the Creaseless Clips 4 Piece Set are perfect for styling your hair and keeping it out of your face — without leaving creases. What makes these clips different from others that you might use to section off your strands while you do your make up? They won’t ruin your look by leaving creases or flattening your hard-earned volume. You can even use them to hold curls and waves in place to set after styling. As good for the environment as they are for your hair, these clips are made from 85% recycled plastic — they’re a win-win all round!
how_to_use: Secure styles in place, smooth down the hair, or slip back the hair when applying make up.
ingredient: 85% recycled acrylic +15% iron.

name: Davines NOUNOU Nourishing Conditioner 250ml Davines NOUNOU Nourishing Conditioner 250ml
description: Restructuring and replenishing, Davines's NOUNOU Conditioner works to prolong the vibrancy of colour-treated hair - providing protection from the ravages wrought by the elements, while strengthening strands and enhancing elasticity to minimise brittleness and breakage. With tomato extract to ward against free radical attack, alongside sweet almond butter and vitamin F to 'rebuild' and intensively nourish from the inside out. Now available in the original (250ml) and a new travel-friendly (75ml), you won't need to go without this hair hero ever again...

name: BLEACH LONDON Reincarnation Mask 200ml BLEACH LONDON Reincarnation Mask 200ml
description: Don’t let colour kill your hair – resurrect strands and remain the best tressed with BLEACH London’s Reincarnation Mask. Magnificently moisturising, this intensive treatment is enriched with sunflower seed extract and micro wheat proteins to hydrate hair and boost elasticity, while also imparting enviable shine, strength and colour vibrancy. For a total treat, enhance the ultra-conditioning effect by wrapping hair in a warm towel and leaving this on for 10-20 minutes. The formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan (like the entire BLEACH line, in fact) so you can comfort scalp, strands and conscience at once. Sublime.

name: OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 40g OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 40g
description: The perfect way to add some ‘grit’ to slippery hair types, OUAI’s Texturizing Hair Spray is ideal for recreating that enviable ‘French girl’ look – a tousled sexiness that exudes Parisian nonchalance. Invert your head and spray the roots to create ‘oomph’ (and absorb oil), then spray the lengths and ‘tszuj’ with fingers to achieve a separated, choppy finish. Enriched with OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology’ – a cocktail of nourishing ingredients including amino acids, tamarind seed, keratin, ama oil, hibiscus and jasmine to strengthen, enhance moisture levels, repair and protect from humidity – this refreshes, volumises and perfumes your strands with the delicate scents of Italian bergamot, rose, lily of the valley, waterlily, iris and white musk (ideal to disguise a stale, night-on-the-town odour).

name: Fable & Mane MahaMane Smooth and Shine Hair Oil (Various Sizes) Fable & Mane MahaMane Smooth and Shine Hair Oil (Various Sizes)
description: Created to help smooth flyaways and protect your strands as you style your hair, the MahaMane Smooth & Shine Hair Oil should be next in line to your styling rituals. If you’re yet to discover the restorative powers of Fable & Mane’s therapeutic range, then allow us to make the necessary introductions… The latest creation from Fable & Mane’s strand-transforming range will upgrade your post-wash hair care routine and protect your hair from thermal damage while it’s at it too. A blend of six fruit oils and shikakai (an ayurvedic herb) are combined in this indulgent treatment to grant a mirror-like shine in an instant. To strengthen your strands, the adaptogenic ayurvedic root known as ashwagandha is infused to keep your hair at its most resilient… and with the added benefit of heat protection, this is a must-add to your styling routine. A heat-activated style saver, this lightweight lotion locks out heat damage and humidity while extending your style for up to 48 hours. Ionic peptides guard against heat damage up to 450°F, for healthier hair whether you're straightening, curling or opting for a bouncy blow dry. name: Oribe Gold Lust Hair Oil 100ml Oribe Gold Lust Hair Oil 100ml
description: Treat your hair to some golden goodness with Oribe's Gold Lust Nourishing Hair Oil, a luxurious yet light oil that absorbs swiftly into strands calling out for an SOS. Each protective drop of this liquid gold penetrates the hair to deeply condition, strengthen and smooth, imparting intense nourishment and incredible shine. A rich blend of emollients conditions and softens hair without weighing it down: argan oil adds lightweight shine, reduces frizz and shields strands from damaging UV rays and pollutants; jasmine oil helps to combat a dry, itchy scalp and enhance shine further; sandalwood extract, amur cork bark extract and barley extract stimulate the hair cuticle; cassis seed oil imparts moisturising omega-6 and omega-3 acids and, finally, shea butter (rich in vitamin F) moisturises and softens dryness and damage, adding lustre and helping to prevent further damage. Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. name: Kitsch Satin Wrapped Flexi Rods - Rosewood Kitsch Satin Wrapped Flexi Rods - Rosewood
description: If you’ve been wanting to jump on the heatless curls bandwagon, but can’t seem to achieve the results all over your ‘For You’ feed, then this is the hair-saving hack you need in your life. Create effortless curls or waves with this dusky-hued six-piece set of flexible satin hair rollers. The perfect alternative to heat styling, and the ultimate summer hair hack (whoever can bear to heat style their hair in 30-degree weather is a beauty hero). These flexible rods are suitable for most hair types and textures and help you create classic curls without a curling wand. Made of 100% vegan satin to prevent broken strands and friction, these glide through your hair with no painful tugging and stay firmly in place while your hair dries. You might never look back after getting the hang of heatless curls!
how_to_use: With slightly damp hair, take a section of hair & start rolling up from the end upwards toward the scalp. Tuck hair securely so that the ends of your hair do not stick out. Roll upwards until taught against scalp & then bend the ends of the roller to secure it in place. Continue this process with the next roller until all rollers are in place & secure. Wear overnight or allow hair to fully dry. Remove & style to enjoy beautiful heatless curls.
ingredient: 100% vegan satin.

name: Olaplex No. 4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250ml Olaplex No. 4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250ml
description: Betraying its chic, minimalist appearance, this brilliant bottle holds miracles. So much more than your average regular-degular shampoo, the No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo gently lifts away weighty dirt, debris and build-up from your hair with just one use. Bursting with a hair-renewing pH-balanced blend of vegan nourishment, this sought-after formula restores your once-voluminous locks for the healthiest-looking shine from root to tip. Cleansing each and every shaft with a wonderfully rich sulfate-free lather, this must-try shampoo removes dare-to-stay chlorine, excess oils, hard water minerals and even heavy metals all the while maintaining stronger than ever shafts coated with hydrating heroes! Sounds like better hair days are on the horizon if you ask us.

name: Color Wow Dream Filter 50ml Travel Color Wow Dream Filter 50ml Travel

The perfect way to mane-tain the integrity of your colour or highlights, it’s made with one-of-a-kind, breakthrough technology (two molecular filters with two polymeric filters) to gently and effectively remove minerals and metals from your hair. Anything from calcium and magnesium to copper, iron and chlorine can be deposited along your lengths - due to everything from the environment to the water you wash your locks with; they accumulate on your hair and can discolour your precious tresses. No more! This non-stripping spray revives vibrancy in no time at all - and comes in a sized-to-try bottle to trigger addiction before you (inevitably) commit.

description: Formulated to rival your rinse-out shampoo and extend time in between washes, Living Proof’s PhD Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo Jumbo keeps hair feeling refreshed, while conditioning for a just-washed softness and shine. name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Intensive Treatment 150ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Intensive Treatment 150ml
description: An iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsleys Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny and all before youve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage youll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid

name: Davines More Inside This Is A Dry Texturizer 250ml Davines More Inside This Is A Dry Texturizer 250ml
description: The latest addition to Davines cult collection, the Dry Texturizer Spray provides defined texture and hold for a chic, freshly cut and styled appearance. A must-have for ultra-chic and beautifully styled hair, Davines' Dry Texturizer Spray provides piecey, defined texture and hold within seconds of application. The formula is also paraben and colourant-free and also remains completely workable so hair will be free from any unwanted crunch. Perfect for creating enhanced volume, definition and style, this chic product gives hair an instant full-bodied and tousled look without weighing it down. What more could you want?
how_to_use: Shake well. Apply to dry hair from approximately 10 inches away. Spray Dry Texturizer on both roots and lengths, lifting and gently releasing hair to ensure an even application.
ingredient: Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., Vp/Va Copolymer, Aqua, Parfum, Zeolite, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane

name: BLEACH LONDON Silver Shampoo 250ml BLEACH LONDON Silver Shampoo 250ml
description: A game-changing hair cleanser, BLEACH London’s Silver Shampoo will give you your brightest blonde yet. Designed to be used in every other wash, this violet-toned, high pigment shampoo works to neutralise brassiness, eliminating unwanted yellow and orange tones. Ideal followed with BLEACH’s {Silver Conditioner}, it features strengthening wheat proteins and moisturising vitamin B5 to nourish strands as it brightens. Like the entire BLEACH line, this formula is also completely cruelty-free and vegan – what more could we ask for.
how_to_use: Lather into wet hair and massage through to the ends. Rinse well and follow with BLEACH’s {Silver Conditioner}. Warnings: Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Avoid contact with clothing and towels.

name: Davines OI All in One Milk Davines OI All in One Milk
description: Daviness does-everything conditioning treatment is brimming with provitamin B5 renowned for its phenomenal, hydrating action alongside roucou oil a secret ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the Lipstick Tree to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses.100 times richer in beta-carotene than carrots, roucou helps to stimulate melanin synthesis (and in turn, maintain your hairs natural pigment), while its ellagic acid content works to neutralise free radicals and thus protect against cellular damage caused by UV exposure.
how_to_use: After using OI Shampoo, towel dry and spray OI All in One Milk 10-15 times on roots and ends: do not rinse and continue with styling. Depending on the type of hair, increase or decrease the number of sprays.

name: OUAI Curl Crème 236ml OUAI Curl Crème 236ml
description: To craft their Curl Crème - Fragranced, the minds behind OUAI Haircare turned to the most knowledgable, discerning people they know: their very own curly-haired community. That's right, this luscious blend was co-created with 150 members of their community and faced over a year of testing before they were sure it was worthy of touching your curls... This does-it-all styling cream is brimming with conditioning plant oils that add definition, shine and impressive hydration to parched coils, curls and ringlets. It's unique consistency first goes on like a cream before melting into your hair with the swiftness of an oil; speaking of which, at the heart of the formula is a frizz-smoothing duo of chia and linseed oils that emphasise the shape of your curls as well as protecting them against humidity. Coconut oil then floods your hair with hydration and helps to seal damaged cuticles, while babassu oil softens and enhances shine. The finishing touch is an infusion of the brand's fan-favourite North Bondi scent: a bergamot and lemon blend that's simply bewitching. As for what's not included, this vegan cream is free from silicones, SLS, parabens, phthalates and gluten. Psst, the tube is also made out of sugarcane plastic, making it 100% recyclable!
how_to_use: On wet hair: To prevent breakage, section and detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb (stay away from bristle brushes because they can disrupt your curl pattern) Start with a dime-size amount of Curl Crème and evenly distribute it with your fingers (it’s super creamy and melts into your curls like an oil) Comb through each section using your fingers to ensure Curl Crème blesses each and every curve Let your hair dry, then say hello to your softest curls ever If you plan on heat styling later and want heat protection, pair Curl Crème with OUAI Leave In Conditioner, our multitasking detangler and leave-in that provides thermal heat protection and weightless hydration On dry hair: A little bit of Curl Crème goes a long OUAI in refreshing day-two or day-three curls. On dry hair, apply Curl Crème sparingly and directly to your curls to help define and smooth frizz and flyaways.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Orbignya Speciosa Kernel Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyquaternium-37, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol,Isopropyl Alcohol, Xylitol,Caprylic Acid, Sorbitan Oleate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance / Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol.

name: Davines LOVE Curl Conditioner 250ml Davines LOVE Curl Conditioner 250ml
description: Tailored towards hair that’s curly or wavy, LOVE Curl Conditioner imparts much-needed moisture and elasticity without weighing strands down. The lusciously creamy formula is enriched with Noto almond extract, harvested from the farm of Mr. Carlo Assenza in Noto, Syracuse. These heirloom nuts are brimming with hair-strengthening proteins and moisturising healthy fats, which are capable of hydrating textured hair without disrupting its delicate balance, so that hair is neither stripped nor overburdened. The addition of panthenol boosts moisture further and imparts brilliant shine, while vitamin E offers antioxidant action to protect hair from harm. Scented with a refreshing yet indulgent note of green citrus, this is the perfect choice for all you curly-haired Cult Beauties.
how_to_use: After shampoo apply to the hair with a gentle massage. comb and leave for 5 - 10 minutes. Rinse carefully.

description: Leaping bunny and Vegan certified, amika's Bust Your Brass Shampoo not only aligns with your personal values but it also helps to tone and flush out brassy warm tones, leaving you with beautiful cool, blonde locks. This ultra-violet shampoo tones unwanted brassy hues, while also repairing hair for stronger, healthier-looking hair prone to less breakage. Perfect for those with blonde, silver or grey barnets, this Holy Grail formula is packed with the brand's bond cure technology (which targets bonds prone to breakage), quinoa protein, plant butters and ultraviolet pigments. Prepare for this purple shampoo keeps your blonde looking cool and strong.

If you have highlights, a balayage, or natural-looking (colour-treated) blonde hair: If you have gray hair:

name: OUAI Matte Pomade 50ml OUAI Matte Pomade 50ml
description: OUAI Haircare’s luxurious Matte Pomade gives short hair added texture, or you can use it to mould and sculpt longer hair into a number of styles. It can give fine, flat hair a new lease of life, plus it’s also perfect for sleeking back greasy/messy locks in-between washes. The line was created by celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin (whose client list includes the Kardashian Klan, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani) – so it’s safe to say she knows her ‘oignons’ when it comes to immaculate-looking locks. Products combine clever technology with an addictive fragrance and oh-so-chic packaging - for tresses that are truly oh là là!
how_to_use: Work a penny-sized dab through the ends of hair for easy, piece-y texture.

name: Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Conditioner 200ml Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Conditioner 200ml
description: Reverse time on any damage dealt to your mane with Oribe’s hydrating and restorative conditioner. Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this revitalising formula is brimming with botanical extracts – including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf. Add to this magic potion extracts of daisy and honeysuckle and expect hair to be fortified from roots to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative blend has just upped the ante on building strong, resilient hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity, while green tea and plant polysaccharides protect from environmental stressors by warding off any pollution particles that are tempted to sit on your precious locks. Just one rinse of this super hydrating formula will leave your hair feeling strong, smooth and soft.
how_to_use: After shampooing, massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: Davines Energizing Shampoo Davines Energizing Shampoo
description: Do you want to stop thinning hair in its tracks? Then you need to meet Davines’ Energizing Shampoo, formulated with caffeine phytoceuticals, this hard-working formula stimulates circulation and improves elasticity, preventing further or future hair loss with continued use. Benefitting from eucalyptus and peppermint oil extracts as well as niacinamide and citric acid, this hard-working shampoo works to cleanse, clear and calm irritated and congested scalps. Housed in a minimalist deep brown bottle with quintessential Davines packaging, this Energizing Shampoo will look right at home in your bathroom while delivering effective use with continuous use.
how_to_use: Gently massage into damp hair and allow to process for a few minutes. Rinse thoroughly, and follow with Energizing treatments.

name: Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask 75ml Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask 75ml
description: Looking for a hard-working, nourishing hair treatment that you can use once or twice a week? Enter Gisou's Honey Infused Hair Mask. Brimming with moisturising ingredients (not to mention the most gorgeous, subtle floral scent), this mask is formulated to hydrate and replenish hair while improving its elasticity and health. It's all about the honey here: a natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), this star ingredient is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and add all of the shine. With a full-sized 250ml and a new sized-to-travel 75ml, you can keep your hair nourished and cared for even when you're away from your at-home shelfie.
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount of hair mask onto towel-dry hair from root to tip. Leave in for 5-7 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. For best results, use 1-2 times per week.

name: WetBrush Go Green Detangler - Lavender WetBrush Go Green Detangler - Lavender
description: An innovation in hair care, the eco-friendly Go Green Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) comb is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Go Green Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth. But wait, it gets better – when you’re ready to replace your brush, you’ll be happy to know that it will naturally biodegrade within five years!
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures, and especially good for children.
ingredient: Biodegradable Plant Starch.

name: Oribe Purse Dry Texturising Spray 75ml Oribe Purse Dry Texturising Spray 75ml
description: When it comes to hair, bigger is always better – and Oribe’s Dry Texturizing Spray is the perfect shortcut to enviable volume and sexy, sultry texture. With patented polymers that absorb oil at the roots, this is a great alternative to dry shampoo, that will leave your locks looking ‘just-styled’ without a hint of powdery white residue. Kiwi and passion flower extracts deliver powerful antioxidants to maintain moisture and protect colour, while Hawaiian white ginger root extract softens and adds shine and mango extract hydrates and smooths. For that effortlessly texturised, ‘piecey’ look, a unique co-polymer blend provides subtle hold, allowing styles to last longer. An ideal addition to any hair care collection – and something of a ‘gateway’ spray likely to get you hooked on Oribe – this black and gold bottle is a sure-fire symbol of chic.
how_to_use: Shake. Spray. Pump. Finishes and holds styles. Add heat for extra volume

name: Amika The Kure Multi-Task Repair Treatment Amika The Kure Multi-Task Repair Treatment
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Centred around dry, damaged tresses, The Kure Multi-Repair Treatment is a fast-acting rinse-out mask that also doubles as a leave-in treatment; the ultimate form of damage control, it works to strengthen your strands and repair damage in a mere 60 seconds! Think: freshly trimmed ends in a treatment. (We can dream...) Clinically proven to repair and strengthen the damage caused by everyday stressors, heat and chemical treatments (compared to control after three uses), this bond repair treatment is a hair necessity for depleted strands. Packed with bond cure technology, it targets the most abundant bonds in your hair, which break the most frequently during daily wear and tear. What's more, it is infused with plant butters (think: mango butter extract, borage oil and shea butter) and vegan proteins to lend the formula an abundance of conditioning omega fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. Your strands will thank you for it! Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: Fine hair types: after using the kure bond repair shampoo and conditioner, apply multi-task repair hair treatment from roots to ends. leave on for at least 1 minute and rinse. Coarse hair types: after using the kure bond repair shampoo, apply multi-task repair hair treatment from roots to ends. leave on for at least 1 minute and rinse. follow with kure bond repair conditioner. Pro tip: for stronger results, can be used as a leave in treatment. Next, apply a dime-sized amount of the closer to hair, mid lengths to ends, prior to any additional styling products. focus on damaged ends. add more as needed. For best results, use multi-task 1-2x per week with the entire kure system

name: BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Davines OI Oil Davines OI Oil
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Daviness OI range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ku) a secret ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the Lipstick Tree to protect their hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensively replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and controlling weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. Available in two sizes, pick from either 135ml or 50ml for home and away.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Conditioner 90ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Conditioner 90ml
description: Replenish frizz-prone hair with this rich conditioning formula inspired by Rio. Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Strengthening & Smoothing Conditioner infuses locks lasting moisture for a silky, soft-to-the-touch finish. Formulated with patented SOL Seal Technology (plant-based keratin micro-capsules), this strand-smoothing conditioner works to strengthen your hair as it repairs damage by ionically bonding your split ends. Made with all hair types and textures in mind, this creamy formula cloaks your lengths with a weightless, moisture-rich blend of antioxidant Brazil nut selenium and fatty acid-rich buriti fruit oil. What's more, this luscious conditioner is infused with the brand's iconic Cheirosa '62 scent to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as you comb away the tangles.
how_to_use: After using Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo, apply a generous amount, concentrating on mid-strand to ends. Leave 2-3 minutes, or more as desired, then rinse. Use with Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo for maximum benefits.

name: JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask 147ml JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask 147ml
description: Meet the ultimate weekly treatment for thirsty locks of all types and textures - even fine hair. JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask infuses every strand with intense moisture for lasting hydration, softness and manageability that won't weigh you down. With notes of fruity blackcurrant and smooth vanilla to make this mask a real treat to use, Nurture Deep Moisture Mask gets to work replenishing dried out tresses in as little as 3 minutes. Rice protein and camellia seed oil add shine, softness and strength, while JVN's patented (and sustainable!) sugarcane-derived hemi-squalane instantly improves hair health and restores 'slip' - without the drying effects of silicones.
how_to_use: Apply to freshly shampooed mid lengths and ends, and use a wide tooth comb to disperse through the hair. Leave on for 3-5 minutes, and rinse. Use in place of conditioner weekly.

name: JVN Complete Blowout Styling Milk Travel 25ml JVN Complete Blowout Styling Milk Travel 25ml
description: Bring the heat (but not the damage) with JVN Blowout Styling Milk Travel. A heat-activated style saver, this lightweight lotion locks out heat damage and humidity while extending your style for up to 48 hours - making it a go-to for weekends away. With a fast absorbing texture that won't weigh strands down, this styling milk is enriched with orchid milk to deeply hydrate and seal in moisture - helping to replenish parched strands. Ionic peptides guard against heat damage up to 450°F, for healthier hair whether you're straightening, curling or opting for a bouncy blow dry. Cassia bark polymer creates gentle hold, humidity resistance and style 'memory' to cut down on restyling time the next morning. With a subtle citrus, amber and cashmere musk scent, this hair hero creates styles that smell as good as they look.
how_to_use: Apply to palms and rub together, smoothing down mid lengths and ends before lightly adding whatever remains to roots. Activate by blow drying - then flat iron, curl or wave to your heart's desire!
