name: Function of Beauty Strengthen #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml Function of Beauty Strengthen #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml
description: Feeling your hair grow weaker and weaker as the days go on? Enter: Strengthen Hair Goal which shoots for total strand protection and increased elasticity and scores! Slotting right into your wash day routine with ease, this booster shot harnesses the power of hair-reviving pea sprout extract to add a much-needed splash of resilience. Renewing your hair from root-to-tip, this 100% vegan blend of scalp-loving essentials stimulates healthy hair growth and wards off breakage, split ends and dryness. New hair, who’s this?
how_to_use: Snap open your #hairgoal. Pour 1 shot into any of your Function of Beauty hair care bases. Each box contains 2 shots. Shake (or stir!) for 15 seconds!

name: Function of Beauty Curly Hair Conditioner 325ml Function of Beauty Curly Hair Conditioner 325ml
description: Perfect for hair that twists and turns, the Curly Base Conditioner enhances your curl pattern and lays the foundation for manageable, moisturised hair that maximises the three boosters of your choice. Powered by ultra-nourishing shea butter, this vegan conditioner helps with manageability while locking in moisture and shine, so you can style your curls with ease. The 97% naturally-derived formula is a complex blend of silicone-free conditioning agents designed to provide the slip curly hair needs for any kind of 'do. Not to mention the exclusive 'Nude Peach' fragrance bursts with notes of peach nectar, jasmine and lemon zest, making it an absolute sensorial treat to massage into your scalp and transform your shower into a spa. Whatever three boosters you choose – from anti-frizz to curl definition – this conditioner is more than your average nourishing must-have, instead, it's elevated hair care made just for you.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply generously through hair and rinse thoroughly. For best results, use with Function of Beauty Shampoo.

name: Hair Gain Comb Hair Gain Comb
description: Designed to make light work of what can often be a major detangling task, the biodegradable Wide Tooth Comb teases out stubborn knots, prevents shedding and is perfectly suited for all hair types and textures.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.

name: Function of Beauty Deep Condition #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml Function of Beauty Deep Condition #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml
description: Taking a new, loving approach to your thirsty tresses, the Deep Condition Hair Goal rescues your hair from the brink of dryness with an all-nourishing, just-for-you formula that you never knew you needed. Powered by hair-reviving apple fruit extract, this unique conditioner hydrates your hair without leaving it lank or weighed down. Instead, its light-as-air mix helps to repair your broken or damaged shafts caused by excess heat or chemicals and restores your once-healthy strands to tip top shape. Delivering a surge of supportive hydration to quench the thirst of dry, crunchy coils, expect a salon-worthy experience right from the comfort of your bathroom!
how_to_use: Snap open your #hairgoal. Pour 1 shot into any of your Function of Beauty hair care bases. Each box contains 2 shots. Shake (or stir!) for 15 seconds!
ingredient: Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Glycerin.

name: OUAI Thick Hair Treatment Masque 236ml OUAI Thick Hair Treatment Masque 236ml
description: Brittle, lacklustre lengths? It’s time to call in for damage control, and the Treatment Mask by Ouai will hydrate, fight frizz and condition with a medley of nourishing ingredients – all held in 100% recyclable packaging. Formulated specially for fine to medium hair types, this lightweight (but hardworking!) mask won’t Ouai down your strands, helping you to split up with split ends for shiny, soft, healthy hair. Using a nourishing blend of shea butter, panthenol and hydrolized keratin, this elixir fights frizz, strengthens, enhances moisture levels and controls flyaways while tackling damage from the very root. Get ready for shiny hair and bucketloads of compliments with its swoon-worthy scent too – presenting you with a one Ouai ticket to LA’s Melrose Place via a sweet, velvety blend of bergamot, lychee, white musk, champagne and rose.
how_to_use: Squeeze out excess water from freshly cleansed hair. Apply a quarter-size amount, starting from the ends and working to the roots. Chill out for 5 minutes, then rinse with cool water to lock in moisture and shine.

name: BLEACH LONDON White Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON White Toner Kit
description: Whatever the shade, the ultimate blonde ambition is to banish brassiness for good – and BLEACH London’s White Toner Kit is one of the best ways we’ve ever found. Neutralising yellow, orangey pigments, this semi-permanent (it lasts around 16-20 washes) post-bleach toner kit keeps hair at its brightest blonde, whether you’re golden, white, silver or platinum. Containing a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a repairing treatment mask (to nourish stressed-out strands), alongside a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet, this really does contain everything you need to carry off effortless application. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This semi-permanent dye will last for around 16-20 washes. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. The final effect will depend on your hair colour. Best results will be seen on already very pale yellow bleached or highlighted hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH London TOTAL BLEACH or BLEACH London DIY DIP DYE to lighten your hair first. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Follow with BLEACH London SILVER SHAMPOO every other wash to extend brightness.
ingredient: Colourant 40ml :- Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocamide MEA, Polysilicone-18 Cetyl Phosphate, Ethanolamine, Carbomer, Sodium Sulfite, Betaine, Dipropylene Glycol, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Mica, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Bisabolol, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium HEDTA, Boswellia Serrata Gum, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Resorcinol, Sodium Benzoate, 2-Amino-4-Hydroxyethylaminoanisole Sulfate, 4-Amino-m-Cresol, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene. name: Gisou Honey Infused Leave-In Conditioner 150ml Gisou Honey Infused Leave-In Conditioner 150ml
description: An overachiever if ever we laid eyes on one, Gisou’s Honey Infused Leave-In Conditioner works hard to *takes a deep breath*: hydrate, smooth, detangle your mane, all while protecting hair from heat damage, pollution and breakage. Phew! How does it do it? Well, of course, there’s Gisou’s star ingredient, honey, front and centre. A natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), honey is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and add all of the shine. Alongside that, you’ll find baobab extract, argan oil and panthenol, all of which work together soften and condition hair while making the styling process a whole lot more manageable.
how_to_use: Spray through wet hair after shampooing and conditioning and style as usual.

name: Kitsch Eco-Friendly Jumbo Open Shape Claw Clip (Various Colours) Kitsch Eco-Friendly Jumbo Open Shape Claw Clip (Various Colours)
description: The secret to minimalist styling with just a *touch* of quirkiness, the Eco-Friendly Jumbo Claw Clip is about to become the chicest new addition to your hair accessory wardrobe. What’s so great about a claw clip that made them a staple in every nineties up-do? Well, they can be used to style and hold even the thicket of manes (they work brilliantly in curly or coily hair too!), the stylish designs that are both classic and statement at the same time are made from recycled materials — yay! After all, who doesn’t love a more sustainable option when it comes to our hair care? Oh, and did we mention how much less damaging a claw clip can be to your mane compared to your usual scrunchie or hair tie? Hair breakage? We don’t know her.
how_to_use: Keep the clip dry to avoid damage.
ingredient: Recycled materials.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml
description: Ultra-hydrating and divinely scented, Sol de Janeiro’s Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Hair Oil promotes mirror-like shine and impressively sleek strands. It’s infused with a nourishing cocktail of Brazilian oils (read: patauá, buriti and pequi) which are brimming with antioxidants, fatty acids and essential vitamins that deeply moisturise, smooth and enhance the lustre of your lengths. This luscious oil is also laced with the brand’s iconic Cheirosa ’62 scent that’s sure to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as work it into your strands. It’s credentials are pretty stellar too; in a clinical study conducted by an independent third party lab, the oil (when used as directed) was clinically proven to repair split ends and provide 72-hour frizz control and up to 450° heat protection.
how_to_use: For Wet/Damp Hair: Use this oil treatment as a before air drying or heat styling to tame frizz — or as a heat protectant for up to 450 degrees. Ideal for dry, damaged hair. For Dry Hair: Rub a small amount of oil in between your palms, and start with your ends, working your way up to mid-shaft. Benefits of application on dry hair include taming flyways, managing frizz, enhancing shine, or adding hydration in between washes.

description: A leave-in conditioning serum to separate curls while providing soft, flexible hold, Davines’ Curl Building Serum promotes elasticity, fights against frizz and protects from humidity. Perfect for those keen to boost definition for beautifully bouncy curls, coils, waves or ringlets, this featherlight formula ‘wraps’ every hair to create shape and ward against weather’s worst efforts (take that humidity). Perfect for porous or delicate hair that is brittle or prone to split ends, this keeps your curls healthy and helps to recover hair’s ‘spring’.

description: If your hair seems to never quite feel as fresh as you'd like then it's high time you introduced Aveda's Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo into your tress-care sessions... This effective cleansing formula is powered by a medley of deeply clarifying ingredients that help to leave your hair feeling squeaky clean, revitalised and ever-so shiny. It's made 97% naturally derived ingredients and features micelles to gently lift product build-up and impurities without disrupting the balance of your scalp and strands, as well as white vinegar to purify your hair without stripping it! The finishing touch is an invigorating aroma of certified organic rosemary, peppermint and spearmint that promises to stimulate your senses as you shower.

name: Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum
description: As Hindu mythology would have it, the amla tree grew from where Brahma’s tears hit the earth during meditation. Said to have been the first ever tree to germinate, its berries are rich in vitamin C and a popular Ayurvedic remedy for keeping scalps in tip-top condition. Delightfully weightless, the SahaScalp Amla Soothing Serum harnesses the power of amla to deeply condition hair and soothe itchy scalps. Bakuchi (extracted from babchi plant seeds) balances the crown chakra and helps to rejuvenate sensitive skin while hydrating and encouraging skin cell regeneration. Aloe then strengthens and nourishes dry scalps, and vitamin E cools itchiness. A root-to-tip nourishing elixir, this serum nourishes hair, clears product build-up from the scalp, softens hair, smooths cuticles, adds shine and protects hair from further breakage — all with a deliciously mindful scent that instils a sense of peace and calm. Think: a chakra-balancing blend of ripe blackcurrant with tea rose and fresh orange blossom on a bed of woody amber and musk.
how_to_use: Part dry hair. Apply a few drops for fine hair, one full dropper for thick hair. Rub between your palms. Massage into scalp with a focus on your crown to release stress. Focus on dry areas of the scalp. Follow this ritual bi-weekly; for best results leave in overnight. For a deeper treatment, massage a generous amount onto scalp, rinse then cleanse. Safe for all scalp types and suitable for colour-treated hair. Formulated without silicones, parabens, phthalates, sulphates, animal derived ingredients. Cruelty-free and vegan.

name: Coco & Eve Youth Revive Pro Youth Conditioner 280ml Coco & Eve Youth Revive Pro Youth Conditioner 280ml
description: Say goodbye to dull, lacklustre locks with Coco & Eve's Youth Revive Pro Youth Conditioner, an age-defying formula that seeks to restore volume, strength and shine. Brimming with botanicals such as PRO-VITALI B (a sustainably-sourced honey blend) and coconut oil, the creamy conditioner protects against breakage and split ends for a fuller, thicker-looking finish. The formula is supported by retinol, caring for both the scalp and strands to encourage optimal conditions for hair growth; while prebiotics help to balance excess oils for a fresher feel. Stubborn tangles and seemingly unmanageable hair are no match for this fortifying formula…

name: Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 100ml Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 100ml
description: Fed up of frizzy, lifeless curls that refuse to stay in line? The Curl Defining Gel from Bouclème creates a non-sticky cast around your curls to hold your style and keep it in shape... and all in a vegan and alcohol-free formula! If smoothed and defined curls are on your wishlist, then add the Curl Defining Gel straight to your bag and get ready to give your tresses a new lease of life. A best-seller for good reason, this serum-like gel promises to deeply hydrate your mane and reveal unrivalled body and bounce without any greasy residue or flaking. It's touchably-soft curls from here on out thanks to a blend of nourishing virgin coconut oil, argan oil and linseed extract, and with no drying alcohol and a fully vegan, 99% naturally derived formula, we're wondering what we ever did without this sunshine-hued bottle...
how_to_use: Application differs depending on your curl texture and desired results. Apply to soaking wet hair. For extra volume: Pour gel into palms and graze gel over canopy, tip head forward and graze underneath. Apply more gel to ends and scrunch hair up towards head. Scrunch and hold each section for 10 seconds to encourage curl formation. For volume control: Use fingers to rake gel through hair in sections starting at the back of the head and working towards the front. Ensure even distribution. This method works well for medium/thick textures to elongate curls and prevent shrinkage. Style as usual. Avoid touching hair until completely dry to prevent frizz. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel.

description: Available in eight colour-correcting hues, this weightless mineral powder clings to your hair to cover the look of greys and any dark roots that threaten to peek out to deliver seamless, consolidated colour. This moisturising formula hydrates the hair without weighing it down, while also protecting against pollution build up. name: Oribe Travel Gold Lust Oil 50ml Oribe Travel Gold Lust Oil 50ml
description: Treat your hair to some golden goodness with Oribe's Gold Lust Nourishing Hair Oil, a luxurious yet light oil that absorbs swiftly into strands calling out for an SOS. Each protective drop of this liquid gold penetrates the hair to deeply condition, strengthen and smooth, imparting intense nourishment and incredible shine. A rich blend of emollients conditions and softens hair without weighing it down: argan oil adds lightweight shine, reduces frizz and shields strands from damaging UV rays and pollutants; jasmine oil helps to combat a dry, itchy scalp and enhance shine further; sandalwood extract, amur cork bark extract and barley extract stimulate the hair cuticle; cassis seed oil imparts moisturising omega-6 and omega-3 acids and, finally, shea butter (rich in vitamin F) moisturises and softens dryness and damage, adding lustre and helping to prevent further damage. Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. Providing thermal protection, detangling and reducing drying time - on top of all of the above! - there's really nothing this hair miracle can't do. Plus, the alchemist-style bottle is sure to add a touch of luxe opulence to your dressing table.

The time has come to up your 'cool quota' and reveal effortlessly styled locks. So, you've perfected the sexily tousled, slightly dishevelled look with the Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist... but how about creating long-lasting volume and hold? Sam McKnight's chic styling staple will be your new go-to to achieve weightless volume and effortlessly tousled locks, finished with an irresistibly chic fragrance. It's time to go big or go home...

name: Act+Acre Intelligent Hair Towel Act+Acre Intelligent Hair Towel
description: Not only will the Intelligent hair towel elevate your wash day rituals to spa-level heights of luxury, this waffle knit microfiber towel reduce friction and frizz to reveal healthy, swish-worthy strands. Act+Acre are on a mission to transform damaged, over-wrought tresses and leave them soft, shiny and visibly healthy. A vital part of your wash day routine that you might not have given a second thought to is how you wrap up your mane post-wash. Before you click ‘add to bag' it's time for a quick science lesson... after water exposure, your hair texture shifts as hydrogen bonds break which are integral to how your hair stays in shape. From frizz to curl pattern and overall volume, the way you care for your hair during the drying process dramatically impacts the look and feel of your strands. So make way for the Intelligent Hair Towel, this clever microfiber creation stops breakage in its tracks to ensure your style stays frizz-free, not to mention speeding up your drying time by 50%!
how_to_use: Flip damp hair forward and place the towel at the base of your neck. Twist hair into the tail end of towel. Leave hair wrapped for at least five minutes for optimal drying. Wash with other like colours on the cold setting and lay flat or hang to dry.
ingredient: Size: 10x25in / 26x64cm. Microfiber

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 80ml Hair By Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 80ml
description: A styler with serious benefits, this defining, de-fluffing and de-frizzing balm deeply conditions every strand it touches — think of this as hair care and a styler in one pretty-in-pink bottle. Best friend to the lazy beauty maven, the Happy Endings Nourishing Balm combines hair care with the styling prowess that Sam McKnight is famed for. In need of a primer to use ahead of styling? This multi-tasking balm perfectly preps your hair and makes light works of styling your ‘do. Is second-day frizz ruining your look? Just a pump or two of this conditioning cream tames flyaways and smooths as you work it through to leave you with perfectly tamed tresses. Thanks to ‘Vegabead Microcapsules’ that boost manageability and shine (without adding build-up either), you can re-style and smooth your hair as the day goes on — these shine-boosting microcapsules reactivate whenever you comb or brush your strands… we’re just as impressed as you are!.

Use yours to work through knots without causing breakage, and relish in the fact that it’s made with post-consumer recycled plastic, so you’re doing your bit for the planet, too.

Deep Conditioning Mask, the formula features vitamin and mineral-rich algae extract to nourish locks, strengthening biotin, moisture-boosting panthenol and richly hydrating rose oil. name: Philip Kingsley Density Amino Acid Protein Booster (120 Capsules) Philip Kingsley Density Amino Acid Protein Booster (120 Capsules)

name: BLEACH LONDON Rose Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Rose Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: The INKEY List Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment 150ml The INKEY List Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment 150ml
description: If you find that you’re moulting more than usual, or feel like your hair is increasingly thin, THE INKEY LIST’s Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment was made with you in mind. Clinically proven to reduce and prevent hair loss (after three months of testing, 85% of testers showed significant improvement), this overnight treatment invigorates stem cells to optimise growth and increase your hair’s thickness. With 1% caffeine powder – a stimulant that kick-starts sluggish follicles – alongside 1% Redensyl (which both supplements growth and helps counteract fallout) and 1% Betaine to soften and nourish each strand, this helps to build body for lustrous locks.

Wash hair as normal in the morning, if desired. Use every night for best results over a 3 month period.

name: Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 300ml Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 300ml
description: Fed up of frizzy, lifeless curls that refuse to stay in line? The Curl Defining Gel from Bouclème creates a non-sticky cast around your curls to hold your style and keep it in shape… and all in a vegan and alcohol-free formula! If smoothed and defined curls are on your wishlist, then add the Curl Defining Gel straight to your bag and get ready to give your tresses a new lease of life. A best-seller for good reason, this serum-like gel promises to deeply hydrate your mane and reveal unrivalled body and bounce without any greasy residue or flaking. It’s touchably-soft curls from here on out thanks to a blend of nourishing virgin coconut oil, argan oil and linseed extract, and with no drying alcohol and a fully vegan, 99% naturally derived formula, we’re wondering what we ever did without this sunshine-hued bottle…
how_to_use: Application differs depending on your curl texture and desired results. Apply to soaking wet hair. For extra volume: Pour gel into palms and graze gel over canopy, tip head forward and graze underneath. Apply more gel to ends and scrunch hair up towards head. Scrunch and hold each section for 10 seconds to encourage curl formation. For volume control: Use fingers to rake gel through hair in sections starting at the back of the head and working towards the front. Ensure even distribution. This method works well for medium/thick textures to elongate curls and prevent shrinkage. Style as usual. Avoid touching hair until completely dry to prevent frizz. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel.

name: The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml
description: With a 'gentle-is-essential' formula, the Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair is an effective cleanser that rids your hair, skin and scalp of excess sebum, dirt, debris and product residue - without leaving skin feeling stripped, dry or irritated. With a lightly foaming formula, this multipurpose product uses a modified sulphate derivative called SLES-2, at a minimal concentration of just 4%. This modified sulphate is an effective cleansing agent - its a surfactant, which dissolves the barrier between dirt and oil on your skin, scalp and hair, allowing this to be rinsed away easily with water - but doesn't feature the irritating, sensitising or drying attributes we often associate with traditional sulphates. Instead, it helps to maintain the skin barrier - both on your body and your scalp - to keep it hydrated and healthy. In fact, this cleanser can even safely be used to a colour-treated mane without stripping it.

description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.

description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...

Smart keratin helps to bolster the defences each strand from the cortex to the cuticle, while bamboo stem cells set out to strengthen existing strands and encourage healthy hair growth by extending the anagen phase of your hair life cycle. description: With a lightweight, non-greasy formula, The Ordinary's Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA for Scalp serum brings all the benefits of skin care to your scalp, stopping dryness and dehydration in their tracks while also maintaining the integrity of your moisture barrier (yes, even on your scalp!) Mirroring the formula of their very similar product designed to target your face, this lightweight, serum heroes two key ingredients: hyaluronic acid and natural moisturising factors, to strengthen and moisturise sensitive or dry skin. A much-beloved humectant, hyaluronic acid absorbs water from the air, holding it within the skin and offering a flood of hydration. Natural moisturising factors also help to keep the outer layers of skin hydrated and protected, thanks to a mix of multiple amino acids, fatty acids and ceramides. And don't worry about this serum leaving hair looking greasy: the thin, milky texture allows for easy distribution on the scalp, without sticking to the hair and weighing down the roots.

Keep out of reach of children.

Made from clear oils, this innovative formula grants a glossy finish that won’t mar your colour of weigh down your lengths. The luscious oil has a delicious tropical scent with notes of creamy coconut, yuzu extract and woody undertones that linger subtly on your tresses after use. The results? Seriously soft, healthy-looking hair with an unrivalled shine.

description: Dealing with all the tell-tale signs of hard water? Think dryness, brittleness, brassiness and dullness. Meet your new hair hero, HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner. Specially formulated to counteract the effects of minerals and heavy metals, it restores softness, strength and shine from root to tip. Hyaluronic acid infuses strands with moisture, to plump up dry, brittle hair, while provitamin B5 boosts hair strength to ward off breakage. Free from silicones, this lightweight formula seals in hydration and adds just enough slip without weighing locks down.

name: Davines DEDE Conditioner Davines DEDE Conditioner
description: A light, detangling conditioner for those with fine or fragile hair, Davines’ DEDE Conditioner leaves your locks soft without limiting lift so your hair has a beautiful bounce. Perfect for those who’re committed to everyday cleansing, this delivers intense (but non-suffocating!) nourishment, to help tease the tangles and amplify shine while providing protection from daily aggressors. Ideal for all those prone to limp, lifeless lengths this is brimming with mineral-rich red celery extract (a source of fortifying sodium, potassium and calcium) and, although it feels wonderfully rich, it will strengthen your hair without quashing its volume. Sourced from a farm in Orbassano (a town in the Torino region), the red celery used within Davines’ DEDE range – part of their ‘Essential Haircare’ edit – is one of a handful of crops that are lovingly reared by Italian growers; showcasing the brand’s commitment to sustainability, as well as to supporting local industry. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (DEDE, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this incredibly gentle (and very good-looking!) conditioner, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!

name: Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit
description: Calling all blondes! Say goodbye to dull, brassy, brittle hair with the Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit, a four-step ritual designed to restore visible strength and vibrancy to blonde, lightened and grey hair. Working as a two-part system, the No.0 Hair Treatment and No.3 Hair Perfector™ draw upon the brand’s patented bond-building technology to repair visible damage and brittleness. Next up is No.4P Blonde Enhancer™ Toning Shampoo, a purple shampoo formulated to banish brassiness and brighten your blonde; all while cleansing hair of impurities. Completing your vibrancy-boosting routine, No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask restores weightless moisture (goodbye dry, dehydrated hair), adds shine and enhances smoothness.
how_to_use: No.0 (40ml): Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes then follow with No.3. Do not rinse at any point. No.3 (30ml): Use directly after No.0. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. No.4P (20ml): Apply to wet hair. Lather fully and leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse well. For more intense toning, leave on hair up to 5 minutes. No.8 (20ml): Apply mask to clean, damp hair mid-length to ends and work through with fingers. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse well and style as usual. Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair, and less for fine or short hair.

name: Pattern Cleansing Shampoo 230.7ml Pattern Cleansing Shampoo 230.7ml
description: Designed to deeply cleanse and refresh your tresses, the Cleansing Shampoo removes any residue, dirt and product build-up that could be standing in the way of beautiful, bouncy curls. Thanks to an infusion of antioxidant-rich matcha green tea, aloe vera and panthenol, this clarifying shampoo manages to remove dirt and impurities without stripping your scalp of its natural oils. Specially formulated for type 3 and type 4 curls, this blend of ingredients doesn''t disturb moisture levels in the hair shaft and instead, helps low porosity hair take in moisture by keeping the cuticle open and clear of product build-up. Like a breath of fresh air for your scalp, this is just the thing you need to nurse your hair back to health, and the floral blend of jasmine, bergamot & sweet sandalwood certainly doesn't hurt.

If desired wash a second time with PATTERN Cleansing Shampoo. Follow with your preferred PATTERN conditioner or PATTERN related products. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Pro tip: Use every third wash or so to keep hair & scalp residue-free.

description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.

name: Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit
description: Calling all blondes! Say goodbye to dull, brassy, brittle hair with the Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit, a four-step ritual designed to restore visible strength and vibrancy to blonde, lightened and grey hair. Working as a two-part system, the No.0 Hair Treatment and No.3 Hair Perfector™ draw upon the brand’s patented bond-building technology to repair visible damage and brittleness. Next up is No.4P Blonde Enhancer™ Toning Shampoo, a purple shampoo formulated to banish brassiness and brighten your blonde; all while cleansing hair of impurities. Completing your vibrancy-boosting routine, No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask restores weightless moisture (goodbye dry, dehydrated hair), adds shine and enhances smoothness.
how_to_use: No.0 (40ml): Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes then follow with No.3. Do not rinse at any point. No.3 (30ml): Use directly after No.0. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. No.4P (20ml): Apply to wet hair. Lather fully and leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse well. For more intense toning, leave on hair up to 5 minutes. No.8 (20ml): Apply mask to clean, damp hair mid-length to ends and work through with fingers. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse well and style as usual. Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair, and less for fine or short hair.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml
description: An iconic hair hero given an irresistibly tropical twist, Philip Kingsley’s Coconut Breeze Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Infused with exotic scent, this Coconut Breeze incarnation captures the scent of sunshine and pure white sands, taking your head on a holiday with warm notes of coconut, jasmine, almond and vanilla. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A treat for the senses as well as tresses, this will leave your locks smelling divine, as well as looking and feeling intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive!

You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. name: Pattern Hair Clip Pattern Hair Clip
description: Whether you need to section your hair as you style, or keep your strands firmly tied up for the day, the Hair Clip from Pattern is there for all your hair care needs. Formed of strong, premium acetate, this clip is the perfect companion to keep your hair sectioned as you care for each and every curl on your head. Picture this, you’ve put your conditioner in or are doing a co-wash, but you need to work through your locks in segments without getting lost in your tresses. This ultra-sturdy hair clip helps to make the space you need to style your curls, coils and kinks with ease, keeping every section firmly out of the way as you give your strands all the care and attention they deserve.

name: Amika Mighty Mini Dryer Amika Mighty Mini Dryer
description: amika's first travel-friendly hair dryer, the Mighty Mini Ionic Dryer is small enough to pop in your hand luggage, while still packing a powerful punch. In fact, we'd go as far as to say this is the secret for quick, frizz-free drying, wherever you are. Despite its small size, the Mighty Mini Ionic Dryer offers 1100 watts of drying power. And it harnesses amika's next-gen heat technology, emitting far-infrared heat that instantly penetrate the cortex of the hair cuticle, heating from the inside out. This means that hair is heated evenly and in half the time of conventional hair dryers, greatly reducing the risk of damage. It also means a whole lot less frizz and a whole lot more shine, no matter where you are in the world. Result.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. Then use the hair dryer to style your hair into your desired fashion.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. Voltage information: 1000 watts

name: Slip Pure Silk Skinny Scrunchies (Various Colours) Slip Pure Silk Skinny Scrunchies (Various Colours)
description: Made from a carefully chosen elastic tie with a sumptuous silk covering, Slip's Skinny Scrunchies minimise damage while looking totally chic. Get ready to upgrade your updo in more ways than one. Crafted from the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme, the Skinny Scrunchie is a must-add to your hair styling rituals. Whether you're creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate 'do, this sumptuous silk leaves no trace of kinks or creases. name: OUAI Medium Hair Conditioner Refill 946ml OUAI Medium Hair Conditioner Refill 946ml

It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage smooth, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of babassu and coconut oil grants virtually endless hydration to your hair. Last but definitely not least, the miracle ingredient behind this conditioner’s glossy shine and silk-like finish is vitamin-rich kumquat fruit extract. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is another beautiful bonus; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a gorgeous scent that lingers even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: Coco & Eve Super Hydrating Shampoo 250ml Coco & Eve Super Hydrating Shampoo 250ml
description: Featuring a rich lather (but no drying sulphates!) the Super Hydrating Shampoo leaves hair feeling clean, hydrated and healthy from the very first wash. Never stripping locks of their colour, this shampoo uses hyaluronic acid to intensely hydrate for a smooth and soft finish, while pineapple fruit enzymes slough away the dirt, dry skin and excess product build-up atop your scalp. A fermented oil complex (featuring the likes of argan, almond and green tea oils) gives shine and strength without weighing hair down, and nourishing avocado pumps strands with proteins and vitamins before sealing hair cuticles for a lustrous look. Coconut feeds lengths with fatty acids to seal split ends too, and the iconic coconut and fig scent will transport you straight to a tropical island...

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Aveda Smoother 100ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Aveda Smoother 100ml
description: All hair types can reap the rewards of Aveda’s smoothing pre-style treatment… formulated for all hair types and textures, from fine, medium and thick manes to straight 1A’s, wavy 2A-2C’s and curly 3A’s-3C’s and colour and chemically-treated hair. Transform your tresses with the revamped formula of the Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Smoother, infused with sand ginger to naturally protect vulnerable strands from the drying effects of UV rays. It’s smooth hair from here on out thanks to the botanical smoothing oil blend of Kalahari melon seed oil and Tamanu oil that conditions your cuticles and leaves your hair with a lust-worthy softness and shine. If you find yourself constantly battling against frizz-inducing humidity, you can thank Aveda for the invisible plant polymer shield that cloaks every single strand to repel water without the need for silicone. Finished with Aveda’s own ‘Pure-Fume Aroma’ of bergamot, palmarosa and Australian sandalwood to scent your tresses with an indulgent floral fragrance, we’re struggling to find a reason not to make this a mainstay in our styling routines. Available in a sized-to-try 25ml and shelfie-worthy 100ml, you need never be without this anti-frizz serum saviour.
how_to_use: To prep hair for styling, work a small amount of product in hands and apply through damp hair. Style as desired.

name: BLEACH LONDON Rose Conditioner 250ml BLEACH LONDON Rose Conditioner 250ml
description: As well as moisturising strands, BLEACH London’s Rosé Conditioner imparts a subtle touch of stunning pink colour. It can be used to neutralise unwanted green tones in your hair, or to enhance blonde shades with a soft, pastel pink rinse. Ideal used after BLEACH’s {Rosé Shampoo}, this is the perfect way to change up your style without making a big colour commitment, while also softening with shea butter and strengthening with hydrolysed wheat proteins. What’s more, like the entire BLEACH line, the luscious formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason to love it.

description: Over done it with the dye or scorched your strands with your straighteners? Allow us to introduce you to OLAPLEX's Hero Bundle: a three-piece routine of their hair repair heroes. Earning upwards of 500 reviews, the No 3 Hair Perfector (100ml) is a pre-shampoo that's powered by star ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate (sounds science-y, we know) to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching or heat styling. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo (250ml) deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner (250ml), which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.

name: OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 130g OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 130g
description: The perfect way to add some ‘grit’ to slippery hair types, OUAI’s Texturizing Hair Spray is ideal for recreating that enviable ‘French girl’ look – a tousled sexiness that exudes Parisian nonchalance. Invert your head and spray the roots to create ‘oomph’ (and absorb oil), then spray the lengths and ‘tszuj’ with fingers to achieve a separated, choppy finish. Enriched with OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology’ – a cocktail of nourishing ingredients including amino acids, tamarind seed, keratin, ama oil, hibiscus and jasmine to strengthen, enhance moisture levels, repair and protect from humidity – this refreshes, volumises and perfumes your strands with the delicate scents of Italian bergamot, rose, lily of the valley, waterlily, iris and white musk (ideal to disguise a stale, night-on-the-town odour).
how_to_use: Shake it up. Holding the bottle 6" from your head, mist dry hair from roots to ends. For ultimate volume, flip hair upside down and spray. Jen's Tip: Mist it on dry hair and scrunch strands out with your fingers for a loose, lived-in look. Flip hair upside down and spray for instantly fresh-looking hair.

name: BLEACH LONDON Total Bleach Kit BLEACH LONDON Total Bleach Kit
description: Bottling BLEACH London’s colour expertise so you can access it from the comfort of home, this Total Bleach Kit contains salon-standard bleach to lighten hair up to seven levels for gorgeous, platinum blonde shades. To help you achieve your lightest, brightest blonde – whether you’re a bleach-a-holic or just need a root touch-up – this kit contains a bottle of developing lotion (peroxide), two sachets of bleaching powder and a nourishing conditioning repair mask. Alongside this, there’s a pair of gloves (to keep your hands bleach-free) and an instruction leaflet to guide you through the mane-changing process. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This kit lightens hair up to 7 levels and contains BLEACH London REINCARNATION MASK for optimum hair health and is suitable for roots up to 2.5cm long. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. Not suitable for hair that is very dark, has been dyed with henna, metallic dyes or colour restorers. Best results will be seen on mid-coloured untreated hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have a second pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.

name: Oribe Straight Away Smoothing Blowout Cream 5 oz. Oribe Straight Away Smoothing Blowout Cream 5 oz.
description: Transform even thick, curly, unruly tresses into smooth, sleek and straight locks with Oribe’s Straight Away Blowout Cream. Providing heat protection up to 450°, the formula minimises damage from heat styling while also strengthening, thanks to heat-activated protein and hydrolysed quinoa, which reduces breakage while providing subtle body and movement. The cream also fights humidity and frizz, smoothing strands with a straightening copolymer blend, sealing split ends with great mullein flower and nourishing with yacón root juice, a tropical plant native to Peru. Not only does this make blow drying easier and more manageable, it also makes your lock looks last longer – simply distribute evenly through damp hair and let your dryer do the rest of the work.
how_to_use: Distribute throughout damp hair, section by section, before blowing out silky smooth. A flat-iron finish adds extra perfection

name: Bouclème Curl Cleanser 100ml Bouclème Curl Cleanser 100ml
description: Perfect for a co-wash day, the Curl Cleanser reinvigorates dry, undefined curls with mild cleansing agents coupled with nourishing ingredients. A creamy, non-foaming cleanser that boosts shine and strengthens curls. A mid-week wash doesn’t get much better than this. The Curl Cleanser (available in 100ml and 300ml) can be used for gentle washing or to keep the co-washers among us going. Starting with the scalp, this luxe formula uses decyl glucoside, a mild cleansing base to keep greasy roots far, far away; a helping of virgin coconut oil moisturises and strengthens, alongside organic aloe vera to condition and cleanse. Not only will your hair feel hydrated and soft, but it’ll look it too as Bouclème have formulated this shampoo with argan oil to impart a glossy, enviable shine.

name: Drybar Hold Me Hair Clips Drybar Hold Me Hair Clips
description: The key to the bouncy, sought-after blow-dry lies in the prep, so make sure you section your hair in style with the Hold Me Hair Clips, the easy (and cute) way to hold small to large sections of your tresses without leaving stubborn dents behind. Perfect for keeping your strands out of the way while you create your bouncy blowout, these 'alligator jaw' hair clips are designed to stay put without slipping as you style. Efficiency is the goal when heat styling, and these grips make your drying time more effective and less time-consuming thanks to the jointed arm that holds small or large sections of hair. Created for use on wet and dry hair, these buttercup-yellow grips are a hair care essential.
how_to_use: Use to section hair during blow-drying, curling, or straightening. For damp styling, use lower arm as a comb to create vertical sections in hair and clip. Makes blow-drying more effective and efficient. For dry styling, use lower arm to create horizontal sections below the part in dry hair and clip for optimal use of Drybar Detox Shampoos & Conditioners.

name: OUAI Wave Spray 145ml OUAI Wave Spray 145ml
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s ouai-ve spray grants gorgeous separation and flexible hold while perfuming your hair with its heavenly blend of Italian lemon, rose de mai, magnolia, lily, blackberry, cedarwood, amber, patchouli, sandalwood and white musk. Simply twist still-damp hair and mist lengths with Wave Spray then ‘unravel’ to reveal enviable, ‘French girl’ bed-hair texture.

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner 200ml Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner 200ml
description: Winner of the 'Ultimate Shampoo and Conditioner' Grazia Award in 2020 and the 'Best Conditioner for Damaged Hair' Marie Claire Hair Award in 2021, Aveda’s Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner nourishes and instantly detangles, helping to rebuild brittle strands for a supple, soft and silky result. With 98% nature-derived ingredients, this deep-conditioning hero smooths, strengthens and separates compromised hair – feeding your lengths with a cocktail of healing, replenishing extracts that maximise shine and help minimise breakage. Suitable for all hair types and textures – even colour-treated and chemically processed – this featherweight formula helps to restore heat- or bleach-weakened hair to its natural glory, while its heavenly scent will envelop your headspace with beautiful, mood-boosting fragrance.

name: BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Shampoo BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Shampoo
description: Swear by slate-toned tresses with BLEACH LONDON's Fade To Grey Shampoo. Battling brassiness in pre-lightened hair, this toning shampoo helps to maintain the coolest manes in the capital. Formulated with innovative anti-green stain (if you know you know) technology, this gentle mask-like cleanser refreshes lengths while helping to fade out-of-place warm tones and maintain your style. Shaking up your look and skipping the salon appointment, all without making a colour commitment, this clever formula grants a slate grey sheen that's perfect for topping up the coverage of already toned hair (on light blonde lengths gradual build up is key!). As if all that wasn't enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH's products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.

Can stain skin, nails, bathroom tiles and grouting. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse with water immediately. Avoid contact with clothing and towels.

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Deeper Love Intense Treatment Mask 50ml Hair by Sam McKnight Deeper Love Intense Treatment Mask 50ml
description: Is your mane calling out for a little tender loving care? Treat your tresses to the newest launch from the genius mind that is Sam McKnight and introduce the Deep Love Intense Treatment Mask to your hair care ritual. Intensely nourishing, this hydration mask restores dull and lacklustre hair to its former glory. Brimming with shea butter and ‘RepHair’ to soften stressed-out strands and bring back the much-coveted lustre you’ve been lacking, this 5-minute mask is the perfect excuse to indulge in self care moment. Catering for damaged strands, an infusion of plant keratin gives your hair the love and attention it deserves and is sure to leave you with that ‘just-left-the-salon-’ swish. With a 50ml and long-lasting 200ml to choose from, you’d need never be without the ‘love’ of your hair’s life…

name: dpHUE ACV Hair Rinse - 8.5 oz dpHUE ACV Hair Rinse - 8.5 oz
description: The cycle of over-shampooing is a hard one to kick but it’s essential for maintaining the vibrancy of your hair colour. dpHUE's advice? Skip the shampoo, reach for the rinse — their Apple Cider Vinegar Hair Rinse, that is. Made with artisanal crafted apple cider vinegar from George Paul Vinegary, it's a shampoo substitute that gently cleanses and removes impurities without stripping hair colour and natural oils that are essential to scalp and hair health. It works in tandem with argan oil, lavender extract and aloe vera to help seal the cuticle, add shine, protect your colour, soothe your scalp and moisturise your strands. Who said you needed to shampoo to reveal your shine?
how_to_use: Wet scalp and hair. Squeeze excess water out. Apply directly to scalp. Massage into scalp and hair. Leave in 1–3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Head Refill Cartridges HELLO KLEAN Shower Head Refill Cartridges
description: A hero for skin and hair, the HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head tackles the drying effects of hard water - no plumbing qualification or water softening system required. When it's ready for a refresh, simply swap in a new Shower Head Refill Cartridges to continue saving water, boosting pressure and filtering out unwanted metals, chlorine and impurities. Featuring advanced two-step filtration powered by amino acids, activated carbon fibre and KDF 55, this clever shower system head removes water-soluble metals (including lead, iron, mercury and nickel), trihalomethane (THMs) and odour. This softer water is kinder on skin and hair, and the boosted pressure makes short work of rinsing out suds for lightweight locks and happier skin.
how_to_use: Remove the Purifying Shower Head and lay on a flat, stable surface. Place a wrench onto the triangle tip of the shower head, handle facing outwards. Place one hand on the wrench, and hold Shower Head with your other hand. Press down and steadily turn the headpiece counterclockwise. Refill the headpiece cartridge. Twist the bottom handle counterclockwise to swap out the carbon cartridge.

name: Coco & Eve Super Hydrating Conditioner 258ml Coco & Eve Super Hydrating Conditioner 258ml
description: Two times thicker than the average conditioner for intense and mask-like conditioning, the Super Hydrating Conditioner will revive damaged hair with a powerful blend of hyaluronic acid and Balinese botanicals. For visibly glossier, shinier and smoother lengths, a hyaluronic acid complex feeds parched hair with moisture – turning back time on dryness, coarseness and frizz – while pineapple fruit enzymes slough away dirt, dry skin and excess product build-up. A fermented oil complex (featuring the likes of argan, almond and green tea oils) gives shine and strength without weighing hair down, and nourishing avocado pumps strands with proteins and vitamins before sealing hair cuticles for a lustrous look. Coconut feeds lengths with fatty acids to seal split ends too, and the iconic coconut and fig scent will transport you straight to a tropical island...
how_to_use: On clean and damp hair, work a small amount onto lengths and ends. Leave for up to three minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Pro-tip: use after the {Super Hydrating Shampoo} for thoroughly cleansed and hydrated hair.

name: Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush
description: We're pretty sure it's not just us that has spent hours on end trying to grapple with a barrel brush and hair dryer to create the hairdresser-level blow-dry at home… only to end up with aching arms and frizzy, flat hair that simply refuses to cooperate. If this picture resonates a little too profoundly with you then (thankfully) Drybar has just the tool to solve all your hair woes. The Double Shot Oval Blow-Dryer Brush combines the hot air of a hair dryer with the structure and shape of a round brush to help you create the lusted-after blowout of dreams. Gone are the days of trying to coordinate two tools and constantly rest your aching arms, this does all the work for you. Great for hair types from wavy to curly and poker straight, this ergonomically-designed tool is lightweight and easy to use so you can style your hair stress-free. Customise your blowout with three temperature settings, and the combination of nylon and tufted bristles brings you total control and optimal tension over your tresses. Worried about frizzy strands ruining your 'do? The clever minds at Drybar have infused ionic technology into The Double Shot to help seal the hair cuticle and leave your strands shining and frizz-free. You can use this on wet or even dry hair to extend the life of your style and create a smooth, complete look between hair wash days. The at-home blow-dry just got a seriously effortless upgrade…
how_to_use: After shampooing, thoroughly towel-dry hair to remove excess water. Brush out hair using a detangling brush or comb, and separate into large sections. Place The Double Shot underneath each section and work it slowly from roots to ends until the section is dry and smooth. For Volume at the Roots: Use horizontally at the crown and pull through from roots to ends in an upward motion. For Extra Thick or Long Hair: Rough dry with a regular blow-dryer before using The Double Shot. To Extend Your Blowout: Use on DRY hair to create a smooth, finished look.
ingredient: Dual Plug

name: OUAI Fragrance Free Curl Crème 236ml OUAI Fragrance Free Curl Crème 236ml
description: To craft their Curl Crème - Fragrance Free - the brand's very first unscented formula - the minds behind OUAI Haircare turned to the most knowledgable, discerning people they know: their very own curly-haired community. That's right, this luscious blend was co-created with 150 members of their community and faced over a year of testing before they were sure it was worthy of touching your curls... This does-it-all styling cream is brimming with conditioning plant oils that add definition, shine and impressive hydration to parched coils, curls and ringlets. It's unique consistency first goes on like a cream before melting into your hair with the swiftness of an oil; speaking of which, at the heart of the formula is a frizz-smoothing duo of chia and linseed oils that emphasise the shape of your curls as well as protecting them against humidity. Coconut oil then floods your hair with hydration and helps to seal damaged cuticles, while babassu oil softens and enhances shine. The fragrance-free edition is also ideal for cocktailing with other curl treatments without overwhelming your senses! That's not the only thing they left out; this vegan cream is also free from silicones, SLS, parabens, phthalates and gluten. Psst, the tube is also made out of sugarcane plastic, making it 100% recyclable!
how_to_use: On wet hair: To prevent breakage, section and detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb (stay away from bristle brushes because they can disrupt your curl pattern) Start with a dime-size amount of Curl Crème and evenly distribute it with your fingers (it’s super creamy and melts into your curls like an oil) Comb through each section using your fingers to ensure Curl Crème blesses each and every curve Let your hair dry, then say hello to your softest curls ever If you plan on heat styling later and want heat protection, pair Curl Crème with OUAI Leave In Conditioner, our multitasking detangler and leave-in that provides thermal heat protection and weightless hydration On dry hair: A little bit of Curl Crème goes a long OUAI in refreshing day-two or day-three curls. On dry hair, apply Curl Crème sparingly and directly to your curls to help define and smooth frizz and flyaways.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Orbignya Speciosa Kernel Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lauryl Glucoside,Polyquaternium-37, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol,Isopropyl Alcohol, Xylitol, Caprylic Acid, Sorbitan Oleate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Oribe Gold Lust Dry Shampoo 300ml Oribe Gold Lust Dry Shampoo 300ml
description: Oribe's opulent Gold Lust Dry Shampoo is in a different league to traditional formulas. Not only does it instantly refresh scalp and strands, it also nourishes and smooths locks, imparting the brand's signature Cote d'Azur scent with advanced fragrance-retention technology, which allows it to remain throughout the day. The formula features a translucent starch blend to instantly absorb dirt, oil, impurities and product build-up, leaving hair feeling 'just washed', while celery seed extract reduces oil on the scalp, helping to extend the time between washes. Alongside this, bamboo and rice silks leave hair instantly smooth and silky-soft, myrrh extract nourishes and fortifies and lavender and chamomile moisturise and hydrate to sooth a dry, itchy scalp. Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. With notes of Calabrian bergamot, white butterfly jasmine and sandalwood, Oribe's signature scent makes this dry shampoo a total pleasure to use - plus, the bottle adds a touch of luxe opulence to any dressing table (or handbag).

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo Hair by Sam McKnight Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo
description: A dry shampoo and a styling product in its own right, Hair by Sam McKnights Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo is perfect for those lazy (or hectically busy!) days in between washes. The ultra-light powder mist absorbs excess oil to refresh hair from scalp to ends. As well as these revitalising capabilities, this hard-working hair hero also imparts enviable body, volume and subtle texture and hold its enough to fool everyone into thinking that your locks are freshly washed. Sam McKnight's top tip is to spray it onto a brush for a lighter effect this is ideal for fringes and for absorbing any excess oil around the hairline, especially after applying skin care or make up. The culmination of McKnights iconic expertise and experience in the industry, his irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional standards of styling at home in mere minutes and we just can't get enough. As well as professional appeal, this dry shampoo smells divine, with a luscious, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.Available in a full-size and an all-new travel (50ml) size, you can keep one at home and one close at hand.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. For best results, direct spray into hair roots. Work through the hair with a brush. For a lighter effect (great for fringes and oiliness in the hair line) spray onto a brush and sweep through gently.

name: Augustinus Bader The Scalp Treatment 30ml Augustinus Bader The Scalp Treatment 30ml
description: On the hunt for a treatment that boosts scalp health by calming irritation and clearing blocked hair follicles — leading to a fuller, stronger, shinier mane that (we guarantee) will turn heads? Look no further than Augustinus Bader’s The Scalp Treatment with TCF8. This supercharged serum delivers a healthy dose of scalp-loving ingredients directly where you want the, including the amnio-acid rich ‘TFC8 Complex’, which promotes skin renewal and repair, helping to ‘rev up’ sluggish hair follicles and boost strand growth considerably. Alongside this is a powerful ‘Multi-Mineral Active Complex’, which uses a carefully-formulated cocktail of magnesium, zinc and copper energise the cells and tissue of your scalp; l-arginine, an amino-acid present in keratin that helps to smooth and hydrate your mane, preventing breakage in the process; and peppermint extract which refreshes and balances the scalp to help return it to its natural pH level.
how_to_use: Apply a few drops to a clean, damp scalp in sections from the hair line to the crown of the head, focusing on problem areas. Use the push button and specific glass nozzle for a precise application. Gently massage into the scalp with your finger tips or a comb. Do not rinse. Leave to dry naturally or blow dry and style as usual. Use 2 to 3 times per week as needed.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Volume Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Volume Shampoo
description: If your hairs looking limp and in need of an oomph boost then reach straight for NatureLab TOKYOs Volume Shampoo a build-up dissolving and root-lifting cocktail of plant extracts and proteins to amplify lift and build body. A petal-pink cleanser that smells like Japans cherry blossoms, this expertly blended shampoo is a boon for limp hair that requires reviving. Starring apple extracts to replenish the scalp and maintain equilibrium (they're great for inhibiting hair loss), alongside rice and soy proteins to add weightless moisture and fortify delicate strands so your hair becomes thicker and less prone to breakage, this treats every strand with the same care you'd show to your prized silks and cashmeres. The addition of sakura extract great for preserving your colour and optimising brightness makes this the ultimate threat for flat, brittle and flyaway manes. We're calling it a 'hair lift' in a bottle... Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo 200ml Aveda Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo 200ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. name: OUAI Rose Hair and Body Oil 99ml OUAI Rose Hair and Body Oil 99ml

Enriched with absinthium, shea and rosehip oils, it works to nourish and protect stressed-out tresses – when applied from mid-lengths to tips, it offers UV protection, seals in moisture and re-injects shine back into lacklustre locks. name: Davines VOLU Volume Enhancing Shampoo 250ml Davines VOLU Volume Enhancing Shampoo 250ml

With a mixture of mild surfactants to leave hair clean without weighing it down, and hops extract to revitalise, soothe and provide a natural root-boost, this heavenly-scented Shampoo will soon transform limp, lacklustre locks into enviable crowning glories.

name: Function of Beauty Thermal Protection #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml Function of Beauty Thermal Protection #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml
description: Better safe than sorry! We’re sure that in a different, far away land, high temperatures don’t result in damage or split ends but until we crack that code, Thermal Protection Hair Goal is here to be your ultimate bodyguard against every heat styling faux pas. Shielding your strands against high heat, this formula is fused with sesame protein that works to seal in moisture and resurrect your once-healthy locks. name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml
description: An intensified version of an iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley’s Elasticizer Extreme will transform your hair care ritual, even if you’re struggling with very dry, damaged hair. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects – and this edition contains higher active doses of its clever ingredients to offer even more intense benefits. Originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, the formula boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage – you’ll never want to wash your hair without it.

You can even sleep in Elasticizer Extreme Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only

name: Solaris Labs NY Intensive LED Hair Growth Brush Solaris Labs NY Intensive LED Hair Growth Brush
description: Brush your way to healthier hair (and scalp) with the LED Hair Brush from New York beauty tech innovators, Solaris Laboratories. Combining LED light therapy with gentle vibrations, this clever brush fast-tracks you to your hair growth goals. Used like any other hair brush, the silicone bristles expose the scalp to both red and blue LED light therapy. These wavelengths are known to help stimulate growth, slow hair loss, promote thicker locks, soothe irritated scalps and increase the size of hair follicles for stronger strands. A relaxing massage (courtesy of 6000 gentle vibrations per minute) seals the deal for shiny, swishably healthy hair, aiding the absorption of hair care products and boosting blood flow to nourish every follicle.
how_to_use: Use on dry hair only. Alternate between the different modes during each use:  Gentle vibratory massage on the scalp for 1 minute. Using the red LED mode, massage and brush your hair for a few minutes. In blue LED mode, comb the lengths of your hair for a few minutes.

name: Pattern Styling Cream 443.6ml Pattern Styling Cream 443.6ml
description: Rich and juicy with nourishing ingredients, the versatile Styling Cream delivers unrivalled levels of moisture to coat curls and bring out the best of your curl pattern, no matter what style you don. As with all Pattern hair care, the Styling Cream is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a oil-rich blend of shea butter, cacay oil and sweet almond oil that helps to nourish curls and protect them from breakage, while improving hair retention so all the good stuff can stay in. Holding frizz down with a lightweight hold, this curl cream is perfect for setting twist outs, braid outs, bantu knots and much much more. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, this cream makes dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and is designed the bring out the best of your own unique curls.
how_to_use: Apply hair styling cream on wet hair or dry hair as you style or braid. Pro tip: For protective styles, use this hair product to seal the hair with moisture before styling. Extra pro tip for healthy hair: For locs hair type, apply styling curl cream as you retwist each strand for shine, definition & hold.
ingredient: Water (Aqua, Eau), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, Polysorbate 60, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Sulfite, Potassium Sorbate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phenethyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Caryodendron Orinocense Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein.

name: SILKE London Coco Hair Ties SILKE London Coco Hair Ties
description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...
how_to_use: Use to tie your hair up, in lieu of traditional elastics which can snap your precious strands.
ingredient: Specially selected super elastic interior, 100% pure silk exterior.

name: Gisou Propolis Infused Polishing Primer 75ml Gisou Propolis Infused Polishing Primer 75ml
description: Diminishes frizz, reduces drying time, increases hold… there’s not much the Propolis Infused Polishing Primer can’t do when it comes to shaving time (not to mention effort) off your styling routine. The key ingredient here really is propolis, a volume- and definition-boosting superhero that fuels all of Gisou’s superstar styling range. Produced and used by bees to build strong beehives, propolis contains plenty of oils, vitamins, minerals and flavonoids to protect your hair and keep it at its most healthy. It doesn’t just enhance your styling process either; it helps to restore strands back to their former glory by preventing breakage and repairing split ends.
how_to_use: Squeeze a pea-sized amount of primer onto the palms of your hands and warm by rubbing hands together. Work hands through damp or dry hair by running fingers from root to tip. Style as desired.

name: HELLO KLEAN Clarifying Scalp Soak 50ml HELLO KLEAN Clarifying Scalp Soak 50ml
description: Whether product build-up has left your lengths limp and lacklustre, or pollution is raining on your parade, this Clarifying Scalp Soak from HELLO KLEAN is here to change your fortunes. Tested on all hair types - from wispy fine hair to gloriously textured coils - this vegan-friendly soak is especially effective for oily scalps and trichologistas with extensive styling regimes. The multitasking formula works two-fold to detoxify your scalp, shifting build-up (be it from product, excess oils or hardwater minerals) and delivering skin-loving ingredients that ultimately encourage healthy, softer hair. Want to see its qualifications? It's powered by apple cider vinegar and phytic acid to whisk away follicle-clogging residue without stripping your scalp; fermented rice water and tamanu oil then replenish moisture levels to nourish your hair and scalp; finally, pro-vitamin B5 and rice seed protein help to restore damaged hair, improving its integrity and making it less brittle. Consider us obsessed...
how_to_use: Apply to your wet scalp and take a moment to massage it in. Let it soak in for a minimum of five minutes before rinsing thoroughly. Follow with conditioner if desired. Use twice a week for optimum results, in between shampoo days, or as often as needed.
