name: Oribe Bright Blonde Shampoo - Travel 2.53 fl. oz. Oribe Bright Blonde Shampoo - Travel 2.53 fl. oz.
description: Achieve your most beautiful blonde with Oribe’s Bright Blonde Shampoo for Beautiful Color, a revitalising violet cleanser that corrects brassiness and yellow-orange tones for hair that is healthier, shinier and ‘lit from within’. The sulphate-free formula is specially designed to gently cleanse without stripping, thanks to coconut and corn-derived cleansers. Available in two sizes, pick from the 250ml full size or the 75ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. It’s also enhanced with pure violet pigment and reflective pearls, as well as a brightening complex – of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts – to optimise your hair colour and luminosity. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damage, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts, high in phyto-nutrients, detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. Boosting this protection, Oribe’s signature complex (crafted from watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defend hair from oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural collagen, while multi-UV protection shields hair from the colour-depleting effects of the sun’s rays.
how_to_use: Oribe says: Lather, indulge, rinse.

name: BLEACH LONDON Champagne Super Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON Champagne Super Toner Kit
description: Champagne-hued locks are officially chic – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Champagne Toner Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add pearly blonde, golden tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool. It will last for around 16-20 washes on pre-lightened hair.
how_to_use: Lasts for around 16-20 washes. For use on pre-lightened hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH LONDON TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH LONDON DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH LONDON BEACH LIGHTS to lighten hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Hair condition, porosity, length, fineness, shade and any previous treatments. The final effect will depend on your current hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Follow with BLEACH LONDON LIVE FOREVER SHAMPOO every other wash to maintain your sparkling tone.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocamide MEA, Polysilicone-18 Cetyl Phosphate, Ethanolamine, Carbomer, Sodium Sulfite, Betaine, Parfum (Fragrance), Dipropylene Glycol, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Mica, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Bisabolol, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium HEDTA, Boswellia Serrata Gum, Resorcinol, Sodium Benzoate, m-Aminophenol, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool

name: BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour Just Like Honey BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour Just Like Honey
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Briogeo Vegan Boar Bristle Brush Briogeo Vegan Boar Bristle Brush
description: A boar bristle brush without... well, boar bristles, this vegan alternative offers the same smoothing and polishing benefits without any animal-derived fibres. Great for detangling straight, wavy, curly or coiled hair, Briogeo's Vegan Boar Bristle Brush helps to tease any tats without damaging strands - paving the way to a high-shine (less frizzy!) finish. Lightweight, ergonomic and thoughtfully engineered, this bristles feature ballpoint tips to gently massage the scalp - stimulating bloodflow to invigorate your roots - while the multi-layered bristles glide through every strand to separate while minimising 'ouches'. Sufficiently resilient to cope with even thick hair, this vegan and cruelty-free option leaves hair smooth and healthy-looking. Plus, it's lilac! Sold.
how_to_use: Safe for colour-treated, keratin-treated, chemically-treated and relaxed hair.
ingredient: Synthetic bristles.

name: Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smooth + Shine Hair Care Minis Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smooth + Shine Hair Care Minis
description: Sure to trigger a life-long obsession with one of Briogeo's bestselling lines, this Farewell Frizz Smooth + Shine Hair Care Minis set stars a four-piece hair care routine that spans from shampoo to styling creme. Expect silky, frizz-free locks! Repairing damage and protecting against future breakage and colour fade, this sulphate-free Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Shampoo (59 ml) comprehensively cleanses without stripping hair, so that all that marvellous moisture is maintained. Packed with ultra-nourishing rosehip, argan and coconut oils, the Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Conditioner (59 ml) swiftly restores a silky sheen to dry, brittle and lacklustre locks by sealing the uplifted cuticle to lock in moisture. Like luscious, lock-loving milk, the Farewell Frizz™ Rosarco Milk Leave-In Conditioning Spray (51 ml) restores hair’s softness, strength, manageability and moisture levels, while also acting as an effective barrier against heat. Offering further heat protection and weightless hydration for a flawless finish, the Farewell Frizz™ Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Crème (59 ml) leaves hair smooth, shiny and protected from heat up to 425°F – curling wands and straightening irons at the ready!
how_to_use: Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Shampoo: apply to wet hair and vigorously massage for about 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. If your hair has extra build-up, rinse and repeat. Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Conditioner: after shampooing, dispense and apply evenly throughout hair length. Let sit for two minutes before rinsing. For best results, finish with Rosarco Milk™ Reparative Leave-In Conditioning Spray and/or Rosarco Oil™ prior to blow drying or using heat tools. Farewell Frizz™ Rosarco Milk Leave-In Conditioning Spray: spray throughout clean, damp hair with focus on mid-length to ends of hair. Blow-dry or air-dry and style as usual. Farewell Frizz™ Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Crème: apply one to two quarter-sized amounts to freshly washed, damp hair, evenly from root to tip then blow dry and style as desired. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml
description: A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. Uniting this advanced protein with a host of other powerful ingredients, this One For All 6-In-One Styler truly does it all, providing softness, shine and light hydration, while also strengthening, polishing and protecting from heat. It’s enriched with panthenol (vitamin B5) a natural B vitamin that delivers moisture, softness and shine, cypress, an antioxidant rich essential oil known for light, soothing hydration and strengthening polymers, which work like an invisible scaffold to provide light hold and block out humidity. Fragranced with a fresh, verdant citrus blend featuring sweet orange, cypress and elemi essential oils, this truly is a gift from the hair care gods. What's more, after one week in a clinical trial, 89% of users found their hair felt softer, while 86% reported their hair looked healthier!
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp or dry hair from mid-shaft to ends.

description: Dont even think about brandishing your straighteners until youve sprayed Philip Kingsleys Daily Damage Defence Conditioning Spray. An award-winning leave-in conditioning spray, the formula has been called an everyday Elasticizer, utilising hydrolysed elastin to add strength, body and elasticity, alongside protein-rich almond seedcake extract and moisturising panthenol. Surprisingly lightweight given its impressive conditioning capabilities, this makes both wet and dry hair easy to detangle, improving manageability and reducing breakage as it guards against the damage wrought by heated styling tools and the daily environmental onslaught caused by UV rays.

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo
description: With Briogeo’s Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, you can continue your dry shampoo dependency without damaging scalp or strands. Unlike some dry shampoos, which can create dry flakiness, this features a host of natural, lock-loving ingredients to detoxify hair as it cleanses and refreshes between washes. Binchotan charcoal draws away impurities, while a complex of clay, tapioca and rice starches absorbs excess oil at the roots to leave hair fresh and clean. With the addition of witch hazel extract to help normalise oil production, this is a long-term solution for oily scalps, as well as a quick-fix blow dry prolonger. Super-vitamin biotin provides essential nutrients to the hair follicle, stimulating and supporting healthy hair growth.
how_to_use: Shake well before use and twist the cap to reveal spray dispenser. Squeeze the bottle and dispense evenly five inches away from hair, focusing at the roots. Let the dry shampoo sit for two minutes and then brush or finger through the hair thoroughly until the powder is removed.

name: Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask 230ml Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask 230ml
description: Looking for a hard-working, nourishing hair treatment that you can use once or twice a week? Enter Gisou's Honey Infused Hair Mask. Brimming with moisturising ingredients (not to mention the most gorgeous, subtle floral scent), this mask is formulated to hydrate and replenish hair while improving its elasticity and health. It's all about the honey here: a natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), this star ingredient is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and addallof the shine. With a full-sized 250ml and a new sized-to-travel 75ml, you can keep your hair nourished and cared for even when you're away from your at-home shelfie.

description: A conditioning cream that defines your natural curls and coils, the Perfect Texture Curl Cream from NatureLab TOKYO reduces the look of frizz and offers humidity-resistant control. name: Color Wow Colour Security Conditioner for Normal to Thick Hair 250ml Color Wow Colour Security Conditioner for Normal to Thick Hair 250ml

description: Designed to brighten the tone of blondes while providing intense hydration and light-catching shine, there's no much Davines' Heart of Glass Sheer Glaze doesn't do; no, really, it even delivers heat protection, promotes hair elasticity and extends the duration of your blow dry, thanks to the brand's patented Fortifying Botanical Shield complex! Developed to counteract the ravages wrought by repeated dyeing, straightening or Brazilian blow-drying, this leaves locks feeling soft and supple with an enviable lustre that enhances the impact (and helps extend longevity) of your expensive colour.

name: Oribe Curl Gloss 175ml Oribe Curl Gloss 175ml
description: Delivering ultra-hydrating control, Oribe’s Curl Gloss Hydration & Hold creates gorgeously glossy, defined curls without a hint of stiffness or ‘crunch’. A luscious, lightweight formula, this provides soft, natural hold, frizz control and brilliant shine. It’s rich in Brazilian extracts: passion flower and cupuaçu (both rich in fatty acids, amino acids and vitamins) deeply hydrate hair, jicama smooths and boosts shine and Brazil nut extract brings shine, silkiness and softness to dry, lifeless curls. Aloe vera moisturises scalp and strands, boosted by conditioning polymers and strengthening vitamin B5, while a speciality styling resin provides long-lasting curl retention for control, even in high humidity. Ideal for every kind of curl, this jade-emerald green bottle will revolutionise your hair ritual.

name: Briogeo Wide Tooth Detangling Comb 1 piece Briogeo Wide Tooth Detangling Comb 1 piece
description: Relieving particularly rigorous in-shower detangling sessions with its extra wide teeth, the Wide Tooth Detangling Mask Comb effortlessly glides through tangles, eliminates ouches and hooks seamlessly onto your shower. With a delightful lilac body, this knot-busting tool works on straight, wavy, curly or coily hair while minimising snagging and enhancing ‘slip’. Coasting through wet or dry strands with minimal effort, (and without eliciting any unnecessary breakage!) you can use it on all hair types – even those that have been subject to bleach, keratin treatments, colour and the like. name: Hair by Sam McKnight Easy-Up Do Texture Spray Hair by Sam McKnight Easy-Up Do Texture Spray
description: Forget hairpins and get yourself grip that doesn’t slip with Hair by Sam McKnight’s Easy-Up Do Texture Spray, a fine but powerful mist. Whatever style you’re aiming for – be it braid, topknot, ponytail or chignon – this provides the body and strong hold you need to achieve it and rest assured that it will stay in place. Sam McKnight himself calls this ‘hair grips in a can’, effortlessly styling to create enviably nonchalant yet glamorous looks, without over-burdening hair or creating any crispiness. Miraculously, it disappears at the stroke of a brush, a quality that was essential to the brand's founder, who frequently creates multiple looks on the same hair backstage at fashion shows and shoots. The culmination of his iconic expertise and experience in the industry, Sam McKnight's irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional standards of styling at home in mere minutes – and we just can't get enough of it. As well as professional appeal, this texturising hairspray smells divine, with a fresh, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.

name: BLEACH LONDON No Bleach Bleach Kit BLEACH LONDON No Bleach Bleach Kit
description: Time to show bleach the bench - this clever, salon-standard formulation lifts hair colour up to five levels without bleach, so you can achieve a lighter, brighter blonde with less damage and scalp irritation. The shade achieved and the time it will last will depend on your hair’s current colour, condition, porosity, length and thickness but, in general, No Bleach Bleach will lift medium brown hair to medium blonde and light brown hair to light blonde, and should only be used on unbleached, virgin hair. Unlike with traditional bleach, the colour achieved will continue to lighten subtly over time and the BLEACH London Reincarnation Mask included in this pack is perfect for helping your hair on its way to repair. Top roots up every 4-6 weeks for the ultimate lift!
how_to_use: The shade achieved and length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Current colour, condition, porosity, length and thickness of hair as well as any previous treatments. Always follow the timing guidelines given. If you do not apply enough product or leave it on for the correct time it might become patchy or not fully develop, leaving hair brassy. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Apply BLEACH LONDON SCALP SAVIOUR before use for extra scalp protection. Follow with BLEACH LONDON WHITE TONER and BLEACH LONDON SILVER SHAMPOO and CONDITIONER to banish brassy tones. Alternatively follow with CHAMPAGNE SUPER TONER or your choice of BLEACH LONDON SUPER COOL COLOUR. Mandatory warnings: Wear suitable gloves. Contains hydrogen peroxide. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with them. Recommended warnings: Avoid contact with skin. Follow the instructions carefully and do not extend the application time beyond that indicated. Rinse immediately in case of burning or tingling. This product should only be used on undyed, virgin hair.

description: Fast track your mane to a salon-worthy blow dry from the comfort of your own home with the Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0 — an even better (if that’s possible) version of the much-loved original two-in-one styler from amika. Constantly striving to bring you your best hair ever, amika has put their bestselling tool through its paces to unveil and even more effective styling companion. how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.

name: Kitsch Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie - Black Kitsch Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie - Black
description: Satin-lined and silky smooth, you’ll never want to take this beany off. Although perfect for bedtime, the Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie would look chic during the day too – there are no rules when it comes to keeping your hair friction-free! Bad hair day who? Enter the Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie: luxury at its finest, for all hair types. Boasting some seriously soft jersey, this beanie will prevent your hair from tangling, thinning or breaking, while keeping your hairstyle intact. With satin that’s heavenly to the touch, your locks are kept friction-free. Wear at night for an I-woke-up-like-this ‘do come morning, or wear during the day as a chic, multi-tasking accessory.
how_to_use: Scoop your hair in place and cocoon the wrap around it. Be sure to tuck any wayward strands within the wrap so the edge is completely covering your hairline and the tip of your ears – this will ensure it sits tight, protecting your hair through the night.
ingredient: 50% rayon, 45% polyester, 5% spandex

name: Innersense Hydrating Cream Hairbath Innersense Hydrating Cream Hairbath
description: Formulated with hard-working coconut, this Hydrating Cream Hairbath is a mild yet effective deep cleanser and conditioner that easily foams and reduces static without stripping hair of its natural oils. Rich in fatty acids, shea butter also intensely moisturises parched strands while tamanu oil helps to regenerate, strengthen and protect precious locks throughout the day. Luxe yet completely lightweight, this hairbath is quick-absorbing and rich in vitamins A, B, D and E to keep locks in tip-top condition. Formulated with therapeutic essential oils, this divine product also allows you to take a moment to re-centre and rebalance while practising self-care. We're obsessed! Now available in full size 295ml and travel-friendly mini 59ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.
how_to_use: Thoroughly saturate hair with water. Taking a deep breath and become centred. Begin by dispensing a small amount of hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. Apply with fingertips to scalp, massaging and cleansing. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary and follow with Hydrating Cream Conditioner.

name: MONPURE London Follicle Boost Hair Density Serum 50ml MONPURE London Follicle Boost Hair Density Serum 50ml
description: Free of harsh chemicals, silicones, sulphates – the list goes on – this scalp serum gets to work on preventing hair loss and promoting a thick, full mane you can wear out with confidence. This supercharged formula heroes a special pumpkin seed extract that has been scientifically proven to block an enzyme called 5-alpha reductase (which then produces a chemical called DHT that causes hair loss). Good news, right? What’s more, this lush serum infuses a gentle form of retinol and lactic acid to promote cell turnover, resurface the scalp and unclog follicles from debris and dead skin cells getting in the way of growth. Encased in a handy (and very chic) dropper, stimulating your scalp towards full, lustrous locks has never been easier.
how_to_use: 1. Starting with dry or towel-dried hair, part the hairline and apply one to two drops of serum, spaced evenly, onto the scalp. 2. Work across the head, section by section, focusing on areas of concern. 3. Gently massage until the serum has fully absorbed into the scalp. Do not rinse. We recommend using once daily.

name: dpHUE Gloss 6.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Gloss 6.5 fl. oz.
description: Designed for quick and easy in-shower application, dpHUE’s Gloss+ brings a boost of colour to natural or colour-treated hair. Intended to enhance and deepen your current colour, use this vibrancy-boosting treatment when your strands are lacking vitality, have started to fade or when highlights need to be toned down. Free from ammonia and peroxide, this semi-permanent (it lasts for up to ten shampoos!) hair colour won’t damage your tresses; quite the contrary, it boasts a deep conditioning base that’s brimming with hydrating ingredients that leave your hair soft, shiny and illuminated. Have your pick of 11 shades, including the ‘Sheer’ variation that can be used to tailor the tone of other colours to perfectly match your hair.
how_to_use: Gloss+ Sheer: Evenly distribute Gloss+ through clean damp hair. Leave on for 3-20 minutes and rinse thoroughly. For all other shades: Evenly distribute Gloss+ through clean damp hair. Leave on for 3-20 minutes and rinse thoroughly. For less intense results, mix with Gloss+ Sheer. Darker pigments may stain hands, scrub with soap and water or use gloves.

name: Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Shampoo 75ml Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Shampoo 75ml
description: Prep your hair against future damage - and undo what's already been done - with Oribe's Resilience Shampoo. Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this restorative cleanser is brimming with botanical extracts - including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf. Add to this magic potion extracts of daisy and honeysuckle and expect hair to be fortified from roots to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe's signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative, travel-sized blend has just upped the ante on building strong, resilient hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity, while green tea and plant polysaccharides protect from environmental stressors by warding off any pollution particles that are tempted to sit on your precious locks. Plus, it's safe to use on coloured hair, so if you've been searching for a remedy to damaged hair, split ends, flyaways and thinning, this shampoo sorcery will leave hair feeling cleansed, healthier and stronger.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair as the first step in your cleansing routine. Lather, indulge, rinse.

name: Living Proof Restore Conditioner 236ml Living Proof Restore Conditioner 236ml
description: Daily shampooing, heat styling, chemical processing, colouring and UV exposure all wreak havoc with hair strength, health and resilience. Over time, strands become brittle, dry and more susceptible to breakage – which is why we often reach for short-term synthetic cover-ups, which only exacerbate the problem. Oils and silicones are effective ‘quick fixes’ but only temporarily disguise the underlying damage – which is why Living Proof have developed a targeted range of reparative products, to fortify strands from the inside out. Their innovative silicone and oil-free solutions star the brand’s patented OFPMA – the proprietary technology that coats each individual hair with an ultra-thin, non-greasy shield that smooths, corrects and protects from root-to-tip, whilst re-establishing moisture balance and delivering UV and thermal protection up to 235°C. With regular use, hair is proven to become up to 20 x more resistant to split ends, as well as more glossy, lustrous and reassuringly envy-inducing.
how_to_use: Start with Restore Shampoo. Apply Restore Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Follow with Restore Stylers.

name: Briogeo Superfoods Banana + Coconut Hair Pack Briogeo Superfoods Banana + Coconut Hair Pack
description: A bright and happy pairing that’s set to revive your smile as well as hair, the Banana + Coconut Superfoods Hair Pack unites the {Be Gentle, Be Kind Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Shampoo} and the {Be Gentle, Be Kind Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner}. Boasting gentle, everyday essentials that hydrate and restore shine to dull, lifeless and dry strands, see this couplet as a duo of superfood smoothies – bursting with nutrient-rich ingredients that will provide hair with its daily dose of vitamins, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids. Safe for those with colour-, keratin- or chemically-treated hair, the shampoo harnesses the power of antioxidant-rich fruits to support both hair and scalp health – gently cleansing without stripping away natural oils. The creamy conditioner offers a true medley of barnet-boosting ingredients: nourishing banana extracts contain potassium and antioxidants to nourish and protect; hydrating coconut is rich in fatty acids and vitamin E to provide essential hydration; antioxidant-rich acai contains powerful antioxidants, vitamins and minerals to support healthy hair; and finally, vitamin-rich mango is loaded with vitamins and antioxidants to also nourish and protect.
how_to_use: Apply shampoo to wet hair and vigorously massage for 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. After shampooing, apply the conditioner and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing.

name: BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Philip Kingsley Overnight Scalp Barrier Serum with Triple Balancing Action 60ml Philip Kingsley Overnight Scalp Barrier Serum with Triple Balancing Action 60ml
description: Strengthening your scalp while you snooze, the Overnight Scalp Barrier Serum with Triple Balancing Action soothes sensitivity and regulates sebum production. Yes, dreams really do come true… Supercharged with calming aloe vera leaf juice extract and gently exfoliating AHAs that are both backed up by Triple Balancing Action, this fast-absorbing formula works to seal in moisture, retain hydration and keep your scalp at a happy, itch-free equilibrium.
how_to_use: Apply in the evening, the day before you wash your hair. Fill the pipette by pressing down on the top of the dropper. To dispense, gently press again. Apply directly to the scalp in 4-5 sections, using 2-3 drops per section. Massage over your scalp gently. A soothing sensation can be expected. Do not rinse. Upon waking, wash and style as usual. For best results, repeat every evening.

description: Made from a carefully chosen elastic tie with a sumptuous silk covering, Slip’s Skinny Scrunchies minimise damage while looking totally chic. Whether you’re creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate ’do, this sumptuous silk leaves no trace of kinks or creases. name: Pattern Styling Cream 88.7ml Pattern Styling Cream 88.7ml
description: Rich and juicy with nourishing ingredients, the versatile Styling Cream delivers unrivalled levels of moisture to coat curls and bring out the best of your curl pattern, no matter what style you don. As with all Pattern hair care, the Styling Cream is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde… the list goes on. But what it has got is a oil-rich blend of shea butter, cacay oil and sweet almond oil that helps to nourish curls and protect them from breakage, while improving hair retention so all the good stuff can stay in. Holding frizz down with a lightweight hold, this curl cream is perfect for setting twist outs, braid outs, bantu knots and much much more. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, this cream makes dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and is designed the bring out the best of your own unique curls.

Extra pro tip for healthy hair: For locs hair type, apply styling curl cream as you retwist each strand for shine, definition & hold.

name: Oribe Hair Alchemy Fortifying Treatment Serum 175ml Oribe Hair Alchemy Fortifying Treatment Serum 175ml
description: This styling treatment serum delivers instant shine and strengthens your hair ahead of forthcoming styling tools. Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this revitalising formula is brimming with botanical extracts – including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf. This on the go elixir also has daisy and honeysuckle extracts that fortify from root to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative blend works overtime to strengthen hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity; cotton seed extract softens stiff hair, while green tea and plant polysaccharides ward off pollution particles. Just a small amount of this super serum goes a long way towards a strong and soft mane that is healthy from the inside out.

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Conditioner 200ml
description: The perfect follow-up to the bestselling cleansing formula, Philip Kingsley’s Flaky Itchy Scalp Hydrating Conditioner is key to calming, comforting and stimulating healthy growth while lending light hydration. Developed to nourish your hair at the source while respecting the natural flora and fauna that thrive on your scalp, this soothing blend swiftly relieves irritation and works to restore equilibrium. Calming, refreshing and nourishing, this deeply replenishing (but featherweight!) blend of provitamin B5 with betaine, patauá oil (a plant-derived oil rich in essential fatty acids) and VarisoftBT 85 (a vegetable-based conditioning agent with potent antistatic properties) works to cherish your lengths – from the roots to the tips – while addressing the ‘upset’ that leads to an itchy, inflamed and dandruff-prone scalp. Completely non-stripping and perfect for fragile or delicate textures – as well as fine, oily or colour-treated hair – this slots neatly into the award-winning ‘Flaky Itchy’ ritual; use after Flaky Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo to 're-set' and quickly make dandruff a thing of the past.
how_to_use: Apply to damp lengths, minimising direct contact with the scalp - the balm texture helps to tease tangles for minimal strain on the strands. Comb through gently and rinse thoroughly, to leave your hair supple and nourished without any 'weight' that can compromise lift or exacerbate greasiness.

description: A must-have addition to your hair styling collection, R+Co's OUTER SPACE Flexible Hold Hairspray can easily be used with hot tools, as a styling product, to slick or volumise hair while also having 'memory' to help you change up looks then return to a previous look with ease. This workable product doesn't create any build up when reapplied, only the desired finish, hold and freshness - which many other hairsprays don't quite achieve. Scented with R+Co's beautiful ROSY EYED fragrance (a beguiling yet unique blend of bergamot, wild fig, cyclamen, lotus flower, cedarwood and tonka beans) and formulated with pro-vitamin B5 to condition and moisturise hair while also helping build thickness and volume, this is a dream come true for any hairstyle. Packaged in a sleek white opaque can with quintessential R+Co imagery, OUTER SPACE (like the rest of this unmissable range) is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, colour-safe and free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oils and petrolatum. Trustworthy and transparent, you need this hair care range in your life.

name: BLEACH LONDON Pearlescent Conditioner BLEACH LONDON Pearlescent Conditioner
description: A must-have for very light bleached blondes wanting to keep their colour in check, this Pearlescent Conditioner helps achieve and maintain that covetable almost-grey shade of white blonde and effectively diminishes yellow-toned hues from creeping in. This good-to-hair formula also effectively nourishes and moisturises parched locks while imparting a subtle pearly sheen to hair for a gorgeous and healthy finish with added lustre.
how_to_use: Apply to shampooed hair and massage through to ends. Leave in for 3-4 minutes. Comb and rinse thoroughly. Use after the Pearlescent Shampoo for depth of colour. Skin Test: Apply small amount of product to the skin on the inside of your elbow. Do not cover or disturb for 45 minutes. Rinse with water, pat dry and leave for 48 hours. name: Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil
description: We all need a little TLC every now and then (especially our tresses when we’ve gone a little OTT on chemical treatments) and we'll be taking our hair care self care in the form of Briogeo’s reparative duo. Elevate your hair wash ritual with the Don't Despair, Repair! MegaStrength Treatment. Suitable for absolutely all hair types (though particularly potent for restoring dry, damaged or chemically-treated manes), this intensive weekly treatment combines a two-part formula that utilises a unique set of natural and vegan ingredients. To strengthen hair right from the cuticle, look to the ‘Proprietary Rice Protein Complex’, which undoes existing damage and prevents further damage from taking place. To hydrate, there’s fatty acid-rich rosehip oil which not only injects moisture but also helps to reduce the appearance of split ends for an all-over more glossy mane. Lightweight and silicone-free the Don’t Despair, Repair! Strengthening Treatment Oil is perfect for brittle hair prone to split ends — sealing each strand to protect and promote healthy shine. Brimming with nourishing ingredients to reinforce the cuticles and help to fuse split ends, this luscious elixir is perfect for those who crave sleek, silky locks — reversing 88% of damage within just two uses. You can thank a complex of fortifying ceramides, shine-optimising macadamia nut derivatives and antioxidant rose flower oil, that deflects the hair-harming effects of heat, chemicals and the elements, for these hair-swishing results. 97% natural, vegan and cruelty-free — as well as free from phthalates, parabens, sulphates, silicones and artificial dyes — this oil is S.O.S. for lengths in crisis.
how_to_use: Don’t Despair, Repair! Strengthening Treatment Oil: Apply a few drops to dry or damp hair, focusing on mid-length to ends or other areas of damage. Don't Despair, Repair! MegaStrength Treatment: After shampooing, wring hair of excess water and apply the treatment evenly throughout damp hair. Leave in for at least 10 minutes or longer/overnight as desired. Rinse out and then apply the Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask to complete your intensive treatment process. For best results, use weekly.

description: Achieve your most beautiful blonde with Oribe’s Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color, a revitalising, moisturising violet conditioner that corrects brassiness and hydrates for hair that is soft, strong, shiny and ‘lit from within’. The formula moisturises and restores strands without weighing them down, smoothing each cuticle to seal in moisture and help to reduce split ends. Available in two sizes, pick from the 200ml full size or the 50ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. Pure violet pigment, reflective pearls and a brightening complex – of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts – optimise hair colour and luminosity, while luscious natural oils (including moringa seed and jojoba oils) condition locks. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damaged hair, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. name: RANAVAT Mighty Majesty Fortifying Hair Serum RANAVAT Mighty Majesty Fortifying Hair Serum
description: Elevating your hair care ritual to a level fit for royalty, RANAVAT's Mighty Majesty Fortifying Hair Serum helps to manage breakage, nourish the scalp, and protect against heat damage to leave hair stronger and more supple. No stranger to industry acclaim, this length-loving formula was crowned 'Best Hair Serum' by Women's Health and 'Best Hair Serum' by Harper's Bazaar India. Here's why: the jasmine-scented serum is infused with amla extract, which is overflowing with a high concentration of oleic acid, vitamin C, and vitamin E to control breakage, encourage hair growth, and nourish the scalp. Formulated with their own cold-pressed extraction method, each and every ingredient in the mane-changing formula is blended at the highest potency to promote your most lustrous locks yet.
how_to_use: Apply 2 to 3 drops into the palms and smooth onto wet or dry locks from mid-length to ends to target frizz and flyaways. This serum also functions as an overnight deep conditioning mask. Just massage into the scalp, leave on overnight and rinse with your favourite shampoo the next morning.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Jasminium Sambac (Jasmine) Oil* and Phyllanthus Emblica (Amla) Fruit* *Organic

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Curl Spray 200ml Act+Acre Cold Processed Curl Spray 200ml
description: Whether you're channelling your inner surfer girl or redefining your childhood curls, this ultra-hydrating Cold Processed® Curl Spray is a true hair-care wonder. It's infused with star ingredients glycerin and aloe vera, creating a potent mix that deeply moisturises the scalp while soothing any sensitivity. The formula also contains watermelon extract, which not only makes us think of dreamy beaches, but also refreshes and defines curl pattern and texture. Your locks are left shiny, soft and feeling their best. Compliments, guaranteed.
how_to_use: Spray evenly over wet or dry hair. If using on damp hair, use after a shower to prep the scalp and hair for styling. For use on dry hair, use it to restore curls and soothe scalp between washes.

name: Aveda Heat Relief Thermal Protector and Conditioning Mist 100ml Aveda Heat Relief Thermal Protector and Conditioning Mist 100ml
description: Don't let your styling routine get the better of your tresses, let Aveda's Heat Relief formula be on hand to ward against heat damage and boost the shine of your strands. It's safe to say that our hair goes through a lot - from heat damage and friction to pollution and chemical treatments - and an effective hair care regime is the best way to keep it in tip-top condition. That's where this styling aid comes in! Made from 97% naturally derived ingredients, this clever formula provides thermal protection and condition your hair to encourage a soft, glossy finish. What's more, it boasts Aveda's shampure aroma: a calming, signature blend of 25 pure flower and plant essences that leave your tresses divinely scented.
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray lightly onto dry hair from 6 – 8 inches away. Focus on mid-lengths to ends. Heat-style as desired. Avoid spraying into eyes.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream 59ml Living Proof No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream 59ml
description: Designed to tame medium hair types prone to unruliness, Living Proof No Frizz Styling Cream conditions from root to tip and banishes humidity for smoothness and manageability that lasts. A blend of shine-enhancing emollients and Living Proof’s might-be-magic proprietary smoothing technology aligns hair fibres for a swishably smooth finish. Shea butter deeply nourishes to soften frazzled ends and keep strands in tip top condition — even on drizzly days.

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Cleanse Shampoo (Various Sizes) Act+Acre Cold Processed Cleanse Shampoo (Various Sizes)
description: Start every wash day with this replenishing, barrier-boosting shampoo from Act+Acre and prepare to unveil silky-soft, lustrous tresses in next to no time. Available in a travel-sized 85ml and full size 285ml, you need never sacrifice your new scalp care rituals. Banishing the notion that a gentle shampoo doesn’t garner results is the Act+Acre Cold Processed Cleanse Shampoo. Dryness and irritation will be long gone thanks to this science-led shampoo, your hard working hair care hero that breaks down dirt, oil and pollution while keeping essential hydration levels topped up. Boasting a sulphate-free formula that has been supercharged with 2% apple amino acids and glycerin, Act+Acre’s efficacious shampoo will maintain your scalp’s moisture barrier and restore balance.
how_to_use: In hands, mix a pump of cleanse to create a silky lather. Apply to entire scalp, starting from the nape of the neck towards your hairline. Rinse and repeat to remove buildup and deliver nutrients.

name: Olaplex Blonde-Enhancer Routine Olaplex Blonde-Enhancer Routine
description: Blondies, listen up: this one's for you. Meet OLAPLEX's Blonde Enhancer Routine, a trio of bond-repairing products especially formulated for blonde, lightened or grey hair. Strengthening hair with this set is as easy as 1, 2, 3. Begin with the No 3 Hair Perfector, a once-a-week, at-home treatment that utilises the power of bis-aminopropyl diglycol to restore hair's strands' structure and integrity. Next there's the No. 4-P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo, a daily cleansing and repairing shampoo which uses OLAPLEX's original hydrating and strengthening formula enhanced with toning pigments to reduce brassiness and boost the brightness of your blonde. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Save The Do Heat Protection Spray 150ml Hair By Sam McKnight Save The Do Heat Protection Spray 150ml
description: If, like us, you've spent years trying to perfect a salon-worthy blow dry, then allow us to solve all your styling woes at once with Sam McKnight's new hero. Keep curls from falling flat and ultra-sleek lengths from turning to waves with the ultimate styling essential. Sam McKnight's Save The Do Blow Dry Style Starter is a three in one multi-tasker that preps, styles and protects your hair as you create your desired look. Flexan and crodasone unite to form a protective shield around each and every strand, keeping thermal damage at bay so your locks stay looking (and feeling) healthy. A conditioning dose of provitamin B5, boosted by hibiscus and fire tulip extracts, impart a flood of nourishment to leave your hair soft and smooth with an enviable shine. Finished with Sam's signature scent of frankincense, juniper wood and water lily, your mane will have never looked - or smelt - so good!
how_to_use: Apply evenly to damp freshly washed hair, before blow drying.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Stimulating Scalp Massager Aveda Scalp Solutions Stimulating Scalp Massager
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Stimulating Scalp Massager, your new hair care essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal a healthy mane. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. What’s more relaxing than that indulgent scalp massage at the salon? While you ponder on that, allow us to introduce you to Aveda’s sensorial scalp massager, featuring carefully designed thin and flexible long bristles that reach the scalp even when your hair is wet. Uniquely formulated with bi-level filaments that target the scalp and your strands, each finished with a rounded ball tip that provide gentle yet thorough exfoliation. The result? Impurities are lifted, micro-circulation of the scalp is boosted and your relaxation levels will go through the roof. A must-add to your wash day rituals...
how_to_use: Start at the front line down to the nape in 3 gentle circular movements, covering your entire head. Reverse the technique and work from the nape to the front hair line using the same gentle circular motions. Use daily or as often as desired.
ingredient: Bi-level Filaments. Double Concave Design.

name: Grow Gorgeous Intense Thickening Shampoo 250ml Grow Gorgeous Intense Thickening Shampoo 250ml
description: It’s time to let your hair flourish with this effectively cleansing shampoo, formulated specifically to promote full, healthy and more volumised hair. A key component of keratin, this shampoo is rich in amino acids to ensure lacklustre hair is cared for and nurtured, don’t we all deserve a little TLC? Transforming thin and weak strands to a thick, full and healthy head of hair is a complex of rice protein, energising caffeine and barrier supporting niacinamide, keeping vital moisture locked in for a happy scalp. We all know by now that a happy scalp means happy hair, so start as you mean to go on with the perfect beginning to any cleansing regime.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair to create a creamy lather. Leave for 1 minute, then rinse.

name: Davines LOVE Curl Hair Mask 250ml Davines LOVE Curl Hair Mask 250ml
description: Tailored towards hair that’s curly or wavy, LOVE Curl Mask imparts intensive, much-needed moisture and elasticity without weighing strands down. The lusciously creamy formula is enriched with Noto almond extract, harvested from the farm of Mr. Carlo Assenza in Noto, Syracuse. These heirloom nuts are brimming with hair-strengthening proteins and moisturising healthy fats, which are capable of hydrating textured hair without disrupting its delicate balance, so that hair is neither stripped nor overburdened. Alongside this, Davines’ high performing blend of conditioning agents detangles effortlessly and swiftly restores tresses in distress. Scented with a refreshing yet indulgent note of green citrus, this is the perfect choice for all you curly-haired Cult Beauties.
how_to_use: Apply to damp hair after {LOVE Curl Shampoo}. Leave in for 10-15 minutes, comb through and rinse. Proceed with drying.

name: Slip Pure Silk Large Scrunchies - Positano Slip Pure Silk Large Scrunchies - Positano
description: Elevate your summer hair care wardrobe while keeping your lengths safe from snags and kinks with the Large Scrunchie Set — Positano. Specially selected elasticated bands are covered with Slip’s exclusive Slipsilk covering, crafted from the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme. Whether you’re creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that there’s no damage or breakage. Live ‘La Dolce Vita’ with this trio of holiday-ready colourways, from eye-catching sage green to the classic red and white check and an irresistibly bougie lemon-drenched patten.... that’s amore!
how_to_use: Use to secure all kinds of hairdos.
ingredient: Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme (exclusive of elastic)

name: ghd Oval Dressing Brush ghd Oval Dressing Brush
description: For soft and groomed tresses, ghd's Oval Dressing Brush is The One. Crafted with clever anti-static nylon bristles that reach deeper into hair than natural bristles, this strand saviour detangles at the root while distributing your scalp's natural conditioning oils down your tresses for optimum, effortless shine. The bristles are grounded in a rubber cushion pad, which has breathable air holes to allow for flexibility and comfort when brushing at the scalp. To make things extra easy (and therefore gaining multiple brownie points from us!) a non-slip handle ensures plenty of control while you dress out your mane.
how_to_use: Brush through your hair from root to tip. This is not to be used with a hair dryer.

name: Davines The Circle Chronicles - Spotlight Circle 50ml Davines The Circle Chronicles - Spotlight Circle 50ml
description: For a speedy way to transform stressed tresses, The Spotlight Circle by Davines offers a highly conditioning effect, moisturising hair without weighing it down to leave a gorgeously glossy result. Incredibly illuminating, the formula is enriched with shine-boosting ingredients including moringa oil and other naturally derived shine elements, which work to smooth hair fibres, making them appear polished and prepped. Apply it to towel-dried hair after shampooing or, for the ultimate, multi-masking benefit, combine it with another of Davines’ quick-fix masks – purifying {The Purity Circle} comes highly recommended.
how_to_use: Apply to towel-dried scalp and hair after shampooing. Process for 10 minutes, comb through and rinse. Proceed with blow-drying.

name: VIRTUE Flourish Density Booster 120ml VIRTUE Flourish Density Booster 120ml
description: Ideal for anyone up against mild to moderate hair loss (be it as a result of hormonal, hereditary or dietary factors), Virtue’s Flourish Density Booster is a lightweight, fast-absorbing spray that helps to stimulate sluggish follicles and nurture new growth. Powered by ground-breaking keratin proteins, the Flourish range works to cleanse, purify and enrich your scalp, creating the foundation for new growth. As each new strand emerges, it’s supplied with the nourishment needed to stay strong and resist breakage. As well as the brand’s world-worshipped Alpha Keratin 60ku complex that binds directly to areas of damage and fills them, this formula is laced with growth-supporting nutrients; an infusion of biomimetic signal peptides works to nourish and calm your scalp, helping to create a healthy environment for hair growth; saccharomyses lysate (a probiotic yeast extract) helps to increase oxygenation and help reduce irritation in the scalp; larch wood extract then works to encourage the initiation of the anagen growth phase, helping you on your way to fuller hair. When used alongside the Flourish shampoo and conditioner, the Density Booster has seen impressive results. After six months of using the regimen, 90% of women in an independent third party test said their hair feels healthier; 90% said they have more volume and 83% said they saw less fall-out. We like those numbers!
how_to_use: Use once daily, on damp or dry hair. Lift hair into sections and spray directly onto the scalp. Gently massage in and do not rinse.

name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Combination Shampoo 75ml Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Combination Shampoo 75ml
description: Developed by ‘The Hair Doctor’, Philip Kingsley, Moisture Balancing Shampoo does exactly what it says on the bottle – balancing moisture so that there’s less at the roots and more throughout mid-lengths and ends, where it’s most needed. Ideal for dry, frizzy or curly locks, the formula gently cleanses scalp and strands and contains anti-static conditioning agents to provide control and manageability, whether hair is wet or dry. Wheat protein strengthens strands and delivers moisture, while antioxidants protect against environmental degradation, smoothing the hair cuticle to impart reflective shine – a sure-fire sign of healthy, beautiful hair. name: Bouclème Super Hold Styler 250ml Bouclème Super Hold Styler 250ml
description: Looking for extra hold, well, here it is. Introducing our new Super Hold Styler! With nourishing plant extracts such as chia seed, blue agave, algae sugars, kahai oil and linseed, this skilful Super Hold Styler from Bouclème effortlessly helps to prevent split ends and keeps curls in check from desk to disco! Ideal for defining and holding loose waves, curls and kinky coily curls, this 99% naturally-derived and 100% vegan formula means your curls will be soft, glossy and gorgeous! For waves start with 20p amount and smooth down the length of the hair and scrunch up towards the scalp hold, pulse and release working your way through the in sections. For curly and kinky curls, with 10p amount rake through hair in sections from root to tip, using fingertips to smooth as you go. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel to release the cast. Using with Curl Defining Gel: Apply your Curl Defining Gel as normal, then whilst hair is still wet, smooth 2 -3 x 10p sized amounts of Super Hold Styler over canopy and scrunch into ends. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel to release the cast.

name: Act+Acre Hair Comb Act+Acre Hair Comb
description: This isn’t just a detangling comb — although it’s a brilliant (and beautiful) one at that. Act + Acre has created this deceptively simple tool to give your scalp the TLC it’s been craving. In other words, it’s your at-home, on-call, personal scalp massage therapist. According to research, scalp massages are known to increase blood flow, which aids the natural growth cycle of your hair as well as improving follicle health. They can also reduce inflammation that may trigger hair loss — so using this comb to stimulate the root is never going to be a bad idea, just make sure you’re gentle. Look closely and you’ll see that the first tooth is shorter than the rest — a smart design detail that will help you create the perfect parting.

name: Drybar The 3-Day Bender Digital Curling Iron, 1 Inch Drybar The 3-Day Bender Digital Curling Iron, 1 Inch
description: Promote flawless-looking curls and waves with Drybar’s The 3-Day Bender Digital Curling Iron 1 Inch. The tool boasts a rotating clamp, quickly styling the hair for long-lasting, salon-worthy results. Ergonomically designed with dual ceramic heaters to deliver even heat distribution, the curler’s digital temperature control function warms up to 226°C, helping to ensure suitability for all hair types. Ionic technology smooths the strands and encourages a glossy shine, while infrared technology works to protect against heat damage. Complete with a 60 minute automatic safety shut-off, the tool is the perfect addition to your styling routine.
how_to_use: For a traditional curl: Hold iron vertically and clamp hair high on the barrel midway up the strands. Use thumb and forefinger to rotate the clamp away from face. When curl is finished, it will slip out of the clamp. For a wave or bend: Hold iron horizontally and wrap a section of hair over the clamp away from face. Leave ends out 1'' (2.54 cm). Hold for 3-5 seconds and release the clamp. Tug slightly on the ends while hair is still warm.

description: Your wash day line-up is about to get an upgrade... Inspired by the effervescent salon-worthy finish that we all desire, the No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo cleanses, repairs and replenishes dry and damaged hair with a pH-balanced blend of hydrating ingredients. Creating a luxurious non-drying lather that rinses away impurities and build-up, allow this once-weekly treatment to optimise your wash days without compromising on moisture for an enviable, non-greasy sheen as a result. Follow it with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.

description: If your strands are up against never-ending knots and look-ruining static, then allow us to introduce you Aveda's Rosemary Mint Weightless Conditioner: a deeply nourishing yet impressively lightweight formula that coaxes tangles into submission and enhances your natural shine. This silicone-free conditioner is made from 97% naturally derived ingredients, including beautifully featherweight, plant-based conditioners that tackle tangles and stop static energy in its tracks, all while adding weightless body to your tresses. What's more, it's infused with a dash of white vinegar to deliver show-stopping shine! The finishing touch is an invigorating aroma of certified organic rosemary, peppermint and spearmint that promises to stimulate your senses as you shower.

description: Think of Briogeo's Be Gentle, Be Kind Matcha + Apple Superfood Shampoo as a revitalising green juice for your hair. The luscious formula is inspired by the nourishing ingredients typically found in rejuvenating, ultra-healthy superfood smoothies (it even comes in the same kind of bottle), harnessing the fruit and vegetable nutrients to support healthy-looking hair and a balanced scalp. Powerful antioxidants from matcha provide impressive protection from damaging environmental elements and guard against colour fade, while apple is rich in natural procyanidin, a compound shown to encourage hair health. Completing the nourishing cocktail, there's also spinach, broccoli, cucumber and lemon extracts – all the green goodness your hair could hope for. Gently cleansing away oil and impurities, this will leave your hair and scalp clean and clear, while also helping to enhance hydration, shine and vitality.

Instead, it infuses a blend of sea moss, aloe vera and chia seeds to fortify and hydrate hair, so your hair is just as healthy on the inside as it looks on the outside. Perfect for a slicked back, wet look or to lay down edges or to keep down some stubborn flyaways, this strong hold formula has just the right amount of slippage to evenly distribute the gel. The result? A long-lasting hold that helps you achieve exactly the look you're going for.

Using naturally-derived cherry blossom and sweet almond oil, this delicate conditioner swiftly restores softness and shine to lacklustre locks from root to tip – giving your mane a weightless bounce with every swish of your head. Organic coconut oil and shea butter deeply condition for effortless detangling, lending a gorgeous silky, ‘slippery’ texture that smooths right through any knots. A whopping 38 flower and plant essences (think: tonka bean, organic orange and ylang ylang) also lend a perfumey aroma that infuses hair with a sweet, juicy scent. 98% naturally derived and safe for coloured hair, this scrumptious formula is ideal for all lengths of normal to dry textures, and is especially effective on longer locks in need of a delightful boost.

name: Grow Gorgeous Intense Thickening Hair and Scalp Mask 200ml Grow Gorgeous Intense Thickening Hair and Scalp Mask 200ml
description: Increase the volume on your weekly self care ritual with the Intense Thickening Hair and Scalp Mask. Formulated to nourish your hairandscalp with a tailored blend of potent ingredients to bring about thicker and healthier hair. Visibly improve hair density while still conditioning your scalp, this unites hair care and scalp care in one weekly treatment mask. Fortifying your scalp's natural barrier is a complex of oat lipids and skin-friendly niacinamide, keeping that all-important moisture locked in for hair thatshines. Raising your roots are a shot of caffeine for stimulation (hello longer hair) and film-forming pea peptides, flat hair be gone! As for a little TLC, an infusion of amino acids, a key component of keratin, the Intense Thickening Hair and Scalp mask is rich in these nurturing treasures to leave your hair healthier than ever. Grow Gorgeous is sitting proudly on our shower shelfie and giving us the spring back in our step and the *flick* back to our hair.

name: Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml

Powdered by the brand's patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), this must-have body-builder helps cleanse delicate hair types, whilst repelling dirt and oil to ensure your hair is not weighed down, promoting natural-looking fullness without any stiffness or restrictive weight. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies – and without parabens, sulphates or silicones – Living Proof abandoned the usual shampoo ‘recipe’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.

Working on all scalps – but is an extra special treat for oily scalps – this lightweight, spa-like treatment leaves scalps feeling cool and offers a long-term solution to irritated scalps in need of relief. Not to mention, it packs in a punch with a wealth of moisture that leaves spells stronger hair days ahead.
how_to_use: After shampoo, apply a dime size in sections directly to the roots of wet hair and massage into scalp. Leave for up to 10 minutes. Rinse out and follow with HoliRoots Hair Mask or Conditioner on strands.

name: Larry King Hair Care Velvet Texture Clay Larry King Hair Care Velvet Texture Clay
description: A great way to add instant body to ‘second day’ hair, Velvet Texture Clay provides non-greasy ‘oomph’ to limp locks that could desperately do with some ‘va va voom’. With a matte finish and featherweight, non-sticky feel, this gives ‘guts’ to cropped styles or some super-cool, Courtney Love texture to mid-lengths and ends for some ‘90s grunge-glamour. Delectably scented – an evocative blend of log fires, musk, moss and warm cedarwood (Larry calls it ‘Autumn Fog’) – this perfect pomade is contained in a gorgeous glass jar while its beautiful box is suffused with a medley of wildflower seeds so that should it wind up where it probably shouldn’t, the carton will sow some new blooms as it biodegrades.
how_to_use: Rub a pea-sized amount between your hands, as if you’re using hand cream. For shorter lengths, rub throughout your hair, working from the back to the front. Imagine you’re running your hands over velvet, pushing the pile in all different directions. For mid-lengths and ends, rub hair between the palms of your hands back and forth. Once the product is thoroughly distributed you’re free to work your style into shape.

name: R+Co Death Valley Dry Shampoo (Various Sizes) R+Co Death Valley Dry Shampoo (Various Sizes)
description: Scented with R+Co's ROSY EYED scent (a beautiful blend of bergamot, wild fig, cyclamen, lotus flower, cedar wood and tonka beans) this multi-tasking miracle will leave your hair fresh and fragrant all day long. Simply spray DEATH VALLEY Dry Shampoo at the root to achieve your desired finish, whether you're removing excess oil, adding volume or creating 'bedhead' texture, this spray does it all - effortlessly. Silica absorbs excess oil, vitamin E nourishes and strengthens and pro-vitamin B5 thickens and builds volume for a lust-have hair look that will give everyone around you a major case of hair envy. Packaged in a sleek white opaque can with quintessential R+Co imagery, like the rest of this range DEATH VALLEY is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, colour-safe and free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oils and petrolatum. An essential part of the trustworthy and transparent hair care range you need in your life.
how_to_use: Give hair a shot of DEATH VALLEY whenever you want or need it and hair will instantly liven up.

name: Melanin Haircare Twist-Elongating Style Cream 475ml Melanin Haircare Twist-Elongating Style Cream 475ml
description: Designed to adapt to your hair's specific needs, the Twist-Elongating Styling Cream by Melanin Haircare nourishes, defines and detangles in one do-it all formula. The lightweight and buildable cream features five rich hair butters that work in harmony to condition the strands, including shea, mango, cocoa, kokum and cupuaçu. The benefits don't end there, as a blend of aloe vera, avocado, sweet almond oil and argan oil (phew) deliver a much-needed boost of hydration. Whether your hair is wet, dry, thick or thin, this versatile styling cream leaves strands ready to face the day.
how_to_use: Use as little or as much as needed. If you have thin hair, use less. For thicker hair, use more. Massage styling cream into wet or dry hair, one section at a time, and style as desired. Use with your favourite leave-in conditioner.
ingredient: Use as little or as much as needed. If you have thin hair, use less. For thicker hair, use more. Massage styling cream into wet or dry hair, one section at a time, and style as desired. Use with your favourite leave-in conditioner.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY Hair-Oil: Everyday Gloss 30ml BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY Hair-Oil: Everyday Gloss 30ml
description: Going above and beyond in its hair-caring role, BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY's hair-oil: everyday gloss — now available in a mini 30ml serving — is a versatile treatment that floods thirsty tresses with glossy hydration! Perfect for 3c to 4a hair, this multi-purpose, silicone-free formula is powered by superfruit extracts and impressive emollients to reveal soft, dewy curls and coils. What's so super about those oils? The potent Kakadu plum contains the highest concentration of vitamin C than any other fruit — 50 times more than an orange - and lends a hand in the maintenance of collagen and elastin levels in your scalp and hair to keep them soft and supple. As for starflower oil - otherwise known as borage oil - it possesses more gamma-linoleic acid than any other seed oil and helps to strengthen your hair follicle to prevent hair from breaking and shedding. Capryl capric triglycerides are the finishing touch as the cloak your hair in a silky veil of hydration that's both lightweight and impressively shiny. Whether you use it as a pre-wash conditioning treatment or in-between washes to boost the slip of your strands, you can expect enviably smooth, glossy and never greasy results!
how_to_use: Apply as you like - to wet hair after wash and mask, or dry hair in-between wash days. Add a few drops to hair-mask, or your body cream - or use as a pre-wash oil treatment.
ingredient: Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Terminalia Ferdinandiana Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool

name: BLEACH LONDON Awkward Peach Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Awkward Peach Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Pattern Intensive Conditioner 384.5ml Pattern Intensive Conditioner 384.5ml
description: Low-porosity hair types, listen up! If you feel like your hair just can't get enough moisture, the Intensive Conditioner is about to change your tune as it soaks strands in a potent, moisturising formula, turning the tide on undefined, frizzy curls. As with all PATTERN hair care, the award-winning Intensive Conditioner is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a moisturising blend of avocado oil, shea butter, safflower oil and acacia decurrens flower that penetrates even the porest of strands with moisture. Not only that, this oil-rich blend protects from breakage and washes through hair, leaving behind a bounty of beautifully-defined curls. Leaving behind a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, this deep conditioning treatment is a treat for dry, brittle tresses.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair from roots to ends. For extra dense curls or long hair, section with PATTERN Hair Clip while conditioning to ensure every strand gets the love it deserves. Use PATTERN Shower Brush or fingers to help detangle & bring curls together. Rinse thoroughly. Pro tip: For dry or brittle hair, leave conditioner on for 10 minutes as a repair treatment mask to help restore & revitalize your curls.

description: On the hunt for a hair oil that not only gives your mane a mirror-like shine, but also cloaks it in nourishing ingredients strands are guaranteed to lap up? Look no further than Augustinus Bader’s The Hair Oil with TCF8. Ultra-hydrating and yet impressively lightweight, this restorative elixir repairs dryness and split ends while actively reducing further breakage by deeply conditioning locks and protecting them against damage. This magic is all down to a seriously impressive ingredients list: the amnio-acid rich ‘TFC8 Complex’ helps to repair brittle, breakage-prone hair, tame frizz and boost shine; squalane and argan oil inject serious moisture for added silkiness; and vitamin E (a powerful antioxidant) restores your mane to its former glory by optimising cell structure maximum shine and strength.
how_to_use: Apply 1-3 drops to clean dry or towel-dried hair from the mid-lengths to the ends to detangle, smooth and add shine. Use 2 to 3 times per week as needed.

name: Oribe Royal Blowout Heat Styling Spray 5.9 fl. oz. Oribe Royal Blowout Heat Styling Spray 5.9 fl. oz.

Fortifying and softening strands, the formula is enriched with argan oil and an exclusive silicone complex that binds to keratin, forming a sheer layer that boosts shine and provides thermal protection. Ceramides provide further heat protection and help to repair splits ends, aided by a patented film-forming polymer that provides a breathable, long-term protective barrier. Fit for royalty, this opulent spray promises to speed up drying time too, so youll be left with more precious getting ready minutes its highly concentrated and best used sparingly, so itll also last you ages too.

name: Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Split End Remedy 50ml Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Split End Remedy 50ml
description: Working on and beneath the hair’s surface, Philip Kingsley’s pioneering Bond Builder Split End Remedy physically fortifies heat-weakened lengths and protects against damage from styling. Sealing and strengthening each individual strand, this ingenious formula fuses the compromised bonds to ‘undo’ any breakage and ward against ravages wrought by your straighteners, bleach, colour, sun and pollutants. Like ‘shrink-wrap’ for tresses, this has an immediate smoothing (and protective!) impact, granting a freshly cut feel that lasts up to three washes. In independent trials, 98.6% of split ends were sealed after one application, making this a boon for those susceptible to brittleness and breakage.
how_to_use: Start with a large pea sized amount, spreading in sections through mid-lengths and ends of towel dried hair. Pay close attention to the most damaged areas. Apply more to thicker or more damaged hair. For best results, blow-dry hair into desired style. Hair can be left to air dry. Re-apply at least every third wash. Use after and in-between Elasticizer treatments to maximise the results.

name: invisibobble Original Hair Tie (3 Pack) - Crystal Clear invisibobble Original Hair Tie (3 Pack) - Crystal Clear

name: Innersense I Create Volume Lotion 59ml Innersense I Create Volume Lotion 59ml
description: A lush formula that unites Certified Organic honey and aloe vera to bring fullness and manageability to even the finest or damaged of hair. Wheat amino acids and eucalyptus then add moisture, improving expansion and shine. Make hair styling a luxe, lush and relaxing experience with the sublime Innersense range. The I Create Volume Lotion allows you to take a moment, rebalance and reach a newfound calm during styling. Use your fingertips to work the product roots to end, then blow- dry or style and feel ready for the day or night ahead. Now available in a handy travel sized 59ml version, you can take this dreamy formula wherever you go.
