name: Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml
description: The ultimate mane-taming follow up to No Frizz Shampoo, Living Proof’s No Frizz Conditioner has a weightless, detangling formula to minimise hair stress when styling, whilst nourishing strands to preserve precious pigment and leave your locks feeling super-soft, shiny and ‘slippery’. Powered by the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA), which helps block humidity 70% more effectively than traditional oils and silicones whilst repelling environmental grime and pollutants – this heavenly hair-hydrator is a must-have in the war against frizz – rendering tresses more meek, mild and manageable. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Start with No Frizz Shampoo. Apply No Frizz Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Follow with one of Living Proof's No Frizz styling products.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Octafluoropentyl Methacrylate(OFPMA), Behentrimonium Chloride, Quaternium-87, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Fragrance/Parfum, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Magnesium Nitrate, Magnesium Chloride.

name: Philip KingsleyFlaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Scalp Toner 75ml Philip KingsleyFlaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Scalp Toner 75ml
description: Water-based and fragrance-free, this clear formula provides immediate and long-lasting relief from flaking and itchy scalps. With continued use alongside the wider Flaky/Itchy Scalp range, this prevents the recurrence of flakes and build-up of dead skill cells due to its anti-microbial and anti-flaking formula. Simply apply to damp, freshly washed hair and work into the scalp with fingertips. There’s no need to rinse, simply let this leave-in product do the hard work for you.
how_to_use: Apply to freshly washed, damp hair. Apply to the scalp from nozzle in 1" (3cm) sections (tip head back when applying to avoid product running into eyes). Distribute with fingertips. Do not rinse. Use cotton buds to apply to difficult to reach sensitive areas of the scalp. Can also be applied to dry hair to refresh.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Alcohol Denat., Benzalkonium Chloride, Camphor, Piroctone Olamine, Alcohol.

name: Davines Heart of Glass Intense Treatment 150ml Davines Heart of Glass Intense Treatment 150ml
description: An intense cosmetic treatment to reinforce blonde tones, Davines’ Heart of Glass Intense Treatment strengthens the hair fibre, helping to prevent breakage, for nourished hair, immediately brightened. Part of Davines ‘Heart of Glass’ edit – which derives its name from a famous song from the 80s, sang by a very blonde artist who has become an icon – this collection of products are designed to highlight the beauty of blonde hair, both natural and bleached, lightened and dyed; or hair that has been exposed to sunlight, the frequent use of the brushes or straighteners, all elements that could weaken its fibre. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (Heart of Glass, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this shampoo, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!
how_to_use: Apply to towel-dried hair along lengths and ends. Leave on for 5 to 10 minutes, comb and rinse thoroughly. If needed, follow with Heart of Glass Rich Conditioner. Use once a week, or more often if hair is very damaged. Rinse thoroughly in case of contact with eyes.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Behenyl Alcohol, Dicocoyl Pentaerythrityl Distearyl Citrate, Parfum / Fragrance, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentastearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Quaternium-87, Isopropyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Maleic Acid, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Disodium Edta, Oryza Sativa Cera / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Thioctamidoethyl Dimethylamine Maleate, Sodium Hydroxide, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Lactic Acid, Coumarin, Retinyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.

name: VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml
description: A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. Uniting this advanced protein with a host of other powerful ingredients, this One For All 6-In-One Styler truly does it all, providing softness, shine and light hydration, while also strengthening, polishing and protecting from heat. It’s enriched with panthenol (vitamin B5) a natural B vitamin that delivers moisture, softness and shine, cypress, an antioxidant rich essential oil known for light, soothing hydration and strengthening polymers, which work like an invisible scaffold to provide light hold and block out humidity. Fragranced with a fresh, verdant citrus blend featuring sweet orange, cypress and elemi essential oils, this truly is a gift from the hair care gods. What's more, after one week in a clinical trial, 89% of users found their hair felt softer, while 86% reported their hair looked healthier!
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp or dry hair from mid-shaft to ends.

name: Coco & Eve Bond Building Pre-Shampoo Treatment 125ml Coco & Eve Bond Building Pre-Shampoo Treatment 125ml
description: If chemically-treated and over-processed strands have you despairing for your hair, you might want to consider adding in Coco & Eve's newest hair saviour to your mane's rituals. Clinically proven to reduce hair breakage by 85%, this potent treatment works to rebuild broken bonds for a completely holistic hair repair. ‘Micro 3D Bond Building Technology' takes bond repair to another level to bring you results that will have you doing a double take. Rather than just rebuilding a single bond, this clever treatment works to repair 3 structural bonds (disulphide, ionic and hydrogen) to repair your strands from root to tip. Alongside a strengthening oil complex of coconut and avocado oils, and protective botanical oils, you'll soon reveal softer, smoother and overall healthier hair.
how_to_use: 1. Apply the product to damp hair from your roots to ends. 2. Leave in for at least 10 minutes. 3. Rinse off the treatment and shampoo your hair as usual. Follow up with our hair masks for best results.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Intensive Conditioner MALIN + GOETZ Intensive Conditioner
description: A conditioner gentle enough for daily washing but with the hydration power of a specialist treatment, MALIN + GOETZ’s Intensive Conditioner is a three-in-one hair hero. Not only does it detangle and condition dry, dehydrated strands, but it also restores shine and protects from environmental stressors that cause damage in the first place. See? A hero! Effective as a apply-and-rinse daily conditioner or as a moisture-injecting mask, its packed with vegan ingredients your thirsty mane will lap up. To replenish essential hydration and boost hair health, an effective trio of shea butter, safflower seed oil and argan oil work a treat. To nourish on a deeper level, soy and wheat amino acids replicate hair’s natural amino acids, strengthening strands and preventing breakage over time. All this, without leaving hair feeling limp or heavy.

description: The time has come to skinify your hair care rituals with Sam McKnight's deeply replenishing conditioner... the ultimate wash day essential. If your tresses have gone from lustrous to lacking lustre then you've come to the right corner of the beautysphere. A duo of two deeply replenishing seed oils -castor and sunflower - deliver a high concentration of omegas and minerals to cloak strands with a shiny, soft veil. Sustainable sugar beet and panthenol target dehydration and an infusion of Sam's signature botanical fragrance blend make this luxe conditioner a salon-worthy treat for your tresses.

description: Wake up call anyone? Instantly redefine your your loosening curl with the Power Hour Curl Refreshing Spray and turn heads wherever you go… Fighting off frizz and sealing in moisture with a powerhouse blend of soybean extract, tapioca starch and sea buckthorn that’s enriched with hair-loving omega 7, this hydrating hero delivers a surge of energy to otherwise dreary-looking locks and amps up every single coil with optimal hydration that you can spot from a mile away. name: Pattern Shower Brush Pattern Shower Brush
description: Designed to comb through thick hair without tugging, the Shower Brush glides through wet hair with ease to make managing your curls, coils and waves easy breezy. It can't be understated just how important it is to get the right brush to detangle textured hair in the shower but this award-winning brush gets it right. With its rubber bristles, it combs through hair effortlessly and with the just enough space between the rows to clump curls together, bringing out the best in your curl pattern. Not to mention, you can even hang it up in your shower. A heavyweight that can glide through thick curls and still be gentle? Prepare for your curls to pop.

name: Briogeo Superfoods Banana and Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray 170ml Briogeo Superfoods Banana and Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray 170ml
description: Beach day anyone? Where tousled tresses meet the crashing waves on the shore for a fun and flirty ‘do that needs a little zsushing up, the Superfoods Banana + Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray delivers vitamin-rich nourishment to your locks. Leaving the saltiness for the ocean water, this wave-enhancing formula is bursting with hair-strengthening vitamin B5 that supports your strands, fruit-derived antioxidants, potassium-packed banana extract that deeply nourishes parched hair and hydrating coconut sugar which encourages piecy separation for the most effortless looking beach waves. Totally non-drying and suitable for both keratin and colour-treated hair, this deliciously scented hair smoothie-turned-spritz is the perfect beach bag essential.
how_to_use: Spray throughout damp or dry hair. Scrunch or twist hair to enhance wave formation, then air dry to finish. For optimal results, use a diffuser to enhance your wave or curl pattern.

description: A salon service in a jar, amika's Bust Your Brass Cool Blonde Mask is an all-in-one ultra-violet lathering treatment that will rescue hair in need of some major TLC. Perfect for blondes, silvers and greys, this potent mask helps bring blondes back to life. Packed with the brand's bond cure technology (which targets bonds prone to breakage), plant butters, vegan protein, and ultra-violet pigments for your strongest and brightest mane yet! It's clinically proven to significantly brighten, intensely hydrate, strengthen and repair hair while providing a healthy portion of hydration thanks to three types of plant butters.

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Leave-In Treatment 25ml Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Leave-In Treatment 25ml
description: Whether you've dyed your hair to within an inch of its life, burnt it to a crisp or simply neglected your tresses to the point of breakage, consider this Botanical Repair Strengthening Leave-In Treatment from Aveda a hair necessity. The multi-purpose formula helps to detangle knots, reduce frizz, prevent breakage, strengthen your hair from the inside out and protect against heat up to 450°F! An all-rounder that delivers beautifully smooth, soft strands, this 99% naturally derived formula is designed with all hair types and textures in mind and is even safe for colour-treated and chemically processed hair. It's powered by a medley of plant extracts and oils that encourage the repair of your hair from the inside out, building bonds for stronger hair that's more resistant to damage. What's more, it protects against heat damage up to 450°F and the drying effects of the sun's UV rays. We're obsessed!

description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Signature Shampoo with this refill. Custom-blended from the most exclusive ingredients available, this luscious formula gently cleanses, detangles and protects hair, leaving it silky without adding weight. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection, while amber extract delivers conditioning antioxidant protection and keratin and hydrolysed keratin strengthen damaged hair and protect the surface of the hair shaft. description: Crafted to complement lighter tresses that are up against thinning, Aveda's low-lather, sulphate-free Invati Advanced Exfoliating Shampoo Light boasts an impressive exfoliating action that refreshes and renews your scalp to reveal thicker, fuller hair. The 94% naturally derived formula lays the foundation for voluminous strands and a healthy scalp with its conditioning and revitalising blend; it's infused with an impressive medley of conditioning agents to balance the exfoliating effect of wintergreen-derived salicylic acid which helps to shift the build-up that clogs your scalp. Soft, smooth and nourished strands that appear to have greater body!

For added hold, we recommend finishing your style with {Curl Defining Gel}. For added shine, we recommend finishing your style with {Curl Moisturizing Shine Oil}. Curl Enhancer does not make straight hair wavy as it was designed for naturally wavy textures. If you're looking to add waves to naturally straight hair, try the Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler.

name: Aveda Sap Moss Weightless Hydration Shampoo 200ml Aveda Sap Moss Weightless Hydration Shampoo 200ml
description: Looking to the earth's produce to enrich your tresses, this Sap Moss Shampoo from Aveda is carefully crafted to cleanse and hydrate your hair without the weighing it down, so you achieve beautifully shiny, manageable locks. The 94% naturally derived, silicone-free formula is made with a unique blend of Iceland moss and larch tree sap and coconut extract to deliver featherweight yet effective hydration to thirsty, frizz-prone strands. Helping to refresh and revitalise your hair without leaving it feeling stripped in any way, this clever concoction will sweep through the competition to win a spot in your shower. Not convinced? In consumer testing of 420 women (with hair of all textures) using the shampoo and conditioner, 90% said their hair was immediately left feeling hydrated without feeling weighed down. Plus, the formula is infused with a beautiful, earthy aroma that boasts notes of jasmine and certified organic olibanum and cypress.
how_to_use: Emulsify a small amount into hands, massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with sap moss™ weightless hydrating conditioner.

name: dpHUE Gentle Brightening Conditioner for Blonde Highlighted Hair 6.5 fl. oz dpHUE Gentle Brightening Conditioner for Blonde Highlighted Hair 6.5 fl. oz
description: Wash day shouldn’t cost your colour. Maintain the vibrancy of your blonde hair with dpHUE’s Gentle Brightening Conditioner. As well as leaving your strands silky, soft and strong, it’s formulated to prevent dullness and keep brassiness at bay too! This colour-safe conditioner provides much-needed slip and hydration to chemical-treated hair, helping to prevent damage and breakage. It’s also formulated with a gentle chelating agent that draws out dulling minerals, product residue and impurities to reveal your brightest blonde yet. Although it has the most visible results on blonde and highlighted hair, it can be used on darker hair to purify and condition it without impacting its colour.
how_to_use: Apply through clean, damp hair. Rinse thoroughly. For best results, use with dpHUE Gentle Brightening Shampoo.

name: Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Anti-Fade Shampoo 250ml Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Anti-Fade Shampoo 250ml
description: Benefitting course, fine, medium and naturally coiled hair types, the Pure Colour Anti-Fade Shampoo locks in and extends the lifetime of your colour – whether you dyed it at home or in the salon – while extending the life of chemical styling treatments, with an aim to help you go for longer between salon appointments. Working to improve on vibrancy and shine, this sulphate-free formula even adds body and bounce while soothing and conditioning the scalp for optimum hair health. In fact – when compared to a standard shampoo in a lab-controlled test – this formula prolongs colour by up to 100% longer, and protects your colour for up to 24 washes! It does this via green tea extract – an antioxidant-rich ingredient than protects hair colour from water, UV rays and free radical pollutants. A protein-based complex also strengthens the hair and builds its resistance to brushing and combing, while pro vitamin B5 imparts moisture, shine and silkiness to improve on manageability while limiting the damage caused by chemical treatments.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and lather, gently kneading the scalp for 60 seconds. Rinse well and repeat if necessary. If colour treating your hair at home, use to wash out colour following application and for each wash following. If having hair colour treated or chemically processed in the salon, use from the first wash after having hair treated.

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Serum Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Serum
description: Detoxifying, soothing and hydrating, Briogeo’s Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment is the SOS dry, flaky and irritated scalps are crying out for. At the forefront of the crack team of reviving ingredients, Binchotan charcoal draws impurities from the scalp and hair follicle to remove build up. Cooling peppermint, spearmint and tea tree oils reduce itchiness and offer healing antiseptic properties to reduce inflammation. And as if that wasn’t enough, super vitamin biotin provides essential nutrients to the hair follicle to support healthy hair growth.
how_to_use: Part the hair into sections, apply 1-2 drops to each partition and massage into the scalp. Do not rinse out. The treatment should be applied after washing and before styling. It can also be applied before bedtime as a pre-shampoo scalp treatment. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: WetBrush Pro Detangler - Purple WetBrush Pro Detangler - Purple
description: An innovation in hair care, the Pro Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) brush is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Pro Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.

name: Amika Bust Your Brass Intense Repair Mask 100ml Amika Bust Your Brass Intense Repair Mask 100ml
description: All blondes are welcome — bring your strands back to life with this transformative hair wash treatment, infused with brass busting ultra-violet pigments and plant butters to keep your mane strong and colour vibrant. Here to bring the best out of lighter-toned tresses, amika’s Bust Your Brass Cool Blonde Repair Shampoo unites innovative ‘Bond Cure Technology’ to keep breakage at bay, with corrective pigments to leave your hair strong and colour on point. Working alongside your normal hair wash days, this ultra-violet hued shampoo counteracts unwanted brassy and yellow tones to keep blondes, silvers or greys as intended. Damaged hair, we don’t know her! This cleansing treatment is packed full of vegan proteins derived from quinoa (it’s not just for your bougie salad) to help provide keratin-like benefits for your strands that don’t leave your hair feeling brittle and weak. Three nourishing plant butters, including mango butter extract and shea butter, provide a supercharged dose of omegas, essential vitamins and fatty acids, so even the most lacklustre hair will be revived after a little one on one time with this innovative and intoxicatingly scented shampoo… we’re just about ready to bathe in the warming aroma of spicy sweet clover, fresh citrus and vanilla. Get ready to bust your brass and perfect your hair flick.
how_to_use: If you are a natural (non-colour treated) blonde: In the summer months (when hair is more likely to become brassy), use the bust your brass shampoo + conditioner every other wash. use the Bust Your Brass Repair Mask 1x per week in place of conditioner. If you are a platinum blonde: To maintain tone, use Bust Your Brass Shampoo + Conditioner every other wash. We suggest alternating Bust Your Brass Shampoo + Conditioner with the Kure Shampoo + Conditioner and Multi-Task Repair Treatment. Use bust your brass repair mask 1x per week in place of conditioner. If you notice pesky brassiness pop up, use the Bust Your Brass system every wash until desired tone is reached. Keep track of your tone: if you're loving your tone, keep up your routine as is. If you notice brassiness peeking in, increase use of the Bust Your Brass mask an additional time per week. If you are a little too cool-toned and nearing a violet tone, cut back on the Bust Your Brass routine for a week or two. If you have highlights, a balayage, or natural-looking (colour-treated) blonde hair: Use bust your brass shampoo + conditioner every other wash. Assess hair's tone and pivot (increase or decrease usage) as needed. Those with naturally dark hair should use the bust your brass intense repair mask 1x per week in place of conditioner. Please note: naturally darker or brunette hair will fight to return to natural hair color; in this case, increase the usage of system. If you have grey hair: Use bust your brass shampoo + mask every wash or alternate every other wash with the kure collection. If you are a textured blonde: Follow the regimen suggested above based on the type of blonde, but use the Bust Your Brass Repair Mask in place of conditioner for an extra dose of moisture. The bust your brass repair mask is the perfect mix of toning, moisture, and repair which is just what a textured blonde needs.

name: Oribe Gold Lust Conditioner Refill 1000ml Oribe Gold Lust Conditioner Refill 1000ml
description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner with this refill. The luscious, restorative conditioner seals in moisture without weighing hair down, thanks to centuries-oil healing oils and extracts — including deeply moisturising Mediterranean Cyprus extract, shine-boosting argan oil and hydration-boosting maracuja oil. Alongside this, Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) defends hair from oxidative stress, damage and the colour-fading effect of the elements. A bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) strengthens the hair cuticle from inside out, boosted by a protein blend that reverses existing damage and reduces split ends. Ultra-hydrating, this will leave your mane soft, smooth and magnificent.

name: ghd The All-Rounder Paddle Hair Brush ghd The All-Rounder Paddle Hair Brush
description: ghd stands for 'good hair day' - a motto that the All-Rounder Paddle Brush certainly lives up to. If you're looking to create smooth and shiny salon-worthy locks at home, and receive multiple compliments, this is your new can't-live-without-it tool.  Designed for mid to long hair, the All-Rounder gently detangles tresses without creating static (cue extra points from us). The broad flat base is ideal for styling larger sections of hair, whether you're creating a Hollywood-inspired blowout or smoothing your locks into a sleek updo - although it's just as good at ensuring your fringe sits perfectly straight, too. And just to make things extra easy and efficient, it has a non-slip handle so you'll feel like a total pro every time you use it.
how_to_use: Blast your hair on a low heat and medium speed setting until 80% dry, then brush it through from root to tip using swift strokes, while following the direction of your brush with your hairdryer. Ensure your dryer's nozzle is on to concentrate the air flow. Top tip: For a straight fringe that sits perfectly, alternate between brushing to the left and right with the paddle brush, while blasting with your dryer on a low heat and medium speed setting.

name: Living Proof PhD Conditioner Travel Size 60ml Living Proof PhD Conditioner Travel Size 60ml
description: Formulated to ensure every day is a Perfect Hair Day, this conditioner hydrates and nourishes without weighing down locks. What makes this particular product oh-so-special? It’s clever formulation is designed to give you the perfect balance of five of the most-coveted benefits in hair care: smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength and polish. We’re selling you on it, right? Add in a sulphate-free INCI list (sulphates can lead to serious dryness in your strands over time) and a light, fresh, citrusy fragrance, and you’re on to a winner.
how_to_use: Start with Perfect hair Day Shampoo. Then apply Perfect Hair Day Conditioner, spread through hair and rinse.

description: A fan favourite, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Shampoo is a beautiful phthalate, paraben, silicone, sulfate and cruelty-free formula that helps you wash your hair less often, improves health and condition over time and makes locks feel cleaner for longer. A revolutionary formula, the shampoo is powered by the brand's patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA), which does four things: smooths hair, polishes and protects strands, creates visibly healthier hair over time and helps repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer. Prepare to become seriously obsessed.

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Scalp Renew 2 oz Act+Acre Cold Processed Scalp Renew 2 oz
description: Hit the refresh button on your tender scalp with the itch-preventing Scalp Renew, an gently exfoliating scalp treatment that helps to rebalance sebum levels, remove build and - yes and target dandruff. Phew! Applying a skin care approach to your wash day rituals and bursting with a cooling and soothing blend of peppermint extract, papaya extract and salicylic acid, this oil-balancing remedy works to give your delicate scalp the much-needed exhale it needs. Perfect for all hair types from straight to coily, this restorative must-have is just what you need to give your scalp the reboot it's been longing for.

name: Innersense Colour Radiance Daily Conditioner 946ml Innersense Colour Radiance Daily Conditioner 946ml
description: Lightweight and build-up-free, this Color Radiance Daily Conditioner moisturises and strengthens hair while imparting intense shine. A lust-have daily conditioner, this rich and luxe cream is formulated with intensely moisturising and cleansing rice bran oil and avocado oils that also provide effective smoothing, frizz-taming and elasticity-boosting properties. Rice proteins moisturise and strengthen while repairing and protecting, and shea butter naturally defines your hair texture for intensified waves and curls. Formulated with therapeutic essential oils, this divine product also allows you to take a moment to re-centre and rebalance while practising self care. Now even available in a huge, value-saving 946ml bottle, you never have to be without this hair hero again. We're obsessed!

name: Davines Liquid Spell Davines Liquid Spell
description: Visibly transforming the structure of your strands – while enhancing their health and strength – Davines’ Liquid Spell is magical enough to live up to its name. Designed specifically for fine or sensitised hair, the liquid turns into a mousse when dispensed and grants instant texture and body to even the most limp, lacklustre locks. Thanks to a complex of amino acids, it boosts hair’s external structure to boost body, enhanced by a ‘thermo-activated molecule’. This helps to defend hair from heat damage: the formula ‘compacts’ your hair fibre to minimise damage while granting softness, shine and tone and boosting enviable vitality. This miraculous fluid can be used alone or in conjunction with your favourite hair care formulas – combine it with Davines’ {OI All In One Milk} for example, to immediately strengthen and boost your hair while reducing blow-dry time and leaving your mane magnificently fully-bodied, shiny and durable.
how_to_use: Dispense 3-4 pumps on towel-dried hair, applying it evenly from the roots to the ends and comb through. Finally, blow-dry and style as desired. It can be used in combination with any of your usual hair care products applying it after any product intended for scalp treatment and before hair treatments or styling products. Apply Liquid Spell Reinforcing Bodifying Fluid followed by OI All In One Milk. It will immediately strengthen and give body to your hair, for a time-reduced blow-dry and hair that’s full-bodied, shiny and durable

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp 8-Day Kit (Worth £39.50) Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp 8-Day Kit (Worth £39.50)
description: Celebrating the multi-award winning range that's specially designed to relieve and clear irritated scalps of flakes and build up, the Flaky Itchy Regime Kit stars deluxe editions of the Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo (75ml), Flaky Itchy Scalp Toner (75ml) and a full size duo of the Flaky/Itchy Scalp Masks (2 x 20ml). Unlike other dandruff treatments, the Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo does not dry out the hair or strip it of colour, instead, it gently cleanses with specialised ingredients to remove build up and irritation. Water-based and fragrance-free, with continued use the Flaky Itchy Scalp Toner prevents the recurrence of flakes and build-up of dead skill cells due to its anti-microbial and anti-flaking formula. Finally, the tubes (one tube is adequate for one full scalp application) of Flaky Itchy Scalp Mask is formulated with anti-fungal piroctone olamine, exfoliating salicylic acid and antioxidant-rich green tea extract to calm whilst tackling the root cause of dandruff and dry, flaking scalps at bay.

name: Kitsch Satin Pillow Scrunchie Kitsch Satin Pillow Scrunchie
description: Minimising damage while looking totally chic, these scrunchies are far more than a nod to the 90s Covering specially selected elasticated bands with beautifully soft satin, Kitschs Satin Pillow Scrunchies won't crimp or disrupt your strands while you sleep, allowing you to wake up frizz and crease-free! Whether youre creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that theres no damage or breakage. Think: night-time necessity.
how_to_use: Use to style hair while sleeping.

name: Oribe Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color 200ml Oribe Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color 200ml
description: Achieve your most beautiful blonde with Oribe’s Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color, a revitalising, moisturising violet conditioner that corrects brassiness and hydrates for hair that is soft, strong, shiny and ‘lit from within’. The formula moisturises and restores strands without weighing them down, smoothing each cuticle to seal in moisture and help to reduce split ends. Available in two sizes, pick from the 200ml full size or the 50ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. Pure violet pigment, reflective pearls and a brightening complex – of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts – optimise hair colour and luminosity, while luscious natural oils (including moringa seed and jojoba oils) condition locks. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damaged hair, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. Boosting this protection, Oribe’s signature complex (crafted from watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural collagen, while multi-UV protection shields hair from the colour-depleting effects of the sun’s rays.
how_to_use: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse

name: Briogeo MegaStrength Dandruff Control Shampoo 248ml Briogeo MegaStrength Dandruff Control Shampoo 248ml
description: Providing a gently cleansing exfoliation, the Scalp Revival MegaStrength+ Dandruff Relief Shampoo Charcoal + AHA/BHA is specifically formulated for those with scalp itching, irritation, redness or flaking due to dandruff, psoriasis, and seborrheic dermatitis. You’ll probably recognise some of your favourite skin care ingredients within this innovative formula — your scalp is just an extension of the skin on your face and body after all. 3% salicylic acid (a beta-hydroxy acid) and hydrating lactic acid (an alpha-hydroxy acid) gently slough away dead skin calls on your scalp that can cause itchiness and flakiness, while also lifting away dryness, excess oils, product build up, and dirt. To really prevent your hair follicles getting clogged up with impurities, products and excess sebum (this can cause that itchiness and irritation!), there’s also binchotan charcoal which detoxifies your scalp and draws out all that build up. The result? A happy, healthy and flake-free head of hair!
how_to_use: Gentle enough for daily use. For best results, use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor or physician. Massage into wet scalp and hair to build lather, then rinse.

name: BLEACH LONDON I Saw Red Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON I Saw Red Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Innersense Pure Harmony Hairbath 946ml Innersense Pure Harmony Hairbath 946ml
description: A sulphate-free formula that’ll leave your precious locks feeling (and smelling) wonderful, this gentle shampoo is a must for fine to medium hair types. Featuring a series of natural ingredients such as coconut, rice bran and avocado oils, it purifies your hair and scalp while granting soft-to-the-touch smoothness. A dream team of antioxidant-rich green tea and cranberry seed oils help to heal and soothe any irritation at your scalp, while imparting moisture and softness to your strands. Incorporating a sensual element into your shower routine, pumpkin seed and orange flower oils add an uplifting top note, releasing tension and boosting circulation. Now available in full size 295ml, travel-friendly 59ml and huge, value-saving 946ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.
how_to_use: Thoroughly saturate hair with water. Take a deep breath and become centred. Begin by dispensing a small amount of hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. Apply with fingertips to scalp, massaging and cleansing. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary and follow with Pure Inspiration Daily Conditioner.

name: Aveda Shampure Nurturing Shampoo 250ml Aveda Shampure Nurturing Shampoo 250ml
description: Treat your tresses to a shampoo that's so gentle, so nourishing that you'll never want to part from it. That's where Aveda's Shampure Nurturing Shampoo comes in! Refreshing in an instant and revealing beautifully soft hair, don't be surprised if you feel the urge to swish your strands... This effective formula is powered by a medley of conditioning ingredients that help to leave your hair feeling squeaky clean, revitalised and ever-so shiny. This silicone-free shampoo is made from 96%(!) naturally derived ingredients, including Abyssinian oil, an impressively lightweight extract that delivers intense hydration without overloading your hair. Best of all, it's made with Aveda's signature calming aroma that's crafted from 25 pure flower and plants essences that will ensure your shower and your strands are scented to perfection.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair. Rinse. Follow with shampure™ nurturing conditioner.

name: We Are Paradoxx Repair 3-in-1 Conditioner 250ml We Are Paradoxx Repair 3-in-1 Conditioner 250ml
description: There are not one, not two but three functions to this conditioner! Meaning whatever tantrum your hair is throwing, it’s nothing this repair-focused conditioner can’t handle. This 3-in-1 conditioner works with you not against you by offering flexibility so you can tweak your hair care regime as you please. When days call for more TLC, leave the conditioner in as a mask to soak in all the goodness or rinse and go if you’ve got to dash! No matter the method, you can still reap the benefits of We are Paradoxx’s holy trinity of ingredients: carragreen moss to fortify hair, coconut oil for hydration and matcha green tea for fuller-looking (and healthy!) hair.
how_to_use: After shampooing, work into wet hair and rinse. You can also apply to towel dried hair as a leave in conditioner or on dry hair as a styling balm.

name: ghd The Comb Out Detangling Hair Comb ghd The Comb Out Detangling Hair Comb
description: Whether you're detangling damp hair, combing through mousse or conditioner, or dressing bouncy curls into soft waves, The Comb Out does it all with gentle precision. This wide-toothed, anti-static design ensures that your hair is cared for even when it's at its most fragile and prone to damage. It's also heat-resistant so you can use it alongside blow-dryers, straighteners and curling wands alike. Start using this essential tool and you can guarantee that every day lives up to the brand's 'good hair day' motto.
how_to_use: Work on detangling your hair from the ends to the root. Hold each section as you comb to avoid causing stress to the root area.

name: BLEACH LONDON Lavender Grey Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON Lavender Grey Toner Kit
description: Grey is officially chic… and lilac-tinted grey is even chicer – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Lavender Grey Toner Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add a lavender- grey sheen tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool. It will last for around 16-20 washes on pre-lightened hair.
how_to_use: Lasts for around 16-20 washes. For use on pre-lightened hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH LONDON TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH LONDON DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH LONDON BEACH LIGHTS to lighten hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Hair condition, porosity, length, fineness, shade and any previous treatments. The final effect will depend on your current hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocamide MEA, Polysilicone-18 Cetyl Phosphate, Ethanolamine, Carbomer, Sodium Sulfite, Betaine, Parfum (Fragrance), Dipropylene Glycol, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Mica, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Bisabolol, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium HEDTA, Boswellia Serrata Gum, 2-Methyl-5-Hydroxyethylaminophenol, 5-Amino-6-Chloro-o-Cresol, Sodium Benzoate, Resorcinol, 2,4-Diaminophenoxyethanol HCl, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool

name: Amika Un.Done Volume & Texture Spray Amika Un.Done Volume & Texture Spray
description: For an effortlessly undone, piecey, just-stepped-off-the-catwalk-into-the-streets-of-Paris look, the Un.Done Volume & Texture Spray adds instant volume and purposefully imperfect texture. Cruelty-free and vegan, this lightweight finishing spray will give you the bedhead without the bed, adding tousled texture to already-styled hair. Also providing light hold with an intoxicating scent that’ll have other heads turning (think: warm vanilla, spicy-sweet clover and fresh citrus), this spray enhances your hair’s own natural texture – encouraging volume and giving flat hair the boot. Zeolite minerals fight frizz and detoxify; rice starch absorbs dirt and oil while adding body; and sea buckthorn (an incredibly potent and natural ‘superfuit’) pumps strands with omega 7 fatty acids and antioxidant-rich vitamins to promote elasticity, protect and provide superior levels of hydration to both hair and scalp.
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray on dry, styled hair all over or where needed for texture, volume, and undone sexiness. Tousle hair.

(SD ALCOHOL 40-B), Disiloxane, VP/VA Copolymer, Oryza Sativa (Rice/Riz) Starch, Zeolite, Isobutane, Fragrance/Parfum, Triethyl Citrate, Glycerin, Water/Eau/Aqua, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Isopropyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Citronellol

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Cleanse Shampoo 250ml Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Cleanse Shampoo 250ml
description: The time has come to skinify your hair care rituals with Sam McKnight's deeply replenishing shampoo... the ultimate wash day essential. Scalp care goes strand in strand with healthy hair, which is why finding the right shampoo to care for your hair is of the utmost importance. The Rich Cleanse Nourishing Shampoo from Sam McKnight has been designed to care for coloured, thirsty and damaged lengths. Naturally derived mild surfactants sweep away excess oil, dirt and product residue without drying out your scalp, making this gentle shampoo a must for those with sensitive scalps. A quinoa pro complex and conditioning plant keratin have been combined to create a nourishing powerhouse. These hair heroes are rich in amino acids that leave brittle hair feeling instantly softened. Finished with moisturising and shine-inducing sugar beet and Sam's signature botanical fine fragrance to start you on your healthy hair journey.
how_to_use: Gently massage into wet hair and scalp. Repeat and follow with conditioner if required.
ingredient: Aqua, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Steareth-100/PEG-136/HDI Copolymer, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Citric Acid, Panthenol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Amaranth Protein, Potassium Sorbate, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Polyquaternium-7, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Limonene.

name: VIRTUE Full Shampoo 240ml VIRTUE Full Shampoo 240ml
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Full Shampoo, a game-changing way to cleanse and care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Shampoo also creates enviable volume, dissolving excess oil, lifting the root and plumping each strand for weightless, long-lasting body. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and biotin, a hard-working form of vitamin B known for boosting strength and shine. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. What's more, after one week of using the shampoo and conditioner in a clinical trial, 87% of users reported that their hair had more body, while 84% found their hair felt thicker!
how_to_use: Work a small amount between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, pair with your favourite Virtue Conditioner.

name: Davines Alchemic Conditioner - Silver 250ml Davines Alchemic Conditioner - Silver 250ml
description: A colour-based conditioning cream designed to intensify and protect your natural or chosen hair colour. This luxurious conditioner contains hydrolysed milk proteins that deeply moisturise and protect hair. It is formulated with strong colour pigments to enhance and maintain your colour for a vibrant, long lasting effect. This conditioner leaves your hair feeling salon treated after just one use & works best when used after Alchemic Shampoo. Available in 'Silver Fox' for light/ash blondes and grey hair to bring down any brassiness, 'Golden Blond' to bring warmth and depth to honeyed blonds, 'Chocolate' to add a warm richness to Brunettes and 'Red' to add fire to auburn to redheads.

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml
description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.
how_to_use: Once a week, or immediately after rinsing a chemical colourant, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Sodium Chloride, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Cocamide Mea, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrated Silica, Fragrance (Parfum), Saccharide Isomerate, Menthyl Lactate, Bisabolol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal.

name: Philip Kingsley Body and Volume Jet Set (Worth £41.50) Philip Kingsley Body and Volume Jet Set (Worth £41.50)
description: Frustrated with limp or lacklustre hair that has no volume? Now’s the time to give your hair a kiss of life. The Philip Kingsley Body and Volume Jet Set is the perfect introduction- or clever stock-up - to the complete collection of bounce-bestowing hair care. The first step of the routine is the super enriching Elasticizer, a pre-shampoo treatment mask that deeply conditions the hair for healthy and hydrated lengths right from the start. Follow with the Body Building Shampoo give your hair a cleanse to remember. The blend of natural cellulose and keratin proteins works to strengthen your hair and give a voluminous appearance. Finish with the lightweight Body Building Conditioner to perfect your hair’s new bounce. Fortified and plumped by wheat protein and softened by cuticle-smoothing silicone, your fear of flat lengths will become a thing of the past.
how_to_use: Elasticizer: Apply before shampooing. Dampen the hair with water and apply evenly in sections to mid-lengths and ends. Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. Leave for at least 10-20 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only. Body Building Shampoo: Apply to wet hair. Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp. Rinse and repeat if necessary. Body Building Conditioner: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends. Rinse well.
ingredient: Elasticizer – Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid. name: Bouclème Curl Towel Bouclème Curl Towel
description: A staple in any member of the curly hair crews' ritual, Bouclème's Curl Towel - Original White is made from lightweight materials to accelerate drying time without drawing too much moisture from your hair. With an ultra-soft, jersey texture, this lightweight hair wrap won't compromise the cuticle layer: a sure-fire way to exacerbate split ends and frizz. Instead, it's made of a unique fabric - comprised of 46% organic cotton, 46% bamboo and 8% elastane - that only absorbs excess water. The results? Your hair will stay feeling smooth, hydrated and well cared for. *Adds to basket*
how_to_use: Plop or wrap curls into curl towel after cleansing, or whilst enjoying a deep conditioning treatment. How to plop: Place towel on a flat surface. Lower curls then head onto the middle of the towel. Flip the towel over the back of the head and twist to tie. Curls are now concertina’d on top of your head, encouraging curl formation as they dry. Wash towel on a 30 degree cycle. Do not tumble dry.
ingredient: 46% Organic Cotton, 46% Bamboo and 8% Elastane Approx. 95cm x 55cm

name: Oribe Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz. Oribe Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz.
description: Ideal for tresses in a tizz, the Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner works to balance, deeply hydrate and soothe the scalp using acacia tree extract while giving troublesome dandruff flakes the boot. Ultra-nourishing, this conditioner encourages a happy equilibrium atop your scalp while quenching thirsty strands with shea butter and unwinding tangles for soft, silky, more manageable hair. Oribé’s Signature Complex feeds hair with watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower to defend against oxidative and environmental stress alongside the deterioration of natural keratin. Biotin and quinoa strengthen the hair cuticle, prevent breakage and revitalise brittle strands, while caffeine stimulates the scalp and rejuvenates hair follicles. Expect gorgeous shine via lightweight olive oil with restored levels of elasticity as the super sweet, Insta-worthy packaging adds a pretty, pastel touch to your shower-side décor.
how_to_use: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Smooth Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Smooth Shampoo
description: NatureLab TOKYOs Perfect Smooth Shampoo goes right to the root of the frizz problem. Nourishing your scalp and strands with a deeply moisturising blend, this dryness-defeating shampoo is a must for mane management. The ultra-softening blend of argan, baobab and marula oils helps to smooth frizzy follicles, while yuzu ceramides detangling action makes worn-out hair all the more manageable. Protein- and mineral-rich quinoa is a source of all eight essential amino acids which makes it perfectly suited to repairing and strengthening your strands. Encouraging hair renewal at a cellular level, argan stem cells stimulate the follicles of your lengths to promote growth and improved quality. Smelling as good as it does, this formula has a warm and fresh scent profile that is inspired by freshly peeled Japanese yuzu (y-u-m). Need a final nudge? After 30 day clinical study, 83% of users saw an improvement in frizz reduction and hair smoothness! Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.
how_to_use: No points for guessing this one - wash and rinse your way to smoothness.

name: Oribe Power Drops Damage Repair Booster Oribe Power Drops Damage Repair Booster
description: Supercharge your hair care with this potent booster from Oribe. Highly-concentrated, this Power Drops Damage Repair Booster provides an intense dose of essential nutrients to rebuild and restore dry, damaged, time-weakened hair. Formulated with linoleic acid, biotin and sea kelp extract, just a few drops of this powerful elixir repairs and fortifies strands. Tired of dry, damaged hair? Then let us introduce you to Oribe's Power Drops Damage Repair Booster. This mini but mighty formula is jam-packed with good-to-hair actives that promise to revive lacklustre locks. It's formulated with a 2% hyaluronic acid complex which acts like a sponge, holding onto moisture in hair while creating a barrier around the cuticle for deep hydration and conditioning as well as Oribe's signature complex of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower which defends hair from oxidative stress, photoageing and the deterioration of natural keratin all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. But it doesn't stop there, this booster is also brimming with linoleic acid - an essential fatty acid that strengthens and repairs damage by rebuilding hair's healthy structure and functionality, biotin - which is known to strengthen strands and reduce hair fallout caused by breakage and finally, sea kelp extract - rich in vitamins A, B and E, this deeply hydrates and restores elasticity while smoothing the cuticle and enhancing softness, just a few drops of this powerful elixir repairs and fortifies strands. Entirely fuss-free, you can mix this with any Oribe hair product to create your very own potent concoction of hair-strengthening goodness that you'll never want to be without again.
how_to_use: Mix 3-5 drops with any Oribe product in the palm of your hand to give your regular routine a boost. To use alone, apply to damp hair.

name: Briogeo Curl Charisma Rice Amino and Avocado Hydrating Shampoo Jumbo 1000ml Briogeo Curl Charisma Rice Amino and Avocado Hydrating Shampoo Jumbo 1000ml
description: Formulated with clever, naturally-derived cleansers that remove dirt and build up without stripping curls of much-needed moisture, Briogeo's Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating Shampoo is a game-changing must-have for all those with coiling curls, wild waves and formidable frizz. Ultra-hydrating shea butter and avocado oil increase hair's softness and enhance the body of curls without weighing them down. Meanwhile, rice amino acids penetrate the hair shaft to effectively lock out frizz-causing environmental moisture, while tomato fruit ferment seals the cuticle to ensure that hair dries consistently, allowing for uniform curl formation.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and massage vigorously for about 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. If your hair has extra build-up, rinse and repeat. For best results, follow with Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Shea Curl Defining Conditioner. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: Drybar The Bouncer Diffuser Drybar The Bouncer Diffuser
description: So, you've got your eye on the happy-hued powers of the Buttercup Blow-Dryer, but your curly tresses need a little more TLC... look no further than the Bouncer Diffuser to care for your curls! If you're a curl connoisseur or wondering why your curls don't stay in line after your blowout, then chances are you need this blow-dryer partner in your life. Brightly coloured and created to perfectly fit your Buttercup Blow-Dryer, Baby Buttercup (P.S. and most other blow-dryers too!) this diffuser broadens and reduces the speed of airflow as you dry to offer a gentle breeze that defines your curls and keeps frizz at bay. Simply attach to the nozzle of your blow-dryer and, using a low or medium heat, work slowly up from the ends to the roots of your strands in large, scooped sections. It's time to let your curls do all the talking.
how_to_use: Attach to the nozzle of your blow-dryer and adjust the temperature setting to low or medium. Start at the ends. Hold each section in place for several seconds before moving on to the next section. Continue until the hair is dry. TIP: Tilt your head so you can "dip" your hair into the diffuser.

description: Hello… is it volume you’re looking for? Conservation is the name of the game with Philip Kingsley’s new Density Preserving Scalp Drops — formulated to help slow hair loss with continued use. Trust in the science of Trichology and let the hair and scalp specialists at Philip Kingsley restore volume and health back to even the finest of strands. This innovative combination of actives comes together to help prolong your hair’s lifecycle through a biomimetic peptide blend and saw palmetto: two vital ingredients that may not only help slow hair loss but also improve hair density and quality over time. A cooling, tingling sensation can be expected. Blow-dry or style as usual.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Shampoo 236ml Living Proof No Frizz Shampoo 236ml

Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.

name: amika Curl Corps Enhancing Gel amika Curl Corps Enhancing Gel
description: Want to define and celebrate your curls while protecting them for the weather for long-lasting results? Let us introduce you to amika's Curl Corps Enhancing Gel. This clear, weather-protecting styling gel enhances hair's existing curl pattern, making natural waves, curls, and coils look better than ever without any unwanted crunch. An award-winning formula that prevents the weather from diminishing your chosen finish, this clear styling gel boosts your natural curls and lends them a bouncy shape without any of that unwanted crunch. But it doesn't stop there, this hero protect also lightly moisturises, controls frizz, seals in moisture, and holds the definition of curls for a long-lasting style. A must-have for those with natural curls, koils or waves, this is laced with hydrolysed wheat protein, which adds body, strength and shape to your hair, oat peptide, which is extracted from oat kernel, forms a protective barrier on hair which locks in moisture to deliver shine and a silky feel as well as sea buckthorn – one of the most potent natural ingredients on the planet. This superfruit is amika's Holy Grail hero ingredient and is one of the few known plant sources of the fatty-acid omega 7 typically found in fish oil which promotes elasticity and provides superior hydration making it the ultimate holy grail ingredient for hair and scalp. Need another reason to invest? It also features amika's go-to intoxicating blend of warm vanilla, spicy sweet clover, and fresh citrus. Yum.

name: Philip Kingsley Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment 5g Philip Kingsley Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment 5g
description: The Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment is – not to sound dramatic – like nothing you’ve ever tried before. The texture is a unique powder to jelly, which – stay with us here – actually helps you to get the most out of your vitamin C. Allow us to explain… Vitamin C is an unstable molecule that oxidises on exposure to light, air and heat, which instantly reduces its efficacy, rendering it pointless. This is common in liquid formulas, which is why Philip Kingsley has made this pre-shampoo treatment in powder form – thus removing any instability and making the vitamin much more potent. Impurities on the scalp can accrue with exposure to city pollution, hard water and product build-up, leaving your hair limp and lacklustre. Vitamin C’s acidity helps to remove these impurities – deeply cleansing residue and restoring radiance. Being a strong antioxidant, it also protects your scalp from free radicals – neutralising them and aiding in skin’s natural healing process to allow later treatments to work more effectively. Also starring naturally derived amino acids and vitamin B5 (AKA panthenol) this sensational formula even provides lasting moisture, conditions, thickens and helps to prevent damage.
how_to_use: Before shampooing, thoroughly wet the hair and scalp. Empty one sachet into the applicator bottle and fill with 60ml of warm water (to the measured mark). Shake for 30 seconds to activate the formula, until a light jelly forms. Apply the jelly directly from the bottle to the hair and scalp and work in with fingertips. Ensure all hair is covered. Use all of the jelly and dispose of any which is not used. Thoroughly rinse out the bottle and keep for your next treatment. Leave on for 5 minutes and then rinse thoroughly. Follow with shampoo and conditioner as normal. Use once every 2-3 weeks to remove all impurities. Do not use for the first 3 washes after having hair colour treated.
ingredient: Panthenol, Ascorbic Acid, Betaine, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY hair-mask: creamy deep conditioner BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY hair-mask: creamy deep conditioner
description: Whether you shampoo, 'low-poo' or co-wash, it's always a good idea to recharge your moisture levels with a generous helping of BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY'S hair-mask: creamy deep conditioner. Made with curly, textured and dry hair in mind, this velvety emulsion packs a powerful (and yet lightweight!) punch of hydration! Adored for achieving a finish of cloud-like softness, this moisturising emulsion is powered by superfruit extracts, including Australian Kakadu plum and starflower oil, to leave your curls soft, hydrated and buttery smooth without feeling weighed down. What's so super about those oils? The potent Kakadu plum contains the highest concentration of vitamin C than any other fruit - it even boasts 50 times more than an orange! It doesn't end there, it's also a moisturising powerhouse that lends a hand in the maintenance of collagen and elastin levels in your scalp and hair to keep them soft and supple. As for starflower oil - otherwise known as borage oil - it possesses more gamma-linoleic acid than any other seed oil and helps to strengthen your hair follicle to prevent hair from breaking and shedding. The results? Curls that feel cushioned in moisture!

name: Kitsch Satin Sleep Cap - Black Kitsch Satin Sleep Cap - Black
description: Your one-way ticket to ‘I woke up like this’ hair each morning, the Satin Sleep Cap will envelop your strands in Kitsch’s finest satin. This is no ordinary sleep cap — it’s coated in Kitsch’s luxurious satin, which is known for its gentleness and ability to prevent hair damage. Incredibly comfortable, it allows you to say “bye” to bedhead and frizz, giving you total protection against friction with its unique charmeuse construction. name: Amika Reset Exfoliating Jelly Shampoo Amika Reset Exfoliating Jelly Shampoo
description: Introducing amika's Reset Exfoliating Jelly Shampoo – though as a clarifying shampoo, it is not recommended for colour or chemically treated hair. This innovative jelly shampoo deep cleans, purifies, and rebalances the scalp, showing your scalp the TLC it craves. Acting as a dirt and grime magnet, this results-driven formula sloughs away unwanted gunk, purify, and rebalance the scalp. Plus it works well on even the most oily, itchy, and sensitive scalps too. The precise needle applicator ensures it can nestle its way deep into roots and scalp for precise application whatever your hair type or style. It's formulated with sea salt - which contains a number of essential minerals and trace elements such as magnesium and calcium, salicylic acid to gently exfoliate the scalp, pink clay and charcoal - which are both known for their ability to absorb dirt, odours, minerals, hard metals, toxins, and other harmful substances that can collect on our hair and skin through pollution or hard water. they gently remove unpleasant odours while exfoliating dead skin cells as well as Indian cress - full of vitamins and antioxidants to encourage a healthy and clean scalp.
how_to_use: Top tip: this should be used whenever the scalp is in need of an extra-deep cleanse to remove product build up, such as after prolonged dry shampoo usage or removing a protective style. you can start with using it once a week!

name: Olaplex The Anti-Damage Duo - No.3 & No.9 Olaplex The Anti-Damage Duo - No.3 & No.9
description: Brimming with OLAPLEX’s superstar bond repairing ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, The Anti Damage Duo unites the beloved No.3 Hair Perfector and all new No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum with the promise to deliver a stronger, shinier and healthier mane. The first step in this two-part bundle is the No.3 Hair Perfector. A brand bestseller for good reason, this once-a-week treatment seeks out broken bonds in the hair (which are caused by chemical, thermal and mechanical damage) and repairs them, restoring compromised hair to former glory in the process. Use overnight for maximum results, or as a quick 10-minute pre-wash treatment. For post-wash, look to the second step here: the No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum (that’s the newest addition to the OLAPLEX clan!). Packed with antioxidants to neutralise free radicals, this leave-in serum acts as a shield against pollution, guarding your hair from breakage and protecting against heat styling. Alongside this, the lightweight formula will envelop locks in softness and shine, making it easier to detangle and style too.
how_to_use: No.3 Hair Perfector: Apply to damp hair, combing through, and leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes before washing as normal, or leave on overnight. No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum: Apply a small amount to damp, towel-dried hair working upward from ends to roots. Use more as needed for longer, thicker hair. Air-dry for a soft texture. Blow-dry for a smooth finish. Diffuse for waves or curls. Apply sparingly to dry hair for frizz and static control and added shine.
ingredient: No.3 Hair Perfector: Water (Aqua/Eau), Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Hydroxyethyl Ethylcellulose, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Quaternium-91, Sodium Benzoate, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Polyquaternium-37, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzyl Benzoate, Etidronic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Phytantriol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate.

name: Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smoothing Shampoo Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smoothing Shampoo
description: Infused with Briogeo’s signature blend of ultra-nourishing rosehip, argan and coconut oils, Rosarco Repair Shampoo swiftly restores silky sheen to dry, brittle and lacklustre locks. Coconut oil penetrates the hair shaft to nourish and repair from the inside out, sealing the uplifted cuticle to lock in moisture and reduce environmental impurities. Argan oil provides further conditioning to fight frizz, while antioxidant-rich rosehip oil shields strands from the damage wrought by UV rays and free radicals.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and vigorously massage for about 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. If your hair has extra build-up, rinse and repeat. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: Philip Kingsley Pure Blonde Booster Mask 75ml Philip Kingsley Pure Blonde Booster Mask 75ml
description: Working double duty to correct colour that’s gone astray and strengthen chemical-treated strands, the Pure Blonde Booster Mask will help take brassy tones to radiant blondes in ten minutes or less. Suitable for all textures – from fine to coarse – this weekly treatment is designed to neutralise brassiness and deeply condition overworked lengths. Starring the optimal balance of violet micro-pigments to neutralise warmth and keep platinum manes looking fresh-from-the-salon, this nourishing blend also stars keratin and panthenol to hep fortify your hair against breakage: smoothing and moisturising each strand to enhance elasticity and flexibility while easing frizz and granting enviable shine. And now this blonde-boosting superhero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) — because nobody wants to be worrying about brassy, thirsty hair when they should be laying about by the pool.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work through the hair, avoiding the scalp. Leave for up to 3 minutes if hair is bleached, up to 5 minutes if hair is dyed, and up to 10 minutes if hair is naturally blonde. Rinse thoroughly. Use once per week. These timings are a guide only and should be halved for first use. All hair will react differently so test a small section of your lightest hair before first use. Wait at least two weeks after having hair coloured, bleached or permed before using.

Violet 2).

name: VIRTUE CORRECT Healing Oil 20ml VIRTUE CORRECT Healing Oil 20ml
description: Available in 20ml and 50ml sizes, the Healing Oil infuses dry and damaged lengths with an impressive dose of shine-giving moisture, calling upon a nourishing blend of proteins and oils to protect and restore your hair. Formulated with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole- human keratin born from regenerative medicine - this restorative formula binds directly to areas of damage and fills them. What’s more, there’s a nourishing blend of Tahitian tiare flower (to help remedy weak and damaged strands) and antioxidant-rich Kalahari melon seed oil to protect against environmental aggressors while imparting lasting hydration. Made from clear oils, this innovative formula grants a glossy finish that won’t mar your colour of weigh down your lengths. The luscious oil has a delicious tropical scent with notes of creamy coconut, yuzu extract and woody undertones that linger subtly on your tresses after use. The results? Seriously soft, healthy-looking hair with an unrivalled shine.
how_to_use: Shake well before each use to mix key ingredients and activate the formula. Pump a few drops into hands and work throughout damp and/or dry hair. Style as desired.

name: VIRTUE Full Conditioner 200ml VIRTUE Full Conditioner 200ml
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Full Conditioner, a game-changing way to care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Conditioner also creates enviable volume, deeply moisturising without adding weight and creating lasting lift, body and lustre. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and artichoke leaf, loaded with lipids and protein to help seal and strengthen your hair’s cuticle. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. What's more, after one week of using the shampoo and conditioner in a clinical trial, 87% of users reported that their hair had more body, while 84% found their hair felt thicker!
how_to_use: Work a small amount between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, pair with your favourite Virtue Shampoo.

name: Coco & Eve Deep Clean Scalp Scrub 150ml Coco & Eve Deep Clean Scalp Scrub 150ml
description: Created by the beachy haired duo that brought us the now iconic Super Nourishing Coconut & Fig Hair Masque, Coco & Eve's all-new Like A Virgin Deep Clean Scalp Scrub is here to help deep clean your scalp and help balance out of whack hair. Like A Virgin Deep Clean Scalp Scrub is infused with ash from Balinese volcanoes to absorb excess oil while AHAs, BHAs and coconut shell exfoliate and remove flakes. But it doesn't stop there, cooling peppermint soothes irritation whilst caffeine fortifies and creates a healthy environment for stronger, thicker hair growth. Finally, an infusion of pineapple & passionfruit creates a delicious scent to transport you to a Balinese jungle. We're obsessed!

name: VIRTUE Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair 240ml VIRTUE Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair 240ml
description: Designed to detoxify, volumise and repair thinning hair, Virtue’s Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair is a gentle, lathering formula that helps to foster the perfect environment for healthy hair, ensuring new growth survives. Powered by ground-breaking keratin proteins, the Flourish range works to cleanse, purify and enrich your scalp, creating the foundation for new growth. As each new strand emerges, it’s supplied with the nourishment needed to stay strong and resist breakage. As well as the brand’s world-worshipped Alpha Keratin 60ku complex that binds directly to areas of damage and fills them, this formula is also enriched with sodium hyaluronate and red algae extract; this cocktail provides lightweight hydration and a sheer ‘moisture shield’ to thicken your hair and keep the fibres supple. Finally, an infusion of biomimetic signal peptides works to nourish and calm your scalp, helping to create a healthy environment for hair growth. When the shampoo and conditioner are used alongside the Flourish Density Booster, the regimen has seen impressive results. After six months of use, 90% of women in an independent third party test said their hair feels healthier; 90% said they have more volume and 83% said they saw less fall-out. We like those numbers!
how_to_use: Work a quarter-sized amount of shampoo into a rich lather between palms. Apply to wet hair and massage into scalp, starting at the nape of your neck and working the lather through the ends. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Davines SOLU Sea Salt Scrub Cleanser 250ml Davines SOLU Sea Salt Scrub Cleanser 250ml
description: An ingenious secret weapon if you’re interested in the ‘skinification’ of hair, Davines’ Solu Sea Salt Scrub Cleanser is the perfect way to cleanse and refresh your scalp. Crafted from all-natural ingredients, this scrub provides a deep yet delicate cleanse, gently removing impurities and build-up to leave you with an unbeatably clean result. Ideal for city dwellers, it also removes pollution particles to help city-proof your mane. Regular use has a texturising effect, minimising signs of hair ageing, maintaining cleanliness and boosting the volume of hair right from the root. Enriched with sea salt, beet sugar extract and jojoba scrubbing beads, it’s a natural wonder that will swiftly boost your hair health.

name: NatureLab Tokyo Perfect Clean Dry Shampoo 21g NatureLab Tokyo Perfect Clean Dry Shampoo 21g
description: There are dry shampoos and then there are dry shampoos. This is the latter. Small and purse friendly and not an aerosol, we promise this will fast become the mid-day hair pick-me-up you won't want to be without. Infused with Japanese rice powder, this little hair saviour neutralises the musty scent of your strands, absorbs excess oils and gets your locks looking and smelling as good as the day you washed them. It's not just the rice powder working hard to have your hair looking luscious; the silica in the formula also helps to absorb impurities and the addition of the natural Shiso oil is antimicrobial and deodorises any staleness... Clean, fresh and fabulous hair without any of the work!
