name: Hair by Sam McKnight Self Control Gel 150ml Hair by Sam McKnight Self Control Gel 150ml
description: If you're after all-day hold that won't strip or damage your hair, you've come to the right corner of the beautysphere. The Self Control Gel will satisfy your every styling whim. No matter what your hair type or texture, Sam McKnight's water-based styling gel brings you the power to create and set whatever style your heart desires... while still being able to effortlessly wash it out come nightfall. Conditioning honeysuckle and amaranthus seed extracts are combined with panthenol to care for your strands all day and impart an enviable shine. This transparent gel will do everything from smoothing edges to polishing updos, sculpting an editorial-worthy wet look and creating the perfect groomed short style. Direct your mane into place and set with a diffuser to keep your style locked in place from dawn till dusk... well technically, until you wash it out!
how_to_use: Apply required amount onto hands and style in wet or dry hair. To set style in place, blow dry with a diffuser. Super-sleek ponytails or Sculpted chignons: apply one or two pumps into the roots in sections and then brush flat and tight to the head to create a sleek silhouette. Controlled masculine silhouettes: put a few pumps in the hands, run through the hair or apply in small sections and comb it into shape. Shape edges: apply a small pump to fingers, apply to edges and smooth in place with a natural bristle toothbrush, fix with a hairdryer.

description: Uniting four of Briogeo's Scalp Revival heroes, this kit of deluxe minis help nourish, soothe, and hydrate an itchy, irritated, and flaky scalp. Uniting the brand's award-winning Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo, Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask, Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment and Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, this Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit removes deep rooted impurities with this award-winning, charcoal-based scalp treatment collection that detoxifies, nurtures, and soothes a dry, flaky, itchy or oily scalp. how_to_use: Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Scalp Scrub Shampoo: Part wet hair, massage into the scalp, then rinse clean. Use once per week or every other week. Hydration is important after exfoliation; apply Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask to scalp after treatment. For best results, apply your favorite Briogeo™ deep conditioning mask or conditioner from mid-lengths to ends after cleansing. Scalp Revival™Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask: For best results, use in the shower after exfoliating with Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo. Apply directly to the scalp and massage it in. Leave on for up to 10 minutes. Rinse out thoroughly and condition the hair as normal with your preferred Briogeo™ deep conditioning hair mask or conditioner. Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment: Part clean and conditioned damp hair into sections; apply 1-2 drops to each partition. Massage into the scalp; do not rinse out. Can also be applied before bedtime as an overnight or pre-shampoo scalp treatment. For best results, use with the entire Briogeo™ Scalp Revival™ collection for a clean, healthy scalp. Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo: Gently shake powder into hair, focusing on the roots. Comb through hair until powder is fully absorbed. This set includes:

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Conditioner NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Conditioner
description: A restorative post-cleansing treatment for lacklustre locks, NatureLab TOKYOs Perfect Shine Conditioner bestows weightless, mirror-like gloss to dulled hair thanks to platinum fibres and precious pearl extracts. Brimming with antioxidant-rich grape extracts key to protecting the scalp by reducing the cell-damage wrought by free radicals alongside pearl extract (it boosts hairs own enzymes to grant an iridescent finish) and platinum fibre (which wraps every shaft with a weightless, naturally reflective veil that ensures a phenomenal, mirror-like shine), this silky conditioner swiftly resuscitates limp, lifeless locks. With a delicate perfume of violet and almond, as well as strand-plumping hyaluronic acid (it absorbs up to 1000 times its own weight in water), this super-charged blend is a boon for all those with bleached, coloured of chemically-treated tresses protecting your mane to help widen the gap between salon appointments. Sulphate-, paraben- and cruelty-free, and made with sustainably sourced ingredients not to mention the minimum packaging say Hello! to great hair and a squeaky-clean conscience. Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.
how_to_use: Use after Perfect Shine Shampoo. Apply from roots to ends of damp hair - leave for a minute or two before rinsing.

name: Malin + Goetz Cilantro Hair Conditioner 236ml Malin + Goetz Cilantro Hair Conditioner 236ml
description: MALIN + GOETZ’ Cilantro Hair Conditioner is an intensely hydrating, yet lightweight formula that nourishes your precious locks without weighing them down or irritating sensitive scalps. Enriched with shea butter and easily absorbed fatty acids, it offers moisture, balance and frizz control – perfect for detangling, styling, softening and smoothing. name: Kitsch Ponyfull Kitsch Ponyfull
description: The ultimate low-maintenance hair hack for a more voluminous-looking ponytail that means you don't need to wake up at 6:30 AM to intricately curl each strand Kitsch's Ponyfull is a covert styling tool that fits into your natural hair to add fullness and height. A savvy and time-saving alternative to extensions, this patent-pending tool slides into your ponytail effortlessly to comfortably create a fuller and thicker-locking ponytail in minutes. Perfect for lengths that look a little limp or to spruce up your strands with minimal effort, simply part your pony and slip this styling essential in between before easily rearranging your hair to ensure no one can see the secret to your voluminous ponytail.
how_to_use: Gather your hair into a ponytail and wrap KITSCH NO SNAG ELASTIC around two to three times depending on hair thickness. Split your ponytail in half horizontally. With your non-dominant hand, hold the to half up above your head. With your dominant hand hold PONYFULL with pick facing downward and the self-gripping material side facing your palm. Gently hook the pick into the centre of the pony pushing downward making a C shape. Elastic should naturally settle around the narrowest groove of PONYFULL. It will instantly expand the elastic and make your ponytail feel tighter. Release the top half of the ponytail down & adjust hair to cover the self-gripping material. This will secure the PONYFULL & keep it from being seen. Adjust PONYFULL to sit comfortably as needed and enjoy the results as PONYFULL instantly thickens and lifts your Ponytail.

name: Davines OI Hair Butter 75ml Davines OI Hair Butter 75ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.
how_to_use: Warm product onto the palm of your hand before applying. For medium to thick hair: apply product on towel-dried hair and leave in for 5-10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well. For medium to fine hair: apply on dry hair and leave in for 10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well and shampoo as usual. For an extra nourishing boost: apply both before and after shampooing as noted above.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alchol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Behenyl Alchol, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentastearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Quaternium-87, Parfum / Fragrance, Isopropyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojo-Ba) Seed Oil, C15-19 Alkane, Dimethiconol, Silicone Quaternium-22, Sodium Benzoate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Disodium Edta, Oryza Sativa Cera / Oryza Sativa ( Rice ) Bran Wax, Dipropylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate, Citric Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Citronellol, Geranoil, Palmitamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil.

name: R+Co ZIG ZAG Root Teasing Texture Spray 5 oz. R+Co ZIG ZAG Root Teasing Texture Spray 5 oz.
description: Zapping limp lengths with a bolt of body-boosting volume, R+Co's Zig Zag Root Teasing + Texture Spray adds durable girt and hold for an all-day ample look. Fragranced with 'Stars Align' (an aromatic ode to the moment when dusk hits, with notes of deep palo santo, white cedarwood, smoky tobacco leaf, fresh pine needles, waterlily), this lightly tinted formula blends into any hair colour for a residue-free, flexible texture. It's laced with vitamin- and mineral-rich bamboo stem extract to help thicken fine hair and strengthen weakened hair while styling resins provide hold, prevent frizz and add volume. A mineral pigment lends your lengths additional texture and helps to blend the formula into any hair colour without leaving a powdery residue. Finally, zeolite (a natural mineral) helps to add structure, absorb excess oil and help to maintain fresh-smelling tresses. Talk about a multi-tasker...
how_to_use: On styled hair, spray directly onto roots for volume. Spray mid-shaft to ends for texture.
ingredient: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, Zeolite, Aqua/Water/Eau, Fragrance (Parfum), Silica, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, PEG/PPG-15/15 Allyl Ether Acetate, PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Benzophenone-4, t-Butyl Alcohol, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499).

name: Aesop Sculpt Hair Polish 100ml Aesop Sculpt Hair Polish 100ml
description: A grooming gel that’s great for adding shape to fine or flimsy hair, Aesop’s Sculpt Hair Polish subtly scents as it amplifies shine and lends long-lasting hold. With fresh notes of bergamot rind, lime and clove, this aromatic offering bestows a glossy finish (it’s particularly good for wet-look styling) and is perfect if your hair is short to medium-length – allowing you to effortlessly emulate your icons with a slicked-back, ‘60s vibe (think: Donald Draper). Laced with hydrolysed oats to condition your strands, simply comb through your wet or dry hair to achieve the desired effect.
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry hair, then comb or structure as desired. Simply shampoo to rinse product from hair.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), PVP, VP/VA Copolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin, Carbomer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydrolyzed Oats, Polysorbate 20, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Panthenol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Dehydroacetic Acid, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Acrylic Acid, Limonene, Linalool, Eugenol.

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Curl Cleanse Cleansing Conditioner 250ml Hair by Sam McKnight Curl Cleanse Cleansing Conditioner 250ml
description: Created to keep frizz under control and care for all hair textures (and over-processed, damage strands) is the Curl Cleanse Cleansing Conditioner from Sam McKnight's sought-after line. A multi-tasking formula designed to care for all hair textures as well as hair prone to breakage, this will transform your wash day (not to mention your hair!) Sustainable jackfruit keeps tresses free from frizz for a more defined finish while nourishing and caring for the scalp. A trio of watercress, sage and velvet flower extracts give strands a new lease of life with an infusion of essential vitamins, minerals and essential oils. Lightly scented with Sam's signature botanical fragrance blend this performance-driven formula is a salon-worthy treat for your tresses. Prepare to reveal healthier hair that swishes with a mirror-like shine.
how_to_use: Thoroughly wet hair from roots to ends. Lather a generous amount in your hands and gently massage into scalp and hair. Rinse off.

name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Combination Conditioner 75ml Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Combination Conditioner 75ml
description: Developed by ‘The Hair Doctor’, Philip Kingsley, Moisture Balancing Conditioner does exactly what it says on the bottle – balancing moisture so that there’s less at the roots and more throughout mid-lengths and ends, where it’s most needed. Ideal for dry, fine or processed locks, the formula instantly and painlessly detangles hair (it’s gentle enough even for children) and imparts anti-static conditioning agents to provide control and manageability. Hair is left shiny, smooth and strong, without being overburdened with moisture – a total hair game changer. And now this hydration hero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) — because nobody fancies thirsty hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends Rinse well Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-12, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid.

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit Briogeo Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit
description: Uniting four of Briogeo's Scalp Revival heroes, this kit of deluxe minis help nourish, soothe, and hydrate an itchy, irritated, and flaky scalp. Uniting the brand's award-winning Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo, Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask, Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment and Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, this Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit removes deep rooted impurities with this award-winning, charcoal-based scalp treatment collection that detoxifies, nurtures, and soothes a dry, flaky, itchy or oily scalp. Perfect for those with a dry, irritated, flaky and/or oily scalp, this set will help lift away impurities and buildup on the scalp, restore vital scalp hydration and restore scalp hydration and absorb excess oils.
how_to_use: Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Scalp Scrub Shampoo: Part wet hair, massage into the scalp, then rinse clean. Use once per week or every other week. Hydration is important after exfoliation; apply Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask to scalp after treatment. For best results, apply your favorite Briogeo™ deep conditioning mask or conditioner from mid-lengths to ends after cleansing. Scalp Revival™Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask: For best results, use in the shower after exfoliating with Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo. Apply directly to the scalp and massage it in. Leave on for up to 10 minutes. Rinse out thoroughly and condition the hair as normal with your preferred Briogeo™ deep conditioning hair mask or conditioner. Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment: Part clean and conditioned damp hair into sections; apply 1-2 drops to each partition. Massage into the scalp; do not rinse out. Can also be applied before bedtime as an overnight or pre-shampoo scalp treatment. For best results, use with the entire Briogeo™ Scalp Revival™ collection for a clean, healthy scalp. Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo: Gently shake powder into hair, focusing on the roots. Comb through hair until powder is fully absorbed. This set includes:

name: Olaplex Repairing Hair Protector Set - No.3, 4, 5 & 9 Olaplex Repairing Hair Protector Set - No.3, 4, 5 & 9
description: Brimming with OLAPLEX’s superstar bond repairing ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, the Repairing Hair Protector Set unites the beloved No.3 Hair Protector, N.o 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo and No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner along with the all new No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum. That’s your hair wash routine, sorted… Effective on their own, but even more so when used together, the four hair heroes in this kit go as follows. First, there’s the No.3 Hair Perfector, a once-a-week pre-wash treatment that seeks out broken bonds in the hair (which are caused by chemical, thermal and mechanical damage) and repairs them, restoring compromised hair to former glory in the process. Then, there’s the No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, this silky fluid gently cleanses away dirt, oil and product build up while hydrating and strengthening hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds. Next, there’s the No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair. Finally, add a layer of defence (while rebuilding bonds in the process) with the No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum (that’s the newest addition to the OLAPLEX clan!). Packed with antioxidants to neutralise free radicals, this leave-in serum acts as a shield against pollution, guarding your hair from breakage and protecting against heat styling. Alongside this, the lightweight formula will envelop locks in softness and shine, making it easier to detangle and style too.
how_to_use: No.3 Hair Perfector: Apply to damp hair, combing through, and leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes before washing as normal, or leave on overnight. No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo: Apply to damp hair, work through hair from root to tip creating a lather. Rinse. No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner: Apply to damp hair and work through hair from root to tip and then wash off. No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum: Apply a small amount to damp, towel-dried hair working upward from ends to roots. Use more as needed for longer, thicker hair. Air-dry for a soft texture. Blow-dry for a smooth finish. Diffuse for waves or curls. Apply sparingly to dry hair for frizz and static control and added shine.

name: Amika Velveteen Dream Smoothing Conditioner Amika Velveteen Dream Smoothing Conditioner
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika’s mantra is “all hair is welcome”. The key to your silkiest mane yet, the Velveteen Dream Smoothing Conditioner is a non-negotiable necessity for frizz-prone hair of all types! Guiding you on your way to a smooth, frizz-free finish, this vegan formula not only conditions dry, unmanageable but also delivers time-released humidity protection! How, you may wonder? Among other nourishing botanicals, it's infused with aloe barbadensis leaf juice to inject some lustrous shine and support moisture retention. It's also powered by provitamin B5 to bolster your hair's resilience as it smooths and conditions each strand. Finally, it wouldn't be an amika formula without seabuckthorn contributing its abundance of elasticity-boosting fatty acids and antioxidants! The perfect way to prep frizzy lengths for styling, you'll never have to cry "It's the humidity" again when you have this hair care hero... Psst, did we mention is safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: After shampooing with velveteen dream smoothing shampoo, massage a small amount from mid-length to ends. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Malin + Goetz Cilantro Hair Conditioner 236ml Malin + Goetz Cilantro Hair Conditioner 236ml
description: MALIN + GOETZ’ Cilantro Hair Conditioner is an intensely hydrating, yet lightweight formula that nourishes your precious locks without weighing them down or irritating sensitive scalps. Enriched with shea butter and easily absorbed fatty acids, it offers moisture, balance and frizz control – perfect for detangling, styling, softening and smoothing. Multi-purpose, it can also be used as a leave-in treatment, a cleansing rinse or even as a styling aid for those whose hair needs an extra bout of hydration help. To top it off, the product is spiked with cilantro (coriander) to lend a naturally calming scent.
how_to_use: As a daily conditioner: Apply a small amount to clean, wet hair, especially the ends. Leave on for 3 minutes, then rinse clean. As a leave in treatment: Apply a small amount to damp hair and comb through. As a cleansing rinse: Apply a small amount to wet hair, massage into scalp and rinse clean. As a styling aid: Use on wet or dry hair to smooth, soften and tame frizz.

name: Amika Double Agent 2-in-1 Straightening Blow Dry Brush Amika Double Agent 2-in-1 Straightening Blow Dry Brush
description: Fusing the power of a hairdryer with the smoothing capabilities of a straightener, amika’s Double Agent 2-in-1 Blow Dryer Straightening Brush promises to reduce your styling time (and frizz) with this ergonomically designed tool. The sleek blowout has never been so attainable than with this multitasking tool from amika. Boasting 3 adjustable air/thermal brush settings and far-infrared heat that ensures to lock in moisture and reduce thermal damage, your strands will be left smooth, shiny and ready to take on whatever the day has to throw at you. Fed up with frizzy flyaways ruining your day? The negative ion generator will deliver on shine while banishing frizz. With a maximum temperature of 365f/185c, and flexible outer teeth that provide the perfect grip (without the damage), this hardworking tool will take your hair from just-washed to perfectly coiffed in no time… you can even use this on dry hair to smooth away kinks on second… third… or even fourth-day hair (we don’t judge here!).
how_to_use: Towel or air dry hair so it's damp, not wet. Heat protect and detangle hair. select your setting by twisting handle to the right. Glide brush through hair section by section, making sure you're not applying the bristles directly onto scalp. For a sleeker look, use the 3rd setting until you have desired results. to keep your tool clean, twist bottom handle towards the unlock icon, and pull downwards to release filter. Wipe with a damp cloth.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a UK plug. 220-240 Volts.

name: Pattern Lightweight Conditioner 384.5ml Pattern Lightweight Conditioner 384.5ml
description: In need of moisture but find the average conditioner too heavy on your strands? Then the Lightweight Conditioner is just the thing. Hitting the sweet spot of weightless moisture, fine and/or thin hair types will love how this formula seamlessly glides through curls. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Lightweight Conditioner is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. Instead, it features a blend of coconut oil, irish moss & biotin – a trio that helps to strengthen and soften hair so it's not just pretty to look at but is healthier on the inside, too. Perfectly suited as a co-wash, this creamy formula glides through strands with ease, helping to detangle and lock in moisture before it goes down the drain. Did you just find the conditioner of your thin hair dreams? Yes, yes you did.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair from roots to ends. For extra dense curls or long hair, section with PATTERN Hair Clip while conditioning to ensure every strand gets the love it deserves. Use PATTERN Shower Brush or fingers to help detangle & bring curls together. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Daily Moisturizing Treatment 40ml Aveda Nutriplenish Daily Moisturizing Treatment 40ml
description: Part of the Nutriplenish range, Aveda's Nutriplenish Daily Moisturizing Treatment melts moisture into thirsty locks, locking in four times the hydration of untreated hair. Infused with a superfood blend of oils and butters, the creamy leave-in treatment from Aveda is true nourishing decadence for all textures of dry hair. A leave-in you'll come back to time and time again, this instantly hydrates all textures of dry hair thanks to a formula jam-packed with nourishing and shine-boosting mango butter, softening and moisturising coconut oil, omega 5-rich pomegranate seed oil which revitalises brittle strands and finally, sand ginger which provides a natural UV filter, helping to protect hair from the drying effects of the sun. Providing heat protection up to 230 degrees, you need to make this part of your daily routine, stat!

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Self Control Gel 150ml Hair by Sam McKnight Self Control Gel 150ml
description: If you're after all-day hold that won't strip or damage your hair, you've come to the right corner of the beautysphere. The Self Control Gel will satisfy your every styling whim. No matter what your hair type or texture, Sam McKnight's water-based styling gel brings you the power to create and set whatever style your heart desires... while still being able to effortlessly wash it out come nightfall. Conditioning honeysuckle and amaranthus seed extracts are combined with panthenol to care for your strands all day and impart an enviable shine. This transparent gel will do everything from smoothing edges to polishing updos, sculpting an editorial-worthy wet look and creating the perfect groomed short style. Direct your mane into place and set with a diffuser to keep your style locked in place from dawn till dusk... well technically, until you wash it out!

Controlled masculine silhouettes: put a few pumps in the hands, run through the hair or apply in small sections and comb it into shape. Shape edges: apply a small pump to fingers, apply to edges and smooth in place with a natural bristle toothbrush, fix with a hairdryer.

It contains rosemary extract (an antioxidant) to nourish the hair and give it a beautifully smooth, shiny finish that's impervious to static and will help protect your style from humidity. Don't even think about brandishing your straighteners until you've sprayed MELU Shield on your tresses.

name: Slip Pure Silk Minnie Scrunchies - Italian Summer Slip Pure Silk Minnie Scrunchies - Italian Summer

Live ‘La Dolce Vita’ with this collection of holiday-ready colourways, from limoncello yellow to a cute coral and irresistible lemon-drenched patterns. Bellissimo!

name: Davines MOMO Shampoo Bar 100g Davines MOMO Shampoo Bar 100g

An extension of their fan-favourite shampoo line, Davines' Solid Shampoo Bars boast a solid texture that develops into a rich creamy foam that cleanses without stripping your strands. Suited to dry, thirsty tresses, the MOMO Naked Shampoo Bar is enriched with yellow melon extract to promote softness, lightweight hydration, shine and silky texture. Compact like a soap bar, these salon-quality shampoo bars are packaged in 100% recyclable paper (you're helping to cut down single-use plastics!) and boast the same results that you would see from using their traditional shampoos. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. This Smooth Shampoo also refines and de-frizzes strand by strand, sealing in moisture and shine. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), phospholipids – derived from natural soybeans – to help fight frizz and protect against humidity and gotu kola, a multi-tasking Indian herb that promotes strength, smoothness and lustre. description: A plant-powered cocktail of deeply conditioning extracts to cherish your curls, Bouclème’s Curl Conditioner feeds dry or compromised strands with a buffet of oils and replenishing extracts to maximise bounce and restore your locks’ lustre. Strengthening and protecting, this nourishing blend helps to shield from the damaging impact of daily aggressors (“Take that, pollution!”), while bathing each strand with a smoothing and softening cocktail that deeply – but lightly! – hydrates to keep curls feeling wonderfully ‘springy’ (and looking defined) without adding lift-limiting weight that can drag your hair down. description: Part of the Anti-Hair Fall collection, the Anti-Hair Fall Scalp Serum is the second step in an effective strengthening and nourishing routine to prevent hair breakage and promote all of the volume and thickness. The nourishing leave-in treatment takes a three-pronged approach to keeping hair fall at bay. Firstly, it uses camellia and larch extracts to strengthen strands from the very root, nourishing the follicles and encouraging the growth of thicker, healthier hairs less prone to breakage. Next, it uses pro-vitamin B5 to up the resilience of the hair shaft, offering an 'anti-split end' effect - particularly useful for battling the friction hair experiences courtesy of jumpers, hats, scarves or even just overzealous styling. Finally, to keep your hair in overall great condition, this clever formulation is infused with seriously hydrating cationic hyaluronic acid. A velvety-soft, thick head of hair is within your reach!

Brimming with healthy-for-your-hair oils like coconut and soybean, the formula also uses smart conditioning technology to hydrate hair by targeting dry micro-sites within compromised strands – delivering a precise and healthy dose of much-needed hydration while detangling and taming frizz. A divine, natural scent deriving from jasmine, organic olibanum and cypress offers an earthy, woody and – well, mossy – scent, and your mane is left feeling soft, quenched and easy-to-manage. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny and all before you've used shampoo. Compatible with either dryer (‘Helios’ or ‘Air’), the ghd Professional Hair Dryer Diffuser is ideal for adding instant lift as well as helping curls retain their shape to guarantee a frizz-free finish. A great addition to your styling kit, especially if your hair tends to fall flat or your ringlets can lack definition, this diffuser features 18 contoured ‘fingers’ that ensure the air’s evenly spread to facilitate perfectly formed, sleek and separated curls and waves – as well as some much-needed ‘oomph’ at the roots. A must if you’re naturally curly, this also works well if your hair’s fine or straight – letting you mimic a loose, tousled texture whenever you’re ready to ring(let) the changes.

name: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring Scrunchie - True Black invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring Scrunchie - True Black

Wrapping the iconic invisibobble Original in luxurious velvet fabric, this is the coolest Scrunchie we’ve ever come across, providing all the benefits of the brand’s innovative spiral shape. Offering strong hold without compromising on comfort, the Sprunchie is very easy to remove, minimising tangles and damage (we’re talking split ends an breakage, people!) The soft, shiny velvet exterior means this looks great on your wrist as well as in your hair – there’s fierce leopard print ‘Purrfection’ and midnight ‘True Black’.

name: Pattern Edge Tool Pattern Edge Tool

Made from strong, vegan boar bristles, this routine essential combines an edge brush and mini comb at one end and a pointed styler side at the other. This is for helping you to perfect those finishing details as your swirl and shape your edges exactly how you want them.

Produced and used by bees to build strong beehives, propolis contains plenty of oils, vitamins, minerals and flavonoids to protect your hair and keep it at its most healthy. The rejuvenating formula also includes a UV filter, protecting your mane against sun damage.

name: Briogeo Curl Charisma Chia and Flax Seed Coil Custard 177ml Briogeo Curl Charisma Chia and Flax Seed Coil Custard 177ml

Formulated with Briogeo's unique 'NOVA Complex', containing a blend of nutrients from algae to biotin and rosehip and argan oils this replenishes damaged hair to keep it glossy, shiny and the picture of health. Sealing the hair cuticle are rice amino acids, locking out frizz-causing humidity that would happily make a 'Monica' out of the any wavy hair type. As with all of their formulas, it's infused with Oribé’s Signature Complex to feed hair with watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower and defend against oxidative and environmental stress alongside the deterioration of natural keratin. description: Developed to brighten your blonde (or your silver!), Philip Kingsley’s Pure Blonde Booster Shampoo is perfect for keeping your locks looking tip-top with no brassy tones. Starring the optimal balance of violet micro-pigments to neutralise warmth and keep platinum manes looking fresh-from-the-salon, this nourishing formula also fights frizz and intensifies shine for a sleek, glossy ‘swish’. Great for blonde, grey or highlighted hair, this cleanser is just what your fair hair’s been longing for. name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Anti-Hair Fall Scalp Serum 50ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Anti-Hair Fall Scalp Serum 50ml
description: Part of the Anti-Hair Fall collection, the Anti-Hair Fall Scalp Serum is the second step in an effective strengthening and nourishing routine to prevent hair breakage and promote all of the volume and thickness. The nourishing leave-in treatment takes a three-pronged approach to keeping hair fall at bay. Firstly, it uses camellia and larch extracts to strengthen strands from the very root, nourishing the follicles and encouraging the growth of thicker, healthier hairs less prone to breakage. Next, it uses pro-vitamin B5 to up the resilience of the hair shaft, offering an 'anti-split end' effect - particularly useful for battling the friction hair experiences courtesy of jumpers, hats, scarves or even just overzealous styling. Finally, to keep your hair in overall great condition, this clever formulation is infused with seriously hydrating cationic hyaluronic acid. A velvety-soft, thick head of hair is within your reach!

name: Philip Kingsley Body Building Weightless Conditioner 75ml Philip Kingsley Body Building Weightless Conditioner 75ml
description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently hydrating, Philip Kingsley’s Body Building Conditioner boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. Ideal for flat hair that’s prone to getting oily quickly, the formula plumps each and every strand for a thicker, fuller effect. It’s enriched with wheat protein to both achieve this plumping and strengthen, as well as silicone to add shine and reduce static, all without adding any unwanted weight. Meanwhile, behentrimonium chloride smooths the cuticle and quickly detangles. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, Body Building Conditioner makes fine hair healthier and more manageable. And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too — because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends Rinse well Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner

description: For touchable texture without zero effort R+Co’s 3-in-1 texturising multi-tasker should be your point of call. Infused to lock in hydration are a trio of cactus, yuca and joshua tree, ensuring your lengths are perfectly nourished, while coconut acid rinses away impurities without compromising your scalp’s natural oils. Enriched with strengthening vegetable proteins that seal hair fibres, this is one 3-in-1 formula we can get on board with.

Purifying kaolin clay attracts dirt and excess oil to liberate your roots and help your hair regain its ‘oomph’, while charcoal powder purifies and vinegar enhances shine for healthy, glossy hair from root to tip. Suitable for all hair types – from fine to thick and straight to coily – this smells like a spa (thanks to oils of ylang ylang, orange, patchouli and lavender) and is perfect for cleansing your headspace; lavishing strands while dispelling your stresses for healthier hair and a happier outlook.

name: Bouclème Curl Conditioner 100ml Bouclème Curl Conditioner 100ml
description: A plant-powered cocktail of deeply conditioning extracts to cherish your curls, Bouclème’s Curl Conditioner feeds dry or compromised strands with a buffet of oils and replenishing extracts to maximise bounce and restore your locks’ lustre. Strengthening and protecting, this nourishing blend helps to shield from the damaging impact of daily aggressors (“Take that, pollution!”), while bathing each strand with a smoothing and softening cocktail that deeply – but lightly! – hydrates to keep curls feeling wonderfully ‘springy’ (and looking defined) without adding lift-limiting weight that can drag your hair down. Starring 97% naturally derived ingredients – including virgin coconut, argan oil, linseed, organic aloe vera leaf and honey – the bottle is also completely recyclable, so you can take care of your curls and the planet!
how_to_use: Apply to soaking wet hair. Section dense/thick curls into two or more sections to ensure even coverage. Rake Curl Conditioner through hair using your fingers, adding more conditioner and water in small doses until hair looks milky and makes a squelching sound when squeezed. Pay special attention to drier areas such as ends of hair and back of the head. Rinse out partly or fully depending on your curl pattern and texture. For drier, thicker curl types we recommend leaving the conditioner in. For loose curls and waves experiment with rinsing partly.

name: dpHUE Apple Cider Vinegar Scalp Scrub 9 oz. dpHUE Apple Cider Vinegar Scalp Scrub 9 oz.
description: Scalp in need of a deep clean? DpHUE's has just the scrub for the job! Perfect for dry, flaky and itchy scalps, their Apple Cider Vinegar Scalp Scrub exfoliates the scalp, removing product build-up, impurities, and dead skin cells. The title ingredient chemically exfoliates away the detritus of the day to unclog hair follicles while balancing the pH of your hair and scalp. Pink Himalayan sea salt lends a helping hand with physical exfoliation, shifting flaking dead skin cells, loosening product residue and stimulating circulation to promote a healthy scalp. This purifying action is balanced by an infusion of aloe vera and avocado oil which soothe your scalp, condition your strands and enhance your shine.
how_to_use: Wet scalp and hair in shower and squeeze excess water out. Scoop 1-2 tablespoons and rub gently between hands. Start at your hairline and work your way up toward the middle, massaging directly onto scalp. Continue from the back of your head at the bottom and work your way up. Tip: for longer hair, flip your head over in shower to apply to back of head and crown. Not meant to be pulled through hair. Rinse very thoroughly. For best results, use in combination with other dpHUE Apple Cider Vinegar products. Where in your regimen: Use before your cleansing routine, whenever you feel like your scalp needs a deep cleanse that won't strip!

name: Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo
description: Like a juice cleanse for your tresses, Briogeo's Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo is a must-try for those with dull, greasy (no judgement here!) hair, looking for an everyday nourishing cleanse. No matter if your hair is straight, wavy, curly or coily, this nutrient-rich, juice-inspired shampoo will have you on your way to refreshed, shiny locks. It's bursting with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants that are carefully chosen for their ability to nourish and protect your hair; there's naturally derived papaya enzymes to help balance oil production; cherry extract (an impressive source of natural sugars) to flood your hair with hydration and antioxidant-rich vitamin C; finally, mango extract works to protect against free radical damage to minimise hair dullness. Boasting a vegan and cruelty-free formula that also contains zero sulfates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, DEA or artificial dyes, you can be sure that this Briogeo range is strand-friendly.

description: An intensive, replenishing treatment for coarse, porous hair with a will of its own, Davines’ Nourishing Miracle Mask helps to hydrate and soften while making it easy to tease out your tangles (no ‘ouches’ allowed!). Formulated without parabens or sulphates, this buttery mask boasts the brand’s Biacidic Bond Complex – a medley of molecules blended in Davines’ Research Laboratory, used to seal split ends and ‘glue’ damaged areas, tackling breakage while smoothing the cuticle leading to maximised shine. name: Kitsch Eco-Friendly Deep-Conditioning Flaxseed Heat Cap Kitsch Eco-Friendly Deep-Conditioning Flaxseed Heat Cap
description: When your mane is lacking that lustrous sheen and needs a helping hand just reach for the Eco-Friendly Deep-Conditioning Flaxseed Heat Cap Set to up the ante on your hair care ritual. Give your tresses a little extra treat and supercharge your next deep-conditioning mask or oil with a little fire. Well, maybe not fire, but this microwaveable heat cap applies customisable heat to the hair, working in turn to improve absorbancy of your chosen treatment. Suitable for most hair types and textures, the steam created from heat works to optimise the benefits of your applied hair care product to enhance shine and keep your strands smooth. Made from soft recycled polyester and filled with natural flaxseed, this reversible and reusable cap is your secret weapon to an envy-inducing mane.
how_to_use: Follow hair preparation & application instructions of chosen hair treatment. Wrap up & secure hair with a Kitsch Recyclable Shower Cap to protect the heating cap from hair treatment residue. Wrap the Deep-Conditioning Heat Cap in a dry towel & microwave on medium or low heat for up to 60 seconds. Test the cap & if the temperature isn’t to your liking, continue heating at intervals of up to 60 seconds until your desired temperature is reached. Do not microwave longer than a combined total of 3 minutes and do not use high heat. Keep out of water.
ingredient: Made from soft recycled polyester & filled with natural flaxseed. Includes: 1x Heat Cap 10x Recyclable Shower Cap - Made From Recycled Materials! One size fits most.

name: ghd The Sectioner Tail Hair Comb ghd The Sectioner Tail Hair Comb
description: There's an art to intricate hairstyling, but having the right tools is crucial to the creative process. Cue The Sectioner: a comb that does a lot more for your locks than meets the eye.
how_to_use: For damage-free backcombing (that's also easy to brush out), use ghd's three-stroke method. Take a small section of hair and hold it away from your head. Place the comb in the section a few centimetres away from the root and comb in two short strokes against the direction of growth, stopping short at the roots. For the third stroke, brush back right to the roots.

name: We Are Paradoxx Detox Clarifying Shampoo 250ml We Are Paradoxx Detox Clarifying Shampoo 250ml
description: Enriched with vegan keratin, this clarifying shampoo gently washes away any product gunk (when you know, you know), leaving hair feeling clean, fresh, and strengthened. Grapefruit enters the mix to purify hair and remove product build-up, and that vegan keratin we mentioned? You can count on it to repair and strengthen damaged locks. Armed with these powerful ingredients, after just one wash your scalp will thank you.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair, lather well and rinse. Repeat as required. Use 1-2 times a week or as required.

name: Bouclème Curl Conditioner 300ml Bouclème Curl Conditioner 300ml
description: A plant-powered cocktail of deeply conditioning extracts to cherish your curls, Bouclème’s Curl Conditioner feeds dry or compromised strands with a buffet of oils and replenishing extracts to maximise bounce and restore your locks’ lustre. Strengthening and protecting, this nourishing blend helps to shield from the damaging impact of daily aggressors (“Take that, pollution!”), while bathing each strand with a smoothing and softening cocktail that deeply – but lightly! – hydrates to keep curls feeling wonderfully ‘springy’ (and looking defined) without adding lift-limiting weight that can drag your hair down. how_to_use: Apply to soaking wet hair. Section dense/thick curls into two or more sections to ensure even coverage. Pay special attention to drier areas such as ends of hair and back of the head. Rinse out partly or fully depending on your curl pattern and texture. For drier, thicker curl types we recommend leaving the conditioner in. For loose curls and waves experiment with rinsing partly.

name: ghd Duet 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in Black ghd Duet 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in Black
description: Taking on the task of transforming your lengths from wet to dry - and perfectly straight and sleek we might add - is ghd's new hybrid styling tool. Dry and style your hair in one fell swoop with ghd's Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in Black. The future of styling, this simplifies your routine and cuts down your time spent at your vanity... and all while leaving your tresses silky soft and free from thermal damage. After years of research and testing by ghd's savvy scientists; the Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler has finally made its jaw-dropping debut. Taking the best tech from their drying and styling tools, this ground-breaking creation utilises Air-Fusion technology to dry and straighten your strands in unison. Smart low temperature plates deliver an even temperature throughout use; and all with barely a sound thanks to a bespoke acoustic system. If you were worried about this reaching your roots you need not panic... every element of your styling rituals has been accounted for by ghd (of course!). Expertly angled vents direct concentrated airflow at a lower temperature towards your roots to dry them without the damaging effects of extreme heat. Once you've dried your mane (and all without a single sizzle or hint of damage), it's time to turn your tool into a classic styler. The exclusive Shine Shot mode reaches the optimal temperature of 185°C to leave your strands ultra-glossy and free from frizz. Your hair styling rituals are ready for their upgrade...
how_to_use: Apply ghd sleek talker before using ghd duet style for elevated results with up to 72h of hair softness and smoothness, longer-lasting frizz control, and 4X more hair alignment. Ensure hair is towel dried before use. Slide the power button upgwards to turn on your Duet Styler. After a few seconds you will hear the fan ramp up as it heats up to the optimal low styling temperature for wet hair. Once the light stops flashing and the product beeps, it s ready to use. Divide your hair. Take the first section and place the product close to the roots holding for three seconds. Glide down the hair towards the ends in a slow and steady pace. Repeat until dry and move onto the next section of hair, starting once again from the roots. Once the hair is fully dry, for an optional boost of shine, active Shine Shot by pressing down the Shine Shot button for four seconds until you hear a beep. The fan will stop and the plate temperature will increase to the optimal ghd styling of 185°C. Once the product beeps and the lights stop flashing, Shine Shot is ready. Your Duet Style can now be used as a regular styler, for instant frizz-free hair. If you wish to return from Shine Shot back to wet to style mode, press and hold the Shine Shot button for two seconds. Your tool will beep as the plates cool down and the fan will start. The 'ready to use' tone will play when it's safe to use on wet hair.
ingredient: The Duet has a UK 3-pin Plug. No thermal hair damage detected after 4 passes in wet to style mode vs naturally dried hair. Automatic sleep mode switches off your styler off after 30 minutes of non-use, for peace of mind.

name: The INKEY List PCA Bond Repair Hair Treatment 100ml The INKEY List PCA Bond Repair Hair Treatment 100ml
description: If your tresses have taken on more than they can handle whether theyve been ravaged by heat or chemical treatments then allow us to introduce you to THE INKEY LISTs PCA Bond Repair Hair Treatment: a lightweight spray that actually helps to rebuild and strengthen damaged strands. On a mission to promote healthier-looking, smooth lengths, this nourishing blend harnesses an impressive medley of forward-thinking ingredients to reduce frizz and split ends. At the heart of the formula is 10% Granrepair Powerbond a clinically proven compound that strengthens from within the hair shaft, repairing hydrogen and ionic bonds whilst also protecting existing disulphide bonds from damage. It doesnt end here, its also infused with 0.2% Aquarich to boost glossiness and prevent split ends; 2% crodasone to help protect hair from thermal damage; 0.2% heliogenol to fend against damage from free radicals (pollution isnt a friend to our hair!); and 2% betaine to condition and soften your strands.
how_to_use: Activate pump by pressing sprayer 2-3 times before your first use. Shake well before use. Spray on towel-dried damp hair, covering all of your hair (excluding your scalp), focusing particularly on more damaged areas. As a guide, wed suggest spritzing 4-6 sprays through short, fine hair and 6-10 sprays for longer, thicker hair.

description: On the hunt for a hairspray that gives an impressive amount of hold without weighing it down or leaving it crunchy? Enter: Davines’ Strong Hold Hairspray. Housed in a pretty gold bottle, this hairspray avoids all the usual hairspray pitfalls — stickiness, greasiness, giving you that dreaded ‘helmet head’ look. name: Philip Kingsley Density Healthy Hair Complex (60 Tablets) Philip Kingsley Density Healthy Hair Complex (60 Tablets)
description: Hello… is it volume you’re looking for? Restoring harmony to lacklustre manes and targeting vitamin and mineral deficiencies are the nutrient-infused supplements from Philip Kingsley’s new Density collection — created to bring the ‘va-va-voom’ back to your hair. Trust in the science of Trichology and let the hair and scalp specialists at Philip Kingsley restore volume and health back to even the finest of strands. Nutritional deficiencies, stress, over-styling and hereditary influences can all be detrimental to our hair health, and a topical regime will only be able to do so much to help bring a balance back to your scalp. Putting the bounce back into lacklustre manes and completing your hair care routine are the new vegan-friendly supplements from Philip Kingsley that nourish your strands from within for hair that shines. Providing optimal vitamin and mineral support these are uniquely formulated with the powerhouse antioxidant vitamin C to contribute to normal collagen formation and a dose of biotin and selenium to help maintain healthy hair. Give your strands a fighting chance and nourish them from the inside for an envy-inducing *swish*.
how_to_use: Take two tablets per day, one with breakfast, one with lunch for four months. Then reduce your dose to one tablet per day to maintain optimum levels. Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Not to be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet. Suitable for adults only. Suitable for vegans and vegetarians. For best before end date, see base of box. Be patient. Visible improvements in hair quality can take up to three months, however you’ll likely see quicker results in your nails.

name: ghd Max Styler Straightener ghd Max Styler Straightener
description: Ideal for long, thick or curly tresses, the ghd max styler has all the mane-changing benefits of the cult-adored original styler but with larger 2 inch plates. These smooth floating plates have been designed with ghd’s advanced ceramic heat technology, allowing a consistent temperature of 185ºC to be maintained for optimal styling – cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. The result? Smoother, healthier, frizz-free locks with salon-quality shine. The clever features don’t end there: a rounded barrel allows for effortless snag-free styling, particularly when creating curls, while a ultra-speedy 30 second heat up time makes it a godsend on rushed mornings. It takes safety very seriously indeed too with a travel-friendly heat resistant protective plate guard and (best of all) an automatic sleep mode that switches the device off after 30 minutes – welcome relief for those heart-wrenching ‘did I leave my straighteners on’ moments.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W.

name: dpHUE ACV Lightweight Conditioner 250ml dpHUE ACV Lightweight Conditioner 250ml
description: Your wash days just got a wholeeee lot better thanks to the ACV Lightweight Conditioner! Famed for it mane-detangling power and shine-enhancing magic, this hydrating conditioner smooths out strands whilst protecting against breakage. As weightless as it gets, this ACV-powered formula seals your shafts for increased sheen and colour retention. Banishing dryness in one wash-n-go, this clever conditioner fuses nourishing shea butter, hydrating aloe vera and strengthening panthenol to ensure your hair not only feels silky soft but stays that way!

name: Living Proof No Frizz Instant De-Frizzer 95ml Living Proof No Frizz Instant De-Frizzer 95ml
description: Frizz-smoothing is a notoriously tricky business – most anti-frizz products rely on silicones to lubricate the hair’s surface and weigh strands down, which helps to minimise friction but ceases to be as effective when things get hot and humid. Frizz is the product of these two factors; when hair is exposed to humidity or dampness, the moisture is absorbed into the hair fibre, causing the cuticle to flare out – as the strands rub against one another, the increase in friction results in frizz, so a true solution must successfully tackle both of these issues. Living Proof took it upon themselves to devise the biggest and most innovative anti-frizz breakthrough; OFPMA – the proprietary technology in Living Proof’s No Frizz products – which coats each strand more evenly than silicones, so moisture is unable to penetrate the hair shaft. It also helps to smooth each strand’s texture, so friction is minimised and frizz is conquered. Also in the Instant De-Frizzer is a clever blend of oils which replicate the functions of those found naturally in the hair, plus conditioning agents to soften and seal the cuticle. The result? Sleek, smooth and frizz-free locks.
how_to_use: For medium to thick hair, hold canister 6-10" away and spray on dry hair in a sweeping motion. Smooth hair with hands or comb. For fine hair, focus on applying from mid-lengths to ends. To spot treat, spray in hand and apply to specific sections.

description: Versatility and efficiency rules with the Ceramic Radial Brush. Hot from ghd's The Blow Dryer range, this medium-sized styling tool helps you achieve sleek and glossy locks at optimal speed. Nobody wants to spend forever blow-drying their hair (unless it involves a pampering day in a salon). Cue ghd's brilliant Size 2 brush: the perfect choice for short to medium-length tresses. How does it work? The ceramic 35mm barrel retains the heat of your hair dryer, giving you an ultra-smooth and shiny blowout in record time. Did we mention it has a non-slip handle, too? Be sure to check out the other sizes in the range: size 1 is ideal for boosting root lift on short to mid-length hair; size 3 creates beautifully soft waves on longer lengths; size 4 is best for blow drying long hair and creating volume on mid-length styles.
how_to_use: Blast your hair on a low heat and medium speed setting until 80% dry. Working with medium sections, brush from the roots and direct the heat at the barrel. Maintain tension as you move the brush through the hair.

name: R+Co ON A CLOUD Baobab Oil Repair Splash on Styler 4.2 oz. R+Co ON A CLOUD Baobab Oil Repair Splash on Styler 4.2 oz.
description: With R+Co’s baobab oil-protein technology, the ON A CLOUD Baobab Oil Repair Splash-On Styler cares for damaged lengths by feeding hair with moisture for intense shine and softness. A leave-on styling masque that you simply splash on and brush through, it helps to rebuild broken bonds and seal hair cuticles – keeping styles intact and your hair feeling irresistibly repaired. A unique cold-effect polymer (or ‘Cold-Sealing Shine Complex’) also works to smooth hair and fight frizz, strengthening your strands while grapeseed extracts, green tea and vitamin B protects hair from the damaging, dulling effects of pollution. Ideal for anyone who’s looking to inject a bit of extra moisture while detangling and repairing throughout the styling process, this styler even boasts a delicious ‘Rosy Eyed’ scent – bursting with bergamot, wild fig, cyclamen, lotus flower, cedarwood and tonka beans.
how_to_use: Spray evenly from roots to ends on clean, damp hair. Comb through and style as usual.

name: ghd The Sectioner Tail Hair Comb ghd The Sectioner Tail Hair Comb
description: There's an art to intricate hairstyling, but having the right tools is crucial to the creative process. Cue The Sectioner: a comb that does a lot more for your locks than meets the eye.
how_to_use: For damage-free backcombing (that's also easy to brush out), use ghd's three-stroke method. Take a small section of hair and hold it away from your head. Place the comb in the section a few centimetres away from the root and comb in two short strokes against the direction of growth, stopping short at the roots. For the third stroke, brush back right to the roots.

name: Philip Kingsley Maximizer Root Volumising Spray 250ml Philip Kingsley Maximizer Root Volumising Spray 250ml
description: Don’t let your hair fall flat – maximise its potential with Philip Kingsley’s ultimate volumising spray, which instantly imparts body and lift for thicker, fuller hair. Providing superior body and maximum volume, Maximiser also holds the hair, adding shine and smoothing away frizz, whether used on wet or dry tresses. Surface resins add volume and hold, lanolin smoothes and gives anti-static protection and polyamide (sunscreen) protects against colour fade and UV damage. Perfect for fine, limp or flat hair, simply spray this into roots for an immediate lift or spritz throughout mid-lengths and ends to impart unbeatable fullness.

name: Naturally Drenched Rebalance Treatment 100ml Naturally Drenched Rebalance Treatment 100ml
description: Been a while since you've given your hair some much-needed TLC? Well, it's time to reignite those tender, lovingcurlswith the Rebalance pre-conditioning treatment! Now available in 400ml and 100ml sizes so you can keep one on your shower shelfie and one in your travel bag to care for your curls no matter where you are in the world. Housed in a brightly coloured bottle that's brimming with almond oil, bamboo extract, calendula and papaya, this is the ultimate cure-all treatment! Forget the Mac, it's the return of thebounceas this cocktail of hair-loving essentials strengthens your hair follicles one by one and coats them in moisture to prevent dryness or breakage. Got a frizzy curl? Tame that mane with just one pump (or 5 if you're likely to get pump-happy) and smooth its nourishment from root to tip. Perfect for all curl types and textures, you can elevate your entire hair care routine with this one product you never knew you needed...until now!
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply Rebalance from roots to ends. For thick curls, use the Styling Clips to ensure every curl gets the TLC it deserves!

description: Drench the hair in moisture with the Amika Hydro Rush Shampoo Refill. A treat for dry, textured or coarse hair, this refreshing formula delivers up to 72 hours of hydration (that's three days!) as it cleanses. The magic behind the shampoo lies in a hair-quenching blend of squalane, hyaluronic acid, polyglutamic acid, coconut water and algae, helping to protect against dryness and encourage a lustrous appearance. Packed full of fatty acid omega 7, plant extract sea buckthorn works to replenish moisture and minimise the risk of breakage; think smooth, bouncy-looking hair that feels healthy.

description: Coating your strands in a weightless protective blend, the Smooth Blowout Lotions faces off heat and flyaways to grant enviably silky, healthy-looking hair. This hair serum melts into your hair to effortlessly detangle high-maintenance tangles, cloaking them in a protective shield that helps to prevent heat damage while maintaining colour vibrancy. Responsible for detangling, the ultra-softening blend of argan, baobab and marula oils faces off with frizzy follicles, while yuzu ceramide smooths to make dry and worn-out hair all the more manageable. Protein- and mineral-rich quinoa is a source of all eight essential amino acids which makes it perfectly suited to repairing and strengthening your strands. Encouraging hair renewal at a cellular level, argan extract stimulate the follicles of your lengths to promote growth and improved quality. The results? Ultra-soft tresses and a styling ritual with much less stress.

name: dpHUE ACV Hair Rinse Lite 8.5 oz. dpHUE ACV Hair Rinse Lite 8.5 oz.
description: The cycle of over-shampooing is a hard one to kick but it’s essential for maintaining the vibrancy of your hair colour. dpHUE's advice? Skip the shampoo, reach for the rinse — their Apple Cider Vinegar Hair Rinse Light, that is. Formulated specifically for the needs of fine, thin hair types and made with artisanal crafted apple cider vinegar, it's a shampoo substitute that gently cleanses and removes impurities without stripping hair colour and natural oils that are essential to scalp and hair health. It works in tandem with argan oil, lavender extract and aloe vera to help seal the cuticle, add shine, protect your colour, soothe your scalp and moisturise your strands. Who said you needed to shampoo to reveal your shine?
how_to_use: Wet scalp and hair. Squeeze out excess water from hair. Use bottle tip to create small partitions in hair, gently squeezing the product onto your scalp. Massage into scalp & pull through hair. Leave in for 1-3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and use as often as needed.

Dryness doesn't stand a chance when faced with a deeply moisturising blend of squalane, polyglutamic acid, bio-fermented coconut water and hyaluronic acid. Not to be outshined, plant extract sea buckthorn helps to minimise the risk of breakage, while a blend of blue and green algae nourishes the lengths with an abundance of fatty acids. The shampoo also helps to minimise the look of damage - we'll take three please.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Overnight Scalp Renewal Serum 50ml Aveda Scalp Solutions Overnight Scalp Renewal Serum 50ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Overnight Scalp Renewal Serum, your new hair care essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Caring for your scalp while you slumber, this overnight treatment fights off signs of premature scalp ageing while boosting hydration levels. Enriched with barrier-boosting heroes and a soothing blend this will calm redness and reveal a nourished, soft scalp... and in turn, healthy hair.
how_to_use: Apply directly to scalp at bedtime, massage in. Do not rinse. Hair may be damp or dry. (Suggested application technique: part hair from front to back hairline. Apply to scalp with dropper. Repeat in 5 or more sections to cover entire scalp).Nightly or as often as desired.

name: RevitaLash Cosmetics Hair Volumizing Enhancing Foam 1.9 fl. oz. RevitaLash Cosmetics Hair Volumizing Enhancing Foam 1.9 fl. oz.
description: If you're well-acquainted with Revitalash, then you'll know that they're something of a legend in the lash-lengthening-sphere. Now turning their extensive expertise to the realm of fine, thinning hair, their Volume Enhancing Foam is designed to intensify your natural volume as it adds light-scattering shine and body. Colour-safe, vegan and physician-developed, this innovative formula harnesses the brand's proprietary BioPeptin Complex® - a blend of lipids, biotin, biotin and panthenol - to add visible body, while it strengthens, softens and defends against breakage and brittleness. Antioxidant-rich ginseng and swertia japonica extracts then help to protect against free radicals; saw palmetto helps to add shine and condition with its abundance of fatty acids and plant sterols; then amino acids and B vitamins work to fortify and smooth your strands. Don't believe us? In an eight-week consumer study of 35 participants, 97% reported that fine hair looked/felt fuller and more voluminous, 94% said thinning hair looked thicker, healthier and nourished, while 85% reported that fine, thinning hair around hairline looked fuller and was less brittle.
how_to_use: Step one: Use once daily on wet or dry hair. Pump the bottle a few times to release air until foam appears. For shorter hair, pump foam onto hands and massage into scalp and the roots of hair. For longer hair, separate hair into sections and apply nozzle directly onto head, pumping to release product as you go. Step two: Massage thoroughly into the scalp and the roots of the hair. Do not oversaturate. Do not rinse out. Style hair as desired. Designed to work in tandem with Thickening Shampoo and Thickening Conditioner.

name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Combination Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley Moisture Balancing Combination Conditioner 200ml
description: Developed by ‘The Hair Doctor’, Philip Kingsley, Moisture Balancing Conditioner does exactly what it says on the bottle – balancing moisture so that there’s less at the roots and more throughout mid-lengths and ends, where it’s most needed. Ideal for dry, fine or processed locks, the formula instantly and painlessly detangles hair (it’s gentle enough even for children) and imparts anti-static conditioning agents to provide control and manageability. Hair is left shiny, smooth and strong, without being overburdened with moisture – a total hair game changer. And now this hydration hero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) — because nobody fancies thirsty hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends Rinse well Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-12, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid.

name: Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Restructuring Treatment 150ml Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Restructuring Treatment 150ml
description: Don't let chemical styling, colour treating or heat tools get the better of your hair — defy damage with Philip Kingsley's Bond Builder Restructuring Treatment: an industry-shaking, pre-shampoo treatment which reinforces existing bonds and repairs broken ones as it strengthens and protects strands against damage and breakage. We like to think of it as a rewind button for past hair decisions... Working beneath the surface of the hair to rebuild damaged strands from the inside out, this deeply restorative formula leaves locks more resistant to damage as well as instantly stronger and smoother. It's powered by the brand's 'Advanced Bond Rebuilding Technology' that protects, strengthens and repairs damaged hair by protecting existing bonds and reconnecting broken ones. The softening and shine-boosting benefits are an added bonus! It's also infused with one of the industry's most-loved ingredients, panthenol (a pro-vitamin of B5) to deliver long-lasting moisture and thicken the look of your hair while granting a lustrous sheen. Disclaimer: the urge to flick your hair may be irresistible.
how_to_use: For best results, use at least once a week before you shampoo. Those with heavily processed hair can use it more frequently. Dampen hair and apply product to the mid-lengths and ends. Leave for a minimum of 10 minutes (the longer the better). Rinse thoroughly and follow with the recommended Philip Kingsley shampoo and conditioner for your hair texture (those with fine hair should double-shampoo to remove all product).

Charged with the ghd Heat Protection System, it preps your hair with an invisible, lightweight defensive barrier ready for styling – whether that be blow drying or straightening. The formula is also spiked with active ingredients that help to smooth frizz while imparting ultra-sleek locks without flattening them. Suitable for all hair types, this hero is bound to become an essential in your styling regime.

name: VIRTUE Full Shampoo Travel Size 60ml VIRTUE Full Shampoo Travel Size 60ml
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Full Shampoo, a game-changing way to cleanse and care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Shampoo also creates enviable volume, dissolving excess oil, lifting the root and plumping each strand for weightless, long-lasting body. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and biotin, a hard-working form of vitamin B known for boosting strength and shine. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. What's more, after one week of using the shampoo and conditioner in a clinical trial, 87% of users reported that their hair had more body, while 84% found their hair felt thicker!

name: Davines DEDE Shampoo Bar 100g Davines DEDE Shampoo Bar 100g
description: Forget everything you know about shampoo bars... An extension of their fan-favourite shampoo line, Davines' Solid Shampoo Bars boast a solid texture that develops into a rich creamy foam that cleanses without stripping your strands. Suited to all hair types, the DEDE Naked Shampoo Bar is enriched with red celery extract to delicately refresh as it promotes a soft, silky finish. Compact like a soap bar, these salon-quality shampoo bars are packaged in 100% recyclable paper (you're helping to cut down single-use plastics!) and boast the same results that you would see from using their traditional shampoos. Infused with strand-loving actives from Slow Food Presidia farms (an organisation that safeguards biodiversity in Italy), each shampoo contains up to 97.4% of highly biodegradable ingredients — so after rinsing, most of them degrade within 28 days!
how_to_use: Wet the shampoo bar with water, rub it between hands to create a lather and apply it to wet hair. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary. Proceed with a conditioner, if desired. Rinse thoroughly in case of eye contact.

name: Davines Oi Liquid Luster 300ml Davines Oi Liquid Luster 300ml
description: With a weightless, rinse-off formula, the Oi Liquid Luster is a post-shampoo treat for hair in need of softness, hydration and a glossy, head-turning finish. Polishing hair with an illuminating shine, this liquid texture creates a kind of film around strands (but don’t worry, this won’t leave your hair greasy or looking straggly!) for an ultra-smooth finish. Roucou oil nourishes hair while infusing it with antioxidants that protect against daily aggressors like UV rays that can leave your lengths looking dull; alpha hydroxy acids derived from grape must help to close your hair cuticles, giving the appearance of more shiny and feeling of softer strands; and cardoon oil gives your hair extra hydration for a more manageable mane.
how_to_use: After shampooing, squeeze out excess water from hair. section and apply directly to hair fully saturating from mid-lengths to ends. comb through. Use one dose (20ml) for short hair and two doses (40ml) for long hair. Rinse out.

name: AMELIORATE Soothing Scalp Essence 100ml AMELIORATE Soothing Scalp Essence 100ml
description: Bringing instant relief to stressed scalps, AMELIORATE's Soothing Scalp Essence offers a soothing, replenishing burst of hydration to quickly quell itching and calm irritation. Starring the brand's unique LAH6 Skin Hydration Complex - six active moisturisers combined at an optimal level to lock in hydration and leave scaly skin feeling smooth and replenished; alongside oat and frankincense extracts to balance and boost moisture levels, this water-based formula acts like a comforting balm when your scalp's out of sync. Lightweight, fragrance-free and fast-acting, when used regularly this is shown to help normalise oils and maintain your scalp's overall health while improving hair's texture and condition. Your scalp will be left feeling comfortably calm as your hair becomes stronger and glossier.
how_to_use: Hair should be clean and damp. Remove excess moisture from hair and divide into sections, spraying the Essence directly onto the root and scalp area. Comb through lengths and style as usual.

name: VIRTUE Restorative Treatment Mask 150ml VIRTUE Restorative Treatment Mask 150ml
description: A true innovation in hair care, Virtue's advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. Uniting this advanced protein with a host of other powerful ingredients, this luxurious, deeply hydrating treatment mask actively rehabilitates hair in need of extra care, immediately infusing shine, moisture and resiliency, leaving locks bouncy, vibrant and beautiful – one of our beautiful buyers compared it to 'a hug for your hair'. Brown algae extract provides further repairing powers and heat protection, aramanthus seed extract (a plant-based protein) enhances colour, moisture retention and shine, baobab seed oil provides rich, silky moisture and artichoke leaf extract preserves cuticle cohesion and helps to protect hair from environmental aggressors. The ultimate treat for stressed tresses, this mask smells as good as it does, fragranced with a rich, nurturing blend of fresh woods and clean citrus formulated with coconut and yuzu extracts.
how_to_use: After cleansing hair, remove excess water and apply a generous amount, distributing evenly through hair. Leave on for 2-3 minutes. Rinse well. For best results, use once a week (or as needed) as an intensive treatment after shampooing.

name: VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo and Conditioner VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo and Conditioner
description: The VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo and Conditioner works to create a shiny, polished mane. This haircare duo helps to tame frizz and fly-aways with a blend of replenishing ingredients. Set Contents: Smooth Shampoo 240ml A luxurious shampoo, designed to support a sleek, manageable mane. The nourishing formula helps to soften the appearance of damage while increasing slip. Alpha Keratin 60ku® mimics the keratin found in human hair, promoting a smooth and shiny finish. Smooth Conditioner 200ml Wave goodbye to pesky fly-aways with this smoothing conditioner. Featuring a hair-loving formula, the conditioner instantly softens cuticles to help restore a sleek, silky quality to your strands. It also helps to increase slip for easy, manageable styling.
how_to_use: Shampoo: Work a quarter-sized amount of shampoo into a lather between palms. Apply to wet hair and massage into scalp, starting at the nape of your neck, and work the lather through ends. Rinse thoroughly. Conditioner: Work a quarter-sized amount of conditioner between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: AMELIORATE Clarifying Scalp Exfoliant 125ml AMELIORATE Clarifying Scalp Exfoliant 125ml
description: Stimulating your scalp (aka the source of your hair health) with a gentle blend of AHAs and moisturising ingredients, expect an instant improvement of both texture and condition. The Clarifying Scalp Exfoliant helps to lift product build-up and dead (read: flaky) skin from your scalp to relieve the discomfort of itchy dryness. Made with an infusion of lactic acid – an effective alpha hydroxy acid – it helps to dissolve the bonds between old cells, revealing a healthier layer of skin. This exfoliating action works in harmony with their proprietary LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex which is comprised of oat-based hydrating ingredients, that are clinically proven to moisturise for up to 8 hours in their wash-off products. The results? Your scalp will feel renewed and deeply conditioned... D-r-e-a-m-y!
how_to_use: Remove cap and attach applicator nozzle before use. Apply directly onto the scalp and gently massage. Leave on the scalp for a few minutes to ensure the product works to its optimum before rinsing off. For best results follow with AMELIORATE Clarifying Shampoo and Smoothing Conditioner.
