name: Davines LOVE Curl Revitalizer 250ml Davines LOVE Curl Revitalizer 250ml
description: Designed to give curly or wavy hair that little extra zhuzh between washes, the LOVE/ Curl Revitaliser brings your mane back from ‘flat and frizzy’ to ‘big and bouncy’ in just a few spritz.  Rich in proteins, not to mention vitamins B and E, this lightweight formula offers impressive elasticising and volumising action, all while preventing lifeless locks and keeping your hair looking as good as the first day you styled it. The secret? Noto almond extract. This new active helps to counteract the dryness so frequently associated with curly hair and allowing your luscious locks to sing.
how_to_use: Apply to dry hair from a distance of around 10-20cm. Do not rinse off.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Vp/Va Copolymer, Polyquaternium-69, Parfum / Fragrance, Polyquaternium-11, Disodium Edta, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Seed Extract / Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Extract, Limonene, Citric Acid.

name: VIRTUE Recovery Shampoo 60ml VIRTUE Recovery Shampoo 60ml
description: Ideal for dry and damaged hair types, Virtue’s travel size Recovery Shampoo gently cleanses and clarifies while supporting a stronger-looking scalp and strands. Featuring Alpha Keratin 60ku®, the nourishing formula works to provide keratin protein to the tresses, protecting against the look of breakage and split ends. Hydrolyzed quinoa promotes visibly enhanced colour vibrancy, while baobab seed oil offers intense moisture to the lengths. Fortified with antioxidant-rich grapefruit extract, the silky shampoo refreshes the hair and leaves it looking lustrous.
how_to_use: Work a coin-sized amount of the shampoo into a lather between palms. Apply to wet hair, massage into a rich lather, and rinse.

name: Kitsch Luxe Shower Cap (Various Colours) Kitsch Luxe Shower Cap (Various Colours)
description: The humble shower cap, reimagined. This Luxe Shower Cap from Kitsch looks like something youd wear on holiday its almost a crime to keep it to yourself! Accommodating to all head sizes, you can adorn your head with this chic cap to keep your perfectly styled locks in tip-top condition, moisture-free. This is exactly what you need to elevate shower-time into the fun self-care ritual that you deserve. Available in four fun prints, the elastic band allows for comfortable protection from water, while the polyester material is soft on your skin and long-lasting. Move over, plastic single-use shower caps, theres a new gal in town.
how_to_use: Slip over hair to protect during your morning/evening shower.
ingredient: 100% Polyester

name: SILKE Hair Wrap (Various Colours) SILKE Hair Wrap (Various Colours)
description: Made from the highest-quality 100% mulberry silk, SILKE’s Hair Wrap shields the hair against friction and moisture absorption while you sleep, helping to protect it from tugging and snagging that can lead to excessive breakage. The silky-soft hair wrap cocoons lengths to promote growth, boost thickness and reduce flyaway’s- all while you sleep. It is ideal for freshly styled tresses to resist kinking or creasing, revealing salon-quality styles day after day. The one size fits all hair wrap has enough material depth to cover all hair types, from long to short and curly to straight, and features a discreet elasticated band that shrinks and expands to fit all head sizes. Beautifully crafted with a chic and comfortable design, the wrap encourages a sleek and smooth appearance when you wake.
how_to_use: Routine: Arrange and hold your hair in place so it's easy for you to scoop into your SILKE Hair Wrap, releasing the hair into the silk cocoon as it slides on. Be sure to tuck all your hair within your wrap so the elasticated silk edge is completely covering your hairline and the tip of your ears, this will ensure it sits tight, protecting and nourishing your lengths all through the night.

name: Davines Oil Non Oil Davines Oil Non Oil
description: This weirdly named product (sounds like a direct Italian translation to us!) is blended to create a multi-benefit, anti-static, styling and finishing cream. Ideal as a frizz ease, it contains sweet almond proteins to moisturise hair eliminating static, while the conditioning agents and resins provide heat protection, taming fly-aways without weighing hair down. The result is sleek, shiny tresses with a soft hold that lasts all day.

name: Kitsch Satin Wrapped Hair Towel - Blush Kitsch Satin Wrapped Hair Towel - Blush
description: Don't undo your wash day efforts by taking a run of the mill towel to wet hair, instead, use this soft hair towel that quickly dries hair with its microfibre material whilst taming frizz. Also, just look at that cosy blush colour that makes donning this towel half the fun. Satin-wrapped to protect hair from breakage, this multi-tasking towel is a simple yet effective way to upgrade your hair care routine. Thanks to the incredibly absorbent microfibre layer, you can dry your tresses in half the time and it works wonders for dry hair that needs a little help in retaining moisture and natural oils. Don't skimp on this simple yet game-changing step to healthy hair!
how_to_use: Flip head over, letting hair fall toward the ground. Place towel with button at nape of neck. Wrap towel around hair, twisting tightly downward from forehead. Flip head up and fasten elastic loop to button at nape of neck.
ingredient: 53% Microfiber 45% Imitated Silk 2% Elastic -- Microfiber: 70% Biconstituent Fiber (79% Polyester 21% Polyamide) 30% Polyester -- Imitated Silk: 95% Polyester 5% Spandex.

name: MONPURE London Heal and Energise Jade Comb 60g MONPURE London Heal and Energise Jade Comb 60g
description: Inspired by the ancient Chinese practice of ‘combing therapy’, this 100% jade comb marries function and self care. Like the feeling of having your hair brushed but way better, this pretty accessory detangles hair, while stimulating your scalp. As beautiful as it is effective, MONPURE stresses the importance of scalp health once more with this comb that stimulates the meridian channels that run throughout your body and like any tension-relieving (read: satisyfing) massage, it improves blood circulation. As some crystal healing lovers out there will know, Jade is often used to improve a low mood, too. Pair this up with your favourite scalp serum and you’ve got a (massage) match made in heaven. The result? A well-managed mane that looks as good as you feel. We’ll take that.
how_to_use: 1. Part the hairline into 5 or more sections. 2. Using the pipette, apply a few drops of MONPURE serum directly onto each section, approximately 3 cm apart. 3. Using the jade comb, gently massage the serum into the scalp in circular motions. 4. Start closer to the face and temples, working your way back along the scalp until you reach the neck area and the back of the head.
ingredient: 100% Jade.

name: Living Proof PhD Shampoo Travel Size 60ml Living Proof PhD Shampoo Travel Size 60ml
description: A fan favourite, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Shampoo is a beautiful phthalate, paraben, silicone, sulfate and cruelty-free formula that helps you wash your hair less often, improves health and condition over time and makes locks feel cleaner for longer. A revolutionary formula, the shampoo is powered by the brand's patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA), which does four things: smooths hair, polishes and protects strands, creates visibly healthier hair over time and helps repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer. Prepare to become seriously obsessed.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Lather. Rinse. Follow with Perfect hair Day Conditioner.

name: Pacifica Pineapple Curls Refresher Mist 118ml Pacifica Pineapple Curls Refresher Mist 118ml
description: Lightweight and silicone-free, Pacifica’s Pineapple Curls Refresher Mist is designed to add moisture to your curls in-between wash days, enhancing their natural definition and shine. Like all of Pacifica’s formulas, this curl-rejuvenating mist is made in the USA from the best globally sourced ingredients: linseed oil (an impressive source of omega 3 fatty acids) works to hydrate and seal in moisture; vitamin B5 helps to strengthen strands, boost shine, enhance manageability and add lift; the enzymes within pineapple extract help to restore dry and brittle tendrils; finally, hyaluronic acid adds an extra hit of hydration. Long story short, this mist helps to revive tired and parched kinks, curls and coils.
how_to_use: Spritz onto curls (wet or dry) then scrunch for reviving and/or coil with fingers to add curl definition.

name: Oribe Bright Blonde Essential Priming Serum 100 ml. Oribe Bright Blonde Essential Priming Serum 100 ml.
description: Working to eliminate and tone brassiness while imparting lustrous shine via violet and reflective pearlized pigments, the Bright Blonde Priming Serum also enhances vibrancy, replenishes moisture and provides heat protection. A delicious blend of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts come together to form the ‘Oribe Signature Complex’, which saves strands from oxidative stress and the elements, photoaging (premature ageing from exposure to UV rays), and the deterioration of your natural keratin stores. A proprietary ‘Brightening Complex’ (made with lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts) optimises the look of your shade and tone while swiftly restoring lost luminosity, while sodium hyaluronate and hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid work to seal in moisture. Lavender flower extract nourishes over-processed, damaged strands while conditioning and adding shine, and prickly pear fruit extract smooths each hair cuticle to soft, strengthen, repair and present elasticity to dry and brittle lengths.
how_to_use: Work through damp hair before styling to protect, tone and hydrate. NOTE: All packaging except for the pump is recyclable.

name: Drybar Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist 130g Drybar Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist 130g
description: Packed full of nutrient-rich ingredients, the Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist offers a smooth, manageable finish, infused with lingering notes of amber, coconut and vanilla. A powerful blend of fire tulip extract, marula oil and heat-activated rice protein coats the hair in a protective veil to defend against heat up to 232°C. Leaping bunny certified.

name: Davines Nourishing Keratin Sealer Davines Nourishing Keratin Sealer
description: Protective and nourishing, Davines’ Nourishing Keratin Sealer behaves like a ‘top coat’ for hair – wrapping each fibre to shield from aggressors while locking in moisture to keep your strands silky and soft. Jam-packed with natural actives, including vegetal keratin (a blend of rice proteins and amino acids to bolster hair’s resilience to keep it strong and supple), alongside the brand’s proprietary Biacidic Bond Complex – a medley of molecules blended in Davines’ Research Laboratory, used to seal split ends and ‘glue’ damaged areas – this leave-in hydrating and frizz-fighting serum helps to counteract breakage while leaving locks gorgeously glossy. It also makes light work of tangles (no ‘ouches’ allowed).
how_to_use: Apply evenly on towel dried hair to conclude the Nourishing routine, distribute the product with a comb and follow with the usual styling routine. Use every time you conclude a Nourishing treatment, both in salon and at home.

name: Amika Normcore Signature Shampoo Amika Normcore Signature Shampoo
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Living up to their promise, this Normcore Signature Shampoo is crafted to work its magic on all hair types, because everyone deserves to have clean, lustrous hair! Overflowing with vitamins and antioxidants, this lathering formula is equal parts refreshing and hydrating. Expect soft, shiny strands... It infused with coconut acid to generate a luscious - not to mention conditioning - lather that effortlessly shifts grease and impurities. Plus, omega 7-rich sea buckthorn promotes elasticity and delivers impressive hydration! It's even laced with amika's signature scent, so you can expect your tresses to smell like their intoxicating blend of warm vanilla, spicy-sweet clover, and fresh citrus. Psst, did we mention it's safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: Wet hair and massage from roots to ends. Rinse and follow with Normcore Signature Conditioner or Soulfood Nourishing Mask.

name: Naturally Drenched Reusable Pump Naturally Drenched Reusable Pump
description: Go pump crazy and reuse your Rebalance bottle over and over on holidays, for spa weekends away and self-care nights in. Preventing plastic waste from going to the landfill just got easier and more user-friendly. We love to see it!
how_to_use: Unlock pump and push down to dispense product.
ingredient: PP Plastic.

name: Naturally Drenched Bamboo Pick Comb Naturally Drenched Bamboo Pick Comb
description: Give your hair some much needed va-va-voom with this Bamboo Hair Pick that instantly volumises and reshapes your mane. Why not use a plastic hair pick? Well, because Naturally Drenched are totally vegan and eco-conscious, duh! Aaaand, its bamboo texture also helps you to distribute your hair’s natural oils and moisture. Had a somewhat chaotic wash day? This Bamboo hair Pick has the power to single-handedly remedy that (and future wash days) by detangling those stubborn strands without pulling or tugging.
how_to_use: Use the pick to fluff hair from the roots adding volume, shape and elongation.
ingredient: Bamboo.

name: Pacifica Pineapple Curls Refresher Mist 118ml Pacifica Pineapple Curls Refresher Mist 118ml
description: Lightweight and silicone-free, Pacifica’s Pineapple Curls Refresher Mist is designed to add moisture to your curls in-between wash days, enhancing their natural definition and shine. Like all of Pacifica’s formulas, this curl-rejuvenating mist is made in the USA from the best globally sourced ingredients: linseed oil (an impressive source of omega 3 fatty acids) works to hydrate and seal in moisture; vitamin B5 helps to strengthen strands, boost shine, enhance manageability and add lift; the enzymes within pineapple extract help to restore dry and brittle tendrils; finally, hyaluronic acid adds an extra hit of hydration. Long story short, this mist helps to revive tired and parched kinks, curls and coils.
how_to_use: Spritz onto curls (wet or dry) then scrunch for reviving and/or coil with fingers to add curl definition.
ingredient: Aqua, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glyceryl Stearate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Water, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum*. *A scent blend with natural and/or essential oils

name: Drybar The Lemon Bar Paddle Brush Drybar The Lemon Bar Paddle Brush
description: If you use one brush in your hair care regime... make it the Lemon Bar Paddle Brush. This multi-use brush can be used to detangle knotted hair and create a sleek, shiny blow-drywith ease. Brush up on your styling regime with Drybar's Lemon Bar Paddle Brush, created for all hair lengths, including extensions, this is your hair's companion for a sleek blowout that doesn't leave you feeling like you just left the gym. Flexible nylon bristles work through tangles with ease, no tugging or pulling here! The broad, flat base helps you to cover a wider surface area of your hair, while the cushioned body helps you to gently brush through your hair to keep damage at bay. Boasting a slip-free finish and super soft to the touch, this truly is the holy grail of paddle brushes!
how_to_use: To detangle on wet or dry hair: Start by brushing out the ends and work your way up to the crown. For extensions, hold the hair below the top of the extension and brush away tangles. This helps to avoid unnecessary tugging. To create a sleek blowout: Rough-dry hair. Work in clean sections and place the paddle brush underneath the sections at the roots and pull through towards ends while directing the airflow of the dryer downward. Dry thoroughly from roots to ends.

name: Bouclème Scalp Exfoliating Shampoo 250ml Bouclème Scalp Exfoliating Shampoo 250ml
description: Revitalising your curls from root to tip, Bouclème's Exfoliating Scalp Shampoo is carefully crafted to gently detoxify your scalp of cumbersome product build-up and pollution to reveal ultra-refreshed hair. This 96% naturally derived, vegan formula effectively cleanses and energises with its rich, finely exfoliating texture. Created to meet the needs of fragile, neglected scalps, this shampoo harnesses conditioning seabuckthorn oil and hydrogenated castor oil beads to gently shift dead skin cells and product build-up, thereby stimulating your hair follicles to sprout healthy growth (woohoo!). It's also infused with uplifting spearmint and grapefruit oils and calming marjoram to add an invigorating, cool touch to your shower ritual. It's perfect for curls, kinks or coils that feel dull or weighed down!
how_to_use: Wet hair thoroughly. Apply a generous amount of product to fingertips and massage throughout scalp in a circular motion. Rinse hair thoroughly. Then follow with Intensive Moisture Treatment and detangle to ensure any remaining beads caught in tangled hair are rinse away fully. For optimum results, use once per month. For a complete scalp and hair ritual always follow with Intensive Moisture Treatment to replenish any lost moisture. HOW TO RECYCLE: Great news, the 250ml tubes and caps are 100% recyclable, so can be disposed of within your recycling*. *We recommend always checking with the local facilities if you need to rinse the packaging before disposal.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Erythritol, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin (Vegetable), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Betaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Menthyl Lactate, *Anthemis Nobilis (Roman Chamomile) Flower Oil, *Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Oil, *Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, *Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, *Pelargonium Roseum (Rose Geranium) Leaf Oil, *Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Gum Oil, *Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, *Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Oil, *Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, *Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange Sweet) Peel Oil, *Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Oil, *Angelica Archangelica (Angelica) Root Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn) Fruit Oil, Coconut Fatty Acid, Sorbitan Sesquicaprylate, Glyceryl Oleate, Coco Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Xanthan Gum, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Glycerol, Isopulegol, **Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, **Limonene, **Linalool, **Geraniol, **Citronellol, *natural pure essential oils **potential allergens

name: Living Proof Scalp Care Dry Scalp Treatment 100ml Living Proof Scalp Care Dry Scalp Treatment 100ml
description: Ideal for soothing irritation, preventing flakiness and moisturising dry scalps, Living Proof's Scalp Care Dry Scalp Treatment gets to the root of the problem by supporting your microbiome and providing lasting hydration. The lightweight, leave-in treatment is powered by a breakthrough vitamin B3-based complex that's laced with clinically proven actives that work to balance your scalp's microbiome for long-term relief. There's also a hyaluronic acid-based molecular patch which instantly soothes irritation and delivers intense hydration. Based on a 66-person clinical study, 92% of participants said it instantly soothed their scalps while 88% said it reduced the feeling of dryness on their scalps instantly. It's safe to say we like those stats!
how_to_use: Section clean, damp, detangled hair. Apply directly to the scalp. Give yourself a scalp massage to ensure it penetrates the scalp and hair follicles. Do not rinse. For best results, use three times per week for four weeks. Continue to use for maintained results.

name: Drybar Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist 130g Drybar Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist 130g
description: Packed full of nutrient-rich ingredients, the Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist offers a smooth, manageable finish, infused with lingering notes of amber, coconut and vanilla. A powerful blend of fire tulip extract, marula oil and heat-activated rice protein coats the hair in a protective veil to defend against heat up to 232°C. Leaping bunny certified.

name: Le Labo Bergamote 22 Conditioner 237ml Le Labo Bergamote 22 Conditioner 237ml
description: More like a moisture-rich balm than a typical conditioner, Bergamote 22 Conditioner softens, nourishes and leaves behind a whisper of Le Labo's warm and zesty twist on bergamot. Completely free from parabens and phthalates, a cocktail of shea butter, soybean oil, and sweet almond deeply replenish delicate strands to leave hair feeling soft, silky and strong. An easy way to layer up your favourite scent, this luxe conditioner infuses hair with the sensual scent of Bergamote 22 - featuring notes of grapefruit, amber and musk.
how_to_use: After cleansing with your favourite Le Labo Shampoo, smooth Conditioner through lengths, concentrating on the ends, and leave for a couple of minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: R+Co HYPERLINK Fiber Stretch Pomade 60ml R+Co HYPERLINK Fiber Stretch Pomade 60ml
description: R+Co’s Hyperlink Fibre Stretch Pomade is styling and texturising pomade made with unique micro-polymers that adhere to every strand, creating a style with flexible hold, movement and natural shine. This way for touchable, frizz-free styles that hold all day... Infused with the bnd’s 'Relative Paradise’ fragrance (a bright and earthy composition of Sicilian lemon, tangerine, eucalyptus, green tea, tree moss and crisp amber), this nourishing styler will leave your strands scented to perfection. Using natural ingredients (and no parabens, sulphates, mineral oil or petrolatum) this exquisite formula is 100% vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free and colour-safe. It’s infused with cold pressed macadamia seed oil to nourish and help with frizz; castor oil locks in hydration with film-forming properties for volume, hold and shine; pea protein adds texture plus protects hair from environmental aggressors and UV damage; finally, carrot root extract helps to promote stronger, smoother and shinier strands.
how_to_use: Add a dime-sized amount on hand and emulsify. Apply to hair with rubbing motion. Style as desired.

name: WetBrush Go Green Detangling Comb - Tea Tree WetBrush Go Green Detangling Comb - Tea Tree
description: For beauties that prefer to tackle their mane with a comb rather than a brush — and don’t want to sacrifice the earth for the sake of their hair care routine — the Go Green Detangling Treatment Comb is the answer. A truly pain-free approach to styling your tresses, this wide tooth comb features a special ‘WaveTooth’ design (you’ll spot the slightly zigzagged pins) which helps the comb to slip through your tangles without snagging, pulling or causing unnecessary breakage. To reduce the amount of plastic within your collection, this handy comb is made from a more sustainable bamboo fibre (we love to see it). And finally, to treat your hair as you tease it, each comb in the range is infused with oils and minerals to tackle different hair concerns: ‘Tea Tree Oil’ balances your scalp for a healthier mane right from the root; ‘Coconut Oil’ conditions, smooths and adds softness; and ‘Charcoal’ absorbs excess sebum and impurities from the hair.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.
ingredient: Bamboo fibre.

name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Extreme Shampoo (250ml) Philip Kingsley Moisture Extreme Shampoo (250ml)
description: Giving stressed out strands an extreme moisture surge while cleansing, Philip Kingsley’s Moisture Extreme Shampoo is a must-have for curled, coiled and afro hair types. A specialist, award-winning formula, this addresses the unique structure, processing, styling and grooming needs of fine, coiled hair, which is often most susceptible to damage given its structure. Effectively cleaning the hair and scalp and removing styling products without dehydrating, this shampoo deposits moisture along the hair shaft as it cleanses, with conditioning cocoa butter and anti-static guar. Suitable for use on relaxed and synthetic as well as natural hair types, this versatile treat is the ideal first step in your hair care ritual. And now this ultra-moisturising superhero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) — because nobody wants to be wrestling with thirsty locks when they should be laying about by the pool.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner

name: Kitsch Satin Wrapped Hair Towel - Blush Kitsch Satin Wrapped Hair Towel - Blush
description: Don't undo your wash day efforts by taking a run of the mill towel to wet hair, instead, use this soft hair towel that quickly dries hair with its microfibre material whilst taming frizz. Also, just look at that cosy blush colour that makes donning this towel half the fun. Satin-wrapped to protect hair from breakage, this multi-tasking towel is a simple yet effective way to upgrade your hair care routine. Thanks to the incredibly absorbent microfibre layer, you can dry your tresses in half the time and it works wonders for dry hair that needs a little help in retaining moisture and natural oils. Don't skimp on this simple yet game-changing step to healthy hair!
how_to_use: Flip head over, letting hair fall toward the ground. Place towel with button at nape of neck. Wrap towel around hair, twisting tightly downward from forehead. Flip head up and fasten elastic loop to button at nape of neck.
ingredient: 53% Microfiber 45% Imitated Silk 2% Elastic -- Microfiber: 70% Biconstituent Fiber (79% Polyester 21% Polyamide) 30% Polyester -- Imitated Silk: 95% Polyester 5% Spandex.

name: MONPURE London Heal and Energise Jade Comb 60g MONPURE London Heal and Energise Jade Comb 60g
description: Inspired by the ancient Chinese practice of ‘combing therapy’, this 100% jade comb marries function and self care. Like the feeling of having your hair brushed but way better, this pretty accessory detangles hair, while stimulating your scalp. As beautiful as it is effective, MONPURE stresses the importance of scalp health once more with this comb that stimulates the meridian channels that run throughout your body and like any tension-relieving (read: satisyfing) massage, it improves blood circulation. As some crystal healing lovers out there will know, Jade is often used to improve a low mood, too. Pair this up with your favourite scalp serum and you’ve got a (massage) match made in heaven. The result? A well-managed mane that looks as good as you feel. We’ll take that.
how_to_use: 1. Part the hairline into 5 or more sections. 2. Using the pipette, apply a few drops of MONPURE serum directly onto each section, approximately 3 cm apart. 3. Using the jade comb, gently massage the serum into the scalp in circular motions. 4. Start closer to the face and temples, working your way back along the scalp until you reach the neck area and the back of the head.
ingredient: 100% Jade.

name: Oribe Serene Scalp Thickening Treatment Spray 4.2 fl. oz. Oribe Serene Scalp Thickening Treatment Spray 4.2 fl. oz.
description: ‘Oomph’ in a bottle, Oribe’s Serene Scalp Thickening Treatment Spray builds phenomenal body without any stiffness or stickiness. Made for thinning hair, this ultra-lightweight formula instantly ‘plumps’ as the roots to add lift and create the appearance of thicker, redensified lengths. With quick and cumulative benefit, this not only has an immediate impact but gradually works to promote thicker, healthier hair, while the cocktail of antioxidants protects against pollution and strand-damaging aggressors – increasing hair’s resilience to help preserve your lengths’ integrity. Energising, refreshing and balancing, this cares for your scalp by respecting its finely-tuned flora and fauna, while working to ward against fall-out to amplify volume and boost your morale. Oh, and it's pink...
how_to_use: In clean, damp hair, mist directly onto the scalp. Style as usual. For best results, use after every wash. Instantly plumps hair at the roots while creating denser-looking strands over the course of three months.

name: Oribe Conditioner for Beautiful Colour Refill 1000ml Oribe Conditioner for Beautiful Colour Refill 1000ml
description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Beautiful Colour Conditioner with this refill. Extend the life of your hair dye and soothe over-processed, colour-treated tresses (we're pleading guilty as charged) with Oribe's rich, restorative Conditioner for Beautiful Color. The luscious, advanced formula intensely moisturises and repairs the most damaged areas of hair first, leaving it silky, protected and vibrant with colour. Honey-derived humectants deliver optimum thermal and chemical dye protection, while a unique blend of high-tech, lightweight silicones protect dyed hair against UV fading and damage. Watermelon extract from the Kalahari Desert protects against oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural keratin, boosted by Oribe's signature lychee and edelweiss flower extracts. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection to protect hair from the harmful effects of the sun, making this the perfect way to cleanse coloured hair.

name: invisibobble HAIRHALO Headband True Dark Sparkle invisibobble HAIRHALO Headband True Dark Sparkle
description: Created for comfort, invisibobble’s Hairhalo is completely customisable to hold your hair without the common ‘ouches’ that accompany a hairband. Boasting patent-pending technology, the spiralled band is easily adjusted to your headshape – just loosen by bending the band ‘til it fits without pinching and holds your hair firmly in place. With its inky black finish and subtle suggestion of sparkle, ‘True Dark Sparkle’ makes a stylish statement – sweeping hair back from your face without leaving a giveaway kink should you choose to remove it. Traceless, painless and durable, this one-size-fits-all band will soon become your hair's best friend.

name: Living Proof Restore Repair Mask 200ml Living Proof Restore Repair Mask 200ml
description: Whether your hair is long, thick, bleached or stressed-out by dyeing or heat-styling, consider Living Proof’s Restore Repair Mask as a stint in ‘hair rehab’ for delicate, over-dry lengths. Deep conditioning to ‘undo’ damage while promoting hair’s defences, this super-charged treatment restores your hair’s moisture and supplements the strands’ protective layer to leave your locks sleek, smooth and supple from the first use. With quick and cumulative benefits, this is great if you’re plagued by split ends and flyaways – it has shown up to a 70% reduction in breakage – and, because it increases resistance to dirt and pollution it helps to keep hair feeling cleaner for longer, hence lengthening time between washes. Powdered by the brand’s patented Healthy Hair Molecule and an innovative, biomimetic emollient blend to strengthen and boost elasticity, the addition of tucuma butter works to rehabilitate your locks to leave them super-soft and glossy.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply generously from roots to ends – leave for five minutes before rinsing. Use 1-2 times per week as needed, instead of your normal conditioner.

name: Amika Normcore Signature Conditioner Amika Normcore Signature Conditioner
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Living up to their promise, this Normcore Signature Conditioner is crafted to work its magic on all hair types, because who wouldn't want hydrated, shiny tresses? Overflowing with vitamins and antioxidants, this replenishing formula weightlessly hydrates to reveal lustrous locks... Shea butter is at the heart of the blend, providing a medley of vitamin, minerals and fatty acids to deeply nourish your hair and promote a soft-to-the-touch finish. Plus, omega 7-rich sea buckthorn promotes elasticity and delivers impressive hydration! It's even laced with amika's signature scent, so you can expect your tresses to smell like their intoxicating blend of warm vanilla, spicy-sweet clover, and fresh citrus. Psst, did we mention it's safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.

name: OUAI Volumizing Hairspray OUAI Volumizing Hairspray
description: “Flat hair, don’t care.” Said nobody… EVER. Prevent your magnificent mane from falling flat on you with OUAI Haircare’s brilliant Volumizing Hairspray. Delivering an amplifying blast of instant glamour, the formula is enriched with volumising polymers that attach to strands, thickening each and every one for a volume boost that will blow you away (not to mention unsuspecting onlookers). Also enriched with panthenol and vitamin E, this nourishes strands to prevent them from drying out, so there’s nothing you need to worry about! Spray on and get set to smoulder. For the ultimate volume, Jen Atkin says, “If you want to get really crazy, flip your head upside down and spray from roots to ends for hair that’s as wide as it is high.”
how_to_use: Separate dry hair into sections. Spray at the root. Scrunch hair for added lift. Jen Atkin’s tip: If you want to get really crazy, flip your head upside down and spray from roots to ends for hair that’s as wide as it is high.

name: WetBrush PRO Volumizing 3" Round Brush - Thick-Course WetBrush PRO Volumizing 3" Round Brush - Thick-Course
description: Especially made with fine to medium hair in mind, the Volumizing Round brush promises to turn up the volume with a clever concaved design that maximises levels of body and bounce from the very root. A revolution in brush technology, this harnesses a powerful VitaBoost complex – coating locks with keratin and biotin – resulting in stronger, sleeker hair. Snag-free, pain-parrying and defending you from damage, the super-soft (goodbye to unwelcome head scratches!), flexible bristles smooth and style – gliding through tresses effortlessly. It’s time to give nightmare hair the boot with less split ends, less breakage, less frizz and way more glossy shine.
how_to_use: To get lift at the root pull the brush upward and away from your head as you rotate it. For max volume blow-dry sections in the opposite direction than hair naturally falls. And to ensure smoothness and shine blow-dry in downward direction (from root to end).

name: Aveda Colour Control Sulfate Free Shampoo Travel Size 50ml Aveda Colour Control Sulfate Free Shampoo Travel Size 50ml
description: Plant-powered hair care just got a colourful upgrade, the Color Control Shampoo from Aveda’s newest line of effective and sulfate-free formulas offers a next-level neutralising power and gives you the power to fight unwanted fading so you can enjoy your colour for even longer. It’s about time your colour got the attention it deserved, so we’d like to introduce your strands to the Color Control Shampoo. This carefully created cleanser is teeming with apricot kernel oil and soybean oil to improve the overall condition and structure of your tresses, keeping it as glossy as if you just left the salon. The first step in your at-home colour care system, this effortlessly cleanses build-up and grime from your strands and your scalp while water-activated dual-charged molecules create a completely weightless shield to keep water out of the hair fibre and keep your colour firmly locked in. Lusting for shinier, healthier looking hair? Lust no more — a botanical acid complex provides all the strength and shine your locks need thanks to a bio-fermented acid (arginine), that fortifies your hair and keeps it strong to further lock in your colour inside out. Finally, a lactic acid derived from sugar beets keeps the cuticle sealed and smoothed for a mirror-like shine. Vegan, cruelty-free and 95% naturally-derived, this has to be a hair care no brainer.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair, rinse well. Follow with Color Control Conditioner.

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Perfect Blow Dry 50ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Perfect Blow Dry 50ml
description: The Smooth Infusion Perfect Blow Dry for Aveda is a heat-activated treatment that aims to keep the lengths looking sleek for up to 72 hours. Suitable for all hair types and textures, the spray utilises a plant polymer shield that helps to protect the strands against humidity. A botanical smoothing oil blend of Kalahari melon seed oil and tamanu oil works to condition the hair, encouraging a soft, shiny finish. The innovative spray contains UV filters, that seek to protect the hair against environmental aggressors and heat styling of up to 450°F. The spray is complete with Aveda’s Pure-fume™ aroma, a serene blend of Australian sandalwood, palmarosa, bergamot and a blend of flower essences. Vegan and cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Shake well. For use on damp hair-requires blow drying to activate. For best results, do not apply with any other pre-styling products. Begin with clean, towel-dried, detangled hair. Working in sections, spray generously from roots to ends. To activate and seal in the formula, blow-dry thoroughly.

name: Aveda Large Wood Paddle Brush Aveda Large Wood Paddle Brush
description: Brush up your hair styling regime with Aveda's Professional Wooden Hair Paddle Brush. Featuring extended bristles for easy detangling, it reduces stress to hair and scalp during blow-drying and styling. Ideal for smoothing hair during blow-drying to create smooth, straight styles, it detangles effortlessly with minimal tugging or pulling and without generating static. The brush has a broad head which can be used for styling large sections of hair at a time – a time-saving delight for busy bees and ‘I’m late for work’ mornings. Covering all bases, it can be used alone or alongside a blow dryer to create anything from sleek ‘n straight ‘dos to bouncy tresses. What’s not to love?
how_to_use: The Aveda paddle brush is designed for detangling and blow-dry styling. Brush vertically to detangle and brush horizontally to smooth. TIPS: Apply any Aveda styling product to shoulder length damp hair and blow-dry using the large flat surface to flatten the hair.

name: We Are Paradoxx Growth Thickening Conditioner 250ml We Are Paradoxx Growth Thickening Conditioner 250ml
description: The secret to Rapunzel’s long and luscious locks? A trusted hair care routine starring The Growth Conditioner, of course. What says thicker tresses better than a vegan keratin-infused formula? Absolutely nothing and here’s why: Ensuring your journey to fuller hair is as easy and breezy as possible, this powerhouse blend infused with biotin, Irish horsetail herb, hyaluronic acid, coconut oil and eucalyptus fortifies each and every strand on your head. Coating each follicle with damage-preventing nourishment, this hair-loving conditioner promotes hair growth and minimises shedding. Overflowing with more than enough hydration to ward off dryness once and for all, expect next-level moisture from root-to-tip.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, wet hair from mid lengths to ends. Works best when used following Growth Thickening Shampoo.

name: Baxter of California Clay Effect Spray 120ml Baxter of California Clay Effect Spray 120ml
description: Established in 1965, Baxter of California is a curated collection of men’s grooming products that melds simplicity with efficacy through their edit of natural ingredient empowered formulas. Making quick work of your styling routine, the Clay Effect Style Spray is a versatile mist that injects textured hold into your hair. Suitable for all hair types, this formula is especially effective on flat, fine and thinning styles as hair looks immediately thicker, while castor and jojoba oil deliver essential vitamins and nutrients as sustenance for thinning hair and green tea extract has strengthening antioxidant properties. Adeptly layering your lengths with lived-in definition, this spray sinks in for a matte, sculpted finish that holds your shape in place. Designed to resist humidity, it protects against frizz and heat damage to maintain the integrity and condition of your hair. Fitting seamlessly into any step of your routine, use before blow-drying, to bolster your staple pomade or alone for effortless body.
how_to_use: Spray on slightly damp or dry hair, build as you go for desired style. Can also be sprayed directly into hands, rubbed together, and applied throughout hair from back to front. Spray 3-8 times depending on hair type (3 times for finer hair, 8 times for thicker hair). Intended for use on its own or paired with desired pomade for more hold. Finish with a comb to control frizz & flyaways, or with hands for an undone look. Reapply throughout day for added control and restyling options.

name: BLEACH LONDON Silver Conditioner 500ml BLEACH LONDON Silver Conditioner 500ml
description: A game-changing daily conditioner, BLEACH London’s Silver Conditioner will give you your brightest blonde yet, whether you’re ashy or caramel. Suitable for everyday use, this violet-toned, high pigment conditioner works to neutralise brassiness, eliminating unwanted yellow and orange tones. Ideal used after BLEACH’s {Silver Shampoo}, it features strengthening wheat proteins and moisturising vitamin B5 to nourish strands as it brightens. Like the entire BLEACH line, this formula is also completely cruelty-free and vegan – what more could we ask for.

name: invisibobble EXTRA SLIM Value Pack (8pc) invisibobble EXTRA SLIM Value Pack (8pc)
description: Whether you’re after extra hold for a mane with a mind of its own, or undetectable slimline styles there’s a set of spirals for every hair type. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. For fine hair that craves high wearing comfort without effort or drama — the superb Extra Slim pack is nearly undetectable with a gentle grip but no less hardworking. Thicker hair from curls to coils — opt for the ultra powerful Extra Hold pack to provide even more grip for your tresses. Ideal for use during workouts, or to secure the most magnificent of lion’s manes that can’t be tamed by smaller sized ties. Last, but certainly not least, the Original pack caters for all with a strong and comfortable fit without leaving a trace. With three colourways in each set the world is your hair… or at least your hair is anyway, so throw up your hair and go about your day without worrying about snagging ties that snap and fray.
how_to_use: Use to secure all kinds of updos.
ingredient: Polyurethane.

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Curl Cleanse Shampoo 296ml Act+Acre Cold Processed Curl Cleanse Shampoo 296ml
description: This Curl Cleanse Shampoo is the hydration boost your curls have been calling out for. Don't be surprised if you start receiving endless compliments after using it. Formulated with Act+Acre's Cold Processed® system, it boasts ultra-nourishing ingredients lincluding 5% glycerin for soft and shiny tresses, while fulvic acid acts as a probiotic for the scalp to remove build-up and restore your curl pattern and texture. A potent mix of carrot and raspberry seed oil infuse moisture from root-to-strand, leaving your hair feeling its healthiest - and bounciest ever.

name: ghd Rise Professional Hot Brush ghd Rise Professional Hot Brush
description: Reign with the volume you've always dreamed of, with flawless body and lift from root to tip, thanks to this winner of the Harper's Bazaar Best of the Best Award 2020. Designed to allow for close root contact and featuring advanced predictive technology, the ghd rise hot brush creates double the volume in comparison to naturally dried hair, with long lasting results. Developed with ghd's advanced ultra-zone technology, – for consistent heat distribution and personalised results – an optimum styling temperature of 185 degrees is maintained evenly across the 32mm barrel for a salon quality finish. Perfect for styling waves, flicks and curls, the hot brush ensures body throughout the entire hair length, with optimised 5mm cool touch bristles that allow you to get closer to the root for extra lift. With a sleek, tapered handle, the ghd rise is balanced for comfortable use and features a safety stand for care-free styling. Enjoy quick and easy results as the it glides effortlessly through hair without pulling, snagging or tangling – no matter your hair length or type.
how_to_use: Glide through dry hair for effortless styling. Packaging may vary.

name: Aesop Conditioner 100ml Aesop Conditioner 100ml
description: The key to coaxing tangles from your tresses, Aesop’s lightweight Conditioner nourishes your hair as it replenishes moisture to reveal silky soft lengths. Both beautiful and practical, Aesop’s ethos is all about marrying old world wisdom with new tech disciplines — harnessing the finest botanical extracts and fusing them with the latest and greatest scientific discoveries — to bring out the best of your hair. This luscious formula is infused with a blend of nourishing oils to deeply hydrate your strands and cloak them with an earthy yet citrusy scent that lingers even after you rinse the conditioner away. It’s also saturated with amino acids to deliver a wave of stand-softening hydration: this way for sleek and silky hair!
how_to_use: After shampooing, squeeze out excess water. Dispense the desired amount of conditioner into your hands. Apply to the mid-lengths and ends of the hair and ensure even distribution. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Aveda Be Curly Conditioner 200ml Aveda Be Curly Conditioner 200ml
description: Part of Aveda's much-loved Be Curly range, this daily Be Curly Conditioner is designed to help enhance your natural curl while boosting shine and reducing frizz for an eye-catching result. Tired of dull, frizzy hair? Aveda's Be Curly Conditioner is here to help. Enriched with wheat protein and organic aloe to help enhance your natural curl or wave texture as well as a refreshing aroma of certified organic lime, lemon, bergamot, orange and other pure plant and flower essences to help lift your spirits each day, this daily conditioner helps to dramatically reduce frizz, define curls and boost your natural shine. We're obsessed!

name: ghd Styler Carry Case & Heat Mat ghd Styler Carry Case & Heat Mat
description: Introduce your ghd styler to its new, ultra-stylish home - whether you're travelling or just want a heat-resistant bag for your styler, this allows you to pack it up as soon as you switch it off. The luxe matte quilted satin exterior belies a heat-resistant lining inside - there's even a detachable heat-resistant mat which cleverly rolls up around the pouch and makes a great (and safe) spot for resting your styler.
how_to_use: This is the not suitable for non-ghd products, or for storing ghd curve® wands & tongs.

name: VIRTUE Full Conditioner Travel Size 2 oz VIRTUE Full Conditioner Travel Size 2 oz
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Full Conditioner, a game-changing way to care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Conditioner also creates enviable volume, deeply moisturising without adding weight and creating lasting lift, body and lustre. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and artichoke leaf, loaded with lipids and protein to help seal and strengthen your hair’s cuticle. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. What's more, after one week of using the shampoo and conditioner in a clinical trial, 87% of users reported that their hair had more body, while 84% found their hair felt thicker!
how_to_use: Work a small amount between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, pair with your favourite Virtue Shampoo.

name: Virtue ColorKick De-Brassing Shampoo 240ml Virtue ColorKick De-Brassing Shampoo 240ml
description: Boasting the power to brighten, revitalise and tone all shades of natural and colour treated hair (yes, even grey and silver), the Colourkick De-Brassing Shampoo does exactly what it says on the tin: banishes that dreaded brassiness to reveal strong, shiny and gently cleansed strands. Plant-derived humectants hydrate and detangle hair, while Virtue’s very special ‘Alpha Keratin 60ku® protein’ repairs colour-caused damage. It achieves this by filling and smoothing any rough patches on the hair shaft, revealing softer, more glossy hair that you’ll be hjust desperate to run your fingers through. name: Christophe Robin Shade Variation Mask - Baby Blonde 250ml Christophe Robin Shade Variation Mask - Baby Blonde 250ml
description: Part nourishing treatment, part colour-booster, the Shade Variation Mask in 'Warm Chestnut' is designed to restore and replenish your blonde mane in between colour treatments (or even if your hair shade is totally au natural!). name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner 40ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner 40ml
description: Conditioning hair doesn’t get more luxe and effective than this supercharged, sulphate- and silicone-free conditioner that tames, protects against humidity and softens hair towards a smooth, sleek appearance. The Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner owes its powers to a plant polymer shield that provides a veil of protection over strands, effectively repelling water that interferes with your ‘do. Once the frizz is under control, a blend of botanical oils comes into play for that smoothing effect you seek, namely Kalahari melon seed oil and tamanu oil smooths and conditions hair cuticles to reveal soft-to-the-touch locks and easy-to-comb strands. Applying luxuriously to moisturise and smooth flyaways, we’re sending a virtual hug to Aveda for making this vegan shampoo suitable for hair types across the fine, medium and thick spectrum, specifically, straight 1A, wavy 2A-2C, curly 3A-3C, coily 4A-4C and even colour-treated hair can cash in on this humidity-blocking hero.
how_to_use: Use after Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Shampoo. Massage into wet hair, rinse well.

name: Pattern Argan Oil Blend Serum 115.3ml Pattern Argan Oil Blend Serum 115.3ml
description: Strengthen your strands from root-to-tip using the Argan Oil Hair Serum and coat your tresses in a weightless veil of powerhouse ingredients to restore shine and moisture with just a few drops. Supercharged an oil-rich medley featuring argan oil (of course), castor oil, sweet almond oil, sunflower oil, apricot oil and shea oil, you bid the dryness a-dew once and for all! Penetrating your delicate shafts with unbeatable nourishment that works to boost elasticity, strength and length, rest assured that your curly cuticles will stay soft, smooth and protected against moisture loss or damage.
how_to_use: A little goes a long way! Apply a few drops to the palm of your hand & work the oil evenly into your hair. Can be used on wet or dry hair for added moisture either on its own or cocktailed together with other PATTERN products. As a scalp treatment, apply a few drops to targeted areas around your head. Massage oil into scalp.
ingredient: Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil.

name: Pattern Heavy Conditioner 88.7ml Pattern Heavy Conditioner 88.7ml
description: Rich, luxurious and with a butter-like texture, PATTERN’s Heavy Conditioner coats strands in moisturising, powerhouse ingredients to help repair dry, brittle strands while also boost styling. The creamy formula offers your mane the signature PATTERN ‘slip’, which in turn allows you to easily detangle with a brush or your fingers, and also helps curls to clump together for a defined finish. You’ve got some seriously nourishing ingredients to thank for that: avocado oil, shea butter and safflower oil. For seriously thirsty hair in need of hydration, we recommend leaving this on as a hardworking 10-minute mask.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair from roots to ends. For extra dense curls or long hair, section with PATTERN Hair Clip while conditioning to ensure every strand gets the love it deserves. Use PATTERN Shower Brush or fingers to help detangle & bring curls together. Rinse thoroughly. Pro tip: For dry or brittle hair, leave conditioner on for 10 minutes as a repair treatment mask to help restore & revitalise your curls.

name: ghd Gold Limited Edition - Hair Straightener in Sun-Kissed Gold ghd Gold Limited Edition - Hair Straightener in Sun-Kissed Gold
description: Offering the Midas touch to your tresses like no other, the Gold in Sun-Kissed Gold with Bronze Metallic Accents heats up faster than you can say, “I’m in love with my ghd’s” (or thereabouts) in only 25 seconds! A goldsend for busy bees who love a five-minutes-to-get-ready challenge, this incredible tool races the clock so you don’t have to. After extensive research, ghd's scientists concluded that 185ºC is the ideal temperature for styling; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. To ensure this optimum temperature is always maintained, the plates have been carefully crafted with dual-zone technology – instead of one, they have two heat sensors across each plate that regulate heat from root to tip. These clever floating plates are also ultra-smooth, gliding effortlessly through your tresses to create a frizz-free style with salon-rivalling shine. Great for straightening, curling or creating beachy waves, the tool has a round barrel to deliver snag-free, versatile styles with ease. For peace of mind, the device automatically switches off after 30 minutes and has a heat-resistant protective plate guard so you can take it out and about without risk of burns. With so much to offer, the golden ticket to your best hair yet is well deserved of a spot in your next Cult Beauty haul…
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W. Packaging may vary.

name: ghd The Blow Dryer Ceramic Radial Hair Brush Size 3 45mm ghd The Blow Dryer Ceramic Radial Hair Brush Size 3 45mm
description: Master glossy mermaid waves and/or the perfect blowout with The Blow Dryer - Size 3. If you have longer locks, you'll wonder how you ever styled your hair without it.  Designed with a ceramic barrel, this radial brush retains the heat of your dryer so you can create bouncy curls, soft waves or an ultra-smooth and straight 'do in minimal time. And if all that wasn't enough, it has a non-slip handle to maintain tension as you move the brush through the hair - a pro tip that creates salon-worthy results. Be sure to check out the other sizes in the range: size 1 boosts root lift on short to mid-length hair; size 2 is ideal for smooth blow-dries on short to mid-length hair; size 4 is best for blow drying long hair and creating volume on mid-length styles.
how_to_use: Blast your hair on a low heat and medium speed setting until 80% dry. Working with medium to large sections, brush from the roots and direct the heat at the barrel. Maintain tension as you move the brush through the hair. Top tip:To create soft waves, dry each section (as above) and then wrap it around the brush. Direct heat from your dryer on to the barrel of the brush and then leave to cool for 30 seconds. Blast with the cool shot on your dryer before gently unwinding the section.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY MAXI WASH Shampoo 40ml KEVIN.MURPHY MAXI WASH Shampoo 40ml
description: Working as a renowned editorial stylist, Kevin Murphy found that, as the day progressed, models’ hair would become heavy, dull and lifeless – so he developed his own line to prevent this from happening, which soon made its way from backstage secret to cult hair care classic. A brilliant detoxifying shampoo, KEVIN.MURPHY’s Maxi.Wash removes unwanted product build-up, soothes irritated scalps, brightens limp, dull hair and prepares it perfectly to absorb the nutrients that follow. Like skin care for your hair, this cleanser features tropical fruit alpha hydroxy acids (derived from papaya) to gently exfoliate the scalp, removing dead cells and breaking down fatty acids to leave your scalp and strands clean and clear, without stripping. Thyme and rosemary extracts provide antioxidant protection to guard against colour fade, grapefruit extract absorbs excess oil and a balancing combination of witch hazel extract and tea tree oil provide a natural antiseptic effect, relieving irritation and detoxifying for a refreshing, soothing effect. Perfect for medium and dyed hair (it won't strip your colour!), make this the first step in your routine and your tresses will thank you. Now available in two sizes (250ml and a travel-friendly 40ml) you need never be without your detoxyifying hero.
how_to_use: Apply to damp hair, massage into scalp thoroughly, rinse and follow with desired wash & rinse regime.

name: VIRTUE Full Shampoo and Conditioner VIRTUE Full Shampoo and Conditioner
description: The perfect combo for fine, flat and limp hair in need of density, body and bounce, VIRTUE’s Full Shampoo and Conditioner comes to the rescue. Fuelled by the brand’s revolutionary Alpha Keratin 60ku® protein, vitamin-rich pink pomelo and hydrolysed quinoa, the nourishing duo strives to improve the health of hair over time. Your mane will appear thicker, fuller and more voluminous. Colour-safe. Paraben-free. Vegan. Set Contents: Full Shampoo 240ml A volumising shampoo that thoroughly cleans the scalp and lengths, removing excess oils, product build-up and impurities while lifting follicles from the root. Enriched with biotin (also known as vitamin B7) to promote keratin production for stronger fibres. Full Conditioner 200ml A rinse-out conditioner packed with nourishing ingredients that moisturise, soften and improve the strength and flexibility of strands. Infused with lipid and protein-rich artichoke leaf to help seal and reinforce the hair’s cuticles.
how_to_use: Shampoo: Massage into damp hair and rinse. Conditioner: Work a quarter-sized amount of conditioner between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: Living Proof PhD Conditioner 236ml Living Proof PhD Conditioner 236ml
description: Formulated to ensure every day is a Perfect Hair Day, this conditioner hydrates and nourishes without weighing down locks. What makes this particular product oh-so-special? It’s clever formulation is designed to give you the perfect balance of five of the most-coveted benefits in hair care: smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength and polish. We’re selling you on it, right? Add in a sulphate-free INCI list (sulphates can lead to serious dryness in your strands over time) and a light, fresh, citrusy fragrance, and you’re on to a winner.
how_to_use: Start with Perfect hair Day Shampoo. Then apply Perfect Hair Day Conditioner, spread through hair and rinse.

name: Amika Jumbo High Tide Deep Waver Amika Jumbo High Tide Deep Waver
description: Lightweight and easy to use, the Jumbo High Tide Deep Waver is amika’s ultra-versatile tool designed to create shiny, loose and bigger waves compared to the 0.7” barrel of the original beachy-wave tool. Whether you’re after big, beachy waves or something sleeker and more defined, this next-gen crimper can help you achieve it. Three’s a charm, which is why a trio of ceramic barrels work together to deliver heat evenly onto strands, creating deep S-bends in locks that can be customised to your desired look. And for a frizz-free finish, the waver uses far-infrared technology to lock in moisture, and negative irons to seal the hair cuticle. Hello, long-lasting, super smooth styles.
how_to_use: Section hair into half up, half down. Position your thumb on the indent at the clip of the Jumbo Deep Waver. Take one to two inch section of hair. Press to open the Deep Waver clamp. Holding the tool horizontally, insert the desired hair section. Release the hold so the clamp is closed with the hair in between the barrel and clamp. Hold the Deep Waver in place for about five seconds. The longer the hair is pressed, the more defined the waves will be. Press to open and continue downward to the next area of the selected hair section. Repeat down the entire section of hair until the whole length is waved. Continue throughout hair. For face framing pieces, hold the Deep Waver at a slightly downward angle (parallel to your cheekbones).
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. 110/240V.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer (1000ml) (Worth £200) Philip Kingsley Elasticizer (1000ml) (Worth £200)
description: An iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley’s Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage – you’ll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid

name: Le Labo The Noir 29 Shampoo 237ml Le Labo The Noir 29 Shampoo 237ml
description: Turn wash day into a sensorial experience with Le Labo Bergamote 22 Shampoo. Combining gentle cleansing ingredients with Le Labo’s sublimely sophisticated olfactory ode to black tea, this rich lather leaves locks perfectly clean and beautifully scented. With extracts of aloe vera and soybean oil, this replenishing shampoo lifts away build-up to leave locks silky soft and shiny. An easy way to layer up your favourite scent, this luxe shampoo infuses hair with the fresh scent of Thé Noir 29 — featuring notes of bergamot, fig and vetiver.

name: Oribe Curl Shaping Mousse 5.7 oz. Oribe Curl Shaping Mousse 5.7 oz.
description: There's nothing more frustrating than finishing up your washday routine only to saturate your curls with a styling product that doesn't do them justice. That's where Oribe's Moisture & Control Curl Shaping Mousse comes in... Uniting skin care-grade technology with traditional craftsmanship, natural actives and a firm belief that healthy hair is essential for glamorous styling, this mousse is nothing short of hair care alchemy – and should be very high up on your curls’ wish list. For curls and coils that look defined, supple and shiny - never stiff - this formula is a must; not only does it seal in moisture and prevent frizz, but it also protects against heat damage and injects some major bounce into your barnet. How, you ask? It's infused with hydrolyzed amaranth protein to nourish your tresses while promoting movement and shine; sweet almond oil protects and adds lustre; hydrolyzed wheat protein renews damaged hair and lends thermal protection; wheat amino acids boosts moisture retention and, as with all of their formulas, it's infused with Oribé’s Signature Complex of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower to defend against oxidative and environmental stress alongside the deterioration of natural keratin.
how_to_use: Shake it up, mousse it into damp hair, diffuse or simply air-dry.

name: Living Proof Curl Moisture Boost Serum 50ml Living Proof Curl Moisture Boost Serum 50ml
description: Sick of sporting dull, lifeless strands? Look no further, for lacklustre lengths have finally met their match: Living Proof’s Curl Moisturizing Shine Oil. Designed to fake unparalleled levels of shine while actually improving the health of your hair, this oil uses a carefully curated blend of five oils and emollients to boost lustre, moisture and smoothness. Formulated without any silicones to avoid weighing down your strands, this lightweight formula is designed to boost all curly textures – from wavy through to coily. Softening and frizz-busting, it absorbs quickly and is super easy to use. Plus, it’s cruelty-free, gluten-free and comes without any parabens, phthalates or sulphates.
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry hair for added shine and moisture. Use alone or layer with other formulas from Living Proof’s Curl range. Dry as usual. Tip: For added softness and definition, use as a pre-shampoo treatment. Apply to dry hair, leaving it on for 5 minutes before cleansing.

name: Aveda Colour Conserve Daily Colour Protect 100ml Aveda Colour Conserve Daily Colour Protect 100ml
description: Say goodbye to colour fading with Aveda's Color Conserve Daily Color Protect. This potent leave-in treatment boasts the brand's color conserve complex which works to triple protect your strands from dull, fading colour loss. Let us introduce you to Aveda's 93% naturally derived, leave-in treatment that triple-protects your hair colour thanks to their powerfully effective, botanically-based color conserve complex. Formulated with larch tree to help seal in colour, antioxidants from green tea to help protect against environmental stressors and a naturally-derived blend from wintergreen and cinnamon oil to help protect colour from UVA/UVB damage. This hard-worker definitely deserves a spot in your Holy Grail hair hero line up.

Triple-protect your hair colour with colour conserve daily colour protect. RECYCLE IT: 100% post-consumer HDPE bottle. Please recycle.

name: We Are Paradoxx Moisture Shampoo 250ml We Are Paradoxx Moisture Shampoo 250ml
description: Count on this Moisture Shampoo to wash away product build-up and dirt, and put moisture back where it belongs — in your hair not out! Gentle enough for daily use, this moisturising shampoo keeps your locks looking luscious and feeling loved. Through salon mishaps, box bleaching or just…life, your hair has likely been through ups and downs. The remedy? Take it back to basics with We are Paradoxx, the clean beauty brand who treat every hair care worry with powerful natural ingredients. The rich blend of argan oil and vitamins B, C and E in their Moisture Shampoo cleanses and smoothes your hair while jojoba delivers the right dosage of moisture that will save any degree of dry, brittle hair. Even virgin hair will lap the suds up and benefit from the high-shine and increased elasticity courtesy of argan.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair, lather well and rinse.

name: Kitsch Microfiber Spa Headband (Various Colours) Kitsch Microfiber Spa Headband (Various Colours)
description: Anything but ordinary, Kitschs the Microfiber Spa Headband keeps annoying flyaways away from your face while cleansing, applying make up or masking, all while keeping your hair in a pretty pony, too! We stan a multitasking hero. Say goodbye to scratchy Velcro on your forehead and say hello to the luxury headband of your dreams. Available in two aesthetically pleasing holiday-esque patterns, the Microfiber Spa Headband keeps your flyaways at bay while popping your entire mane into a hella chic ponytail. Perfect for all hair lengths, this multi-tasking maverick is the perfect addition to your self-care routine giving you the freedom to cleanse, apply make up and mask away with confidence, all while your hairline is caressed by the soft and protective microfibre material that keeps hair at bay, snag and damage-free. Available in two colourways, choose between Palm Leaves and Leopard or buy them both for when your friend inevitably steals one from your stash!

name: Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Strength + Moisture Leave-In Spray Hair Mask Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Strength + Moisture Leave-In Spray Hair Mask
description: The perfect antidote for severely dry, damaged and brittle hair that needs instant TLC, this clinically proven genie in a bottle stars innovative ingredients to repair damage along the hair cuticle and leave locks stronger, smoother and more hydrated. Rather than coating strands with silicones to give a short-term illusion of healthier hair, Don't Despair, Repair! Strength + Moisture Leave-In Mask utilises the power of micro-encapsulated argan oil, which packs tightly within the damaged area to close structural gaps and release a protective layer on the hair shaft. Alongside this, algae extract contains potent vitamins and minerals to nourish and strengthen strands, while biotin bolsters both shaft and follicle to prevent further damage. Deeply reparative, it noticeably reduces breakage after just one use and is, quite simply, too good to wash out.

name: Oribe Conditioner for Beautiful Color 6.8 fl. oz. Oribe Conditioner for Beautiful Color 6.8 fl. oz.
description: Extend the life of your hair dye and soothe over-processed, colour-treated tresses (we're pleading guilty as charged) with Oribe's rich, restorative Conditioner for Beautiful Color. The luscious, advanced formula intensely moisturises and repairs the most damaged areas of hair first, leaving it silky, protected and vibrant with colour. Available in two sizes, pick from the 200ml full size or the 50ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. Honey-derived humectants deliver optimum thermal and chemical dye protection, while a unique blend of high-tech, lightweight silicones protect dyed hair against UV fading and damage. Watermelon extract from the Kalahari Desert protects against oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural keratin, boosted by Oribe's signature lychee and edelweiss flower extracts. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection to protect hair from the harmful effects of the sun, making this the perfect way to cleanse coloured hair - plus, the ruby red bottle is certain to add a touch of luxe to your bathroom shelf.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Wave Cream NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Wave Cream
description: Like the rest of the Perfect Texture range, this wave cream strengthens and fortifies each strand to reduce the chances of breakage. It uses green sea grapes, omega 9 and Alpine rose extract to hydrate and moisturise both hair and scalp. Blue algae strengthens hair and protects your colour against fading (whether from washing or environmental damage), and flexible film formers work to activate and define your natural curl pattern without weighing strands down. Vitamin C-rich lychee encourages a healthy scalp, and each formula even boasts a deliciously refreshing matcha and mint scent - without any sulphates, silicones or animal-derived ingredients in sight.
how_to_use: Starting with a penny-sized amount, work the cream evenly through wet or lightly towel-dried hair, starting at the root through to the ends. Gently scrunch and shape curls as desired. Dry with a diffuser or allow to air dry for best results. Made for curl types: 2a, 2b, 2c.

name: Davines Energising Gel 150ml Davines Energising Gel 150ml
description: Treating currently stressed-out hair and preventing weak strands in the future, this powerful leave-in treatment rescues fine, thinning hair. name: Amika Jumbo High Tide Deep Waver Amika Jumbo High Tide Deep Waver
description: Lightweight and easy to use, the Jumbo High Tide Deep Waver is amika’s ultra-versatile tool designed to create shiny, loose and bigger waves compared to the 0.7” barrel of the original beachy-wave tool. Whether you’re after big, beachy waves or something sleeker and more defined, this next-gen crimper can help you achieve it. Three’s a charm, which is why a trio of ceramic barrels work together to deliver heat evenly onto strands, creating deep S-bends in locks that can be customised to your desired look. And for a frizz-free finish, the waver uses far-infrared technology to lock in moisture, and negative irons to seal the hair cuticle. Hello, long-lasting, super smooth styles.
how_to_use: Section hair into half up, half down. Position your thumb on the indent at the clip of the Jumbo Deep Waver. Take one to two inch section of hair. Press to open the Deep Waver clamp. Holding the tool horizontally, insert the desired hair section. Release the hold so the clamp is closed with the hair in between the barrel and clamp. Hold the Deep Waver in place for about five seconds. The longer the hair is pressed, the more defined the waves will be. Press to open and continue downward to the next area of the selected hair section. Repeat down the entire section of hair until the whole length is waved. Continue throughout hair. For face framing pieces, hold the Deep Waver at a slightly downward angle (parallel to your cheekbones).
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. 110/240V.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Therapies Bluebell Woods 150ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Therapies Bluebell Woods 150ml
description: An iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley's Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. The limited edition Elasticizer Therapies Bluebell Woods scent boasts the same deeply conditioning effects with limited edition packaging and a mind-calming effect, perfect for elevating your hair care routine to new heights. Originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny and all before you've used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage you'll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing. Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage. Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed. Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer. Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed. Suitable for use on coloured hair. Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only

name: dpHUE Color Fresh Oil Therapy 3 fl. oz. dpHUE Color Fresh Oil Therapy 3 fl. oz.
description: Can’t make your salon appointment? Not to worry, with dpHUE’s Colour Fresh Oil Therapy you can restore your shine and sheen in no time at all from the comfort of your bathroom to star in your own hair commercial! Don’t be fooled by its delicate little bottle, this h’oily grail fusion of argan oil, liquid shea butter, vitamins A and E is not to be underestimated. name: Bouclème Toning Drops 30ml Bouclème Toning Drops 30ml
description: For colour-treated curls, Bouclème’s Toning Drops bid ‘bye-bye’ to brassiness, making it perfect for those who’ve been hitting the bleach bottle… Enriched with deep indigo hues that are perfect for neutralising unwanted orange-yellow shades, these drops can be added to shampoo and conditioner, or used with styling products and deep-conditioning treatments to ‘dampen’ the glare and restore your blonde locks to their pale golden glory. For a deeper acting treatment, add 3-4 drops into your product and leave in for 5 minutes before washing out. This is a guideline, experiment with your dosage until you achieve your desired tone.
