name: BLEACH LONDON Burnt Peach Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Burnt Peach Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring Scrunchie - Purrfection invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring Scrunchie - Purrfection
description: What happens when a hair care classic meets a modern icon? Sprunchie, thats what! Wrapping the iconic invisibobble Original in luxurious velvet fabric, this is the coolest Scrunchie weve ever come across, providing all the benefits of the brands innovative spiral shape. Offering strong hold without compromising on comfort, the Sprunchie is very easy to remove, minimising tangles and damage (were talking split ends an breakage, people!) The soft, shiny velvet exterior means this looks great on your wrist as well as in your hair theres fierce leopard print Purrfection and midnight True Black.
how_to_use: Use to tie up hair or wear on your wrist

name: Pattern Argan Oil Blend Serum 115.3ml Pattern Argan Oil Blend Serum 115.3ml
description: Strengthen your strands from root-to-tip using the Argan Oil Hair Serum and coat your tresses in a weightless veil of powerhouse ingredients to restore shine and moisture with just a few drops. Supercharged an oil-rich medley featuring argan oil (of course), castor oil, sweet almond oil, sunflower oil, apricot oil and shea oil, you bid the dryness a-dew once and for all! Penetrating your delicate shafts with unbeatable nourishment that works to boost elasticity, strength and length, rest assured that your curly cuticles will stay soft, smooth and protected against moisture loss or damage.
how_to_use: A little goes a long way! Apply a few drops to the palm of your hand & work the oil evenly into your hair. Can be used on wet or dry hair for added moisture either on its own or cocktailed together with other PATTERN products. As a scalp treatment, apply a few drops to targeted areas around your head. Massage oil into scalp.
ingredient: Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil.

name: dpHUE Blonding Brush 0.65 fl. oz dpHUE Blonding Brush 0.65 fl. oz
description: Ideal for pre-lightened or natural light blonde hair, dpHUE’s Blonding Brush is formulated with a heat-activated lightening complex that helps to lighten your tips, blend at your roots and create sun-kissed highlights. The soft-bristle brush with precision applicator helps you to brighten fine sections and strands for a natural effect. The formula’s brightening prowess comes from a cocktail of lemon juice and hydrogen peroxide that gently and gradually lightens hair when activated by the sun or a blow dryer. These ingredients are balanced by conditioning agents that help to maintain the health of your hair while purple pigments work to counteract warm tones in the lightening process.
how_to_use: Apply on damp or dry hair. Remove bottom safety cap. Hold applicator upright and click bottom to bring product to brush. Hold strands between forefinger and thumb and pull away from face. Using brush tip, paint onto targeted areas. Repeat process as desired, using one click between applications. Product will activate when heated by sun or hair dryer. Do not use on intensively bleached hair (lightened 4-8 shades) or platinum or white shades of blonde hair. Not intended for use on medium blonde, dark blonde, natural brown or darker shades of hair.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Juice, Hydrogen Peroxide, Propanediol, Glycerin, Bis-C16-20 Isoalkoxy TMHDI/PEG-90 Copolymer, Guar Hydrox ypropyltrimonium Chloride, Phenox yethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acid Violet 43 (Ext. Violet 2).

name: We Are Paradoxx Volume Blowdry Spray 100ml We Are Paradoxx Volume Blowdry Spray 100ml
description: Finally, a hair primer that works with your heat tools, not against it. The Volume Blow Dry Spray serves up sky-high volume and enhances shine so a blow dry doesn’t suck your hair dry, which is pretty ideal, we reckon. Those who love their heat tools (it’s hard to stay away, we know) will know the struggle in finding a product that supports their styling aspirations. Too often do sprays and creams get icky and weigh your hair down, forcing a wash day ahead of schedule but We are Paradoxx’s blow dry spray is not like the rest. Infusing white nettle to boost volume and add shine, your hair will feel lifted and light in no time! How much volume you want is up to you but you know what they say: go big or go home! And this lightweight, plastic-free primer can help you get there.
how_to_use: Spray liberally directly onto towel dried hair and blow dry.
ingredient: Aqua (Water)*, Polysorbate 20, VP/VA Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Polyquaternium-55, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Glycerin*, Pelargonium Roseum (Geranium) Leaf Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Sorbitol*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil**, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch*, Mentha Arvensis (Peppermint) Leaf Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil**, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil**, Caprylyl Glycol*, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract**, Lamium Album (White Nettle) Extract**, Panax Ginseng Root Extract**, Plantago Psyllium (Honey Locust) Seed Extract**, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool*, Limonene*, Citronellol*, Geraniol*, Citral*. *Natural Origin **Organic

name: ghd Platinum+ Black Straighteners ghd Platinum+ Black Straighteners
description: Whether you’re after bouncy curls, beachy waves or sleek ‘n straight locks, ghd’s Platinum+ Styler won’t let you down – far from it! A revolutionary take on traditional heat styling tools, this winner of the 'Glamour Beauty Power List 2020 Best Hair Straightening Tool' can recognise your hair thickness and styling speed to deliver homogenous heat across the entire plate – that’s spot on 185ºC FYI – meaning consistent results and minimal damage. The precision milled, floating plates have a high spec glossy finish for snag-free use and shiny tresses, helped along by a rounded barrel and easily controlled wishbone hinge to ensure effortless styling. Once you’ve created your hair masterpiece and are setting off for a good day’s work (if brunch counts as work…), you can be rest assured knowing that the Platinum+ Styler will automatically enter sleep-mode after 30 minutes of non-use. Travelling? No problem! These wonder workers (which come in two different shades, BTW) have universal voltage, meaning they can be used wherever you want them, and a heat resistant protective plate guard to ensure you can take it on your travels without risk of burns. Trust us, after trying them there’s no going back…
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY snac-pack: mini wash day essentials BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY snac-pack: mini wash day essentials
description: Want a slice of the incredible range before you commit to the whole loaf? BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY's snac-pack: mini wash day essentials is your go-to! Streamlining and shrinking your wash day routine into a mini set that's complete with a collectable purse (we want it!) and scrunchie, this two-step set is perfect for 3a to 4c curl types. Inspired by sensitive skin cleansers for your face, the ultra-gentle hair-wash: gentle milky hair cleanser (100ml) is a lightly foaming hair and scalp cleanser that delivers an effective clean without drying or tangling your curls - all thanks to its infusion of deeply nourishing argan oil and aloe vera juice. For curls that feel cushiony soft, look no further than the hair-mask (100ml)! This moisturising emulsion is powered by superfruit extracts, including Australian Kakadu plum and starflower oil, to leave your hair soft, hydrated and buttery smooth without feeling weighed down. As for the bread-puff (a.k.a. scrunchie), the extra stretchy accessory is made from 100% vegan-friendly satin and looks just as cute on your wrist as it does in your hair. Wash day has never been so easy!
how_to_use: Please see individual product pages for further details.
ingredient: hair-wash: Aqua (Water), Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Quaternium-80, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Limonene, Linalool. hair-mask: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglycerol Esters of Fatty Acids, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Isoamyl Laurate, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Lactic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Tocopheryl Acetate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil bread-puff: 100% vegan friendly satin

name: Davines Calming Superactive Davines Calming Superactive
description: This easy-to-apply serum is the instant antidote to a sensitive, itchy scalp – without any harsh, stripping ingredients that might cause further inflammation in the long run. An ultra-effective but gentle scalp soother by Italian hair legends Davines, the Calming Superactive brings the power of skin care to your hair care line up. Powered by phytoceuticals (that’s plant-derived active ingredients) extracted from blueberries, this tonic is rich in natural antioxidants that will calm and nourish even the most sensitised of scalps. Providing immediate comfort, a few squirts into damp hair will have you breathing a much-deserved sigh of relief.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to damp hair and leave in.
ingredient: Disiloxane, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Dimethicone,Zea Mays Oil / Oxidized Corn Oil, Parfum / Fragrance, Zanthoxylumbungeanum Fruit Extract, Oleyl Alcohol.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Repair Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Repair Shampoo
description: This strengthening shampoo is all you need to bring damaged, colour-treated lengths back from the brink. Infused with nourishing oils and plant extracts, NatureLab TOKYOs Perfect Repair Shampoo reinforces and replenishes for gorgeously soft, healthier hair. The fortifying formula goes right to the root of the problem, treating the scalp with a blend of smart keratin (to bolster the defences of the deepest layers of the cortex) and bamboo extracts (to strengthen existing strands and encourage healthy hair growth by extending the anagen phase of your hair life cycle). Working effortlessly to make your mane more manageable, argan oil conditions each strand to enhance shine and ease frustrating frizz. Prickly pear oil is the final flourish; antioxidant-rich and lightweight, it cloaks your hair in a UV-protective veil to fend off free-radical damage. Smelling as good as it does, this formulas profile is inspired by Japanese bamboo forests with notes of green tea and cypress making for gorgeously fresh-scented lengths. Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.
how_to_use: Massage into damp hair and rinse.

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner 40ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner 40ml
description: Conditioning hair doesn’t get more luxe and effective than this supercharged, sulphate- and silicone-free conditioner that tames, protects against humidity and softens hair towards a smooth, sleek appearance. The Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner owes its powers to a plant polymer shield that provides a veil of protection over strands, effectively repelling water that interferes with your ‘do. Once the frizz is under control, a blend of botanical oils comes into play for that smoothing effect you seek, namely Kalahari melon seed oil and tamanu oil smooths and conditions hair cuticles to reveal soft-to-the-touch locks and easy-to-comb strands. Applying luxuriously to moisturise and smooth flyaways, we’re sending a virtual hug to Aveda for making this vegan shampoo suitable for hair types across the fine, medium and thick spectrum, specifically, straight 1A, wavy 2A-2C, curly 3A-3C, coily 4A-4C and even colour-treated hair can cash in on this humidity-blocking hero.
how_to_use: Use after Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Shampoo. Massage into wet hair, rinse well.
ingredient: Water\Aqua\Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Propanediol, Dioctyldodecyl Dodecanedioate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/ Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Sodium Gluconate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Heptyl Undecylenate, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Farnesol, Linalool, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate .

name: Oribe Shampoo for Beautiful Colour Refill 1000ml Oribe Shampoo for Beautiful Colour Refill 1000ml
description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Beautiful Colour Shampoo with this refill. Gently cleanse and protect your colour-treated tresses with this shampoo which fortifies over-processed and chemically treated hair while preserving your hard-earned hair colour. Responsible for giving fruits their vibrant hues, bioflavonoids protect colour from fading and discolouring, while baobab tree extract — an African plant known for its hydration storage — offers its natural benefits to parched hair, providing superior moisture to the driest areas first. Meanwhile, watermelon extract from the Kalahari Desert protects against oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural keratin, boosted by Oribe’s signature lychee and edelweiss flower extracts. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection to protect hair from the harmful effects of the sun. It’s the perfect way to cleanse coloured hair.
how_to_use: Use to refill your luxe bottle. Lather, indulge, rinse.

name: Oribe Signature Conditioner Refill 1000ml Oribe Signature Conditioner Refill 1000ml
description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Signature Conditioner with this refill. A restorative daily moisturiser, this offers intense detangling hydration without weight, repairing and protecting strands for a lustrous, healthy result. Macadamia nut seed oil, from the Australian rainforest, smoothes hair and delivers antioxidant properties, while whole wheat-derived proteins, keratin and hydrolysed keratin strengthen damaged hair and protect the surface of the hair shaft. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection, while Oribe's signature complex (including watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress, ageing and the deterioration of natural keratin. Intensely moisturising yet weightless, this is the perfect daily conditioner.
how_to_use: Use to refill your luxe bottle. Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Masque Light Moisture 150ml Aveda Nutriplenish Masque Light Moisture 150ml
description: Looking for replenished, nourished and soft-to-the-touch hair, without the burden of over-heavy products that leave your hair limp and lifeless? The Nutriplenish™ Masque Light Moisture may just be the answer. Designed to be used in damp hair after shampooing, this gel cream formula is supercharged with superfoods (and you can expect super results, too). There’s pomegranate seed oil, which is brimming with omega 5 to hydrate and revitalise even the most dry, brittle strands; mango butter, which adds head-turning shine and leaves your hair feeling softer than silk; and finally coconut oil, which drenches your mane with moisture — and most importantly locks it in there, for results that will last and last (and last, ad infinitum)...
how_to_use: After shampooing, smooth through damp hair. Leave on for 2–5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly

name: Living Proof PhD Conditioner 236ml Living Proof PhD Conditioner 236ml
description: Formulated to ensure every day is a Perfect Hair Day, this conditioner hydrates and nourishes without weighing down locks. What makes this particular product oh-so-special? It’s clever formulation is designed to give you the perfect balance of five of the most-coveted benefits in hair care: smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength and polish. We’re selling you on it, right? Add in a sulphate-free INCI list (sulphates can lead to serious dryness in your strands over time) and a light, fresh, citrusy fragrance, and you’re on to a winner.
how_to_use: Start with Perfect hair Day Shampoo. Then apply Perfect Hair Day Conditioner, spread through hair and rinse.

name: ghd The Blow Dryer Ceramic Radial Hair Brush Size 3 45mm ghd The Blow Dryer Ceramic Radial Hair Brush Size 3 45mm
description: Master glossy mermaid waves and/or the perfect blowout with The Blow Dryer - Size 3. If you have longer locks, you'll wonder how you ever styled your hair without it.  Designed with a ceramic barrel, this radial brush retains the heat of your dryer so you can create bouncy curls, soft waves or an ultra-smooth and straight 'do in minimal time. And if all that wasn't enough, it has a non-slip handle to maintain tension as you move the brush through the hair - a pro tip that creates salon-worthy results. Be sure to check out the other sizes in the range: size 1 boosts root lift on short to mid-length hair; size 2 is ideal for smooth blow-dries on short to mid-length hair; size 4 is best for blow drying long hair and creating volume on mid-length styles.
how_to_use: Blast your hair on a low heat and medium speed setting until 80% dry. Working with medium to large sections, brush from the roots and direct the heat at the barrel. Maintain tension as you move the brush through the hair. Top tip:To create soft waves, dry each section (as above) and then wrap it around the brush. Direct heat from your dryer on to the barrel of the brush and then leave to cool for 30 seconds. Blast with the cool shot on your dryer before gently unwinding the section.

name: EVY Technology UV/Heat Hair Mousse EVY Technology UV/Heat Hair Mousse
description: Protecting the quality (and colour!) of your hair from UV rays and heat, the UV/Heat Hair Mousse reduces the chance of hair damage by defending strands against up to 210 degrees Celsius. Also working as a priming and styling mousse, this UV and heat protectant uses UV filters to prevent dehydration and sun bleaching, all while protecting against blue light. Rich in oils and vitamins B3, B5, B6, E and C, this innovative formula will restore lost lustre to your lengths – nourishing and hydrating without feeling heavy or greasy. Also working to add resilience and shine, you can count on this leave-in formula to soften and straighten frazzled locks while strengthening each strand and preventing split ends from forming.
how_to_use: Before sun exposure, apply all over wet or dry hair. Use as a leave in conditioner, as protection for styling with heating tools or as a volumizing product. Spread the mousse evenly over the hair after shampooing with a comb or brush. Blow dry and style as usual. Do not rinse. Shake well before use, turn the bottle upside down so that no extra gas escapes. Push gently to get the desired amount of mousse. It’s better to use smaller amounts and apply more often. Rub the mousse between your hands so that it becomes more liquid-like and massage it thoroughly on your hair. Though long-lasting, this formula is not waterproof, so re-apply after bathing/swimming to maintain UV protection. When finished, simply break off the plastic top for plastic recycling and place the aluminium bottle in the metal recycling bin.

name: Olaplex Nourished Hair Essentials - No.4, No.5 & No.9 Olaplex Nourished Hair Essentials - No.4, No.5 & No.9
description: Brimming with OLAPLEX’s superstar bond repairing ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, the Nourished Hair Essentials unites the beloved N.o 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo and No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner along with the all new No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum. That’s your hair wash routine, sorted… As your first step, discover the No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair. Finally, add a layer of defence (while rebuilding bonds in the process) with the No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum (that’s the newest addition to the OLAPLEX clan!). Packed with antioxidants to neutralise free radicals, this leave-in serum acts as a shield against pollution, guarding your hair from breakage and protecting against heat styling. Alongside this, the lightweight formula will envelop locks in softness and shine, making it easier to detangle and style too.
how_to_use: No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo: Apply to damp hair, work through hair from root to tip creating a lather. Rinse. No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner: Apply to damp hair and work through hair from root to tip and then wash off. No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum: Apply a small amount to damp, towel-dried hair working upward from ends to roots. Use more as needed for longer, thicker hair. Air-dry for a soft texture. Blow-dry for a smooth finish. Diffuse for waves or curls. Apply sparingly to dry hair for frizz and static control and added shine.

name: Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Lipid Shield Oil 30ml Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Lipid Shield Oil 30ml
description: Restore damaged hair and work your way to overall healthier hair with the Bond Builder Lipid Oil post-shower hair treatment that detangles, strengths and adds instant shine, thanks to a whole host of science-backed and innovative ingredients. To restore the loss of lipids in your epicuticle that can lead to knots, frizz and damage, this potent formula actually adds the primary lipid in this layer back in the form of 18-MEA (18-Methyl Eicosanoic Acid) to replenish lost moisture levels and shield cuticles from damage. Designed to be used after your wash day routine, this fast-absorbing oil is perfect for colour-treated, heat-damaged hair and well, any texture and type in need of strengthening and floods of moisture. Promising instant shine, this heavy-hitter reverses signs of damage to reveal soft, shiny and detangled strands.
how_to_use: When to Use: After washing your hair. Recommended Amount: Shake well before use. Gently tilt the bottle and tap the base to dispense 5-6 drops into the palm of your hand. Short, fine, or unprocessed hair may require fewer drops. Long, coarse, or heavily processed hair may require more. Application: Apply to mid-lengths and ends of towel-dried hair. Start with a smaller amount and add more as needed. Use every 2-3 washes. Very dry or damaged hair can use more frequently. Routine: If ends feel particularly dry, 1-2 drops can be smoothed through hair after styling. Can also be applied to dry hair and left overnight, then shampooed out in the morning. 1ml = approx. 20 drops. With 6 drops per use, the 30ml fill would allow up to 90 uses.

name: Pai Skincare System D Schisandra and Ceramide Cooling Eye Serum 15ml Pai Skincare System D Schisandra and Ceramide Cooling Eye Serum 15ml
description: Like a power nap for peepers that don’t actually get enough shut-eye, the System D, Schisandra & Ceramide Cooling Eye Serum supercharges the delicate eye contour with strengthening ceramides and must-have antioxidants. Fondly nicknamed ‘System D’ after the word ‘débrouillard’ (meaning resourceful under pressure) this soothing concoction provides instant relief via a cooling, gel-like formula and ceramic applicator. Think of it as a blissful pause – we’re envisioning you, on the sofa, cucumbers on your closed eyes – even if you don’t actually have the time for one. Working to prevent moisture loss for supple, springy contours, a complex of ceramides (the very glue that sticks your skin cells together) tightens pores and refines tone while fortifying your skin barrier to help ward against moisture loss and environmental stress. Comforting, firming and smoothing, this 99.9% natural formula also utilises Schisandra CO2 extract – an anti-inflammatory, antioxidant-rich ingredient that comes from teeny magnolia berries and soothes even the most stressed-out of sensitive skins.
how_to_use: Apply directly to the skin around the eyes using the cooling ceramic applicator. Tap the skin with ring finger to ensure product is fully absorbed. Suitable for use in the morning and/or evening or any time discomfort occurs.

name: R+Co SUBMARINE Water Activated Enzyme Exfoliating Shampoo 3 oz. R+Co SUBMARINE Water Activated Enzyme Exfoliating Shampoo 3 oz.
description: Prepare for deep detox… Three, two, one, SUBMERGE! R + Co’s SUBMARINE Water Activated Enzyme Exfoliating Shampoo is here to refresh your scalp and nourish your strands. Powered by naturally derived enzymes and fruit AHAs, this beadless shampoo-slash-exfoliator is perfect for scalp upkeep. Infused with the brand’s DARK WAVES fragrance (a warm, romantic scent with notes of cardamom, pineapple, tangerine, lavender, bamboo and blonde woods), this nourishing wash will leave your strands scented to perfection. Using natural ingredients (and no parabens, sulphates, mineral oil or petrolatum) this exquisite formula is 100% vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free and colour-safe. It’s powered by AHA Alternative Technology to remove dead skin and build-up without using irritating granules; bilberry extract (a source of tannins) lends the blend its anti-inﬂammatory qualities to help calm the scalp; fermented radish root nourishes and softens hair while improving scalp circulation; finally, tomato extract helps to stimulate scalp, improve shine and dissolve odour-causing excess sebum.
how_to_use: Use once a week in place of shampoo. Squeeze product into palm to activate with water, then massage into scalp adding water as needed. Work through hair and rinse, follow with conditioner.

name: Pattern Heavy Conditioner 384.5 ml Pattern Heavy Conditioner 384.5 ml
description: Better than butta, the Heavy Conditioner takes all the hassle and hard work out of detangling so you don’t have to. If you were looking for a way to unlock slippery-smooth strands then you’ve found it! Starring curl-saving hair-oes like shea butter, avocado oil, safflower oil and jojoba esters, this creamy dream restores long-lost moisture to parched tresses after just one use. Oozing with sweet floral notes of neroli, rose and patchouli, this deliciously rich blend delivers a surge of hydration that works to soften and support your curls as you effortlessly detangle. Designed to banish that dry and brittle crunch (you know what we’re talking about) and take your mane from here to here with such an invigorating boost, well, who wouldn’t want that?

Pro tip: For dry or brittle hair, leave conditioner on for 10 minutes as a repair treatment mask to help restore & revitalise your curls.

description: It’s time to discipline curls that succumb to frizz with this controlling leave-in treatment. Taking the reins and delivering results, the Love/Curl Controller delivers curls, waves and coils that are soft to the touch and fuss-free. Introducing the new and even more effective extract of noto almond, a Slow Food Presidia to ensure native fruits and foods are cared for, this gives curly and coiled hair an intense dose of moisture that counteracts persistent dryness. Protecting your curls from style-ruining humidity, this brings control without the crunch. It’s time to bring in a new era of soft, elastic and light curls that stay and don’t stray, Davines has your every need covered with this volumising and defining styling treatment.

description: The second step in Christophe Robin’s anti-pollution routine, this Purifying Shampoo with Thermal Mud rebalances your scalp and softens hair for the ultimate clean feel. Expect your roots to feel freshened and your hair soft, manageable and healthy-looking.

description: Prep and prime wavy or curly hair with this multitasking curl primer, designed to optimise your styling experience and ensure everyday is a good hair day (something we know you sometimes have to work hard at if you’ve got curly locks with a life of their own!). Noto almond extract. This new active helps to counteract the dryness so frequently associated with curly hair and allowing your luscious locks to sing.

name: VIRTUE Curl Shampoo 240ml VIRTUE Curl Shampoo 240ml
description: Looking to show your curls the care they deserve? Enter, Virtue’s Curl Shampoo, a game-changing way to cleanse and repair locks that have fallen victim to damage... A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Curl Shampoo is a decadently rich, non-drying blend that effectively lifts excess oils and product build-up, all while helping to maintain your natural curl pattern. It's infused with carob gum to lock in moisture, as well as a vegetable-derived polymer to enhance curl formation and definition. Rice protein and sunflower seed oil are responsible for protecting against the drying effects of UV rays, while water-soluble jojoba oil delivers a wave of shine-boosting hydration. What's not in the formula is just as impressive - it's made without parabens, silicones, sulphates and synthetic colourants, to name a few!
how_to_use: Wet hair thoroughly, work a quarter-size amount of shampoo into palms, and emulsify with water, working into a latherbefore applying. Massage shampoo into hair and scalp to form a rich lather. Rinse and repeat if necessary. For best results, follow with Virtue® Curl Conditioner.

name: VIRTUE Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair 200ml VIRTUE Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair 200ml
description: Designed to strengthen, hydrate and detangle thinning hair, Virtue’s Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair is a lightweight formula that glides through hair with a silky rinse out. Powered by ground-breaking keratin proteins, the Flourish range works to cleanse, purify and enrich your scalp, creating the foundation for new growth. As each new strand emerges, it’s supplied with the nourishment needed to stay strong and resist breakage. As well as the brand’s world-worshipped Alpha Keratin 60ku complex that binds directly to areas of damage and fills them, this formula is also enriched with a probiotic ferment (a microbiome booster) that’s known to nourish the scalp, decrease irritation and support cellular oxygen consumption. Finally, an infusion of biomimetic signal peptides works to nourish and calm your scalp, helping to create a healthy environment for hair growth. When the shampoo and conditioner are used alongside the Flourish Density Booster, the regimen has seen impressive results. After six months of use, 90% of women in an independent third party test said their hair feels healthier; 90% said they have more volume and 83% said they saw less fall-out. We like those numbers!

Davines Love/ Smoothing Perfector 150ml Davines Love/ Smoothing Perfector 150ml
description: Designed to combat frizz and improve manageability, this leave-in styling cream delivers not only on taming flyaways but promises to make your post-wash styling routine easy, breezy, beautiful. Infused with minuta olive extract, this hero ingredient is rich in fatty acids and vitamins, making it a nourishing cocktail of anti-frizz action. Lightweight in texture and easy to use with a handy pump, this smoothing styling cream can be left to soak into hair without feeling weighed down or greasy. Not only that, but it also acts as a heat protectant — covering your delicate follicles from heat up to 230°C! Expect your hair to look glossy, feel soft and stay protected. Also, that minuta olive extract we mentioned? It also helps with elasticity, so you can keep your hair in good health even after it’s endured combing and heat styling. Exceptional hair benefits aside, how could we ignore that lush pastel purple colour?! In true Davines fashion, amazing hair care is even better when it’s absolute eye candy.

It’s also brilliant for accelerating drying time (which in turn, minimises tress distress) – making this a must-have for all those who’re a slave to their dryer or straightening irons.

Prepare for your strands to be so healthy with hydration it can’t help but shine.

This daily-use shampoo is enriched with aloe vera (a source of over 75 active molecules, including 20 minerals, 18 aminos acids and 12 vitamins) which lends the blend its impressive hydrating properties. description: Weighing down your strands with environmental toxins, city living can be a nuisance to your hair. Enter the City Life Shampoo: a deeply refreshing formula to quell the effects of hard water and pollution. If your style never seems to sit just right or your hair feels greasier than ever, this detoxifying shampoo is a must-have step in your routine. Beyond your usual manetainance, it helps to remove product build-up and counteract the effect of pollution. Its saturated with ultra-nourishing vitamin E and gentle zinc PCA to control your scalps oil production, while antibacterial centella asiatica extract work to lift hard water residue and heavy mineral salts from your strands. Now available in a nifty little refill, you'll never find yourself in tress distress again.

description: Easing your detangling efforts and ushering the age of combing your wet hair in the shower into the past, the Liquid Hairbrush Conditioner smooths and seals your strands for an ultra-glossy and manageable mane. Perfect for chemical-treated or damaged hair (of any texture!), this is the key to super sleek tresses, and is designed to be used in conjunction with Larry King Hair Care Wash Cycle shampoos.

description: Dissatisfied with the formulas on offer, the minds behind amika set out to create a dry shampoo that ticked all of their boxes - the Perk Up Dry Shampoo - and now, they've launched the Perk Up Plus Extended Clean Dry Shampoo for the more infrequent hair washers amongst us. Invisible when used correctly, this super-fine mist is the key to a freshly washed look without any white residue, period. The Perk Up Dry Shampoo we all know, love and have fallen hair over heels for has a new partner in the form of Perk Up Plus. Supercharged with inflammation-reducing peptides and oil-absorbing and anti-bacterial arrowroot powder, this new creation is clinically proven to remove oil from the hair and scalp. Rambutan seed extract protects your strands from the ravages of pollution as well as keeping malodour at bay, and with a dose of mandelic acid tackling odour-causing bacteria, your strands will stay smelling fresh for days. Psst, did we mention it's safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair?

description: Sleek, smooth hair is on the horizon with the Smooth Infusion Perfect Blow Dry — a vegan, plant-derived frizz fighter that activates with heat to leave your mane humidity-proofed with an enviable shine. Suitable for colour-treated and chemically processed hair of all textures from Straight 1A’s to Curly 3C’s, the Smooth Infusion Perfect Blow Dry instantly cloaks your strands with a Plant Polymer Shield that repels frizz-inducing water to keep your tresses smoother and sleeker for longer. Daily exposure to the sun’s UV rays can be damaging to your mane, but thankfully Aveda are here to protect your perfect blowout from drying out with clever UV filters as well as heat styling up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Kalahari Melon Seed Oil and Tamanu oil condition your cuticles and keep frizz-prone strands endlessly smooth. If that wasn’t enough of a temptation for you… Aveda’s entrancing ‘Pure-Fume Aroma’, made up of palmarosa, bergamot and Australian Sandalwood, will keep your strands smelling good and looking good.

name: BLEACH LONDON Slime Light Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Slime Light Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY Young.Again.Rinse 40ml KEVIN.MURPHY Young.Again.Rinse 40ml
description: Let your locks relive their vibrant, lustrous youth with KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Rinse, a rich, restorative conditioner that grants softening, moisturising and age-defying benefits. Like skin care for your hair, Kevin Murphy’s professional-standard range utilises the finest ingredients to deliver strength and health to your strands, ensuring that they look their very best – even if you’re growing up a little quicker than you’d like (aren’t we all!) Enriched with a complex of amino acids, bamboo and lotus extracts to strengthen, as well as baobab seed oil and mango seed butter to smooth frizziness and impart much-needed moisture, this lusciously natural formula is ideal for restoring youthful lustre to dry, brittle or damaged hair. Brimming with antioxidants, the gentle conditioner also guards against colour fade and keeps tresses defended from the often harmful effects of the elements. Your locks will be left sleek, chic and soft – without being weighed down. Use after KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Wash for the best results.

name: Kitsch Multi-Way Satin Sleep Scarf - Blush Kitsch Multi-Way Satin Sleep Scarf - Blush
description: A great accessory for covering your scalp, keeping your hair off your face and preventing a bedhead, Kitsch have created a chic Multiway Sleep Scarf to protect your hair from friction while you sleep, so you can wake up to frizz-free locks. In an ultra-cute 'Blush' shade, this indispensable accessory is made from chic satin charmeuse for maximum slip that respects even ultra-fine strands and keeps breakage at bay. Designed to lock in your hair's moisture, help to secure your edges and lay your hair down flat, this nighttime necessity will keep your bedhead at bay. Just keep this within easy reach to secure wayward strays or protect your hair while you're catching some Zzzs.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Intense Hydration Crème Masque Travel Size 30ml Aveda Nutriplenish Intense Hydration Crème Masque Travel Size 30ml
description: Deeply hydrate and replenish your hair with Aveda’s Nutriplenish Intense Hydrate Crème Masque Travel Size. Suitable for medium to thick hair types, the superfood-infused hair mask saturates hair with nutrient-rich moisture, encouraging soft and healthy-looking results. The rich formula is powered by the nutriplenish™ superfood complex. A nourishing cocktail of pomegranate seed oil, mango butter and coconut oil lends instant hydration to promote softer, more manageable hair. For finer hair types, try Light Moisture Masque. Vegan and cruelty-free.

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Hair Oil 2.2 fl oz Act+Acre Cold Processed Hair Oil 2.2 fl oz
description: Deeply replenishing yet incredibly lightweight, the Cold Processed Hair Oil from Act+Acre ensures your strands are perfectly protected and hydrated. Dull, dry and brittle hair is soon to be a thing of the past... Created to tame and nourish your tresses, this science-backed formula gives your hair the helping hand it needs to regulate moisture levels. Hydrated hair means healthy hair... and with just a few drops of this replenishing formula, you’ll be on your way to exactly that. A much-needed dose of fatty acids replenishes lipids within your strands, in turn creating a protective shield that fends off damage (no split ends here, thank you!). Used on wet or dry hair, this argan and meadowfoam seed oil blend hydrates and locks in moisture for hair that you can’t resist giving a satisfying swish. Not content with playing it safe, Act+Acre have enriched this multi-tasking marvel with plant-based squalene to offer superior heat protection against UV and heat styling.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to mid-ends of hair. Pre-styling: Evenly distribute on damp hair to help detangle and protect hair against thermal damage. As a finishing touch: Evenly distribute on dry hair to tame frizz and reduce flyaways. As an add-on to the Restorative Hair Mask: Add pipette to the mask, massage a thick even layer on wet, cleansed hair. Leave on for up to 20 minutes, then rinse. As an overnight treatment: Distribute one pipette onto the mid to ends of the hair. Braid hair to lock in treatment and wash in the morning. Helen's Hair Tips: Fine Hair: 1 drop Medium Hair: 2-3 drops Coarse Hair: 4-5 drops.
ingredient: Limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, Squalane, Argania spinosa kernel (argan) oil, Crambe abyssinica seed oil phytosterol esters, Fragrance.

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner 200ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Conditioner 200ml
description: Incoming bliss… Restoring your once-sleek tresses, the Smooth Infusion™ Anti-Frizz Conditioner resurfaces broken and damaged shafts with stronger bonds that can fight off any unwanted, frizzy curl with just one wash. Harnessing the power of plant-derived nutrients from organic scalp-soothing aloe, maize and guar bean, this moisture-filled blend helps prevent pesky flyaways and softens your strands with a luxurious non-drying lather. Deliciously creamy and brimming with hydrating heroes that banish dryness away, this exclusive concoction of hair-loving essentials is sure to be a staple in your wash day routine.
how_to_use: Massage into scalp and hair after shampooing with Smooth Infusion™ shampoo. Rinse. For best results style with Smooth Infusion™ Style-Prep Smoother.

name: ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong (26mm) ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong (26mm)
description: Sleek red carpet-worthy locks, loose waves, bouncy curls - this versatile tong is the must-have tool to mastering a bevy of different styles, whether your hair is long, short, thick or thin. With a 26mm barrel and spring-activated lever, it creates consistent medium-sized curls from root to tip. As with all of ghd's covetable range, the tong adheres to the brand's research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC - cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. This is regulated and maintained through clever ultra-zone technology, which recognises each section of hair and adapts the heat accordingly. Other clever features include a cool tip to safely hold your hair in place as you style, a ceramic coating to allow for smoother curling and a professional length swivel cable to grant flexibility and easy reach. It takes safety very seriously indeed too: there's a safety stand to secure it on a hard surface when you're not styling, and - perfect for the forgetful among us - an automatic sleep mode that turns the device off after 30 minutes. Beautiful curls and healthy hair? Two words: No brainer.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For long-lasting, classic curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For soft, luxe waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The tong has a UK three-pin plug. Packaging may vary.

name: Grow Gorgeous Repair Daily Rehab Cream 150ml Grow Gorgeous Repair Daily Rehab Cream 150ml
description: Smoothing, soothing and adding some serious shine to your strands, Grow Gorgeous’ repair cream delivers instant moisture leaving your hair feeling instantly stronger. Powered by Bonding Plex technology, the treatment improves the feel and appearance of weaken locks while creating a protective barrier to help control any unwanted frizz. But that’ not all, blended with wheat extract, avocado and cherry oil, the formula targets damage hair to enhance stronger and supplier tresses while conditioning your locks to ensure a nourished and glossy finish. Now, that’s what we call a good hair day!
how_to_use: Apply daily, work through mid-lengths and ends of freshy washed hair or in-between washes. Style as usual. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly. Stop use if redness or itching occurs.

And the benefits don't stop there - alongside its non-slip handle, this masterful tool also works to distribute your hair's natural conditioning oils to create beautiful shiny locks.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Intense Moisture Mask 200ml Living Proof No Frizz Intense Moisture Mask 200ml

Lightweight and easy to apply, the silicone-free hair treatment nourishes the hair’s natural protective layer to enhance maximum protection against frizz, leaving locks silky and lustrous. Infused with a host of softening ingredients, Lactic Acid seeks to smooth strands into submission, promoting a sleek and manageable finish. This effective, anti-frizz hair mask can be used to moisturise even the coarsest mane, charging strands with ultra-hydrating properties to help ease frizz and flyaways while enhancing a cleaner, fresher feel. In just a few minutes, this Living Proof hair treatment supports a fluid, compliant and healthy-looking result. Paraben-, silicone- and cruelty-free. Colour-safe.

description: In need of moisture but find the average conditioner too heavy on your strands? Then the Lightweight Conditioner is just the thing. name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub With Sea Salt Limited Edition La Normandie Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub With Sea Salt Limited Edition La Normandie
description: Perfect for sensitive or oily scalps, this purifying formula sloughs away daily build up as it cleans your locks – revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp, and beautifully soft lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won't irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin), this detoxifying scrub uses sea salt crystals, which won't clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants. There's a 'Natural Carbohydrate Complex' which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you'll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil. And our favourite part? Christophe Robin has dressed it in new signature packaging to transport you to the idyllic beaches of Normandy – which is an image we can definitely get on board with.
how_to_use: Once a week, or post-colour, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly and follow with the brand's Purifying Conditioning Gelée with Sea Minerals to detangle.

name: Innersense Clarity Hairbath 295ml Innersense Clarity Hairbath 295ml
description: Allow us to introduce you to Innersense’s latest innovative formulation. The Clarity Hairbath is the perfect creation to care for the tresses of those prone to sensitivities and allergies alike. Available in a travel-friendly 59ml and full sized 295ml so you can keep your strands perfectly cleansed no matter if you’re at home or on-the-go. As gentle as it is soothing, this hypoallergenic shampoo is the best start to your wash day if you’re looking to attain a balanced scalp and lustrous strands. Japanese swertia and comfrey leaf keep stressed skin calmed; after all a healthy scalp goes strand in strand with healthy hair. Teeming with amino acids, extract of chufa milk helps to moisturise and boost elasticity of your mane while imparting its antioxidant-rich benefits to scalps in need of a little TLC. Cleansing and calming, this is a moment of clarity for your hair care rituals...
how_to_use: Take a deep breath and become centred. Apply a small amount of Hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. With fingertips, massage into scalp. Rinse thoroughly.

name: invisibobble Power Hair Tie (3 Pack) - Crystal Clear invisibobble Power Hair Tie (3 Pack) - Crystal Clear
description: Named invisibobble because it leaves no trace in the hair, this next-generation hair tie has already converted hosts of hair care aficionados – and with good reason! Crafted from hygienic polyurethane in a market-leading spiral shape, the invisibobble Powerful offers extra-strong hold without leaving a trace of damage in your hair – so you can say goodbye to kinks, snagging and painful tightness. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. This extra-powerful edition provides even stronger hold, making it perfect to use during workouts, or to secure the most magnificent of lion’s manes that can’t be tamed by smaller sized ties. Kind to hair, the invisibobble Power also looks great worn on your wrist, available in three cute variations: transparent ‘Crystal Clear’, midnight ‘True Black’ and rich ‘Pretzel Brown’.
how_to_use: Use to secure all kinds of updos. Great for longer, thicker hair or for use during workouts.
ingredient: Polyurethane

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky Itchy Scalp Mask 2 x 20mls Philip Kingsley Flaky Itchy Scalp Mask 2 x 20mls
description: Part of the iconic Flaky/Itchy range and created to soothe and relieve flaky, itchy scalps, this Flaky Itchy Scalp Mask is formulated with anti-fungal piroctone olamine, exfoliating salicylic acid and antioxidant-rich green tea extract to calm whilst tackling the root cause of dandruff and dry, flaking scalps at bay. Suitable for all hair types, this unites two 20ml tubes (one tube is adequate for one full scalp application) which can be used once a week to keep on top of irritated scalps calm and at their best. Use in conjunction with the Flaky/Itchy range to optimise maintenance.
how_to_use: Dampen the entire scalp and hair. Apply the formula from the tube nozzle directly to the scalp in partings approx. 1” (3cm) apart, working from the front of head to the back. Using your finger gently spread the formula down the parted hair line on to the scalp and leave to absorb for 10-20 minutes. Whilst your scalp mask is working, apply Elasticizer to mid-lengths and ends for an extra hair treat. Rinse and follow with a double shampoo, using Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Shampoo. First shampoo and gently massage for one minute to lift and remove loose flakes. Rinse and shampoo again. Condition hair using the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner for your hair type. Finish with Flaky/Itchy Scalp Toner. Use mask once a week. One tube is adequate for one full scalp application.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Coco-Caprylate, Glycerin, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalene, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Salicylic Acid, Lactic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Disodium EDTA, Sorbitan Isostearate, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Camellia Sinensis (Tea) Leaf Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Sodium Metabisulfite, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Piroctone Olamine, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Living Proof Curl Definer Travel Size 100ml Living Proof Curl Definer Travel Size 100ml
description: Best suited to curly hair types - we're talking types 3A, 3B and 3C - Living Proof's Curl Definer is a midweight conditioner-meets-styling essential that not only accentuates the definition of your hair but also lends control and bounce. Defining and conditioning curls from root to tip, this formula is powered by a medley of hair-loving ingredients, including Living Proof's Healthy Curl Complex - an innovative concoction that was perfected over 230 formulas, 650 curl tests, and 10,000(!) development hours; methiopeptide to foster stronger, more elastic curls; as well as a conditioning base and curl controlling resin blend that counters frizz and promotes healthy-looking hair that still has its own glorious natural movement.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair root to tip. Evenly distribute throughout your hair. Scrunch to form curl groupings. Dry as usual. TOP TIPS: start with a small amount and add more as needed. If you have coarse, curly hair, you may prefer the rich conditioning benefits of the Curl Elongator.

name: Living Proof Full Conditioner 236ml Living Proof Full Conditioner 236ml
description: An ultra-lightweight hair hydrator, Living Proof’s Full Conditioner promotes detangling, softens strands and enhances shine without smothering fine, flat or flyaway hair types. Powered by a blend of conditioning agents, alongside the brand's patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), this must-have body-builder helps fortify delicate hair types, whilst minimising breakage, repelling dirt and oil (which means less washing), and promoting natural-looking fullness without any stiffness or restrictive weight. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies – and without parabens, sulphates or silicones – Living Proof abandoned the usual shampoo ‘recipe’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: After shampooing (we recommend Full Shampoo), apply Full Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Note: This conditioner is safe to use on coloured hair.

name: Aveda Invati Advanced Intensive Hair and Scalp Masque 150ml Aveda Invati Advanced Intensive Hair and Scalp Masque 150ml
description: Part of the Ivanti range, Aveda's Invati Advanced Intensive Hair & Scalp Masque is an ultra-intensive hair and scalp masque that deeply nourishes the scalp so thinning hair looks thicker, stronger and more hydrated. A must-have for those wanting to nourish and revitalise their scalps, Aveda's Invati Advanced Intensive Hair & Scalp Masque deeply nourishes the scalp while helping thinning hair to look thicker, feel stronger and hydrated. Formulated with plant-based styling polymers, continued use of this hair hero will help to plump each individual hair strand - for thicker, fuller looking hair from roots to ends. But it doesn't stop there, you can also trust this heavenly formula to help strengthen and reinforce fragile, thinning hair - helping keep the hair you have longer. It's ideal for medium to thick, normal to dry hair and scalp types experiencing hair loss and thinning.
how_to_use: Apply directly to scalp and work through hair from roots to ends. Leave in 2–5 minutes. Rinse well. Use with the invati advanced™ system.

name: Slip Silk Large Scrunchies (Various Colours) Slip Silk Large Scrunchies (Various Colours)
description: Byrdie called them 2018s best hair accessory and now theyve arrived in our Hall of Fame! Minimising damage while looking totally chic, these scrunchies are far more than a nod to the 90s Specially selected elasticated bands are covered with Slips exclusive Slipsilk covering, crafted from the highest grade(6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme. Whether youre creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that theres no damage or breakage. Available in large and Slip Skinny sizes, the blush pink, chic caramel and midnight black shades will suit every look and mood.

Slip uses the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme and enforces the strictest quality guidelines, including non-toxic dyes.

name: Naturally Drenched Rebalance Treatment 400ml Naturally Drenched Rebalance Treatment 400ml
description: Been a while since you’ve given your hair some much-needed TLC? Well, it’s time to reignite those tender, loving curls with this Rebalance Restorative pH Treatment! Housed in a brightly coloured bottle that’s brimming with almond oil, bamboo extract, calendula and papaya, this is the ultimate cure-all treatment! Forget the Mac, it’s the return of the bounce as this cocktail of hair-loving essentials strengthens your hair follicles one by one and coats them in moisture to prevent dryness or breakage. Got a frizzy curl? Tame that mane with just one pump (or 5 if you’re likely to get pump-happy) and smooth its nourishment from root to tip. Perfect for all curl types and textures, you can elevate your entire hair care routine with this one product you never knew you needed… until now!
how_to_use: After shampooing hair, apply Rebalance from roots to ends, detangle with Rebalance in, and let sit for 3-5 minutes, then rinse, and apply conditioner.

name: Drybar Seashore Spritzer Salt-Free Wave Spray Drybar Seashore Spritzer Salt-Free Wave Spray
description: How does that tongue twister go again? Sarah sells seashells on the seashore but if she sells Seashore Spritzer Salt-Free Wave Spray, would we love her more? Refresh your beach waves with siren-like flawlessness using the sought-after spritz on everyone's wish list. Packed with zingy pineapple extract and sea kelp, this vitamin-rich blend delivers a surge of hydrating comfort to parched hair to promote a healthier-looking finish. Scalp-loving sugar also works as a natural wave-enhancer that restores body and texture without drying it out or leaving a less than appreciated gritty residue. Sealing you look with a semi-matte finish, this must-have spray keeps your waves in place so you don't have to worry about them crashing... and falling flat.
how_to_use: For use on dry or damp hair. Spray from roots to ends and "scrunch" hair. Air dry or use a blow-dryer or diffuser for more constructed waves.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY bread-puff BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY bread-puff
description: Proving itself as a hair-tying essential for curls and coils of all shapes and sizes, this bread-puff - that's BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY speak for a scrunchie - is an extra stretchy accessory that looks just as cute on your wrist as it does in your hair. Whether you're wearing your hair au naturel or rocking box braids or cornrows, this impressively stretchy accessory provides impressive hold and easily secures a style in place, be it a bun or a pony! Made from 100% vegan-friendly satin - only the very best for your hair - this puffy band promises to not leaves dents in your curls or tug on your delicate hair. Cue round of applause! It just so happens to look adorable too...

ingredient: bread-puff: 100% vegan-friendly Satin

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner 40ml Aveda Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner 40ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. Available in a full size 200ml and travel-friendly 40ml, this conditioner is a must-add to your wash day rituals. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Cloak your strands and your scalp in this ultra-nourishing conditioner that works to boost scalp hydration by up to 92%! Enriched with moringa and sunflower seed oils, this thirst-quenching wash day essential has been carefully formulated to be kind to your scalp and reveal beautifully healthy hair. A salon-worthy shine is incoming in three, two, one...
how_to_use: After shampooing with scalp solutions balancing shampoo massage into hair and scalp. Rinse well. Use daily or as often as needed.

name: Aesop Rose Hair and Scalp Moisturising Masque 500ml Aesop Rose Hair and Scalp Moisturising Masque 500ml
description: A treat for your strands and your senses, Aesop’s Rose Hair & Scalp Moisturising Masque imparts a flood of hydration to dull hair and irritated scalps. Taking on the task of keeping your hair and scalp in check is this intensive treatment mask, designed to leave your strands soft and shiny and your scalp flake-free. Brimming with carefully selected rose petals, beta-carotene and lavender stem, this nourishing mask cocoons your senses with a warming floral and woody aroma that will make even the most stressful day melt away while treating dry, brittle hair. Whether you take half an hour to indulge in some much-needed self care time while this mask gets to work, or leave it in overnight for an intensive treatment, glossy strands and a healthy, balanced scalp are coming your way.
how_to_use: Dispense onto palms and apply to freshly cleaned, towel-dried hair. Use a wide-toothed comb to ensure even distribution, concentrating on mid-lengths and ends. Tend to relaxing tasks for at least twenty minutes, then rinse hair thoroughly.

name: R+Co TEACUP Peacholine Kombucha Detox Rinse 6 fl. oz. R+Co TEACUP Peacholine Kombucha Detox Rinse 6 fl. oz.
description: Our hair goes through a lot. Think about it; from mineral-rich shower water and products that build-up to everyday pollution (our hair always feels worse for wear after the morning commute), your strands can be left feeling dehydrated and depleted. That's where R+Co's TEACUP Peacholine + Kombucha Detox Rinse comes in! Fragranced with 'Dark Waves' (a warm and romantic scent blended with cardamom, pineapple, tangerine, lavender, bamboo and blonde woods), this detoxifying rinse removes harsh metals and pollutants, helps to prevent colour fade, and moisturises thirsty tresses. It's infused with peach leaf extract to defend against free radicals and lift impurities as it prevents breakage and tangles; fermented kombucha draws out calcium, iron and other mineral deposits as well as boosting the shine and strength of your strands; vitamin-rich sunflower extract fortifies your hair and calms your scalp, revealing a healthy sheen; finally, neem leaf extract balances hydration levels and seals your hair cuticles for a gloriously sleek finish.

name: BLEACH LONDON Twisted Lemon Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Twisted Lemon Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

The formula is powered by an extremely powerful plant-sourced ingredient, prickly pear oil, that leaves depleted hair feeling supremely supple. A helping of biomimetic ceramides then helps to control the look of frizz and smooth split ends, leaving your lengths looking as sleek and soft as ever.

name: ghd Gold Hair Straightener ghd Gold Hair Straightener
description: As good as gold, this ghd gold® styler is a must-have for sleek, smooth and shiny hair – no matter if you like it straight, curly or wavy. Heating up faster than you can say 'I'm in love with my ghd's' (or thereabouts), this incredible tool takes only 25 seconds to be ready for use, making them a godsend for busy bees, rushed mornings and 'I should have arrived at the party half an hour ago' occasions. After extensive research, ghd's scientists concluded that 185ºC is the ideal temperature for styling; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. To ensure this optimum temperature is always maintained, the plates have been carefully crafted with dual-zone technology – instead of one, they have two heat sensors across each plate that regulate heat from root to tip. These clever floating plates are also ultra-smooth, gliding effortlessly through your tresses to create a frizz-free style with salon-rivalling shine. Great for straightening, curling or creating beachy waves, the tool has a round barrel to deliver snag-free, versatile styles with ease. For peace of mind, the device automatically switches off after 30 minutes and has a heat-resistant protective plate guard so you can take it out and about without risk of burns. With so much to offer, the golden ticket to your best hair yet is well deserved of a spot in your next Cult Beauty haul...
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W. Packaging may vary.

name: Innersense True Enlightenment Scalp Scrub Innersense True Enlightenment Scalp Scrub
description: Whether your scalp is a flake fiasco or simply in need of a deep clean, Innersense’s True Enlightment Scalp Scrub is here to gently exfoliate, impart comforting hydration and soothe irritation. A pre-cleanse exfoliation treatment to scrub up your scalp care regime, this organic formula is designed to care for your tresses (hair health is rooted in the scalp!) and encourage your next products to perform even more effectively — think: wash day necessity. It’s formulated with Hawaiian red salt, which is rich in volcanic clay and minerals, to gently exfoliate and invigorate scalp health; sunflower seed oil and tea tree oil helps to soothe sensitive skin, while celery seed extract eases irritation and apple fruit boosts hydration levels.
how_to_use: Scoop a quarter size amount into fingertips. Massage into wet scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with Innersense Organic Beauty hair bath and conditioner.

name: Frank Body Caffeinated Scalp Scrub 125ml Frank Body Caffeinated Scalp Scrub 125ml
description: Made with natural ingredients such as coffee, rosemary, eucalyptus and peppermint, frank body's Caffeinated Scalp Scrub helps to remove product build up and detoxify your scalp to promote healthier, shinier hair that stays cleaner for longer, too. Got all the best products for the healthiest hair possible but not considered the place where hair health all starts from? Well, frank body's Caffeinated Scalp Scrub is here to put your scalp first and we promise it'll show in the health of your hair. Formulated with antioxidant- and fatty acid-rich green coffee, this gently sloughs away dead and dulling cells as well as product build up as well as improving the scalps overall health. Meanwhile, eucalyptus reduces inflammation and peppermint refreshes and detoxifies scalps for your best hair yet.

name: ghd Mini Styler ghd Mini Styler
description: A hair styling hero for short hair and fringes, the ghd mini styler has all you loved about the original styler but with narrower ½ inch plates - it's worth noting that 'mini' only applies to the plates and the body length of the device remains the same. These slimline floating plates allow easier access to shorter strands, meaning they won't make your fringe 'stick out', and in combination with the slender rounded barrel they're also excellent for creating tight bouncy curls. In tandem with ghd's research-backed optimum styling temperature of 185ºC (cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage), the tool features advanced ceramic heat technology to ensure this temperature is evenly distributed across the plates - oh, and they heat up in just 30 seconds! Putting an end to those heart-wrenching 'did I leave my straighteners on' moments, these safety-conscious stylers automatically switch off after 30 minutes (phew!) - plus they have a heat-resistant protective plate guard so you can take these out and about without risk of burns. What's not to love?

Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W. Packaging may vary.

Without stepping foot in the salon, expect pesky brassy shades to be neutralised and all the subtle tones of your locks to shine with this salon-quality treatment from the hair experts themselves.

name: BLEACH LONDON Washed Up Mermaid Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Washed Up Mermaid Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.
