name: We Are Paradoxx Heat Protector Spray 100ml We Are Paradoxx Heat Protector Spray 100ml
description: Condition your hair while you style, and protect against heat damage up to 210°C too! With We Are Paradoxx’s latest launch, your hair care dreams really can come true. The first line of defence against hair damage, this shielding spray not only protects your strands from thermal damage, but also works to strengthen and restore your hair. An infusion of provitamin B5 smooths and repairs the outermost layer of your strands, leaving a protective coating in its wake to ensure your tools leave no trace of damage behind. Even better? You’ll soon reveal a smoother, shinier and less frizzy mane, as a hearty dose of apple cider vinegar takes centre stage to detangle and care for your hair. Boasting sustainable, naturally derived ingredients and packaging, this eco-friendly formula is suitable for all hair types and textures to protect your mane no matter what style your heart desires.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Spray from roots to ends throughout towel-dried hair prior to blow-drying, or on dry hair before using heated styling tools. Comb through hair to ensure even distribution.
ingredient: Aqua*, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate*, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate*, Glycerin*, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride*, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Panthenol*, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Fruit Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil*, Acetum*, Linalool*, Limonene*, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil*, Citronellol*, Geraniol*, Cocos Nucifera Oil*(**), Caesalpinia Spinosa Fruit Extract*, Phenoxyethanol, Helianthus Annuus Sprout Extract*, Citral*, Urtica Dioica Leaf Extract*(**), Malva Sylvestris Flower Extract*(**).

name: Philip Kingsley Pure Blonde/Silver Brightening Daily Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley Pure Blonde/Silver Brightening Daily Conditioner 200ml
description: Struggling with brassy blonde or dull grey hair? Developed by legendary Hair Doctor, Philip Kingsley, this Pure Silver Conditioner will change everything Violet in colour, it brightens blonde and grey hair after just one use, making even the most lacklustre locks significantly more vibrant and shiny. The fabulous formula features optical brighteners and violet hues, reducing the appearance of any discolouration and well as imparting light-reflecting shine and all the while conditioning your scalp and strands to soften and enhance manageability. Great for use in between salon visits, it makes your colour last longer (as well as working on natural hair) without depositing purple tones or staining the hair like some other violet treatments, making it suitable for everyday use.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends Rinse well Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Stearyl Alcohol, Polydimethylsiloxane, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Silicone Quaternium-18, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trideceth-6, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Trideceth-12, Disodium Distyrylbiphenyl Disulfonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Methylparaben, Quaternium-15, Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Linalool, Linalyl Acetate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, 4-Terpineol, Geraniol, Limonene, CI 60730 (Violet Ext. 2)

name: ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong (26mm) ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong (26mm)
description: Sleek red carpet-worthy locks, loose waves, bouncy curls - this versatile tong is the must-have tool to mastering a bevy of different styles, whether your hair is long, short, thick or thin. With a 26mm barrel and spring-activated lever, it creates consistent medium-sized curls from root to tip. As with all of ghd's covetable range, the tong adheres to the brand's research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC - cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. This is regulated and maintained through clever ultra-zone technology, which recognises each section of hair and adapts the heat accordingly. Other clever features include a cool tip to safely hold your hair in place as you style, a ceramic coating to allow for smoother curling and a professional length swivel cable to grant flexibility and easy reach. It takes safety very seriously indeed too: there's a safety stand to secure it on a hard surface when you're not styling, and - perfect for the forgetful among us - an automatic sleep mode that turns the device off after 30 minutes. Beautiful curls and healthy hair? Two words: No brainer.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For long-lasting, classic curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For soft, luxe waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The tong has a UK three-pin plug. Packaging may vary.

name: Sachajuan Ocean Mist Volume Shampoo Travel Size 100ml Sachajuan Ocean Mist Volume Shampoo Travel Size 100ml
description: Following in the footsteps of bestselling Ocean Mist, Sachajuan’s brilliant blue Ocean Mist Volume Shampoo has been painstakingly formulated to recover lost ‘oomph’ and transform the fortunes of limp, lifeless locks. Starring the brand’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology – a cocktail of marine algae extracts which works to enhance strand-strength, suppleness and shine – this mimics the bed-head effect of the spritz, to create texture and body without adding weight. Perfect for all hair lengths and textures, but especially those with fine, ‘slippery’ hair that needs ‘tszuj’, this eliminates dulling build-up and oil whilst granting enviable, just-back-from-the-beach bounce. Follow with Ocean Mist Volume Conditioner and Ocean Mist for maximum root-boosting benefit.
how_to_use: Massage a small amount into wet hair, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with the Oceam Mist Volume Conditioner for maximum volume and texture.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Sodium Laureth Su Lfate, Peg-4 Rapeseedamide, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Rhodophycea Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Trisodium Sulfosuccinate, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Peg-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Linalool, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Ci 42090, Sodium Sulfate

name: We Are Paradoxx Volume Shampoo 250ml We Are Paradoxx Volume Shampoo 250ml
description: Give hair a caring cleanse with the We Are Paradoxx Volume Shampoo. Enriched with hops and nettle extract, the high-performance formula instantly uplifts the hair from root to tip to encourage a fuller-looking appearance. Armed with hydrating and conditioning properties, the shampoo gently refreshes while it works to rid the hair and scalp of daily impurities and excess oils. The rich formula is infused with a blend of babassu oil, matcha green tea and carrageen moss extract to help hydrate and nourish each strand. Suitable for all hair types, the shampoo leaves hair feeling silky-soft with a high-shine finish. Vegan / Leaping Bunny Certified

name: Drybar Baby Buttercup Travel Blow-Dryer Drybar Baby Buttercup Travel Blow-Dryer
description: Adding a cheerful touch to your travelling styling session, the bright yellow beauty that is the Baby Buttercup Travel Blow-Dryer was created to bring you salon-worthy results even when you're overseas.

name: BLEACH LONDON Twisted Lemon Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Twisted Lemon Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Davines Alchemic Conditioner Golden Blond Davines Alchemic Conditioner Golden Blond
description: A colour-based conditioning cream designed to intensify and protect your natural or chosen hair colour. This luxurious conditioner contains hydrolysed milk proteins that deeply moisturise and protect hair. It is formulated with strong colour pigments to enhance and maintain your colour for a vibrant, long lasting effect. This conditioner leaves your hair feeling salon treated after just one use & works best when used after Alchemic Shampoo. Available in 'Silver Fox' for light/ash blondes and grey hair to bring down any brassiness, 'Golden Blond' to bring warmth and depth to honeyed blonds, 'Chocolate' to add a warm richness to Brunettes and 'Red' to add fire to auburn to redheads.

name: Philip Kingsley Nourish and Shine Jet Set (Worth £41.50) Philip Kingsley Nourish and Shine Jet Set (Worth £41.50)
description: Uniting three deluxe editions of fan-favourite formulas (3 x 75ml), Philip Kingsley's Nourish & Volume Jet Set is a clever investment for anyone with damaged, lacklustre lengths that fall on the flat side. Forming a complete wash day routine, these body-boosting steps will have you on your way to voluminous tresses... A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, the Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down.Giving your hair maximum volume while gently cleansing, the Body Building Shampoo is enriched with natural cellulose to achieve a plumping effect, while keratin proteins to help strengthen hair and improve its overall volume. Ideal for dry, fine or processed locks, the Moisture Balancing Conditioner instantly and painlessly detangles hair and imparts anti-static conditioning agents to provide control and manageability.
how_to_use: Body Building Shampoo: apply to wet hair. Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp. Rinse and repeat if necessary. Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner. Moisture Balance Conditioner: after shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends. Rinse well. Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner. Elasticizer: apply before shampooing. Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage. Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed. Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer. Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed. Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Elasticizer: Aqua/Water/Eau, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid. Body Building Shampoo: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, VP/VA Copolymer, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Silicone Quaternium-18, Trideceth-6, Trideceth-12, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone. Moisture Balancing Conditioner: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-12, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Parfum (Fragrance), Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY Young.Again.Rinse 40ml KEVIN.MURPHY Young.Again.Rinse 40ml
description: Let your locks relive their vibrant, lustrous youth with KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Rinse, a rich, restorative conditioner that grants softening, moisturising and age-defying benefits. Like skin care for your hair, Kevin Murphy’s professional-standard range utilises the finest ingredients to deliver strength and health to your strands, ensuring that they look their very best – even if you’re growing up a little quicker than you’d like (aren’t we all!) Enriched with a complex of amino acids, bamboo and lotus extracts to strengthen, as well as baobab seed oil and mango seed butter to smooth frizziness and impart much-needed moisture, this lusciously natural formula is ideal for restoring youthful lustre to dry, brittle or damaged hair. Brimming with antioxidants, the gentle conditioner also guards against colour fade and keeps tresses defended from the often harmful effects of the elements. Your locks will be left sleek, chic and soft – without being weighed down. Use after KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Wash for the best results.
how_to_use: Apply to freshly washed hair, leave for 1- 2 minutes then rinse. For optimal results, use following Young.Again.Wash

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub With Sea Salt Limited Edition La Normandie Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub With Sea Salt Limited Edition La Normandie
description: Perfect for sensitive or oily scalps, this purifying formula sloughs away daily build up as it cleans your locks – revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp, and beautifully soft lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won't irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin), this detoxifying scrub uses sea salt crystals, which won't clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants. There's a 'Natural Carbohydrate Complex' which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you'll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil. And our favourite part? Christophe Robin has dressed it in new signature packaging to transport you to the idyllic beaches of Normandy – which is an image we can definitely get on board with.
how_to_use: Once a week, or post-colour, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly and follow with the brand's Purifying Conditioning Gelée with Sea Minerals to detangle.

description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. Available in a full size 200ml and travel-friendly 40ml, this conditioner is a must-add to your wash day rituals. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Cloak your strands and your scalp in this ultra-nourishing conditioner that works to boost scalp hydration by up to 92%! Enriched with moringa and sunflower seed oils, this thirst-quenching wash day essential has been carefully formulated to be kind to your scalp and reveal beautifully healthy hair. A salon-worthy shine is incoming in three, two, one...
how_to_use: After shampooing with scalp solutions balancing shampoo massage into hair and scalp. Rinse well. Use daily or as often as needed.

name: dpHUE Cool Brunette Conditioner 6.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Cool Brunette Conditioner 6.5 fl. oz.
description: Brassiness, be gone! Just a couple of minutes with the Cool Brunette Conditioner will help you to neutralise yellow tones within your strands, revealing your most beautiful brunette locks (even when you’re not fresh from the salon!) This weightless formula (no greasy, heavy feeling hair around here, thank you very much) uses specially formulated deep blue pigments to tone your mane — without harsh ingredients that might actually strip or dull your colour in the long run. And because the dpHUE team knows the toll colour (not to mention heat and environmental damage!) can take on your hair, this formula is brimming with hydrating ingredients like silk proteins and hibiscus flower extract to add softness and shine, all while making detangling a breeze!
how_to_use: 1. Massage through just shampooed, damp hair. 2. Leave on for 2-3 minutes. 3. Rinse thoroughly. Use weekly or as often as needed.

name: dpHUE Color Fresh Shampoo 8.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Color Fresh Shampoo 8.5 fl. oz.
description: Making its debut on shelfies everywhere from Pinterest boards to your favourite hair-fluencer’s holy grails, spruce up your wash day routine with this Colour Fresh Shampoo for soft, healthier hair full of brilliant shine. Do you fear that your fiery reds and cool toned browns are fading? That’s where this colour-safe shampoo steps in to save the day. Gently lift and cleanse your hair of all the styling mousses, gels and sprays which build up over time and weigh us down. Restore your once-bright and bouncy locks with unbeatable sheen and vitality with this kumquat-infused shampoo. Paired with sunflower seed extract, this powerhouse duo work together to shield your strands against future UV damage to keep your colour in tact and most importantly, clean. Giving your locks a new lease of life, this ‘poo is guaranteed to renew your colourful (and natural) ‘do with long-lasting moisture.

name: ghd Rehab Advanced Split End Therapy 100ml ghd Rehab Advanced Split End Therapy 100ml
description: If a glance over your unhappy-looking split ends has left you feeling glum, were happy to introduce you to your new BFF, ghd's Rehab - Advanced Split End Therapy! Activated by the heat of your tools to strengthen, restore and protect your hair, this styling essential even features ghd's heat protection system that helps to prevent cuticles lifting by improving the smoothness of the hair surface. Sealing split ends for up to 10 washes, the lightweight cream even coats your strands with a protective layer to prevent future breakage. The result? Smoother, shinier, healthier-looking hair, no hair cutting needed.
how_to_use: Massage the product through your hair, focusing on the ends in particular and wherever there is damage. Section the hair and blow-dry it smooth with your ghd hairdryer, then dry divide the hair into small sections and pass your ghd styler over each section to seal the product. For optimum results, dont use a conditioner prior to the treatment.

name: VIRTUE Curl Conditioner 200ml VIRTUE Curl Conditioner 200ml
description: Fancy a conditioner that not only softens your curls but also rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Curl Conditioner, a game-changing way to detangle, protect and care for your curls. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Curl Conditioner harnesses the likes of speciality carob gum to form a lightweight film that locks in moisture, as well as a vegetable-derived polymer to enhance curl formation and definition. Rice protein and sunflower seed oil are responsible for protecting against the drying effects of UV rays, while water-soluble jojoba oil delivers a wave of shine-boosting hydration that also lends your locks a smoothing touch. The results? Renewed elasticity, restored cuticles and silky, strong curls!
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount of conditioner between palms and massage into hair, starting from the ends and working your way up toward the root. Distribute conditioner through hair using a wide-tooth comb. Leave on for 2–3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Slip Silk Minnie Scrunchies - Classic Slip Silk Minnie Scrunchies - Classic
description: It’s like taking your silk pillowcase on-the-go! Kiss those hair kinks and creases goodbye… Secure your strands using the sleek and super-chic Pure Silk Scrunchies now available in 12 Minnie colours to choose from! Go for Pink to make ‘em wink, Caramel, a can’t-go-wrong Black, Navy, a daring Leopard or Silver. Crafted using 100% pure mulberry silk, you can accessorise in style with scrunchies that don’t smush, tug or damage your hair.

ingredient: 100% silk (exclusive of elastic).

name: Davines MINU Colour Enhancing Hair Serum 150ml Davines MINU Colour Enhancing Hair Serum 150ml
description: With a featherweight formula, Davines’ MINU Illuminating Hair Serum helps to intensify the brilliance of colour-treated hair. Delicately scented, the non-greasy texture is readily absorbed – separating and defining all hair textures while helping to smooth strands’ cuticles to promote light-reflective properties and in turn, enhance lustre. An invisible shield between hair and the elements, just mist through lengths of still-damp locks to combat tress distress and help delay the colour-fading process.
how_to_use: In case of medium-coarse hair apply to towel dried hair after colour conditioner; in the case of fine hair apply directly after colour shampoo. do not rinse off. Dry the hair. Apply approximately 3g product for a medium length.

name: Christophe Robin Regenerating Serum with Prickly Pear Oil 50ml Christophe Robin Regenerating Serum with Prickly Pear Oil 50ml
description: Formulated to restore dry, damaged and chemically treated tresses that have seen better days, Christophe Robin’s Regenerating Serum with Prickly Pear Oil enhances shine and smooths the look of split ends while protecting hair from artificial heat up to 230°C. The silicone-free formula boasts a fast-absorbing texture that leaves strands feeling soft and lustrous in next to no time. It’s powered by an extremely powerful plant-sourced ingredient, prickly pear oil, that leaves depleted hair feeling strong and supple; deeply nourishing tucuma butter conditions without weighing your lengths down and castor oils grants light-reflecting shine. We can’t wait for wash-day...
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to the lengths and ends of damp or dry hair after using the Regenerating Shampoo with Prickly Pear Oil and the Regenerating Mask with Prickly Pear Oil.

Coating each and every strand with nurturing antioxidants - what split ends? - and protecting from heat damage up to 230°C this is the ultimate styling companion. Whether you're after the perfect frizz-free bouncy blow dry or sleek and smooth finish, this is one hair care essential you won't want to forgo.

description: Promising flexible, natural-looking but long-lasting hold, Davines’ Medium Hold Pliable Paste is perfect for when you don’t want to your style to look too ‘done’. After a decade spent honing its expertise, the group launched its own line of tress-saving heroes and Davines came to fruition. Another instant classic, the Medium Hold Pliable Paste facilitates controlled versatile styling that doesn’t detract from your natural shine or movement.

name: Davines Energising Thickening Tonic 100ml Davines Energising Thickening Tonic 100ml
description: Created with a caffeine phytoceutical, this leave-in serum treatment works to create natural volume and oomph, while reinvigorating your scalp. Housed in a minimalist, deep-brown bottle in quintessential Davines’ style, this super-powered formula infuses a hair energy complex that actually expands the diameter of hair fibres by 10%! That means that not only does your hair look fuller but actually is from the inside-out, and Davines’ promises you’ll see this volumising effect from the first application.

name: Davines MOMO Moisturising Conditioner 250ml Davines MOMO Moisturising Conditioner 250ml
description: This pH 3.5 conditioner is formulated using a group of ingredients that work as a team to quench the thirst of dehydrated hair creating a light, protective layer on each strand. name: Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Conditioner Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Conditioner
description: The perfect follow-up from Briogeo's Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo, this creamy conditioner is bursting with antioxidant-rich fruits to support healthy-looking hair and scalp. Inspired by your favourite fruit smoothie, inside you'll find nourishing fruit extracts that are bursting with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants to nourish and protect hair. Naturally derived papaya enzymes are harnessed to help balance oil production while cherry extract (an impressive source of natural sugars) helps to flood your hair with hydration and antioxidant-rich vitamin C. Finally, mango extract helps to protect against free radical damage to minimise hair dullness. Boasting a vegan and cruelty-free formula that also contains zero sulphates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, DEA or artificial dyes, you can be sure that this Briogeo range is strand-friendly.

For best results, shampoo first with Briogeo Superfoods™ Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo. Due to the use of plant-based ingredients, the product colour may shift over time—this will not affect performance. This product uses natural colourants, which may fade over time in the formula — it’s still effective and safe to use! Natural separation may occur. For external use only. Do not ingest.

name: BYREDO Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume BYREDO Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hair (or create a totally bespoke scent of your own thanks to scent layering), you need to discover the brand's range of hair perfumes and particularly, Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome cans, BYREDO's Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving hair luminous, nourished and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Created as a gentle tribute to selflessness and compassion, the Rose of No Man's Land Eau de Parfum celebrates the nickname given to nurses by soldiers during World War One, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of pink pepper and Turkish rose petals tickle the senses alongside a vibrant heart of raspberry blossom and Turkish rose absolute, this charming fragrance acts as a comforting and soothing presence.

name: Amika Supernova Moisture and Shine Cream Amika Supernova Moisture and Shine Cream
description: Housed in chic, colourful packaging, this leave-in conditioner delivers intense hydration to thirsty locks without weighing hair down. name: ghd Duet 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in White ghd Duet 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in White
description: Taking on the task of transforming your lengths from wet to dry - and perfectly straight and sleek we might add - is ghd's new hybrid styling tool. Dry and style your hair in one fell swoop with ghd's Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in White. The future of styling, this simplifies your routine and cuts down your time spent at your vanity... and all while leaving your tresses silky soft and free from thermal damage. After years of research and testing by ghd's savvy scientists; the Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler has finally made its jaw-dropping debut. Taking the best tech from their drying and styling tools, this ground-breaking creation utilises Air-Fusion technology to dry and straighten your strands in unison. Smart low temperature plates deliver an even temperature throughout use; and all with barely a sound thanks to a bespoke acoustic system. If you were worried about this reaching your roots you need not panic... every element of your styling rituals has been accounted for by ghd (of course!). Expertly angled vents direct concentrated airflow at a lower temperature towards your roots to dry them without the damaging effects of extreme heat. Once you've dried your mane (and all without a single sizzle or hint of damage), it's time to turn your tool into a classic styler. The exclusive Shine Shot mode reaches the optimal temperature of 185°C to leave your strands ultra-glossy and free from frizz. Your hair styling rituals are ready for their upgrade...
how_to_use: Apply ghd sleek talker before using ghd duet style for elevated results with up to 72h of hair softness and smoothness, longer-lasting frizz control, and 4X more hair alignment. Ensure hair is towel dried before use. Slide the power button upgwards to turn on your Duet Styler. After a few seconds you will hear the fan ramp up as it heats up to the optimal low styling temperature for wet hair. Once the light stops flashing and the product beeps, it s ready to use. Divide your hair. Take the first section and place the product close to the roots holding for three seconds. Glide down the hair towards the ends in a slow and steady pace. Repeat until dry and move onto the next section of hair, starting once again from the roots. Once the hair is fully dry, for an optional boost of shine, active Shine Shot by pressing down the Shine Shot button for four seconds until you hear a beep. The fan will stop and the plate temperature will increase to the optimal ghd styling of 185°C. Once the product beeps and the lights stop flashing, Shine Shot is ready. Your Duet Style can now be used as a regular styler, for instant frizz-free hair. If you wish to return from Shine Shot back to wet to style mode, press and hold the Shine Shot button for two seconds. Your tool will beep as the plates cool down and the fan will start. The 'ready to use' tone will play when it's safe to use on wet hair.
ingredient: The Duet has a UK 3-pin Plug. No thermal hair damage detected after 4 passes in wet to style mode vs naturally dried hair. Automatic sleep mode switches off your styler off after 30 minutes of non-use, for peace of mind.

name: Bouclème Seal and Shield Conditioner 300ml Bouclème Seal and Shield Conditioner 300ml
description: Formulated without glycerin and coconut oil, Bouclème's Seal & Shield Curl Conditioner adds a wealth of nourishment to this wash day step, hitting hair with waves of hydration and shielding it from frizz-inducing humidity. Jam-packed with panthenol (vitamin B5), cupuacu butter, marula oil and wheat bran extract, this intensely moisturising and hydrating conditioner ticks all the boxes. Giving lacklustre curls an instant revival, it offers unrivalled moisture and humidity protection by sealing the cuticle and increasing the smoothness of strands, preventing water loss in the process. It even protects against UV rays, and thanks to cupuacu butter, which is lighter than shea butter, it works beautifully with finer hair textures without weighing strands down. Whether you've got tight coils or big ringlets, this 97% naturally-derived, weightless conditioner coats hair with moisture, making it your mane easy to manage and beautifully prepped for the steps ahead.
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply generously to soaking wet hair. Comb through with fingers. Conditioner can be left in for thirsty curls or rinsed out for finer textures and balanced hair. /p> Packaging can be recycled and all product ingredients are biodegradable. Our 300 ml caps and bottles are 100% recyclable, so they can be disposed of within your recycling bin once used.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetyl Alcohol, C15-19 Alkane, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea, Seed Oil, Limonene, Cetearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter, Distearoylethyl Dimonium Chloride, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Citric Acid, Cetearyl Nonanoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Panthenol, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Potassium Sorbate, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Citral, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Leaf Oil, Linoleic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Coriandrum Sativum (Coriander) Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Bran Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Benzyl Benzoate, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Benzyl Salicylate, Farnesol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Geraniol, Tocopherol.

name: ghd Creative Curl Wand (28-23mm) ghd Creative Curl Wand (28-23mm)
description: For tousled loose curls and beachy waves, step right this way. The ghd creative curl tong is cleverly tapered from a round 28mm to an oval 23mm tip without a clamp to allow for a wide variety of long-lasting styles across all hair types and lengths - even shorter styles. As with all of ghd's heat styling tools, it maintains a research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. Ingenious ultra-zone technology upholds this across the entire barrel throughout styling by recognising each section of hair and adapting the heat accordingly. There's no clamp to secure tips in place, but instead there's a ghd styling glove included and a protective cool tip to hold strands in place while you're styling, not to mention a safety stand for resting the wand on a hard surface. Putting a full stop on those heart-racing 'did I leave my curlers on' moments, the device will automatically turn off after 30 minutes. What more could you ask for in a curl tong?!
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For natural-looking curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For beachy, loose waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The tong has a UK three-pin plug. Packaging may vary.

name: Innersense Clarity Conditioner 59ml Innersense Clarity Conditioner 59ml
description: Allow us to introduce you to Innersense’s latest innovative formulation. The Clarity Conditioner is the perfect creation to care for the tresses of those prone to sensitivities and allergies alike. Available in a travel-friendly 59ml and full sized 295ml so you can keep your strands perfectly nourished no matter if you’re at home or on-the-go. If your scalp and strands are in turmoil then you’ve come to the right corner to the beautysphere. A healthy scalp goes strand in strand with healthy hair and thanks to a calming dose of colloidal oatmeal, hydrating manuka honey and omega-rich organic apricot kernel oil this conditioner will achieve exactly that. Softer strands and more vibrant looking locks are swiftly coming your way. Deeply hydrating and endlessly calming, this is a moment of clarity for your hair care rituals...
how_to_use: After cleansing, take a deep breath and appreciate clean, hydrated hair. Apply 1-2 pumps in hands, emulsify and distribute from mid-length to ends with fingertips or comb. Leave on 1-5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/EAU, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Cetearyl Alcohol,Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearalkonium Chloride,Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Honey, Citric Acid, SodiumLevulinate, Potassium Sorbate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*,Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil*, Colloidal Oatmeal, GuarHydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate,Tocopherol, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil*,Swertia Japonica Extract, Stearyl Alcohol, Amine HCL,Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate.*Certified Organic.

name: MONPURE London Hydrate and Soothe Scalp Serum 50ml MONPURE London Hydrate and Soothe Scalp Serum 50ml
description: Designed to intensely nourish irritated scalps, this hydrating scalp serum is like a big hug for this often neglected part of your body. In typical MONPURE fashion, it’s also vegan, cruelty-free and formulated with only the good stuff (read: no parabens, silicones or sulphates here!). From eczema to acne, sun damage to redness and dehydration on the scalp, this serum tackles all these concerns and then some. Witch Hazel works as an anti-inflammatory that soothes sensitive scalps and also as a natural toner that regulates sebum production. To bolster that calming effect, allantoin (a humectant) is infused to pacify irritation and promote skin cell renewal, while pro-vitamin B5 seals in moisture layers deep into your scalp and strands to combat dryness. Lightweight in texture and easy to use in dropper form, this multi-tasking hair hero is sure to quench a thirsty mane and skyrocket your scalp to hair health heaven.
how_to_use: 1. Starting with dry or towel-dried scalp hair, part the hairline and apply one to two drops of serum, spaced evenly, onto the scalp. 2. Work across the head, section by section, focusing on areas of concern. 3. Gently massage until the serum has fully absorbed into the scalp. Do not rinse.

name: Drybar Half Pint Small Round Ceramic Brush Drybar Half Pint Small Round Ceramic Brush
description: If bouncy tresses have always eluded you, it's time to add the Half Pint Small Round Ceramic Brush to your blow-dry - boasting a 1.75' (50mm) vented ceramic barrel, this helps you to create volume and curl for a style that lasts... and lasts... and lasts! Crafted to help you style your hair your way, Drybar's brushes are the must-have partner to any at-home blow-dry. The secret to achieving a salon-worthy finish is all in the tools you use, so give your styling routine the Drybar treatment with this 1.75 inch (50mm) barrel brush. Allowing for maximum heat and maximum airflow, the vented design ensures you lock in that volume and curl you've spent precious time honing. Gone are the days of slipping hands and tired arms as you create your style, this lightweight design is finished with a soft-touch coating and thumbgrip to stop your hands from losing their hold on your brush so you can keep the tension and control needed for the salon-level blow-dry. Ionic technology makes frizz a distant memory, adding shine to your strands as you style, and with a versatile styling selection in its arsenal, this brush can be used for everything from waves to straightening your mane.
how_to_use: Creates waves in medium to long hair. Adds volume and helps straighten short to medium hair. For curls: Use vertically throughout the hair For volume at the roots: Use horizontally at the crown.

name: Drybar Detox Clear Invisible Dry Shampoo Drybar Detox Clear Invisible Dry Shampoo
description: Made with all hair types in mind - wavy, curly, straight, you name it - Drybar's Detox Clear Invisible Dry Shampoo is here to bring your blowout back from the brink. Don't let your styling go to waste before its time, breathe some life into your blowout with this lightweight spray. It's powered by a proprietary powder blend to absorb oils, sweat and odours while adding touchable texture to your strands. Kiwi extract is employed to lift residue from your hair, leaving it clean and refreshed, while amla oil hydrates for a sheer sheen. The cherry on top? It's laced with a head-turning aroma with notes of coconut, amber and vanilla.
how_to_use: Shake extremely well. Spray into roots 4–6" (10–15 cm) away from the scalp. Allow to dry, gently rub in and brush through.

name: Drybar Mr Incredible The Ultimate Leave-In Conditioner Drybar Mr Incredible The Ultimate Leave-In Conditioner
description: There aren't many superheroes in the world (okay, maybe there are in our world) but joining the list of hair care vigilantes fighting the good fight against frizz and flyaways is Mr. Incredible The Ultimate Leave-In Conditioner. When it's time for the best blowout of your life, who ya gonna call? The ultimate spray lotion, of course! Supercharged with hair-replenishing acai that's enriched with essential fatty acids and vitamins, biotin that works hard to banish away dryness whilst restoring bouncy elasticity to prevent breakage and a major conditioning agent that is coconut milk, what's not to love? Incredible in more ways than we can count, this pre-blowout styling spray settles into your hair to reveal glass-like sheen boasting enviable softness.

name: Innersense Clarity Conditioner 295ml Innersense Clarity Conditioner 295ml
description: Allow us to introduce you to Innersense’s latest innovative formulation. The Clarity Conditioner is the perfect creation to care for the tresses of those prone to sensitivities and allergies alike. Available in a travel-friendly 59ml and full sized 295ml so you can keep your strands perfectly nourished no matter if you’re at home or on-the-go. If your scalp and strands are in turmoil then you’ve come to the right corner to the beautysphere. A healthy scalp goes strand in strand with healthy hair and thanks to a calming dose of colloidal oatmeal, hydrating manuka honey and omega-rich organic apricot kernel oil this conditioner will achieve exactly that. Softer strands and more vibrant looking locks are swiftly coming your way. Deeply hydrating and endlessly calming, this is a moment of clarity for your hair care rituals...

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Repair Hair Mask 200ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Repair Hair Mask 200ml
description: Delivering an intensive shot of targeted repair to dry and damaged locks in serious tress distress, the Repair Hair Mask by Dr. Barbara Sturm gives visibly nourished, silky, glossy and healthy hair. Featuring cationic hyaluronic acid (a uniquely formulated version of hyaluronic acid that hydrates and targets each strand with an ultra-conditioning effect) plus organic shea butter, this treatment ensures soft, supple and shiny hair that feels instantly more moisturised and manageable. Hemi-squalane, which is a plant-based substitute to silicones, prepares hair for styling while a complex of algae and lavender calms, soothes and rebalances irritated scalps. But that’s not all — pro-vitamin B5 smooths the outer layer of your hair without weighing it down, while vitamin-rich sunflower sprouts and tara extract even protect both hair and scalp against heat, pollution particles, colour fade and UV stress.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair after shampooing, allowing one to three minutes for the ingredients to be absorbed. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Deep Moisture Conditioner 1000ml (Worth £110.00) Aveda Nutriplenish Deep Moisture Conditioner 1000ml (Worth £110.00)
description: Are your tresses calling out for a tall glass (or ten!) of water? Aveda has the next best thing! This Nutriplenish Conditioner Deep Moisture is a deeply replenishing formula that harnesses a vegan superfood blend of potent plant butter and oils to leave your lengths visibly hydrated and smooth. A decadent, 96% naturally derived conditioner that feels beautifully rich — the moisturising pay-off is NO joke - this nutrient-powered concoction stars omega 5-rich pomegranate oil to nourish depleted hair, while low-molecular-weight certified organic coconut oil is easily 'slurped' up by your strands for impressive hydration. It boasts their signature ‘Pure-Fume Aroma’ with cocoa, certified organic ginger, cardamom and other pure flower and plant essences. Ultra-smooth, luscious locks never smelt this good!

name: Drybar Prep Rally Prime & Prep Detangler Drybar Prep Rally Prime & Prep Detangler
description: Every day is a good hair day from here on out thanks to the Prep Rally Prime & Prep Detangler... offering heat protection and tangle-free hair in one heaven-scented spray. Your daily dose of vitamins for your hair, Drybar's nourishing preparatory spray is brimming with vitamins B and C to support hair flexibility, strength and texture for overall healthier strands. A protective dose of biotin helps to increase elasticity deep in the hair fibres to keep breakage at bay, while sea berry oil maintains moisture levels right at the hair shaft so your mane is left perfectly conditioned but never greasy. Suitable for all hair types, this ginger, mint and sandalwood-scented spray banishes tangles and protects your strands from up to 232°C. It's time to upgrade your at-home styling sessions with this pro-level upgrade... this is the key to achieving the perfect blowout!
how_to_use: Mist generously on damp hair and brush through before blow-drying. Or, spray onto dry bangs/fringe and re-blow to freshen up your look. Shake Me Up! The conditioning ingredients in Prep Rally can sometimes rise to the top. Don't worry! There is no effect on product performance. A quick shake will re-mix them back in.

name: invisibobble Power Strong Hold Hair Ties - Pretzel Brown (Pack of 3) invisibobble Power Strong Hold Hair Ties - Pretzel Brown (Pack of 3)
description: Named invisibobble because it leaves no trace in the hair, this next-generation hair tie has already converted hosts of hair care aficionados – and with good reason! Crafted from hygienic polyurethane in a market-leading spiral shape, the invisibobble Powerful offers extra-strong hold without leaving a trace of damage in your hair – so you can say goodbye to kinks, snagging and painful tightness. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. This extra-powerful edition provides even stronger hold, making it perfect to use during workouts, or to secure the most magnificent of lion’s manes that can’t be tamed by smaller sized ties. Kind to hair, the invisibobble Power also looks great worn on your wrist, available in three cute variations: transparent ‘Crystal Clear’, midnight ‘True Black’ and rich ‘Pretzel Brown’.
how_to_use: Use to secure all kinds of updos. Great for longer, thicker hair or for use during workouts.
ingredient: Polyurethane

name: Philip Kingsley Density Stimulating Scalp Toner 150ml Philip Kingsley Density Stimulating Scalp Toner 150ml
description: Hello… is it volume you’re looking for? Support healthy hair growth post-hair wash with the Density Stimulating Scalp Toner formulated by hair care experts. Trust in the science of Trichology and let the hair and scalp specialists at Philip Kingsley restore volume and health back to even the finest of hair. Skin care shouldn’t stop at the hairline, so make sure you’re giving your hair your full attention and tone your way to a healthy, lustrous mane. Naturally derived adaptogens contribute to an energised scalp, which paves the way for stronger hair that shines. Control dandruff right at the root by tackling the growth of bacteria with a dose of piroctone olamine, a naturally antimicrobial active. Let the invigorating sensation of a menthyl-derived stimulant give an instant boost to your strands, as well as a long-lasting and somewhat satisfying cooling effect. Water-based and fragrance-free, this is the key to healthy hair growth… and healthy hair starts at the scalp.
how_to_use: After washing and towel drying the hair, tilt your head back and apply directly to the scalp from the nozzle in 1” (3cm) sections. Massage in with fingertips. A cooling, tingling sensation can be expected. Do not rinse. Style as usual. Use daily on a damp or dry scalp for maximum benefit.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 40-B), Polysorbate 20, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Menthol, Glycerin, Arginine, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Menthyl Lactate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Germ Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Piroctone Olamine, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Calcium Gluconate.

name: Davines Replumping Hair Filler Superactive 100ml Davines Replumping Hair Filler Superactive 100ml
description: Tired of your hair looking…tired? Consider Davines’ Replumping Hair Filler Superactive to be the shot of espresso your strands need to feel alive again! Packed with a plethora of anti-humidifying benefits, this uniquely formulated leave-in treatment invigorates and replumps the structure of your hair, follicle by follicle. Thirsty tresses can be a thing of the past after just one use thanks to the almighty blend of hyaluronic acid and fortifying botanical shield. This powerhouse duo feeds your hair with an unbelievable amount of hydration with hyaluronic acid holding 1000x its weight in water (wow (!)) and protects it from further damage. With this must-have leave-in treatment following you on weekend getaways, vacation and even the necessary wash days at home, there’s no doubt that you’ll whip your hair back and forth with more confidence as if you just stepped out of the celebrity salon…

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Perfectly Sleek Blow Heating Cream 150ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Perfectly Sleek Blow Heating Cream 150ml
description: Hair wash day just got a whole lot smoother with this conditioning heat styling cream that keeps frizz-inducing water at bay so your style stays sleek, smooth and ready to take on the day until your next wash. Curly and coily hair, this one is for you… the Smooth Infusion Perfectly Sleek nourishes and protects your style without altering your natural curl pattern. Activated by heat, this silicone-free styling cream features a plant polymer shield to protect your strands from humidity and keep frizz firmly under control. We will never stop thanking Aveda for the smoothing botanical oil blend either, infused to keep your hair shiny and smooth day in and day out… you’ll feel like you just left the salon. Available in 150ml and a sized-to-try 40ml, you can fight humidity no matter where you are.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner Travel Size 60ml Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner Travel Size 60ml
description: The ultimate mane-taming follow up to No Frizz Shampoo, Living Proof’s No Frizz Conditioner has a weightless, detangling formula to minimise hair stress when styling, whilst nourishing strands to preserve precious pigment and leave your locks feeling super-soft, shiny and ‘slippery’. Powered by the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA), which helps block humidity 70% more effectively than traditional oils and silicones whilst repelling environmental grime and pollutants – this heavenly hair-hydrator is a must-have in the war against frizz – rendering tresses more meek, mild and manageable. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Start with No Frizz Shampoo. Apply No Frizz Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Follow with one of Living Proof's No Frizz styling products.

description: Tired of your tresses falling flat? We've been there! Thankfully the minds behind Aveda have created a system to take you towards gloriously thick strands. A key part of the routine, the Invati Advanced Thickening Conditioner delivers weightless hydration and protects against breakage as it encourages fuller hair. It also calls upon certified organic amla to thicken the look of your hair, and a weightless blend of plant oils to tackle tangles and condition your lengths for a silky smooth finish.

name: BLEACH LONDON Alex Plex 22ml BLEACH LONDON Alex Plex 22ml
description: Designed to minimise damage caused from bleaching and dyeing, BLEACH LONDON'S Alex Plex Treatment is an anti-breakage protection treatment in two easy steps. Perfect for following any dye treatment or as a preventative treatment used alone as a reparative hair mask, this results in shiny, healthy hair. Vegan and cruelty-free, the unique formula helps to reform damage from over processing, promoting stronger, healthier hair. If hair is already extremely damaged or over compromised do not bleach it, even with Alex Plex.
how_to_use: Part 1 BONDAGE: Mix colour cream with developer in a non-metallic bowl. Add entire contents of BONDAGE sachet. Mix well and apply according to colour usage instructions. Once development time is over, rinse well, shampoo and follow with SEAL THE DEAL. Part 2 SEAL THE DEAL: When BONDAGE process is complete, rinse well, shampoo and apply entire sachet of SEAL THE DEAL to hair. Massage, comb through and leave for 5-10 minutes. Rinse and follow with conditioner if desired (not essential). DIRECTIONS FOR STAND ALONE TREATMENT: Do this every 2 weeks to improve hair strength! Mix the entire contents of BONDAGE sachet with 90ml warm water. Pour all over unwashed dry hair, comb through and leave for 5 minutes. Then apply entire sachet of SEAL THE DEAL to hair. Massage, comb through and leave for 20 minutes. Rinse well and follow with your choice of shampoo and conditioner.

name: Pattern Hair Pick Pattern Hair Pick
description: Designed to revive hair and look chic on your vanity, the Hair Pick perks up and elongates every kink, curl and coil. When your hair is in need of a pick-me-up, then pick this up to lift roots and fluff out tight curls that have clumped together after some beauty sleep. Its extra-long bristles get right into the thickest of textures and it's even got a handy indent for your finger to grip the pick as you get to work. Sturdy yet gentle enough to lift hair without snagging (or frizz!), prepare to express your hair in a multitude of ways.

name: R+Co VELVET CURTAIN Cotton Touch Texture Balm R+Co VELVET CURTAIN Cotton Touch Texture Balm
description: Mimic that endlessly chic second-day hair look with R+Co’s VELVET CURTAIN Cotton Touch Texture Balm: a dry styler that adds soft volume and light hold to all hair types while boasting a modern matte effect and a touchable texture. Infused with the brand’s DARK WAVES fragrance (a warm, romantic scent with notes of cardamom, pineapple, tangerine, lavender, bamboo and blonde woods), this nourishing styler will leave your strands scented to perfection. Using natural ingredients (and no parabens, sulphates, mineral oil or petrolatum) this exquisite formula is 100% vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free and colour-safe. It’s infused with Nordic cotton flower to seal, restore, plump and protect your hair; pro vitamin B5 to boost manageability, texture, shine and elasticity while strengthening hair and locking in hydration; sunflower seed oil to leave hair soft, silky and conditioned while providing free radical protection; finally, fatty acid-rich amaranth flower seed extract and vegan squalane work to prevent frizz and provide hold.
how_to_use: Spread a small amount evenly on damp or dry hair. Style and air or blow dry as desired.
ingredient: Dimethyl Ether, Water (Aqua/Eau), Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Dipropylene Glycol, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Polysilicone-29, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Glycolic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Extract, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Citral.

name: ghd Helios™ Professional Hair Dryer - Black ghd Helios™ Professional Hair Dryer - Black
description: Fancy an extra ten minutes in bed every morning? Silly question… Usher the game-changing Helios Professional Hair Dryer into your life to secure extra shut-eye and head-turning tresses. Lightweight and easy to wield, this brilliant tool is the ultimate partner in crime against frizz, ‘fluff’ and flyaways – slashing your drying time, smoothing your strands and diminishing damage for bouncy results. With a brilliant brushless motor for consistent 75mph airflow, alongside proprietary Aeroprecis technology for targeted styling and maximum control, this hush-hush hair dryer is rapid and quiet (it’s got its own acoustic system!). Boasting variable power and temperature controls – as well as a cool shot to set your style – this elevates every blowout for a sleek, shiny finish with much less tress trauma (9/10 users agree). With a professionally designed contoured nozzle and 3m flex for ease of use, it’s time to take your hair to drying hair-ven.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Then use the hair dryer to style your hair into your desired fashion.
ingredient: 3m power cables with UK three pin plug. Includes detachable, professionally designed contoured nozzle. Two year warranty.

name: Bouclème Foam to Dry Shampoo 100ml Bouclème Foam to Dry Shampoo 100ml
description: Refresh your hair in between washes with the Bouclème Foam to Dry Shampoo. Ideal for oil-prone scalps and greasy roots, the alcohol-free dry shampoo features a foam-to-powder texture that works to absorb excess oil while boosting hair’s volume. Infused with tapioca and cornstarch, the formula helps to balance oil production and add tousle and texture to hair. Aloe vera lends anti-inflammatory and detoxifying properties, while cooling spearmint and peppermint help to neutralise unwanted odour and leave your hair and scalp feeling refreshed and revitalised. 97% naturally derived. Vegan.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply to dry hair. Add 1-2 pumps into palms and massage throughout the scalp using your fingertips. Leave to air dry or for added volume and lift diffuse roots.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Tapioca Starch, Pentylene Glycol, Corn Starch Modified, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, *Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, *Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Oil, *Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, *Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, *Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Gum Oil, *Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange Sweet) Peel Oil, *Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, *Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Leaf Oil, *Angelica Archangelica (Angelica) Root Oil, *Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Oil, *Anthemis Nobilis (Roman Chamomile) Flower Oil, *Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Oil, ***Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Coconut Acid, ***Algin, Isopulegol, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, **Limonene, **Linalool, **Geraniol, **Citronellol, **Benzyl Benzoate, **Eugenol, **Farnesol, **Benzyl Salicylate. *Essential Oil **Potential Allergen ***Certified Organic

name: Pattern Hydrating Mist 354.9ml Pattern Hydrating Mist 354.9ml
description: Brimming with luxe, hydrating ingredients, this fine mist reactivates curls and keeps wash day at bay without compromising on style. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Hydrating Mist is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. Instead, it infuses a blend of aloe vera, coconut oil, avocado oil and shea butter to flood thirsty locks with moisture and add an abundance of nourishment in-between washes. Not to mention, this milky formula even protects against environmental aggressors that threaten to damage your curls and coils. If your curls are looking limp and lifeless, expect this mist to refresh and reactivate them back to life, so they're ready for whatever style you choose to don.
how_to_use: Give the bottle a good shake to help prime the mist pump to suck up the milky goodness and be ready to spray. May take a little bit to get the juicy flow going! Spritz on to rehydrate wash-&-gos or use to refresh your hairstyle.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caryodendron Orinocense Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Liquid Endosperm, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyurethane-14, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyisobutene, Dicetyl Phosphate, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, AMP-Acrylates Copolymer, Potassium Stearate, Stearic acid, Propanediol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sorbitan Oleate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Phospholipids, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: VIRTUE Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair 60ml VIRTUE Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair 60ml
description: Powered by alpha and gamma keratin proteins, the Virtue Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair seeks to gently cleanse, purify and nourish the scalp, encouraging strength and maturity through the strands. The high-performance formula works to remove dirt and impurities from the hair shaft and follicle openings, creating the ideal environment for hair to grow. The shampoo leaves hair feeling soft and refreshed while promoting volume and elasticity. An aromatic blend of sharp citrus, rich wood and soft florals intertwine with basil accords and patchouli essential oils, provoking a soothing spa-like aroma.
how_to_use: Work a quarter-sized amount of shampoo into a lather between palms. Apply to wet hair and massage into scalp, starting at the nape of your neck, and work the lather through the ends. Rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Lauryl Glucoside, Acrylates Copolymer, Keratin, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Rice Oil Glycereth-8 Esters, Sodium Phytate, Cocamide MIPA, Polysorbate 20, Hydrogenated Coconut Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Isopropanolamine, Coconut Acid, Dextran, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Glycine, Gluconolactone, Zinc Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene, Citronellol.

name: Bouclème Protein Booster 30ml Bouclème Protein Booster 30ml
description: Like skin care but for your hair, these customisable boosters can be added to your current curl care products so that you can treat your hair your way, not anybody else's! These concentrated, strengthening drops do wonders for hair that has seen better days. Using hydrolyzed vegetable protein, Bouclème hones in on strengthening and restructuring hair from the inside out. Meaning, if your hair has suffered heat damage, colour damage…just about any daily life damage then this protein can help to restructure the cortex and shaft of your hair follicles as well as improve shine and moisture. The result? Protected, conditioned hair, and for hair that is coloured, expect an oomph of enhancement! Plus, neroli flower water nourishes and enhances your natural curl. So, what are you waiting for? It’s time to get mixing!
how_to_use: These strengthening drops can be rinsed off or left in. Add to cleanser and/or conditioner. For a light dose, rinse off. For a stronger dose, leave-in. Unscrew the lid and press the button at the bottom of the bottle to release the drops. Add 6 drops to a small palmful of chosen product(s). For rinse-out application: shampoo/cleansers - apply, leave in for 5 mins, rinse out and follow routine as usual. conditioners/mask - apply, leave in for 10 minutes. Rinse out and follow routine as usual. For leave-in application, apply 6 drops to a small palmful of Curl Conditioner, Intensive Moisture Treatment or Curl Cream.
ingredient: ***Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Water, Glycerin (Vegetable), Pentylene Glycol, Aqua/Water/Eau, Erythritol, Hydrolized Vegetable Protein, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate. ***Certified Organic

name: Philip Kingsley Density Stimulating Scalp Toner 150ml Philip Kingsley Density Stimulating Scalp Toner 150ml
description: Hello… is it volume you’re looking for? Support healthy hair growth post-hair wash with the Density Stimulating Scalp Toner formulated by hair care experts. Trust in the science of Trichology and let the hair and scalp specialists at Philip Kingsley restore volume and health back to even the finest of hair. Skin care shouldn’t stop at the hairline, so make sure you’re giving your hair your full attention and tone your way to a healthy, lustrous mane. Naturally derived adaptogens contribute to an energised scalp, which paves the way for stronger hair that shines. Control dandruff right at the root by tackling the growth of bacteria with a dose of piroctone olamine, a naturally antimicrobial active. Let the invigorating sensation of a menthyl-derived stimulant give an instant boost to your strands, as well as a long-lasting and somewhat satisfying cooling effect. Water-based and fragrance-free, this is the key to healthy hair growth… and healthy hair starts at the scalp.
how_to_use: After washing and towel drying the hair, tilt your head back and apply directly to the scalp from the nozzle in 1” (3cm) sections. Massage in with fingertips. A cooling, tingling sensation can be expected. Do not rinse. Style as usual. Use daily on a damp or dry scalp for maximum benefit.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 40-B), Polysorbate 20, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Menthol, Glycerin, Arginine, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Menthyl Lactate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Germ Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Piroctone Olamine, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Calcium Gluconate.

name: ghd Curve Soft Curl Tong (32mm) ghd Curve Soft Curl Tong (32mm)
description: Granting glammer-than-glam bouncy curls and loose waves, the ghd soft curl tong is a hero for longer hair types. It features a large 32mm barrel with a ceramic coating to deliver smooth and shiny locks with plenty of volume, alongside a handy spring-activated clamp to secure the tips of your tresses for effortless styling. As with all of ghd's curling tongs, this wonder worker adheres to the brand's research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC - cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. This is regulated and maintained through clever ultra-zone technology, which recognises each section of hair and adapts the heat accordingly. Designed with safety in mind, there's a cool tip to hold hair in place while you're using it, a safety stand for resting on hard surfaces and - our personal favourite - an automatic sleep mode that turns the device off after 30 minutes - a peace of mind essential if ever there was one.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For big, bouncy and sleek curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For loose waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. Packaging may vary.

name: Amika Supernova Moisture and Shine Cream Amika Supernova Moisture and Shine Cream
description: Housed in chic, colourful packaging, this leave-in conditioner delivers intense hydration to thirsty locks without weighing hair down. The star ingredient, butylene glycol, acts as a humectant and slip agent to ensure that hair feels silky, smooth and manageable. Sodium cocoylamino acids are to thank for a deliverance of a shine and smoothness so enviable, people will stop and stare! Last but not least, this hard-working cream incorporates sea buckthorn oil, which is rich in vitamin C and A, antioxidants and healthy omega fatty acids to further enrich the health of your tresses. Suitable for all hair types and for good reason, what’s not love about this ultra-hydrating and nourishing concoction?!
how_to_use: Distribute throughout damp hair and style as usual. Can also be used on dry hair to tame flyaways or refresh dry ends.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polysorbate 80, Dimethiconol, Sorbitan Oleate, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Sodium Cocoyl Amino Acids, Mica, Potassium Dimethicone Peg-7 Panthenyl Phosphate, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Sarcosinate, Isohexadecane, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium Edta, Sorbitan Isostearate, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Citronellol, Coumarin, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).

name: ghd Helios Hair Dryer Wide Styling Nozzle ghd Helios Hair Dryer Wide Styling Nozzle
description: Accelerating styling time for longer, thicker hair, the Helios Professional Hair Dryer Wide Styling Nozzle puts you in control by directing the air where you want it for super-smooth, shiny results. Designed for speed-drying thick hair types without sacrificing precision, this nozzle allows you to style larger sections of hair while ensuring a sleek, polished finish. Compatible with your Helios Hair Dryer and designed with a team of professional stylists and industry experts, this 88mm wide attachment channels the airflow to counteract frizz (and help minimise damage!) for healthier hair that looks fresh-from-the-salon.
how_to_use: Compatible with your ghd Helios Professional Hair Dryer.

name: Sachajuan Protective Hair Perfume Bois Noir 50ml Sachajuan Protective Hair Perfume Bois Noir 50ml
description: Locking down your signature scent from head to toe (quite literally) Sachajuan's Bois Noir Protective Hair Perfume is packed with nourishing ingredients yet is lightweight, leaving your locks with a shimmering shine and subtle scent. Flirting with fragrant properties, this hair perfume is said to cling onto your strands far more effectively than your skin, ensuring long-lasting aromas. Fusing notes of white honey, cardamom and ciste oil with vanilla, tonka beans and sandalwood, the unisex blend flourishes with floral finishes and a touch of amberiness. Whether your hair is tied in a ponytail or left wafting in the wind, every movement will leave those around you lusting over your new scent.
how_to_use: Mist through lengths of hair whenever you need to eliminate stale smells or refresh your style.
ingredient: Alcohol Denat, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water) (Eau), Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl P-Cresol, Propanediol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Extract, Olive Oil Peg-7 Esters, Butylene Glycol, Ppg-20 Methyl Glucose Ether Distearate, Citronellol, Linalool, Eugenol, Coumarin, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone.

name: Bouclème Dry Scalp Serum 30ml Bouclème Dry Scalp Serum 30ml
description: Healthy hair begins at the very root, and Bouclème's Dry Scalp Serum is on hand to hydrate, soothe and balance your scalp whenever dryness or irritation strikes. This multitasker provides instant relief from inflammation while simultaneously helping to restore your scalp's natural microbiome - which means less dandruff and itching in the future too. So how is it done? This silky serum uses organic argan oil to hydrate and calm a dry scalp (without leaving hair feeling greasy or roots feeling congested), jojoba oil to protect and strengthen your skin's moisture barrier to sure stronger hair right from the scalp, and propanediol caprylate (a plant-derived active ingredient) to stop dandruff in its tracks by reducing the cause of redness and irritation.
how_to_use: 1. Unscrew the lid and press the button at the bottom of the bottle to release the drops. 2. Add 6 drops to a small palmful of Curl Cleanser, Hydrating Hair Cleanser or Scalp Exfoliating Shampoo. 3. Massage cleanser into scalp using your fingertips. Rinse and follow with Curl Conditioner or Intensive Moisture Treatment. 4. Use every wash until you feel it working. Continue to use weekly or every two weeks to keep that great feeling of flake free hair.
ingredient: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol Caprylate, ***Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol. ***Certified Organic

name: Drybar Detox Clear Invisible Dry Shampoo Drybar Detox Clear Invisible Dry Shampoo
description: Made with all hair types in mind - wavy, curly, straight, you name it - Drybar's Detox Clear Invisible Dry Shampoo is here to bring your blowout back from the brink. Don't let your styling go to waste before its time, breathe some life into your blowout with this lightweight spray. It's powered by a proprietary powder blend to absorb oils, sweat and odours while adding touchable texture to your strands. Kiwi extract is employed to lift residue from your hair, leaving it clean and refreshed, while amla oil hydrates for a sheer sheen. The cherry on top? It's laced with a head-turning aroma with notes of coconut, amber and vanilla.
how_to_use: Shake extremely well. Spray into roots 4–6" (10–15 cm) away from the scalp. Allow to dry, gently rub in and brush through.
ingredient: Isobutane, Propane, Alcohol Denat., Dimethylimidazolidinone Rice Starch, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Solanum Tuberosum (Potato) Starch, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract, Passiflora Incarnata Flower Extract, Butylene Glycol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Hydrated Silica, Aqua (Water, Eau), Parfum (Fragrance), Chlorphenesin, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Coumarin.

name: Amika High Tide Deep Waver Amika High Tide Deep Waver
description: Lightweight and easy to use, the High Tide Deep Waver is amika's ultra-versatile tool designed to creative instant, shiny waves no matter your hair type or texture. Whether you're after big, beachy waves or something sleeker and more defined, this next-gen crimper can help you achieve it. Three's a charm, which is why a trio of ceramic barrels work together to deliver heat evenly onto strands, creating deep S-bends in locks that can be customised to your desired look. And for a frizz-free finish, the waver uses far-infrared technology to lock in moisture, and negative irons to seal the hair cuticle. Hello, long-lasting, super smooth styles.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. 110/240V.

name: Innersense Refresh Dry Shampoo Innersense Refresh Dry Shampoo
description: The ultimate saviour for greasy roots, Refresh Dry Shampoo absorbs excess oil in an instant, leaving nothing but volume, texture and shine (aka. The DREAM). With a clever foam to powder texture, it harnesses the oil-reducing powers of witch hazel and tapioca starch, which not only remove grease but add body to flat hair and condition the scalp – no talc needed. Unlike many dry shampoos that leave tresses matte and chalky, this clever formula is spiked with pullulan, a sugar-based polymer that provides transparent shine and flexible hold. As with all of Innersense’s products, this wonder worker focuses not only on your hair happiness, but on your overall wellbeing too; infused with bitter orange, it exudes a gorgeous scent traditionally purposed to boost joy and relaxation.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Add 1-2 pumps of foam into palms, then lightly emulsify with fingertips. Apply to roots of dry hair, massage and work through. Allow to air dry. For added volume, lift and blow dry at roots. Style as desired, using more as needed.
