name: dpHUE Cool Brunette Shampoo 8.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Cool Brunette Shampoo 8.5 fl. oz.
description: Brassiness, be gone! Just a few of minutes with the Cool Brunette Shampoo will help you to neutralise unwanted orange and red tones within your brunette strands, while gently cleansing your mane of dirt, excess sebum and debris. Looking for a shampoo superstar to help you indulge in your most beautiful locks (even when you’re not fresh from the salon)? This rich, foaming and colour-locking formula uses specially formulated, deep blue pigments to tone your mane — without harsh ingredients that might actually strip or dull your colour in the long run. And because the dpHUE team knows the toll colour (not to mention heat and environmental damage!) can take on your hair, this formula is brimming with hydrating ingredients like silk proteins and hibiscus flower extract to strengthen the hair, improve lustre and increase brightness.!
how_to_use: 1. Apply to wet hair, massaging into the hair & scalp. 2. Rinse thoroughly. For more intense results, leave on hair for up to five minutes. Use weekly or as often as needed.

name: Function of Beauty Coily Hair Conditioner 325ml Function of Beauty Coily Hair Conditioner 325ml
description: Like a cocktail but for your hair, the Coily Base Conditioner is designed to revive sleepy curls and coils with a heroic blend that’s perfect for type 4 hair! Who knew the day would come when you can customise your own conditioner without a lab coat or science-y test tubes in sight. Powered by a mighty fusion of Jamaican black castor oil, moisture-locking shea butter, sunflower and olive oils, this nourishing concoction banishes dry, brittle hair. Dappled with light peach-citrus notes, deep conditioning formula amps up curl definition and fortified your strands with unbelievable strength. What’s more — it’s absolutely sulfate-free, cruelty-free and you guessed it – 100% vegan! Coating each and every zig-zag coil, this hair-oic blend is just what your wash day routine has been waiting for.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply generously through hair and rinse thoroughly. For best results, use with Function of Beauty Shampoo.

name: Innersense Bright Balance Conditioner 59ml Innersense Bright Balance Conditioner 59ml
description: A condtioner that works hard in more ways than just one, Innersense’s Bright Balance Conditioner nourishes, softens, moisturises your hair and maintains your colour, neutralising orange tones to keep your colour vibrant, and never, ever brassy. Condition blonde and grey-toned hair the right way with Innersense’s Bright Balance Hairbath. Infused with nourishing organic coconut and apple seed oils to deeply nourish and lessen frizz, this shine-inducing condioner leaves your hair with what everyone will think is a salon-induced shine. Shielding your strands from the elements is a hair-loving dose of rice bran oil, an emollient rich in antioxidants ensuring your hair colour is in tact through every wash. Witch hazel is added to the mix to gently cleanse and remove any residue dulling your shine. A vegan formula that works across a myriad of hair types and textures, and perfect for lighter hair colours, this thoroughly nourishes and keeps your colour true.

name: ghd Duet 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in White ghd Duet 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in White
description: Taking on the task of transforming your lengths from wet to dry - and perfectly straight and sleek we might add - is ghd's new hybrid styling tool. Dry and style your hair in one fell swoop with ghd's Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in White. The future of styling, this simplifies your routine and cuts down your time spent at your vanity... and all while leaving your tresses silky soft and free from thermal damage. After years of research and testing by ghd's savvy scientists; the Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler has finally made its jaw-dropping debut. Taking the best tech from their drying and styling tools, this ground-breaking creation utilises Air-Fusion technology to dry and straighten your strands in unison. Smart low temperature plates deliver an even temperature throughout use; and all with barely a sound thanks to a bespoke acoustic system. If you were worried about this reaching your roots you need not panic... every element of your styling rituals has been accounted for by ghd (of course!). Expertly angled vents direct concentrated airflow at a lower temperature towards your roots to dry them without the damaging effects of extreme heat. Once you've dried your mane (and all without a single sizzle or hint of damage), it's time to turn your tool into a classic styler. The exclusive Shine Shot mode reaches the optimal temperature of 185°C to leave your strands ultra-glossy and free from frizz. Your hair styling rituals are ready for their upgrade...
how_to_use: Apply ghd sleek talker before using ghd duet style for elevated results with up to 72h of hair softness and smoothness, longer-lasting frizz control, and 4X more hair alignment. Ensure hair is towel dried before use. Slide the power button upgwards to turn on your Duet Styler. After a few seconds you will hear the fan ramp up as it heats up to the optimal low styling temperature for wet hair. Once the light stops flashing and the product beeps, it s ready to use. Divide your hair. Take the first section and place the product close to the roots holding for three seconds. Glide down the hair towards the ends in a slow and steady pace. Repeat until dry and move onto the next section of hair, starting once again from the roots. Once the hair is fully dry, for an optional boost of shine, active Shine Shot by pressing down the Shine Shot button for four seconds until you hear a beep. The fan will stop and the plate temperature will increase to the optimal ghd styling of 185°C. Once the product beeps and the lights stop flashing, Shine Shot is ready. Your Duet Style can now be used as a regular styler, for instant frizz-free hair. If you wish to return from Shine Shot back to wet to style mode, press and hold the Shine Shot button for two seconds. Your tool will beep as the plates cool down and the fan will start. The 'ready to use' tone will play when it's safe to use on wet hair.
ingredient: The Duet has a UK 3-pin Plug. No thermal hair damage detected after 4 passes in wet to style mode vs naturally dried hair. Automatic sleep mode switches off your styler off after 30 minutes of non-use, for peace of mind.

name: ghd Creative Curl Wand (28-23mm) ghd Creative Curl Wand (28-23mm)
description: For tousled loose curls and beachy waves, step right this way. The ghd creative curl tong is cleverly tapered from a round 28mm to an oval 23mm tip without a clamp to allow for a wide variety of long-lasting styles across all hair types and lengths - even shorter styles. As with all of ghd's heat styling tools, it maintains a research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. Ingenious ultra-zone technology upholds this across the entire barrel throughout styling by recognising each section of hair and adapting the heat accordingly. There's no clamp to secure tips in place, but instead there's a ghd styling glove included and a protective cool tip to hold strands in place while you're styling, not to mention a safety stand for resting the wand on a hard surface. Putting a full stop on those heart-racing 'did I leave my curlers on' moments, the device will automatically turn off after 30 minutes. What more could you ask for in a curl tong?!
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For natural-looking curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For beachy, loose waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The tong has a UK three-pin plug. Packaging may vary.

name: BYREDO Bal d'Afrique Hair Perfume BYREDO Bal d'Afrique Hair Perfume
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hair (or create a totally bespoke scent of your own thanks to scent layering), you need to discover the brand's range of hair perfumes and particularly, Bal d'Afrique Hair Perfume. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome cans, BYREDO's Bal d'Afrique Hair Perfume enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving hair luminous, nourished and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Inspired by Paris in the late 1920s – where an infatuation with African culture, art, music and dance flooded the streets with vibrancy, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of earthy bucchu, spicy-musky African marigold and zesty bergamot, lemon and neroli which drenches you in rich history, euphoria, nostalgic longing and a touch of mystical allure.
how_to_use: Spritz in a cloud just above your head and walk through it to perfume your hair.

name: Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Conditioner Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Conditioner
description: The perfect follow-up from Briogeo's Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo, this creamy conditioner is bursting with antioxidant-rich fruits to support healthy-looking hair and scalp. Inspired by your favourite fruit smoothie, inside you'll find nourishing fruit extracts that are bursting with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants to nourish and protect hair. Naturally derived papaya enzymes are harnessed to help balance oil production while cherry extract (an impressive source of natural sugars) helps to flood your hair with hydration and antioxidant-rich vitamin C. Finally, mango extract helps to protect against free radical damage to minimise hair dullness. Boasting a vegan and cruelty-free formula that also contains zero sulphates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, DEA or artificial dyes, you can be sure that this Briogeo range is strand-friendly.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing. For best results, shampoo first with Briogeo Superfoods™ Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo. Due to the use of plant-based ingredients, the product colour may shift over time—this will not affect performance. This product uses natural colourants, which may fade over time in the formula — it’s still effective and safe to use! Natural separation may occur. For external use only. Do not ingest.

name: R+Co Lost Treasure ACV Conditioner 6 oz R+Co Lost Treasure ACV Conditioner 6 oz
description: Paving the way for softer, shinier and healthier tresses the Lost Treasure Apple Cider Vinegar Conditioner is your new hair care must-have.  Do you find traditional conditioners too heavy for your strands? Or maybe you’re looking to elevate your wash day rituals with a new detangling and quick-to-rinse formula? Whatever your goals, R+Co’s latest creation is sure to hit the mark. As you work this liquified formula through your mane from roots to ends a blend of turmeric plant milk and reishi and chaga mushrooms cloak your strands in a protective and softening sheen. The hero ingredient — apple cider vinegar — lowers the pH whilst closing damaged cuticles to reveal a mirror-like shine. Combined with growth-promoting biotin and scalp-nourishing almond milk, consider this is your healthy hair rehab.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Repair Hair Mask 200ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Repair Hair Mask 200ml
description: Delivering an intensive shot of targeted repair to dry and damaged locks in serious tress distress, the Repair Hair Mask by Dr. Barbara Sturm gives visibly nourished, silky, glossy and healthy hair. Featuring cationic hyaluronic acid (a uniquely formulated version of hyaluronic acid that hydrates and targets each strand with an ultra-conditioning effect) plus organic shea butter, this treatment ensures soft, supple and shiny hair that feels instantly more moisturised and manageable. Hemi-squalane, which is a plant-based substitute to silicones, prepares hair for styling while a complex of algae and lavender calms, soothes and rebalances irritated scalps. But that’s not all — pro-vitamin B5 smooths the outer layer of your hair without weighing it down, while vitamin-rich sunflower sprouts and tara extract even protect both hair and scalp against heat, pollution particles, colour fade and UV stress.

Promising a creamy, light-as-snow texture and not a hint of crunch in sight, Davines’ latest root-raising formula creates a natural-looking body that doesn’t leave you wanting to immediately repeat the hair wash process. Instead of heavy, uncomfortable strands, this volume-boosting creation grants an airy volume on any hair type, so you can blow dry your mane exactly how you want to... sans the ‘80s throwbacks.

name: Davines MOMO Moisturising Conditioner 250ml Davines MOMO Moisturising Conditioner 250ml
description: This pH 3.5 conditioner is formulated using a group of ingredients that work as a team to quench the thirst of dehydrated hair creating a light, protective layer on each strand. Milk thistle oil, which is packed with essential fatty acids and natural polymer rhizobian gum attract and hold moisture, locking it in to the shaft, but only where it is needed. The pathenol (also known as pro-vitamin B5) and jojoba oil strengthen, soften and add shine without weighing the hair down.

name: Innersense Clarity Conditioner 295ml Innersense Clarity Conditioner 295ml
description: Allow us to introduce you to Innersense’s latest innovative formulation. The Clarity Conditioner is the perfect creation to care for the tresses of those prone to sensitivities and allergies alike. Available in a travel-friendly 59ml and full sized 295ml so you can keep your strands perfectly nourished no matter if you’re at home or on-the-go. If your scalp and strands are in turmoil then you’ve come to the right corner to the beautysphere. A healthy scalp goes strand in strand with healthy hair and thanks to a calming dose of colloidal oatmeal, hydrating manuka honey and omega-rich organic apricot kernel oil this conditioner will achieve exactly that. Softer strands and more vibrant looking locks are swiftly coming your way. Deeply hydrating and endlessly calming, this is a moment of clarity for your hair care rituals...
how_to_use: After cleansing, take a deep breath and appreciate clean, hydrated hair. Apply 1-2 pumps in hands, emulsify and distribute from mid-length to ends with fingertips or comb. Leave on 1-5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

name: BYREDO Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume BYREDO Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hair (or create a totally bespoke scent of your own thanks to scent layering), you need to discover the brand's range of hair perfumes and particularly, Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome cans, BYREDO's Rose of No Man's Land Hair Perfume enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving hair luminous, nourished and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Created as a gentle tribute to selflessness and compassion, the Rose of No Man's Land Eau de Parfum celebrates the nickname given to nurses by soldiers during World War One, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of pink pepper and Turkish rose petals tickle the senses alongside a vibrant heart of raspberry blossom and Turkish rose absolute, this charming fragrance acts as a comforting and soothing presence.

name: WetBrush Go Green Detangling Comb - Coconut Oil WetBrush Go Green Detangling Comb - Coconut Oil
description: For beauties that prefer to tackle their mane with a comb rather than a brush — and don’t want to sacrifice the earth for the sake of their hair care routine — the Go Green Detangling Treatment Comb is the answer. A truly pain-free approach to styling your tresses, this wide tooth comb features a special ‘WaveTooth’ design (you’ll spot the slightly zigzagged pins) which helps the comb to slip through your tangles without snagging, pulling or causing unnecessary breakage. To reduce the amount of plastic within your collection, this handy comb is made from a more sustainable bamboo fibre (we love to see it). And finally, to treat your hair as you tease it, each comb in the range is infused with oils and minerals to tackle different hair concerns: ‘Tea Tree Oil’ balances your scalp for a healthier mane right from the root; ‘Coconut Oil’ conditions, smooths and adds softness; and ‘Charcoal’ absorbs excess sebum and impurities from the hair.

name: Davines Naturaltech Renewing Shampoo 250ml Davines Naturaltech Renewing Shampoo 250ml
description: Ultra-gentle, ultra-nourishing and ultra-effective, Davines’ Renewing Shampoo is the perfect mane cleanser for anyone looking to care for their hair and scalp without relying on harsh, irritating ingredients. The ‘Renewing System’ stimulates skin cell turnover using antioxidant-rich spinach extract while maqui berry — an impressive superfood that originates from South America — reduces inflammation and promotes scalp health. Expect softer, shinier and fuller hair – no parabens or sulphates in sight.

name: VIRTUE Flourish Hair Rejuvenation Treatment (3 Month Supply) VIRTUE Flourish Hair Rejuvenation Treatment (3 Month Supply)
description: The secret to stopping thinning strands in their tracks, Virtue's Hair Rejuvenation Treatment Kit contains a trio of potent, volume-boosting hair heroes that promise to improve the health of your scalp and stimulate hair growth along the way. So, what's in this three-step regimen (which, by the way, is lightly fragranced with bright citrus and fresh florals for a truly spa-worthy hair wash routine)? First up is the Flourish Shampoo for Thinning Hair, which cleanses and purifies hair at the scalp, unclogging the hair cuticle to allow for thicker, healthier regrowth - all while adding bounce and shine. Next is Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair which is packed with alpha and gamma keratin, proteins that repair damage along the hair shaft, reinforcing hair strength and elasticity and preventing breakage or fall out. Finish your routine with the Flourish Density Booster, a phyto-follicle nutrient-infused treatment to stimulate hair growth at the scalp while also thickening strands for pumped up volume.
how_to_use: Shampoo: Work a quarter-sized amount of shampoo into a rich lather between palms. Apply to wet hair and massage into the scalp, starting at the nape of your neck and working the lather through the ends. Rinse thoroughly. Conditioner: Work a quarter-sized amount of conditioner between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1–3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. Density Booster: Use once daily, on damp or dry hair. Lift hair into sections and spray directly onto the scalp. Gently massage in and do not rinse.

name: Davines Love/ Smoothing Instant Mask 250ml Davines Love/ Smoothing Instant Mask 250ml

Infused with minuta olive extract, this hero ingredient is rich in fatty acids and vitamins, making it a nourishing cocktail of anti-frizz action. Rich in appearance but lightweight in application, this mask gets straight to work on taming hair without compromising volume. Within 30 seconds, your hair will be a smoother version of itself and provides an easier canvas to work on for straightening and styling to satisfaction. It’s also designed to help comb unruly tresses and add illustrious shine. Exceptional hair benefits aside, how could we ignore that lush pastel purple colour? In true Davines fashion, amazing hair care is even better when it’s absolute eye candy.

name: Davines VOLU Shampoo Bar 100g Davines VOLU Shampoo Bar 100g

An extension of their fan-favourite shampoo line, Davines' Solid Shampoo Bars boast a solid texture that develops into a rich creamy foam that cleanses without stripping your strands. Suited to fine, limp lengths, the VOLU Naked Shampoo is enriched with turnip root extract to promote enviable body, shine and softness. This detoxifying pre-wash is powered by mineral-rich thermal mud to balance and purify your scalp, relieving the sensation of oily roots. An infusion of spirulina (a nutrient-rich marine algae) helps to support the effectiveness of your scalp’s barrier function, bolstering it against pollution and external aggressors for healthier-looking hair. Expect your scalp to be left feeling comfortable, your roots freshened and your hair soft, manageable and healthy-looking.

name: VIRTUE Flourish Hair Rejuvenation Treatment (1 Month Supply) 180ml VIRTUE Flourish Hair Rejuvenation Treatment (1 Month Supply) 180ml
description: The secret to stopping thinning strands in their tracks, Virtue’s Hair Rejuvenation Treatment Kit contains a trio of potent, volume-boosting hair heroes that promise to improve the health of your scalp and stimulate hair growth along the way. name: Virtue Full Conditioner - Professional Size Virtue Full Conditioner - Professional Size
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Full Conditioner, a game-changing way to care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Conditioner also creates enviable volume, deeply moisturising without adding weight and creating lasting lift, body and lustre. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and artichoke leaf, loaded with lipids and protein to help seal and strengthen your hair’s cuticle. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. What's more, after one week of using the shampoo and conditioner in a clinical trial, 87% of users reported that their hair had more body, while 84% found their hair felt thicker!
how_to_use: Work a small amount between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, pair with your favourite Virtue Shampoo.

name: VIRTUE Refresh Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 150ml VIRTUE Refresh Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 150ml
description: Virtue's Exfoliating Scalp Treatment is an ultra-lightweight, whipped crème treatment that gently sloughs away dirt, product build-up as well as dead skin cells while it also balances and conditions without adding an unwanted residue. A must-have for scalps in need, Virtue's Exfoliating Scalp Treatment is a luxe, deep conditioning treatment that effectively sloughs away dirt, product build-up as well as dead skin cells all while being completely non-irritating to sensitive scalps. Brimming with rice beads and fruit enzymes (that act like BHAs) to provide dual-action enzymatic scalp exfoliation, unclogging pores and optimising follicle growth and stimulation. All while the brand's Holy Grail Alpha Keratin 60ku® formula as well as the additions of Kalahari melon oil and jojoba oil surge hair with moisture as it repairs for a healthy finish. But it doesn't stop there, results from a clinical trial revealed that 95% of women immediately felt their scalp was cleaner and their hair was more conditioned and after one month of use, 93% felt their hair and scalp were more moisturized and hydrated.

Use once or twice a week in place of conditioner or mask.

description: Tailored to the needs of short hair, Virtue’s 6-in-1 Styling Paste not only provides impressive hold, texture and shine but also protects your strands against the perils of heat styling. name: Briogeo Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating & Defining Hair Mask Briogeo Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating & Defining Hair Mask
description: Briogeo's Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating & Defining Hair Mask boosts curl definition and enhances slip to reveal bouncy, vibrant curls. Available in a full size and travel friendly-sized offering, Briogeo is here to ensure that curls, coils and waves get the care and attention they need. Upping the ante on your weekly hair self care, this multi-tasking mask gives curls, waves and coils (types 2A to 4C) exactly what they need to maintain a frizz-free finish. Rice amino acids, the star of the show, seal the hair cuticle to lock out the humidity that causes frizz, leaving smooth, perfectly formed curls. Meanwhile, ultra-hydrating avocado oil helps hair to retain moisture, increasing elasticity to protect against damage. Working to support and reinforce the hair cuticle is tomato fruit ferment, resulting in consistent curl formation, and who doesn’t want that? Perfectly safe for colour-, keratin- and chemically-treated hair,simply add this to your once a week self care rituals to keep your curls in check.

Start with one section and massage the mask into the hair from root to tip. Use a wide tooth comb to distribute the mask evenly and detangle with added slip. After the fourth section is complete, leave the mask in for at least 10 minutes beforerinsing. For enhanced curl definition, style with our Curl Charisma™ Leave-In DefiningCrème, Coil Custard, and/or Frizz Control Gel.

name: Slip Pure Silk Turban (Various Colours) Slip Pure Silk Turban (Various Colours)

name: Frank Body Exfoliating Scalp Serum 70ml Frank Body Exfoliating Scalp Serum 70ml
description: Packed with naturally-derived ingredients designed to slough away dead skin cells and nourish a sensitive scalp, frank body’s AHA Exfoliating Scalp Serum brings all the targeted goodness of a skin care serum to your hair. The water-based formula gently breaks down dead skin to reveal a flake free head and lots of shine. Healthy hair starts with a healthy scalp, which is why this easy-to-apply serum contains prebiotics. Not just good for your gut, prebiotics work to balance your skin’s microbiome — that’s the millions of bacteria and fungi that make up your skin flora. While that might sound... well, kind of gross, your skin’s microbiome is actually essential to its health and happiness. When it's thrown out of whack by harsh, drying products or environmental changes, your skin can easily become dry and irritated. To complement these prebiotics is lactic acid, a beloved AHA that gently exfoliates your scalp for a clearer, flake-free head.

But that’s not all — this magical elixir even protects both hair and scalp against heat, pollution particles and UV stress via vitamin-rich sunflower sprouts and tara extract.

description: Nothing - and we mean nothing - trumps the feeling of truly cleansed hair and with the sought-after On the Rocks Lightweight Conditioner proudly perched in your bathroom cabinet, that's what you're bargaining for and trust us when we say this definitely won't disappoint... Delivering salon-worthy freshness to hair riddled with grease, build up from countless serums and gels, excess oils and dirt, this ultra-lightweight conditioner effectively softens your strands to restore your once-bouncy tresses to their original form. Perfect for all hair types, textures and curls, get heads turning wherever you go with that brand new feeling that'll have you swishing from left to right.

name: ghd Glide Limited Edition - Smoothing Hot Brush in Sun-Kissed Bronze ghd Glide Limited Edition - Smoothing Hot Brush in Sun-Kissed Bronze
description: Treating your tresses to the Midas touch, the Glide in Sun-Kissed Bronze with Bright Gold Metallic Accents is the not-so-secret key to silky softness that you won’t be able to stop running your fingers through. The holy grail of effortless and easy hairstyling tools, this gold-plated tool tames unruly lengths in a few quick strokes for a sleek ‘n smooth finish. Suitable for all hair types, use this tool to detangle and shape your hair. Designed with ceramic technology and an anti-static ioniser, the brush has a uniform temperature to evenly straighten your hair and take frizz out of the equation. As with all of ghd’s heat styling tools, it maintains a research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. The art of the brush lies with the mix of high-density bristles of varying lengths that glide through easily and style large sections at once, giving your hair natural movement that doesn’t fall flat. For total peace of mind, this tool will automatically enter sleep mode after 60 minutes of non-use.

name: We Are Paradoxx Detox Conditioner 250ml We Are Paradoxx Detox Conditioner 250ml
description: This gentle conditioner removes impurities and restores hair with a blend of oils that will no doubt let your natural (and coloured!) locks shine through. Striking the delicate balance between cleansing and hydrating is no easy feat but We are Paradoxx have done it right yet again. Behold their unique ingredients: nettle leaf with its power to promote hair growth and shine; green tea gives our hair follicles a nurturing hug while fighting off stubborn bacterial build-up, and of course, the formula wouldn’t be complete without coconut and argan oil to add shine you can’t ignore. Your search for a lightweight conditioner stops here — you’re welcome.

name: BeautyBio Rejuvenating Scalp + Fuller Hair Therapy BeautyBio Rejuvenating Scalp + Fuller Hair Therapy
description: Ergonomically designed to hug the contours of your scalp, the GloPRO Scalp Attachment features cushion-flex technology to stimulate your follicles and lessen irritation for a healthy head of hair (with fewer flakes). Waging two-pronged attack on the first signs of thinning and hair loss (whether due to stress, over-styling or postpartum) – as well as persistent scalp itchiness – this kit pairs the GloPRO with specialist Healthy Scalp Serum to help ‘reawaken’ the scalp and get right to the root of your worries. Formulated with proprietary FolliGRO Complex – a nutrient-rich cocktail of loquat leaf, rosebay extract, larch tree, camellia leaf extract and zinc, all carefully chosen (and clinically proven) to improve hair density, dissolve damaging build-up and regulate oil production – this penetrates the ‘micro channels’ made by microneedling to counteract scales from the get-go while visibly thickening hair in as little as 60 days, with full results in six months’ time.
how_to_use: Use GloPRO® SCALP on clean, product-free hair. Hair may be damp or dry. Part hair into sections, lightly hold hair taut and in parallel with hair strands, gently glide GloPRO® back and forth over the scalp for about 5 seconds per target area. Continue parting hair and using GloPRO® until all desired areas have been treated. Use the precision tip on the serum tube to help part hair. Apply 2-3 drops directly to scalp on each target area massaging gently. Repeat until all desired areas have been treated. Warning: Do not roll GloPRO® SCALP attachment through loose hair. Do not use the SCALP Attachment on the face, lips, eyelid, eye area or body. GloPRO is a cosmetic beauty device which helps improve the appearance of hair with mild to moderate thinning, dryness and itchiness and is not intended to treat or correct severe cases of complete baldness. For morning and evening use.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Eriobotrya Japonica Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Disodium Edta, Sodium Metabisulfite, Zinc Chloride, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Innersense Clarity Hairbath 59ml Innersense Clarity Hairbath 59ml
description: Allow us to introduce you to Innersense’s latest innovative formulation. The Clarity Hairbath is the perfect creation to care for the tresses of those prone to sensitivities and allergies alike. Available in a travel-friendly 59ml and full sized 295ml so you can keep your strands perfectly cleansed no matter if you’re at home or on-the-go. As gentle as it is soothing, this hypoallergenic shampoo is the best start to your wash day if you’re looking to attain a balanced scalp and lustrous strands. Japanese swertia and comfrey leaf keep stressed skin calmed; after all a healthy scalp goes strand in strand with healthy hair. Teeming with amino acids, extract of chufa milk helps to moisturise and boost elasticity of your mane while imparting its antioxidant-rich benefits to scalps in need of a little TLC. Cleansing and calming, this is a moment of clarity for your hair care rituals...
how_to_use: Take a deep breath and become centred. Apply a small amount of Hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. With fingertips, massage into scalp. Rinse thoroughly.

name: ghd Helios™ Professional Hair Dryer - White ghd Helios™ Professional Hair Dryer - White
description: Fancy an extra ten minutes in bed every morning? Silly question… Usher the game-changing Helios Professional Hair Dryer into your life to secure extra shut-eye and head-turning tresses. Lightweight and easy to wield, this brilliant tool is the ultimate partner in crime against frizz, ‘fluff’ and flyaways – slashing your drying time, smoothing your strands and diminishing damage for bouncy results. With a brilliant brushless motor for consistent 75mph airflow, alongside proprietary Aeroprecis technology for targeted styling and maximum control, this hush-hush hair dryer is rapid and quiet (it’s got its own acoustic system!). Boasting variable power and temperature controls – as well as a cool shot to set your style – this elevates every blowout for a sleek, shiny finish with much less tress trauma (9/10 users agree). With a professionally designed contoured nozzle and 3m flex for ease of use, it’s time to take your hair to drying hair-ven.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Then use the hair dryer to style your hair into your desired fashion.

description: Made with graphene-infused plates, this pro-level tool can be used to create an array of incredible styles, all with a sleek, smooth and shiny finish. What makes it so innovative? This industry-leading hair styler employs the Nobel prize-winning graphene for the first time ever in beauty; the material is the world’s most effective heat conductor so it evenly distributes heat from root to tip at a lower temperature to avoid damaging your hair – in a study, it had 58% less breakage compared to control at 1400 strokes. What’s more, the proprietary ceramic mineral complex in the tool helps to hydrate and condition your hair, working to penetrate each strand with moisture and seal the cuticle for softer, healthier and more shiny tresses. Simply choose the UK or EU plug option to make sure it is suitable for your use.

name: Bio:Ionic 3-in-1 Curler Wand and Flat Iron with UK Plug Bio:Ionic 3-in-1 Curler Wand and Flat Iron with UK Plug
description: A 3-in-1 tool that facilitates virtually limitless looks, Bio:Ionic’s phenomenal NanoIonic MX Styling Iron is perfect for those who love mixing things up – allowing creation of curls or a sleek, silky finish with one clever, multi-use wand. Powered by NanoIonic MX – a proprietary complex of natural minerals that infuses moisture back into the hair while styling – the ‘Moisturizing Heat’ ensures your strands stay sleek and free from frizz while cherishing your precious hair. Combining a flat iron, curling iron and wand with its space-saving (luggage lightening!) design, set to ‘Curl’ and use the clamp to create more defined curls as hair glides freely around the 1.25” barrel, or close the clamp to use as a wand and achieve a more tousled effect. Switch to ‘Straight’ to unlock the plates and pass through hair from roots to ends to combat frizz and leave locks with a healthy shine. Featuring an extra long 9’ swivel cord and adjustable temperature (up to 430˚F/220˚C), as well as a soft-touch texture for comfort and non-slip grip and a ‘cool-touch tip’ for optimised control, this is the must-have, tress-taming gadget.

name: Drybar Blonde Ale Vibrance-Boosting Brightening Powder Drybar Blonde Ale Vibrance-Boosting Brightening Powder
description: If your blonde tresses are lacking their usual lustre then it's time to bring them back to life with the Blonde Ale Vibrance-Boosting Brightening Powder - specifically created for lighter locks to add shine and enhance highlights, and all in just 5 minutes! This twice-monthly treatment takes dull blonde, grey, white and highlighted hair and brings it back to life with shine-inducing powerhouse ingredients. When life gives you lemons... you add them to your hair care routine! A lemon powder extract naturally brightens dullness, with a heavy hitting dose of ascorbic acid working to remove minerals and hard water deposits that can take away your hair's shine and vibrance. Sure to lock in moisture for ultra-soft strands, vitamin B5 adds a mirror-like shine to the dullest of tresses. A post-shampoo treatment that does all the hard work for you, you'll wonder what you ever did before these ginger and mint-scented packettes of potent powder.

A once-a-week pre-shampoo hair treatment, the No.3 Hair Perfector reforms shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your locks beyond repair. So much more than your average regular-degular shampoo, the newly launched No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo gently lifts away weighty dirt, debris and build-up from your hair with just one use. name: Living Proof Curl Conditioner Travel Size 100ml Living Proof Curl Conditioner Travel Size 100ml
description: Whether you’re wavy, curly or coily, the Curl Conditioner cares for all kinds of kinks – swiftly kicking dryness and tangled strands to the curb. Made to moisturise and detangle all textures without leaving a heavy residue or causing a greasy scalp, this thick and creamy formula is infused with Living Proof’s ‘Healthy Curl Complex’ – preventing damage and encouraging curl groupings with every wash – so that you end up with strong, defined curls straight from the shower. Working to make curls three times stronger, this hard-working formula ensures hair looks healthier after just one use, and effortlessly gets to work without interfering with chemically treated or coloured lengths.
how_to_use: Apply and spread throughout wet hair. Work product from root to tip to detangle your hair. For stronger textures, work through hair in sections using a comb or brush to begin forming curl groupings. Rinse as desired. Tip: As this formula is intensely conditioning, it has a much thicker consistency. Keep the cap open when you shake the product to dispense.

name: Molton Brown Volumising Conditioner with Nettle 300ml Molton Brown Volumising Conditioner with Nettle 300ml
description: The universally nourishing, vegan-friendly Volumizing Nettle Conditioner simultaneously softens and adds instant body to your tresses with the hero ingredient of nettle, while an uplifting citrus blend of grapefruit, magnolia, and cedar lingers on your lengths for lasting freshness. Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of conditioner is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-hair ingredients that smooth, detangle and diminish breakage while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances linger on your hair all day long. Ultra-smoothing and shine-enhancing, the Volumizing Nettle Conditioner infuses your lengths with lasting moisture and silk-like softness that you’ll have to stop yourself from stroking. Calling upon fresh nettle, hydroponically grown in London's underground tunnels, this volume-boosting conditioner weightlessly nourishes and revives fine hair. Plus, it's free from gluten, nut, parabens and phthalates!
how_to_use: Massage into damp hair after washing with Molton Brown's Volumising Shampoo With Nettle.

name: Kitsch Eco Friendly Adjustable Headband Set in Sand Kitsch Eco Friendly Adjustable Headband Set in Sand
description: A great way for keeping your hair off your face without breaking your delicate baby hair, Kitsch's Eco-Friendly Adjustable Headbands are made from soft, breathable cotton – complete with an adjustable tie for cosy wear – to keep your fringe clean when you’re cleansing or sleeping (or make up-ing). In a chic ecru shade, this indispensable accessory-slash-statement piece is made from eco-friendly breathable cotton that respects even ultra-fine strands and keeps breakage at bay. With an adjustable tie to fit it perfectly to your head, this band has been lovingly designed with you in mind – simplifying the arts of face-washing, moisturising, make up application or… most importantly – napping! Tie it as a bow at the front for a stylish look or at the back for a more classic one.
how_to_use: Use to secure your hair from your face when you're sleeping (or working or cleansing... you name it). Adjust the size to comfortably fit your head.
ingredient: Cotton 100%.

name: Omorovicza Revitalising Scalp Mask 200ml Omorovicza Revitalising Scalp Mask 200ml
description: For an instant hair health boost, Omorovicza’s Revitalising Scalp Mask is the pre-shampoo treatment your shower ritual is crying out for. Promising results that are sure to go straight to your head, Omorovicza has poured its wealth of skin care knowledge into this formula so that you can show your scalp the same love as the rest of your skin. The formula is enriched with Hungarian Moor mud to detoxify and revitalise the scalp and promote healthier hair; cooling menthol and camphor provide immediate relief for irritated, itchy scalps and salicylic acid provides gentle exfoliation to remove dead skin cells and unblock hair follicles to promote growth and volume. As well as this, a conditioning blend of essential oils – including mint leaf, lavender and lemon peel – cool and stimulate blood circulation to the scalp, also providing anti-inflammatory and antiseptic benefits. Rapeseed deeply nourishes hair to leave it soft and silky, while Apricot kernel oil rejuvenates the scalp and encourages cell renewal.
how_to_use: Using the tube applicator, apply a generous amount directly to a dry scalp. Once applied massage the mask into the scalp and leave for 10-20 minutes before rinsing hair thoroughly.

name: invisibobble Sprunchie - Rosie Star invisibobble Sprunchie - Rosie Star
description: Designed in collaboration with jewellery designer Rosie Fortescue, invisibobble's Sprunchie - Rosie Star transcends the simple bobble and enters the realm of hair jewellery with its elegant pink style. We can't decide if we like it more in our hair or on our wrists... What happens when a hair care classic meets a modern icon? A Sprunchie, that’s what! Wrapping the iconic invisibobble Original in luxurious fabric, this is the coolest Scrunchie we’ve ever come across, providing all the benefits of the brand’s innovative spiral shape. Offering strong hold without compromising on comfort, the Sprunchie is very easy to remove, minimising tangles and damage (we’re talking split ends an breakage, people!) The soft, shiny velvet exterior means this looks great on your wrist as well as in your hair and this on-trend pink shade is set to become a star amongst your other strand accessories.
how_to_use: Use to tie up hair or wear on your wrist.

name: Baxter of California Daily Fortifying Conditioner 236ml Baxter of California Daily Fortifying Conditioner 236ml
description: Established in 1965, Baxter of California is a curated collection of men’s grooming products that melds simplicity with efficacy through their edit of natural ingredient empowered formulas. Finish up your washing routine with the Daily Fortifying Conditioner for easily manageable, smooth lengths that are ready for whatever your styling routine throws at them. Jam-packed with nutrients to encourage a healthy head of hair, this lightweight cream deeply moisturises and softens; wheat protein and vitamin E deliver subtle, natural shine and softness, while coconut extract infuses essential nutrients into the scalp and hair for a deep dose of hydration. Formulated with a boost of mint, you’ll feel it getting to work with a refreshing, tingling sensation and the clean, herbal scent lingers even after rinsing. Now available in the original (237ml) and an even-bigger bottle (437ml), you can stock on this shower staple.
how_to_use: Massage into cleansed hair. For deeper conditioning, leave in 2 to 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Baxter of California Daily Fortifying Shampoo Travel Size Baxter of California Daily Fortifying Shampoo Travel Size
description: Established in 1965, Baxter of California is a curated collection of men’s grooming products that melds simplicity with efficacy through their edit of natural ingredient empowered formulas. An essential first step in any routine, the Daily Fortifying Shampoo lifts dirt and grease along with long-wearing product residue for an ultra-clean base. This shampoo is empowered by wheat protein and vitamin E to repair and cleanse without stripping your hair of its natural oils, while coconut extract delivers a wealth of nutrients to encourage natural hair growth and deeply moisturise. The result? Hair that looks and feels strong and healthy. With a refreshing burst of mint, you’ll feel the formula getting to work with a stimulating tingling sensation and a lasting clean scent. Pick from two sizes, the full size (473ml) or a mini (60ml) that's perfect for travelling with your go-to or discovering a firm favourite before investing in a full size.

name: dpHUE Brightening Powder for Blonde Highlighted Hair dpHUE Brightening Powder for Blonde Highlighted Hair
description: Restoring brightness and shine your blonde strands in just five minutes, dpHUE’s Brightening Powder is ideal for when your highlights are looking dull and greyish. It works by pulling out chlorine, minerals and metals from your hair, revealing brilliantly bright tones. How? It’s formulated with 15% vitamin C and a chelating agent that draws out impurities and product residue. This means hair feels light and airy as well as looking much more vibrant. Designed to be used after shampooing but before conditioning, mix the powder with water to work it into a paste before massaging it into your hair. Although it has the most visible results on blonde and highlighted hair, it can be used on darker hair to purify it without impacting its colour.
how_to_use: Shampoo with dpHUE Gentle Brightening Shampoo (sold separately). Pour one sachet of Brightening Powder into your palm and mix with water to create a paste. Apply from roots to ends and work through for 5 minutes. Rinse and follow with dpHUE Gentle Brightening Conditioner (sold separately). Use every other week.
ingredient: Sucrose, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Inosito.

name: Drybar Jump Start Quick Dry Blowout Serum Travel Size 25ml Drybar Jump Start Quick Dry Blowout Serum Travel Size 25ml
description: An award-winning formula designed to speed up your blow-dry, Drybar’s Jump Start Quick Dry Blowout Serum Travel Size protects, moisturises and smooths. Suitable for use on damp hair, the serum utilises a pliable polymer blend to help prolong the look of your style. Heat-activated rice proteins deliver heat protection of up to 232°C, while fruit extracts lend brightening and softening benefits. Fragranced with an invigorating blend of jasmine, black pepper and sandalwood. Vegan and certified cruelty-free.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Refreshing Protective Mist 100ml Aveda Scalp Solutions Refreshing Protective Mist 100ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Refreshing Protective Mist, your new hair care essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Suitable for all scalp types, this refreshing hair mist treatment utilises zinc PCA and liquorice excess oil under control and extends the time betwee washes (phew!). But why stop there... a carefully selected a end of adaptogenic botanicals, vitamin E, and rosemary and ginger extracts combine to create an invisible shield that fends off oxidative stressors and pollution. Whether you need a mid-day pick me up or some last-minute social plans are interfering with your wash day routine, this scalp-loving mist is here to save the day.

name: ghd The Mini All-Rounder Paddle Hair Brush ghd The Mini All-Rounder Paddle Hair Brush
description: No hairstyling kit is truly complete without a travel companion to keep your locks in check 24/7. And that's exactly what ghd's Mini All-Rounder Paddle Brush does. It might be small but it doesn't compromise on versatility or features, so you can rest assured that your hair will look salon-fresh, no matter how busy your schedule. Like the full-size version, this handbag hero has a non-slip handle and gently detangles without creating static - ready to smooth, set, or style when you're on the move.
how_to_use: For a quick and sleek blow-dry, blast dry hair until 80% dry. Brush hair from root to tip using swift strokes while following the direction of your brush with your hairdryer. Ensure your dryer’s nozzle is on to concentrate the air flow. For a straight fringe that sits perfectly, alternate between brushing to the left and right with the paddle brush, while blasting with your dryer on a low heat and medium speed setting.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Super Anti-Aging Shampoo 250ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Super Anti-Aging Shampoo 250ml
description: Part of the Super-Anti Aging Collection, the Balancing Shampoo is the first step in a hydrating, soothing hair care routine, designed to promote scalp health and keep unwanted dryness, itchiness or flakiness at bay. The rich and creamy cleansing formula takes a three-pronged approach to promote your hair’s resiliency, boost hydration levels and leave it looking healthier than ever before. To strengthen strands right from the root, this shampoo includes a cocktail of antioxidant rich plant extracts like candle bush, sand oat, purslane and thorny knapweed. To foster ultra-smooth and shiny hair, it uses nourishing, split end-preventing pro-vitamin B5. And finally, to repair even the most-damaged locks (yes, even chemically treated hair!), there’s sunflower sprouts, tara extract and catatonic hyaluronic acid.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair, (allowing 1-2 minutes to work in), then rinse thoroughly.

name: Frank Body Dry-Clean Volume Powder 35g Frank Body Dry-Clean Volume Powder 35g
description: Part dry shampoo and part volumiser, frank body’s Dry-Clean Volume Powder is designed to give you all the ‘oomph’ you’re looking for while also sucking up excess oil that can make roots feel flat and heavy. Following the brand’s mission to skip out on the harsh, irritating ingredients in favour of more environmentally-friendly options that your skin will love, the Dry-Clean Volume Powder features vitamin E-rich rice bran to absorb oil and soothe an angry scalp, and hydrolysed keratin to smooth strands and reduce breakage. Alongside lengthening time between washes (yes please), the formula adds a slight ‘grittiness’ to the hair for added texture, bounce and ease when styling. With a dinky handheld bottle, you can throw this volumiser in your bag for the on-the-go touch ups too. Flat, limp hair? We don’t know her.
how_to_use: Tap powder into your hand or straight onto your scalp. Massage into your roots to absorb oil and add volume in between washes. Tease, flip, style, and play with your hair.

name: Aveda Men's Thickening Paste 75ml Aveda Men's Thickening Paste 75ml
description: Aveda's Thickening Paste instantly thickens hair and adds pliable hold to create any style. Making mane moulding ultra-effortless, the Thickening Paste delivers strong, long-lasting hold that enables any style. This 93% naturally-derived paste instantly thickens strands for a strong, defined look with the power of botanicals. Infused with amla, this magical ingredient helps thicken each individual hair strand making hair look and feel thicker from roots to ends and provides a highly versatile hold with a natural finish. Giving effortless, flexible movement and a natural matte finish, this is soon-to-be your styling staple.

name: MONPURE London Ultralight Healthy Hair Oil 100ml MONPURE London Ultralight Healthy Hair Oil 100ml
description: Designed to intensely nourish, enhance and hydrate your strands from root to tip, the Ultralight Healthy Hair Oil revives even the weakest of follicles with enviable shine as a result. Unlock advert-worthy tresses with a single drop… Powered by a strengthening cocktail of castor oil, vegan keratin, wheat germ oil and Q10, a potent antioxidant, this multitasking oil seals in resilient amounts of moisture that prevent breakage. Nurturing even the most fragile follicles with its vitamin-rich superpowers, the hair-oic elixir boosts elasticity with a silky smooth, conditioning feel. Repairing damage from hair woes of the past, this hydrating antidote for dry, brittle tresses restores your mane to its former glory.

name: R+Co Bleu De Luxe Reparative Conditioner R+Co Bleu De Luxe Reparative Conditioner
description: Granting salon-level shine to your strands on the daily, this beautifully rich Bleu De Luxe Reparative Conditioner feeds coarse, unruly and damaged hair with a hydrating cocktail of oils and botanical extracts. A must for fragile, tangle-prone tresses, this transformative formula helps to seal frayed cuticles, smooth split ends and improve the texture of your hair, all without weighing it down! What's behind the mane magic? It's infused with the brand's proprietary repair complex, alongside argan, tananu and marjuca oils, and blood orange and primrose extracts that all work in harmony to strengthen and protect your hair. The results? Your strands will not only look beautifully sleek, but they'll also feel stronger too! Aside from being vegan and cruelty-free (that deserves kudos in itself!), it's also made from 100% post-consumer recycled materials which use 88% less energy to produce. As for the experience, the styling staple is as much a delight for your senses as it is your strands; it's infused with the brand's 'Light Waves' scent - a delicate yet modern concoction of cardamom, pineapple, tangerine, lavender and bamboo.

name: Drybar Triple Sec 3-In-1 Finishing Spray Blanc Scent 118g Drybar Triple Sec 3-In-1 Finishing Spray Blanc Scent 118g
description: Amplify hair's volume with the Triple Sec 3-In-1 Finishing Spray from Drybar, a unique 3-in-1 styling spray expertly formulated to create a glamourous tousled appearance. The formula is powered by crystal clear microporous minerals that help to absorb excess oil, leaving hair with a mattified texture and fuller-looking finish. Suitable for all hair types, the vegan finishing spray is infused with notes of creamy coconut, vanilla and amber for a refreshing haircare experience.

name: ghd Glide Professional Hot Brush ghd Glide Professional Hot Brush
description: The holy grail of effortless and easy hairstyling tools, the Glide Hot Brush tames unruly lengths in a few quick strokes for a sleek ‘n smooth finish. Suitable for all hair types, use this tool to detangle and shape your hair. Designed with ceramic technology and an anti-static ioniser, the brush has a uniform temperature to evenly straighten your hair and take frizz out of the equation. As with all of ghd’s heat styling tools, it maintains a research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. The art of the brush lies with the mix of high-density bristles of varying lengths that glide through easily and style large sections at once, giving your hair natural movement that doesn’t fall flat. For total peace of mind, this tool will automatically enter a sleep mode after 60 minutes of non-use.
how_to_use: Glide through dry hair for effortless styling. Packaging may vary.

name: We Are Paradoxx Superfuel Face Hair and Body Treatment Oil 100ml We Are Paradoxx Superfuel Face Hair and Body Treatment Oil 100ml
description: This 2-in-1 treatment oil injects a powerful dose of hydration to get your skin and hair back into tip-top and (plump!) shape. Luxe and never greasy, this oil is one for all hair and skin types because we all deserve to smooth on a little (or a lot) of hydrating goodness. In true We are Paradoxx fashion, how you want to use this hair and skin saviour is up to you and your needs of that day, week or month! Whether you choose to dab onto skin or apply as a leave-in treatment to your hair, you’ll soak up the benefits of its triple active ingredients: Maracuja, Abyssinian and Argan oils. This holy trinity softens, brightens, and hydrates so your skin and hair can absorb all the vital nourishment it's been craving. If hair loss is a concern, consider Maracuja your new best friend. But it doesn’t stop there! A hardworking blend of vitamins and antioxidants protects and restores from the root so you not only get visible results but intense treatment that goes deeper, too. All of that in this one lightweight oil — you’re welcome.
how_to_use: For face, use in place of or added to your daily moisturiser. For body, apply to wet or dry skin. For hair, pour a small amount into your hands and work through clean, towel-dried hair, from mid-length to ends. Blow dry or let dry naturally. Apply on dry hair to tame flyaways, condition split ends and smooth hair. As an intense treatment, leave in overnight and shampoo out.

The cherry on top? It's laced with a head-turning aroma with notes of ginger, mint and sandalwood.

name: We Are Paradoxx Detox Scalp and Body Scrub 200g We Are Paradoxx Detox Scalp and Body Scrub 200g
description: For when our scalps and skin need a reset, exfoliate your way into renewed skin with this gentle 2-in-1 scrub. You have to admit, everyone gets a little too scrub-happy when it comes to exfoliators, and often, it can do more harm than good. Thankfully, this multi-tasking scrub from We are Paradoxx curbs that habit. Celtic sea salt does the leg work by deeply and effectively exfoliating to reveal a cleaner scalp and softer skin you won’t be able to keep your hands off. It also boasts an infusion of vitamins C, B, copper and zinc to intensely hydrate while lavender oil works to calm any irritation (not to mention smells amazing!). In case you didn’t know, We are Paradoxx have a tendency to take care of you in the long run: here, a healthy dose of macadamia oil encourages recovery from environmental factors that take a slow toll on our locks and skin. Hear that? It’s time to scrub-a-dub-dub!
how_to_use: To use on scalp, section wet hair to reveal scalp and massage in circular motions to gently exfoliate, then rinse. For body, apply to damp skin and massage in circular motions to gently exfoliate before rinsing.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY BALANCING.WASH KEVIN.MURPHY BALANCING.WASH
description: A do-it-all balancing shampoo that strengthens, revitalises and cleanses, the BALANCING.WASH calls on a cocktail of antioxidant-rich botanicals to restore equilibrium and add volume to greasy, flaky or coloured lengths. Sage leaf extract stimulates hair growth, clears toxins, encourages cell regeneration, cleanses greasy hair and clears flakes. Wheat amino acids promote hair growth, while grapefruit extract restores shine and balances your scalps pH levels. Flower oils offer intense shine, and lavender oil regulates oil production to help dry or oily scaps. All you need to revitalise, cleanse and refresh (as well as protect against heat damage!), this hardworking shampoo is vegan-friendly and suitable for all hair types.

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Shampoo 50ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Shampoo 50ml
description: Wash day starts with this supercharged, sulphate- and silicone-free shampoo that boasts a whole host of effects, from taming frizz to softening hair towards a smooth, sleek appearance. The Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Shampoo owes its powers to a plant polymer shield that provides a veil of protection over strands, effectively repelling water that interferes with your 'do. Once the frizz is under control, a blend of botanical oils comes into play for that smoothing effect you seek, namely Kalahari melon seed oil and tamanu oil smooths and conditions hair cuticles to reveal soft-to-the-touch locks and out-of-this-world shine. Lathering luxuriously to gently cleanse and remove impurities, and add moisture, we're sending a virtual hug to Aveda for making this vegan shampoo suitable for hair types across the fine, medium and thick spectrum, specifically, straight 1A, wavy 2A-2C, curly 3A-3C, coily 4A-4C and even colour-treated hair can cash in on this humidity-blocking hero.
how_to_use: The Smooth Infusion Anti-Frizz Shampoo is free from sulfate cleansers and infused with a botanical smoothing oil blend, therefore you might not get the lather or bubbles you often see when shampooing your hair. Shampoos with non-sulfate-based cleansers typically have a dense, creamy lather rather than open, airy bubbles. Adjust the amount of shampoo you apply. A little goes a long way. Try adding more water instead of more product. For optimal results, rinse thoroughly.

name: ghd Platinum+ White Straighteners ghd Platinum+ White Straighteners
description: Whether you’re after bouncy curls, beachy waves or sleek ‘n straight locks, ghd’s Platinum+ Styler won’t let you down – far from it! A revolutionary take on traditional heat styling tools, this winner of the 'Glamour Beauty Power List 2020 Best Hair Straightening Tool' can recognise your hair thickness and styling speed to deliver homogenous heat across the entire plate – that’s spot on 185ºC FYI – meaning consistent results and minimal damage. The precision milled, floating plates have a high spec glossy finish for snag-free use and shiny tresses, helped along by a rounded barrel and easily controlled wishbone hinge to ensure effortless styling. Once you’ve created your hair masterpiece and are setting off for a good day’s work (if brunch counts as work…), you can be rest assured knowing that the Platinum+ Styler will automatically enter sleep-mode after 30 minutes of non-use. Travelling? No problem! These wonder workers (which come in two different shades, BTW) have universal voltage, meaning they can be used wherever you want them, and a heat resistant protective plate guard to ensure you can take it on your travels without risk of burns. Trust us, after trying them there’s no going back…
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W.

name: Naturally Drenched Rebalanced Treatment With Reusable Pump 400ml Naturally Drenched Rebalanced Treatment With Reusable Pump 400ml
description: Been a while since you've given your hair some much-needed TLC? Well, it's time to reignite those tender, loving using the Rebalance Treatment with Reusable Pump! Housed in a brightly coloured bottle that's brimming with almond oil, bamboo extract, calendula and papaya, this is the ultimate cure-all treatment! Forget the Mac, it's the return of the bounce as this cocktail of hair-loving essentials strengthens your hair follicles one by one and coats them in moisture to prevent dryness or breakage. Got a frizzy curl? Tame that mane with just one pump (or 5 if you're likely to get pump-happy) and smooth its nourishment from root to tip. Preventing plastic waste from going to the landfill just got easier and more user-friendly with the Reusable Pump which allows you to reuse your Rebalance bottle over and over on holidays, for spa weekends away and self-care nights in. Perfect for all curl types and textures, you can elevate your entire hair care routine with this one product you never knew you needed... until now!
how_to_use: After shampooing hair, apply Rebalance Treatment from roots to ends, detangle with Rebalance in, and let sit for 3-5 minutes, then rinse, and apply conditioner. Unlock pump and push down to dispense product.

name: ghd Air Hair Dryer ghd Air Hair Dryer
description: Get a salon-quality blow dry without stepping foot in a salon! The ghd air™ hair dryer is fitted with a professional-strength 2100W motor and patented air filter for a high-pressure, high-performing flow of air that'll dry your tresses wonderfully speedily. Courtesy of advanced ionic technology, it also reduces frizz, granting smooth and shiny locks with minimum effort. Whether your locks are thick, thin or somewhere in between, variable power and temperature controls allow you to adjust the dryer to suit your individual hair needs - there's even a cool shot feature to hold your finished masterpiece in place. Suitable for both left and right handers, for easily-tired arm muscles (it weighs around 1.54kg) and for at-home and in-salon use, this universally alluring tool delivers universally pleasing results that're bound to turn you into a ghd addict (if you aren't already)!
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Then use the hair dryer to style your hair into your desired fashion. The hairdryer has a three-pin UK plug and a 2100 Watt motor. Packaging may vary.

description: Suitable for an impressive array of textures and types, from coily to wavy and curly, consider Living Proof's Curl Shampoo your first step towards stronger, more defined curls. With a creamy texture that promises never to strip your hair, this ultra-chic pink bottle will have you wondering why you ever dreaded washday... This beautifully rich low-lather shampoo is infused with Living Proof's Healthy Curl Complex - an innovative concoction of strand-loving ingredients that was perfected over 230 formulas, 650 curl tests, and 10,000(!) development hours - that means it gently yet effectively lifts styling product residue and grime without stripping your hair. Instead, it provides superior slip for weightless detangling, leaving you with stronger, more defined curls. Best of all, when used with the Curl Conditioner, this routine is seen to make curls 3 times stronger!
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Massage at scalp & work into lather. Use the rich lather to begin the detangling process if desired. Rinse. Follow with Curl Conditioner.

name: invisibobble Slim Elegant Hair Ties - Chrome (Pack of 3) invisibobble Slim Elegant Hair Ties - Chrome (Pack of 3)
description: Named invisibobble because it leaves no trace in the hair, this next-generation hair tie has already converted hosts of hair care aficionados – and with good reason! Crafted from hygienic polyurethane in a market-leading spiral shape, the invisibobble Slim offers strong hold without leaving a trace of damage in your hair – so you can say goodbye to kinks, snagging and painful tightness. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. This superb slimline edition is great if you want a more undetectable tie or if you have fine hair. Kind to strands, the invisibobble original also looks great worn on your wrist, available in a multitude of cute colours and patterns.
how_to_use: Use to secure all kinds of updos.
ingredient: Polyurethane

name: Living Proof Scalp Care Revitalizing Treatment 73ml Living Proof Scalp Care Revitalizing Treatment 73ml
description: Dreaming of thicker, fuller, healthier-looking hair, or simply looking to prevent thinning? Allow us to introduce you to Living Proof's Scalp Care Revitalizing Treatment: an overnight treatment that harnesses the brand's 'Healthy Follicle Complex™' (a cocktail of yeast proteins and zinc salts) to promote stronger hair from the root. Think of it as a fertiliser for your scalp, only sans the smell! Made with encapsulated time-released actives that nourish your hair, roots and scalp with targeted delivery, as well as jojoba esters and vitamins to moisturise your scalp while restoring barrier function for prolonged balanced hydration and scalp care. As well as nurturing your scalp in the long term, this fast-acting formula even boasts an immediate plumping effect (thanks to 'NaturePep Amaranth') that will make your hair look and feel instantly fuller; in fact, it's been shown to provide an 11.5% increase in hair fibre fullness after three uses. For best results, it can take up to 90 days to see thicker, fuller, healthier-looking hair.
how_to_use: Apply directly to scalp. Use on wet or dry hair. Massage in. Do not rinse. For best results, use daily. When applying to dry hair, make sure to detangle first in order to create in clean sections to work with. Apply only as much as needed! Massage for as long as you want! There are no limitations here but the minimum would be 1-2 minutes!

name: dpHUE Brightening Powder for Blonde Highlighted Hair dpHUE Brightening Powder for Blonde Highlighted Hair
description: Restoring brightness and shine your blonde strands in just five minutes, dpHUE’s Brightening Powder is ideal for when your highlights are looking dull and greyish. It works by pulling out chlorine, minerals and metals from your hair, revealing brilliantly bright tones. How? It’s formulated with 15% vitamin C and a chelating agent that draws out impurities and product residue. This means hair feels light and airy as well as looking much more vibrant. Designed to be used after shampooing but before conditioning, mix the powder with water to work it into a paste before massaging it into your hair. Although it has the most visible results on blonde and highlighted hair, it can be used on darker hair to purify it without impacting its colour.
how_to_use: Shampoo with dpHUE Gentle Brightening Shampoo (sold separately). Pour one sachet of Brightening Powder into your palm and mix with water to create a paste. Apply from roots to ends and work through for 5 minutes. Rinse and follow with dpHUE Gentle Brightening Conditioner (sold separately). Use every other week.
ingredient: Sucrose, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Inosito.

Courtesy of advanced ionic technology, it also reduces frizz, granting smooth and shiny locks with minimum effort. Whether your locks are thick, thin or somewhere in between, variable power and temperature controls allow you to adjust the dryer to suit your individual hair needs - there's even a cool shot feature to hold your finished masterpiece in place. Suitable for both left and right handers, for easily-tired arm muscles (it weighs around 1.54kg) and for at-home and in-salon use, this universally alluring tool delivers universally pleasing results that're bound to turn you into a ghd addict (if you aren't already)!
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Then use the hair dryer to style your hair into your desired fashion. The hairdryer has a three-pin UK plug and a 2100 Watt motor. Packaging may vary.

name: ghd Curve Thin Curl Wand 14mm ghd Curve Thin Curl Wand 14mm
description: Their narrowest wand yet, ghd’s Curve - Thin Curls Wand 14mm is expertly designed to create tight, defined curls — no matter if your enhancing your naturally curly texture, transforming your straight strands or creating flowing waves. Powered by ultra-compact PTC heater — the technology that maintains the optimal 185ºC styling temperature across the entire barrel — this pro-level curler creates enviable, long-lasting curls without the need for extreme heat. It’s designed with a professional length cord with 360° swivel for flexible styling as well as a 38% longer (yet still lightweight!) barrel, making styling even long lengths quick and easy. Plus, the advanced ceramic coating on the barrel not only improves styling control and grip but it also gives a smooth, high-shine finish to your tresses. It takes safety very seriously indeed too: there’s a safety stand to secure it on a hard surface when you’re not styling, and – perfect for the forgetful among us – an automatic sleep mode that turns the device off after 60 minutes.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For long-lasting, classic curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For soft, luxe waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. UK three-pin plug, universal voltage.

name: Christophe Robin Hydrating Cream Scrub 250ml Christophe Robin Hydrating Cream Scrub 250ml
description: Whether you're constantly battling an uncomfortable, dehydrated scalp, or suffer from sensitivity, the Hydrating Cream Scrub With Aloe Vera makes the perfect pre-wash treatment to save your mane. An ultra-gentle, pre-wash exfoliating treatment, this nourishing creamy scrub buffs away dead skin to banish build-up and impurities so that you can get the most out of your hair wash rituals. An infusion of organic aloe vera seeks out stressed skin to instantly soothe irritation and quell discomfort. Created to restore moisture and hydration as well as nourish your skin right at the roots... even the most stressed-out manes will be left soft, smooth and with a salon-worthy shine after a little tete-a-tete with this mask.
how_to_use: Apply to dry or damp hair. Massage onto the scalp and rinse. Follow with shampoo and conditioner.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Glycerin, Betaine, Jojoba Esters, Polyquaternium-47, Polyquaternium-37, Sodium Benzoate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Agave Americana Leaf Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Limonene, Linalool, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.

name: ghd Helios Hair Dryer Comb Nozzle ghd Helios Hair Dryer Comb Nozzle

Featuring two rows of strengthened, tapered teeth to gently tease and comb through hair as they direct the air to smooth and separate, this comb has been developed in collaboration with top stylists and industry specialists to let you add some ‘oomph’ and mould your style to emulate a salon-worthy finish.

description: Offering the nourishing benefits of your favourite skin care products to your scalp (the sensitive skin there needs caring for too, you know!), this hardworking mask creates the optimal conditions for healthy, strong and hydrated hair growth — right from the root. For soft, repaired strands, this rich mask is packed out with active ingredients your mane will lap up. Pineapple and pumpkin enzymes gently clarify and exfoliate skin for a clean, fresh feeling scalp while spirulina, vegetable taurine and quinoa get to work to support hydration and intensely condition parched, dry hair. Use as a rinse off treatment for a quick-fix of conditioning, or use overnight to really make the most of this mask’s moisturising prowess.

name: Davines More Inside This Is A Shimmering Mist 200ml Davines More Inside This Is A Shimmering Mist 200ml
description: On the hunt for that mane miracle that will your strands feeling silky soft, full of shine and frizz-free — but not weighed down with product? Enter: the Shimmering Mist. Now before you begin to imagine a hair mist full of pearlised sparkle, this lightweight mist is instead the perfect glossing tool for your lengths. name: Davines More Inside Invisible Dry Shampoo 250ml Davines More Inside Invisible Dry Shampoo 250ml
description: Formulated to refresh your hair and scalp (without any dreaded residue), the More Inside Invisible Dry Shampoo is so much more than just a dry shampoo. name: K18 Biomimetic Hairscience Molecular Repair Hair Oil 30ml K18 Biomimetic Hairscience Molecular Repair Hair Oil 30ml
description: Tired of taming frizz? K18’s Molecular Hair Oil is the solution you’ve been searching for. This lightweight formula gets to the root cause — working at a deeper level to repair, strengthen and reverse damage that leads to unruly tresses in the first place. Formulated with the brand’s patented K18 Peptide™ technology, it’s boosted with nourishing natural oils like avocado and sunflower, alongside hemisqualane and squalane to smooth the cuticles and soften your locks without weighing them down. It’s also designed to boost colour vibrancy and enhance shine, while reversing frizz-causing damage so you get immediate and long-term results. Plus, if you love using heated styling tools — it’ll protect your tresses up to 450°F (232°C).

Sam McKnight does nothing by halves and takes no shortcuts to create his hair styling heroes, which is why his latest offering - the Dressed To Kill Define and Defrizz Crème - has been years in the making.
