name: WetBrush Pro Detangler - Black WetBrush Pro Detangler - Black
description: An innovation in hair care, the Pro Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) brush is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Pro Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth.

name: Olaplex No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner 1000ml (Worth £112.00) Olaplex No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner 1000ml (Worth £112.00)

The No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner formula is also colour- sulfate- paraben- gluten- and nut-free as well as vegan-friendly too, making its 250ml and 1000ml sizes perfect for everyone.

name: Color Wow Dream Filter Treatment 200ml Color Wow Dream Filter Treatment 200ml
description: Working overtime to keep your colour fresh and bright, this innovative pre-shampoo treatment helps to lift the dulling particles that compromise your colour to reveal a vibrant finish. The perfect way to mane-tain the integrity of your colour or highlights, it’s made with one-of-a-kind, breakthrough technology (two molecular filters with two polymeric filters) to gently and effectively remove minerals and metals from your hair. Anything from calcium and magnesium to copper, iron and chlorine can be deposited along your lengths - due to everything from the environment to the water you wash your locks with; they accumulate on your hair and can discolour your precious tresses. No more! This non-stripping spray revives vibrancy in no time at all - and comes in a sized-to-try bottle to trigger addiction before you (inevitably) commit.
how_to_use: Apply Dream Filter to dry hair before shampooing. Spray evenly to saturate hair thoroughly. Wait 1-3 minutes, then shampoo. Suggested use is every 3-4 shampoos to keep your colour looking fresh and bright. But, with frequent exposure to well water or chlorine, you can use it more often (even daily) because, unlike chelating products, DREAM FILTER is extremely gentle.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Acrylic Acid/Acrylamidomethyl Propane Sulfonic Acid Copolymer, Cocoamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Polystyrene Sulfonate, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Phytate.

name: Davines Oi Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 75ml Davines Oi Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 75ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by discerning celebrities and beauty buffs all over the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.

name: OUAI Detox Shampoo Refill Pouch 946ml OUAI Detox Shampoo Refill Pouch 946ml
description: The detox your locks have been longing for, OUAI Haircare’s Detox Shampoo works to quickly eliminate build-up (we’re looking at you, Dry Shampoo) to deep clean your hair and ‘unblock’ your clogged follicles. Consider it the hair equivalent of ‘turn it off and on again’. A once-a-week option for those who're suffering from dry shampoo-dependency, this gentle (but thorough!) shampoo boasts apple cider vinegar to ‘cut through’ product build-up and neutralise shine-compromising hard water deposits. Like ‘descaling’ your strands, this deep-cleansing formula also boasts hydrolysed keratin – great for rebuilding and strengthening brittle or heat-weakened hair – while chelating agents attract heavy metals to leave your hair soft, silky and ready for the week ahead. With the brand's signature 'Melrose Place' fragrance – an intoxicating harmony of rose, lychee, bergamot, cedarwood and white musk – this envelops your headspace with heavenly perfume to keep your head happy while lifting your spirits. Plus, it now comes in a whopping 946ml refill pouch to minimise unnecessary waste.
how_to_use: Thoroughly wet your hair from roots to trips with lukewarm water. Squeeze out any excess moisture and lather a coin-sized 'dollop' of Detox Shampoo in your hands. Part hair using fingers and apply Detox shampoo as close to the scalp as possible. Let it work its magic for one to three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Acrylates Copolymer, Cocamide Mipa, Parfum (Fragrance), Polysorbate 20, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Vinegar, Peg-150 Distearate, Polyquaternium-7, Glycerin, Benzophenone-4, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium Edta, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Citronellol, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 61570 (Green 5)

name: OUAI Scalp Serum 50ml OUAI Scalp Serum 50ml
description: Firmly of the belief that healthy hair starts with the scalp, Ouai has created the hydrating and rebalancing scalp serum to bring us the healthy hair that we have coveted for oh-so long. Supporting the appearance of thicker, healthier and more lustrous hair just got sensorial with this earthy and uplifting treatment. Anything that smells this good has to be Ouai, and a new fresh scent too! Has Christmas come early? Top notes of ginger and spearmint run down through tomato leaves and green fig to settle in base notes of wet grass and ambroxan for a truly indulgent self care moment as you massage this into your scalp. Cultivating the healthiest environment for your hair to flourish in are arctic root, Siberian ginseng and chaga mushroom, adaptogens that promote hydration and a healthy barrier. Have you gone a little OTT on the styling front? Fear not, red clover extract works to reduce scalp discomfort from overstimulation while peptides support the full, thick and healthy hair we have always dreamed of…we’re ready for our close-up now.
how_to_use: Apply daily for best results. This is a leave-in product, do not rinse out. Must be applied directly to the scalp. Can be applied in the am or pm on wet or dry hair. Do not apply to open wounds and/or broken skin on the scalp. Start application in your natural part and along your hairline. Press and release the bulb once to fill the glass pipette. Unscrew the cap. Use short, quick presses to release drops throughout the scalp. Massage in to help distribute and absorb into the scalp. SCALP SERUM is skin care inspired. The key is consistent use to see results and absorption. Face serums typically can take anywhere from a 1 minute to a few minutes to absorb and completely dry. Same goes for SCALP SERUM – wait until the serum has completely dried and absorbed before washing hair. If applying at night you are safe to wash your hair and scalp in the morning. If you apply in the morning you will safe to wash your hair and scalp in the afternoon or evening.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Polysorbate 20, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Polyquaternium-7, Rhodiola Rosea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Tocopherol, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Dextran, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Acanthopanax Senticosus (Eleuthero) Root Extract, Rhaponticum Carthamoides Root Extract, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Eugenol, Limonene, Linalool.

name: BLEACH LONDON Tangerine Dream Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Tangerine Dream Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Innersense Pure Harmony Hairbath Innersense Pure Harmony Hairbath
description: A sulphate-free formula thatll leave your precious locks feeling (and smelling) wonderful, this gentle shampoo is a must for fine to medium hair types. Featuring a series of natural ingredients such as coconut, rice bran and avocado oils, it purifies your hair and scalp while granting soft-to-the-touch smoothness. A dream team of antioxidant-rich green tea and cranberry seed oils help to heal and soothe any irritation at your scalp, while imparting moisture and softness to your strands. Incorporating a sensual element into your shower routine, pumpkin seed and orange flower oils add an uplifting top note, releasing tension and boosting circulation.Now available in full size 295ml and travel-friendly mini 59ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.
how_to_use: Thoroughly saturate hair with water. Take a deep breath and become centred. Begin by dispensing a small amount of hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. Apply with fingertips to scalp, massaging and cleansing. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary and follow with Pure Inspiration Daily Conditioner.

name: WetBrush Go Green Detangler - Pink WetBrush Go Green Detangler - Pink
description: An innovation in hair care, the eco-friendly Go Green Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) comb is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Go Green Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth. But wait, it gets better – when you’re ready to replace your brush, you’ll be happy to know that it will naturally biodegrade within five years!
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures, and especially good for children.

name: VIRTUE Recovery Conditioner 200ml VIRTUE Recovery Conditioner 200ml
description: The Virtue Recovery Conditioner is expertly constructed to target dry, damaged hair types. Blended with first-of-its-kind Alpha Keratin 60ku®, the formula replenishes lost moisture to brittle strands that are in need of deep nourishment. Thanks to a high-performance composition made up of hydrolysed quinoa, baobab seed oil and grapefruit extract, the conditioner infuses the hair with softness, helping to increase manageability whilst summoning a glass-like shine. Promoting a visibly stronger appearance, the conditioner is topped with a rich blend of creamy coconut, tropical yuzu extracts and warm woody nuances. Pair with the Virtue Recovery Shampoo for optimum results.
how_to_use: Apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, prep hair with your favourite Virtue Shampoo.

name: WetBrush Go Green Mini Detangler - Pink WetBrush Go Green Mini Detangler - Pink
description: Just when we thought we couldn’t love Wet Brush any more, they release a conveniently mini version of the ultra-effective, planet-friendly Go Green Detangler. With all the incredible hair-smoothing qualities of the classic Wet Brush you know (and likely love), this palm-sized brush has one fundamental difference: it’s biodegradable! Made from plant starch and ergonomically designed with a sleek, shiny handle, this is ideal for eliminating knots on both wet and dry locks. This is all due to the revolutionary Intelliflex technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains yielding or unbending as required to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth. But wait, it gets better when you’re ready to replace your brush, you’ll be happy to know that it will naturally biodegrade within five years!
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures, and especially good for children.
ingredient: Biodegradable Plant Starch.

name: Sachajuan Scalp Shampoo Travel Sachajuan Scalp Shampoo Travel
description: If you suffer from an itchy scalp or dandruff and don't want to load your hair up with chemicals, Sachajuan's Scalp Shampoo is a brilliant alternative to commercial anti-dandruff brands. The stars of the show are a double act of anti-fungal riroctone olamine and climbazole which, according to the Australasian College of Dermatologists, are less toxic than regular flake-fighting ingredients. The addition of rosemary oil, menthol, salicyclic acid and ginger extracts then combine to soothe and nourish irritated, scale-prone scalps.
how_to_use: Massage in to wet hair like any other shampoo but allow 1-2 minutes for the active ingredients to work into your scalp. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Drunk Elephant Cocomino Marula Cream Conditioner Drunk Elephant Cocomino Marula Cream Conditioner
description: A concentrated nourishing blend of plant oils to soften, smooth and detangle, Cocomino Marula Cream Conditioner works to fortify and protect hair from the damage done by heat styling and colour treatments. Blended at a scalp-compatible pH of 3.6, this won't disrupt the scalp's delicate acid mantle or cause buildup commonly associated with silicones. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it's treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. The rest just grew from there. Formulated with an advanced blend of proteins and smoothing, hydrating agents, this Cocomino Marula Cream Conditioner fights frizz and static while adding shine for a healthy, bouncy finish. Marula butter and a nourishing mix of oils (including argan, mongongo, baobab, tamanu and kalahari seed) leave hair soft - never greasy or weighed down. Our multi-amino acid blend adds strength, improves manageability and gives hair a healthier appearance with visible body and bounce.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Shampoo

name: MONPURE London Strengthening Silk Protein Shampoo 250ml MONPURE London Strengthening Silk Protein Shampoo 250ml
description: Does your hair feel weighed down by styling gels, hairsprays and leave-in serums? Take a load off with the Strengthening Silk Protein Shampoo that’s designed to cleanse your hair of dirt and debris whilst still delivering a surge of moisture to your tresses. Recognising that your scalp requires just as much attention as your hair when wash day rolls around, vegan silk peptides work to create a breathable ‘second skin’ texture on hair and scalp that leaves both feeling incredibly hydrated and most importantly — clean! It gets better… bursting with follicle-strengthening vegan keratin and universal hydrating agent aloe vera, this is more than just your regular degular wash day go-to. Fortify the finest of strands and rebuild the protein blocks of damaged follicles to reveal shinier, weightless hair that screams va-va-voom. Successfully protecting your delicate strands against harmful, colour-compromising bacteria and pollutants, this vitamin-rich hair care essential is free from bad-for-you-chemicals and restores your once-bouncy, vivacious locks after just one use. Pssst… did we mention how herbalicious this smells?
how_to_use: Starting with wet hair, apply the shampoo directly on the scalp and roots. Gently massage from the scalp through to your ends, creating a light lather. Rinse thoroughly, and repeat for a deeper cleanse. We recommend following up with the Strengthening Essence-Conditioner.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Leave-in Conditioner Travel Size 30ml Aveda Nutriplenish Leave-in Conditioner Travel Size 30ml
description: The ultimate treatment for dry and ultra-dry tresses, Aveda's Nutriplenish Leave In Conditioner is formulated to tackle tangles, protect against heat damage (up to 230° C), all while hydrating and replenishing your hair for up to 72 hours! It doesn't even end there! This conditioning mist also harnesses a naturally derived UV filter to help protect your strands from the depleting effects of the sun plus, it can be used as a pre-shampoo treatment to make wash day worries (if the knots are that bad, you know what mean...) a thing of the past. Suitable for all hair types and textures, this 98% naturally derived, no-rinse-necessary formula is made without silicones and sulphates since Aveda is committed to thoughtfully chosen, good-to-hair ingredients. The finishing touch? It boasts their signature pure-fume aroma with cocoa, certified organic ginger, cardamom and other pure flower and plant essences. Ultra-smooth, luscious locks never smelt this good!
how_to_use: Shake well. Lightly mist clean, damp hair—or dry hair for added nourishment. Do not rinse. Detangle or style as usual. Adjust usage for your hair types. For fine to medium hair, apply mid-shaft to ends only. For thick and highly textured hair, apply from roots to ends.

name: VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo Travel Size 2 oz VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo Travel Size 2 oz
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Smooth Shampoo, a game-changing way to cleanse and care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Smooth Shampoo also refines and de-frizzes strand by strand, sealing in moisture and shine. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), phospholipids – derived from natural soybeans – to help fight frizz and protect against humidity and gotu kola, a multi-tasking Indian herb that promotes strength, smoothness and lustre. Ideal for medium-to-thick, hard to manage hair, this nourishing blend is scented with soothing lavender, sweet pear and fresh mint essential oils.
how_to_use: Work a quarter-sized amount of conditioner between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, pair with your favourite Virtue conditioner.

name: Innersense Pure Inspiration Daily Conditioner 946ml Innersense Pure Inspiration Daily Conditioner 946ml
description: Take your shower time up an invigorating notch with this delicious smelling, nourishing and repairing conditioner. Infused with a sling of natural ingredients, this has been carefully concocted to look after your strands without the need for silicones or other chemical nasties: rice bran and avocado oils provide moisture to your strands while smoothing frizz and cuticles; sunflower seed oil protects colour-treated hair from fading and leaves it feeling silky soft; rooibos tea is packed with a hefty dose of antioxidants (50 times more than green tea!) to soothe and protect; and shea butter defines waves and curls, providing an intense bout of moisture to parched tresses. The formula doesn’t only focus on hair health though, but on overall wellbeing too, with orange flower oil adding an uplifting top note while stimulating circulation and relieving tension for a wholly therapeutic experience. Now available in full size 295ml, travel-friendly 59ml and huge, value-saving 946ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.
how_to_use: After cleansing hair with Pure Harmony Hairbath, dispense Pure Inspiration Daily Conditioner into palms, rub them together then distribute from mid-length to ends with fingertips or comb. Leave on one to five minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Kit BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Kit
description: Charcoal grey is officially chic – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Fade To Grey Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add grey, slatey sheen tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This semi-permanent dye will last for around 16-20 washes. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH London TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH London DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH London BEACH LIGHTS to lighten your hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. The final effect will depend on your hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.

name: VIRTUE Recovery Shampoo 240ml VIRTUE Recovery Shampoo 240ml
description: Ideal for dry and damaged hair types, VIRTUE’s Recovery Shampoo gently cleanses and clarifies while supporting a stronger-looking scalp and strands. Featuring Alpha Keratin 60ku®, the nourishing formula works to provide keratin protein to the tresses, protecting against the look of breakage and split ends. Hydrolyzed quinoa promotes visibly enhanced colour vibrancy, while baobab seed oil offers intense moisture to the lengths. Fortified with antioxidant-rich grapefruit extract, the silky shampoo refreshes the hair and leaves it looking lustrous.
how_to_use: Work a coin-sized amount of the shampoo into a lather between palms. Apply to wet hair, massage into a rich lather, and rinse.

name: WetBrush Pro Detangler - Pink WetBrush Pro Detangler - Pink
description: An innovation in hair care, the Pro Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) brush is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Pro Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.

name: Davines This Is A Sea Salt Spray Davines This Is A Sea Salt Spray
description: Bring the beach to your bedroom with Davines’ This is a Sea Salt Spray – the key to achieving those soft, ‘scrunchy’ waves with a quick (and conditioning!) spritz. With just the right amount of ‘grit’ to give that sexy, tousled texture, this matte mist provides soft and flexible hold without stiffness or stickiness. A great way to emulate all of those chic, ‘piece-y’ styles that you’ve seen on your Instagram feed, as well as to let you pretend that you’re spending a day at the seaside, just shrug on a sundress and fantasise… (no water required).
how_to_use: Spritz over wet or dry hair then allow to air-dry. Use your fingers to coax into ringlets or waves if you crave some additional waves.

name: Color Wow Pop & Lock High Gloss Finish 55ml Color Wow Pop & Lock High Gloss Finish 55ml
description: A triple threat to dry, dull and unruly tresses, this innovative styling treatment can be used in three easy ways to enhance your colour and deliver epic shine. It’s brimming with deeply hydrating humectants to smooth your hair from the inside out – 75% of the formula works inside of your lengths to help restore elasticity and suppleness. It only functions as a serum, cocooning each stand with a crystal-clear, high-gloss sheen to smooth the cuticle and lock in the hydrating ingredients. Fitting into your routine no matter what, you can use it as a pre-blowout treatment to retain moisture while heat-styling, as a finisher to break tights curls into shiny waves or as a styling aid to tame frizz and flyaways. Either way, you can expect UV protection, a high-shine finish and no greasy buildup.

name: VIRTUE Recovery Conditioner 60ml VIRTUE Recovery Conditioner 60ml
description: The travel size Virtue Recovery Conditioner is expertly constructed to target dry, damaged hair types. Blended with first-of-its-kind Alpha Keratin 60ku®, the formula replenishes lost moisture to brittle strands that are in need of deep nourishment. Thanks to a high-performance composition made up of hydrolysed quinoa, baobab seed oil and grapefruit extract, the conditioner infuses the hair with softness, helping to increase manageability whilst summoning a glass-like shine. Promoting a visibly stronger appearance, the conditioner is topped with a rich blend of creamy coconut, tropical yuzu extracts and warm woody nuances. Pair with the Virtue Recovery Shampoo for optimum results.

name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Extreme Enriching Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley Moisture Extreme Enriching Conditioner 200ml
description: Giving stressed out strands an extreme surge of restorative moisture, Philip Kingsley’s Moisture Extreme Conditioner is a must-have for curled, coiled and afro hair types. A specialist, award-winning formula, this addresses the unique structure, processing, styling and grooming needs of fine, coiled hair, which is often most susceptible to damage given its structure. Intensely moisturising without coating strands, this luxuriously rich cream hydrates with four naturally derived oils – almond to enhance shine and smoothness, wheatgerm, which is rich in nutrients and vitamin E to deliver moisture deeper into the hair matrix, avocado oil to provide essential nutrients and amino and folic acids and, finally, babassu oil to deeply condition with lightweight moisture and leave hair soft, shiny and free from frizz. It’s safe for use on relaxed and synthetic (as well as natural) hair. And now this ultra-moisturising superhero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) — because nobody wants to be wrestling with thirsty locks when they should be laying about by the pool.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends Rinse well Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner

name: KEVIN MURPHY YOUNG AGAIN RINSE 250ml KEVIN MURPHY YOUNG AGAIN RINSE 250ml
description: Let your locks relive their vibrant, lustrous youth with KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Rinse, a rich, restorative conditioner that grants softening, moisturising and age-defying benefits. Like skin care for your hair, Kevin Murphy’s professional-standard range utilises the finest ingredients to deliver strength and health to your strands, ensuring that they look their very best – even if you’re growing up a little quicker than you’d like (aren’t we all!) Enriched with a complex of amino acids, bamboo and lotus extracts to strengthen, as well as baobab seed oil and mango seed butter to smooth frizziness and impart much-needed moisture, this lusciously natural formula is ideal for restoring youthful lustre to dry, brittle or damaged hair. Brimming with antioxidants, the gentle conditioner also guards against colour fade and keeps tresses defended from the often harmful effects of the elements. Your locks will be left sleek, chic and soft – without being weighed down. Use after KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Wash for the best results.
how_to_use: Apply to freshly washed hair, leave for 1- 2 minutes then rinse. For optimal results, use following Young.Again.Wash

name: Amika Blowout Babe Thermal Brush Amika Blowout Babe Thermal Brush
description: Convenient, easy-to-use and ultra-versatile, amika's Blowout Babe Thermal Brush allows you to straighten strands, smooth frizz or create big, bouncy curls that scream 'fresh blow dry' - all from the comfort of your bedroom. With a thermal ceramic barrel, the tool is designed for use on dry hair; instead of blowing out hot air, this brush heats up to create curls as you wrap your strands around it. Not only is it surprisingly easy to use, but it offers you greater control too. And it's ultra-friendly on your locks, thanks to next-gen ion generator technology. By depositing millions of negative ions onto your hair, the brush closes the hair cuticle as it glides, leaving your mane frizz-free and extra glossy.
how_to_use: On dry hair, simply use the bombshell blowout thermal brush as you would a round brush and blow dryer to achieve a smooth, voluminous blowout in half the time. For added shine - activate the negative ion generator by sliding the on/off button all the way up until it glows red, then green. For more volume and body - activate the negative ion generator by sliding the on/off button down until it only glows red.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. Voltage information: 100-125V

name: Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner 200ml
description: Coaxing tangles into submission with a medley of impressive ingredients, Philip Kingsley's No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner has a hydrating, nourishing formula that dramatically boosts manageability without irritating delicate scalps. Originally inspired by Philip’s wife’s battle with breast cancer, this carefully crafted formula was designed to be gentle enough for her when she was undergoing chemotherapy. From there it's been welcomed with open arms by the growing number of people with allergic and reactive skin types that decide to forgo fragrance and strong surfactants. Ideal for sensitive, delicate or easily irritated scalps and an array of textures - from coarse and fine to medium and naturally coiled curls - this softening conditioner is powered by hydrolyzed elastin to improve the strength and flexibility of your hair, as well as encouraging moisture retention and fending against breakage. What's more, amino silicone is employed to detangle pesky knots, and control frizz and flyaways to reveal shiny, smooth strands.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work the conditioner into your hair, particularly your mid-lengths and ends. Rinse well and follow up with the appropriate Philip Kingsley Scalp Toner (sold separately).
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-12, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Pacifica Salty Waves Texture Spray 118ml Pacifica Salty Waves Texture Spray 118ml
description: Ushering in a new generation of salt sprays, the Salty Waves Texture Spray adds mermaid-like waves and texture to our mane without that dreaded crunchy feels — or any unwanted frizz. Housed in a pretty bottle made from PCR (Post Consumer Recycled) plastic, this clever styling spray can be used from root to tip to add grit and bring out your natural beachy tousles. Formulated without sulphates, parabens and petroleum, this formula instead uses nourishing sea algae, banana and chia for softness and manageability. You’ll also love the fresh banana and coconut water scent.
how_to_use: Spray onto wet hair and let dry naturally or blow dry. Can also be used on dry hair for added texture. Build from roots to ends for best results.
ingredient: Aqua (Purified), Sodium Chloride (Salt), Polysorbate-20, Glycerin (Vegetable), Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract (Chia Seed Extract), Chlorella Pyrenoidosa Extract (Algae Extract), Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Kelp Extract), Parfum (Natural).

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Conditioner NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Conditioner
description: Rich and moisturising, the Perfect Texture Conditioner from NatureLab TOKYO detangles and strengthens wavy, curly and coily hair to help protect it against future damage. Like the rest of the Perfect Texture range, this conditioner strengthens and fortifies each strand to reduce the chances of breakage. It uses green sea grapes, omega 9 and Alpine rose extracts to hydrate and moisturise both hair and scalp. Blue algae strengthens hair and protects your colour against fading (whether from washing or environmental damage), and flexible film formers work to activate and define your natural curl pattern without weighing strands down. Vitamin C-rich lychee encourages a healthy scalp, and each formula even boasts a deliciously refreshing matcha and mint scent - without any sulphates, silicones or animal-derived ingredients in sight.

name: Drybar Full Pint Medium Round Ceramic Brush Drybar Full Pint Medium Round Ceramic Brush
description: If bouncy tresses have always eluded you, it's time to add the Full Pint Medium Round Ceramic Brush to your blow-dry - boasting a 2.25' (60mm) vented ceramic barrel, this helps you to create loose curls and waves, volume at the roots and even a straight style as you dry. Crafted to help you style your hair your way, drybar's brushes are the must-have partner to any at-home blow-dry. The secret to achieving a salon-worthy finish is all in the tools you use, so give your styling routine the Drybar treatment with this 2.25 inch (60mm) barrel brush. Allowing for maximum heat and maximum airflow, the vented design ensures you lock in that volume and curl you've spent precious time honing. Gone are the days of slipping hands and tired arms as you create your style, this lightweight design is finished with a soft-touch coating and thumbgrip to stop your hands losing their hold on your brush so you can keep the tension and control needed for the salon-level blowout. Ionic technology makes frizz a distant memory, adding shine to your strands as you style, and with a versatile styling selection in its arsenal, this brush can be used for everything from waves to straightening your mane.
how_to_use: Creates waves in medium to long hair. Adds volume and helps straighten short to medium hair. For loose curls and waves: Use vertically throughout the hair For volume at the roots: Use horizontally at the crown For straightening: Use horizontally throughout the hair

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Shampoo
description: Developing into a nourishing lather for a deep and effortless cleanse, the Perfect Texture Shampoo from NatureLab TOKYO cleans and conditions waves, curls and coils without stripping them of their natural moisture. Like the rest of the Perfect Texture range, this shampoo strengthens and fortifies each strand to reduce the chances of breakage. It uses green sea grapes, omega 9 and Alpine rose extracts to hydrate and moisturise both hair and scalp. Blue algae strengthens hair and protects your colour against fading (whether from washing or environmental damage), and flexible film formers work to activate and define your natural curl pattern without weighing strands down. Vitamin C-rich lychee encourages a healthy scalp, and each formula even boasts a deliciously refreshing matcha and mint scent - without any sulphates, silicones or animal-derived ingredients in sight.
how_to_use: Massage into damp hair and rinse.

name: Briogeo Superfoods Kale + Apple Replenishing Conditioner Briogeo Superfoods Kale + Apple Replenishing Conditioner
description: Think of Briogeo’s Be Gentle, Be Kind Matcha + Apple Superfood Shampoo as a revitalising green juice for your hair. The luscious formula is inspired by the nourishing ingredients typically found in rejuvenating, ultra-healthy superfood smoothies (it even comes in the same kind of bottle), harnessing the fruit and vegetable nutrients to support healthy-looking hair and a balanced scalp. Kale is rich in omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids to impart much-needed moisture, while apple is rich in natural procyanidin, a compound shown to encourage hair health. Completing the cocktail of green goodness, there’s also spinach, broccoli, lemon, orange and ginger extracts, plus super-softening avocado and sweet almond oils. Granting strands rich moisture without overburdening them, this fabulous formula will help you to enhance your hair’s hydration, shine and vitality. We’ll drink to that!
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing. For best results, shampoo prior to this with Briogeo’s Be Gentle, Be Kind Matcha + Apple Superfood Shampoo.

name: Sun Bum Revitalizing Shampoo Sun Bum Revitalizing Shampoo
description: After a long day at the beach (we can dream), there's nothing more important than finding a shampoo that refreshes and hydrates your sun-soaked tresses. That's where Sun Bum's Revitalizing Shampoo comes in! This daily hydrating shampoo cleanses as it delivers nutrients and intense moisture, thanks to its special cocktail of coconut oil, banana, and sunflower seed oil. Crafted with all hair types in mind, this refreshing formula is the first step towards enviably sleek strands, fit for a slow-motion shot on Baywatch. Smoothing even the most hard-to-control hair, it also helps to maintain your colour as opposed to stripping it. The special blend of coconut oil, banana pulp and peel, banana leaf, quinoa protein and sunflower seed oil helps to restore lost moisture, repair damage and provide unmatched humidity-resistant frizz control. We're obsessed!
how_to_use: In the words of the minds behind Sun Bum: "We don't wash our hair every day but when we do, we use a quarter size in our palms, work up a good lather and then apply directly to the scalp to get our hair squeaky clean and rinse all the oils and sand out. Usually, we're good for a few days afterwards."

name: Kitsch Towel Pillow Cover Kitsch Towel Pillow Cover
description: For those days when you want to treat your tresses do a deep treatment while you sleep, the Kitsch Towel Pillow Cover is perfect for wet or deep conditioned hair, preventing tangles and frizz while you catch some much needed zzz's. Perfect for busy night-owls who wash their hair before bed, the Towel Pillow Cover dries your wet hair while you sleep, without getting your pillow wet.Intelligently designed, the waterproof lining keeps the pillow dry while the comfortable microfibre is gentle on your skin and hair. This neat product is practical too, with wide elastic straps for ease-of-use and a universal 26 x 19 design thats suitable for both standard and king size pillows. Available in two hues, pick from Blush or Ivory perfect for coordinating with your matchy-matchy interior addiction, too.

name: invisibobble Fruit Fiesta Ib Sprunchie - My Main Squeeze invisibobble Fruit Fiesta Ib Sprunchie - My Main Squeeze
description: What happens when a hair care classic meets a modern icon? Sprunchie, that’s what! Wrapping the iconic invisibobble Original in luxurious velvet fabric, the Main Squeeze Sprunchie is one of the coolest Scrunchies we’ve ever come across, providing all the benefits of the brand’s innovative spiral shape in a fruity melon and playful stripe prints. Offering strong hold without compromising on comfort, the Sprunchies are very easy to remove, minimising tangles and damage (we’re talking split ends and breakage, people!) The soft, shiny velvet exterior means this looks great on your wrist as well as in your hair – with a range of colourways and patterns to go with every ‘do.

name: Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Aloe + Oat Milk Shampoo Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Aloe + Oat Milk Shampoo
description: An incredibly gentle solution for those prone to sensitive scalps, Briogeo’s Be Gentle, Be Kind Aloe + Oat Milk Shampoo is enriched with a cocktail of soothing ingredients (while being free from any common allergens). Made without fragrance, essential oils, lactose, soy and gluten, this hypoallergenic formula is dermatologist-approved and great for anyone whose scalp is out-of-sorts or all-too-easily offended. Calming and conditioning, this respects your head’s finely tuned balance – helping to keep things in sync for the happiest, healthiest (flake-free!) scalp, as well as soft and glossy locks. Notoriously nourishing, oat milk is packed with omega-rich fatty acids to supplement barrier function, while aloe vera brings relief from itching and green tea has antimicrobial benefits. What's more, the ingredients are 99% naturally derived, and the bottle is 100% recyclable (and made from 100% post-consumer resin).

A leave-in you'll come back to time and time again, this instantly hydrates all textures of dry hair thanks to a formula jam-packed with nourishing and shine-boosting mango butter, softening and moisturising coconut oil, omega 5-rich pomegranate seed oil which revitalises brittle strands and finally, sand ginger which provides a natural UV filter, helping to protect hair from the drying effects of the sun. description: Developed by legendary ‘Hair Doctor’, Philip Kingsley, this Re-Moisturizing Conditioner is a heaven-sent solution for coarse, rough hair which – whether it’s straight or curly – seems impossible to tame. With the same ingredient as the brand’s iconic Elasticizer, hydrolysed elastin, this clever conditioner reduces breakage (caused by snapping) by increasing the hair’s ability to stretch. Hydrating, strengthening and imparting much-needed moisture, the formula turns dry, frizzy hair into soft, smooth and shiny locks, which are unrecognisably easy to manage. And now this moisturising superhero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too — because nobody wants to be fighting thirsty, frizzy hair on their holidays.

name: ghd Flight Travel Hair Dryer ghd Flight Travel Hair Dryer
description: 50% lighter than the {Air Hair Dryer} but with 70% of the power, ghd's Flight Travel Hair Dryer is the perfect fusion of premium design, powerful performance and portability. With its protective dust bag and portable fold-away design, this is a must-have for constant on-the-go travellers. Anything but ordinary, it boasts two temperature settings, has a foldable handle for easy packing and storage and only weighs 422g - all while having dual voltage that works at 240V as well as 120V, so you can rest assured this will work wherever your travel journey takes you.

name: dpHUE Cool Blonde Conditioner 6.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Cool Blonde Conditioner 6.5 fl. oz.
description: Brassiness, be gone! Just a couple of minutes with the Cool Blonde Conditioner will help you to neutralise yellow tones within your strands, revealing your most beautiful blonde (even when you’re not fresh from the salon!) This weightless formula (no greasy, heavy feeling hair around here, thank you very much) uses specially formulated violet pigments to tone your mane — without harsh ingredients that might actually strip or dull your colour in the long run. And because the dpHUE team knows the toll bleach and colour (not to mention heat and environmental damage!) can take on your hair, this formula is brimming with hydrating ingredients like silk proteins and hibiscus flower extract to add softness and shine, all while making detangling a breeze!

Luxe yet completely lightweight, this hairbath is quick-absorbing and rich in vitamins A, B, D and E to keep locks in tip-top condition. Formulated with therapeutic essential oils, this divine product also allows you to take a moment to re-centre and rebalance while practising self-care. We're obsessed! Now available in full size 295ml, travel-friendly 59ml and huge, value-saving 946ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.

name: Amika The KureBond Repair Shampoo Amika The KureBond Repair Shampoo
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika’s mantra is “all hair is welcome”. Centred around dry, damaged tresses, The Kure Bond Repair Shampoo works into a luxurious lather to gently cleanse and simultaneously repair and strengthen lengths on the brink of breakage... Clinically proven to repair and strengthen the damage caused by everyday stressors, heat and chemical treatments when used with the complementary conditioner, this bond repair shampoo is a hair necessity for depleted strands. Packed with bond cure technology, it targets the most abundant bonds in your hair, which break the most frequently during daily wear and tear. What's more, it is infused with plant butters and vegan proteins to lend the formula an abundance of conditioning omega fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. Your strands will thank you for it! Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY Bedroom.Hair KEVIN.MURPHY Bedroom.Hair
description: Working as a renowned editorial stylist, Kevin Murphy found that, as the day progressed, models’ hair would become heavy, dull and lifeless – so he developed his own line to prevent this from happening, which soon made its way from backstage secret to cult hair care classic. For a sexily textured, ‘lived-in’ look, KEVIN.MURPHY’s cheekily titled Bedroom.Hair is a light, flexible hairspray that swiftly adds shine and hold while keeping strands soft. Maintaining texture and separation, the spray also helps to lock in your style, letting your waves or curls last longer, while keeping everything touchably soft and smooth (you won’t need to worry about dreaded ‘crunch’ or stiffness.) Nourishing locks while making them look great, the formula is enriched with sunflower seed extract to protect and provide essential nutrients, ginger root extract to help strengthen strands while conditioning and, finally, vegetable glycerine to protect hair from moisture loss.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY Macadamia Oil 46ml BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY Macadamia Oil 46ml
description: Undergo the ultimate tress-formation with the perfect oily remedy for dry and frizzy hair. BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY’s Macadamia Oil is here to soften your shafts and restore its sheen. Aaand, it doesn’t stop there… From head-to-toe, this super-high-grade nutty nourishment leaves your hair and body feeling silky smooth and cushiony. As an Australian native, the macadamia nut contains naturally occurring squalene — an all-round superhero that’s both a highly effective emollient and natural antioxidant. Whether you want to retain your bouncy curls and sleek straight strands or caress your skin with some much-needed TLC, this versatile oily goodness targets dryness and bids it adieu. Totally fragrance-free and cold-pressed, the only aromas from this leave-in treatment are of sweet and pure maca-moisture.

name: Drybar Triple Sec 3-In-1 Finishing Spray Blanc Scent Travel Size 47g Drybar Triple Sec 3-In-1 Finishing Spray Blanc Scent Travel Size 47g

The formula is powered by crystal clear microporous minerals that help to absorb excess oil, leaving hair with a mattified texture and fuller-looking finish. Suitable for all hair types, the vegan finishing spray is infused with notes of creamy coconut, vanilla and amber for a refreshing haircare experience.

Formulated for dry, heat-damaged and chemically damaged hair, this nourishing shampoo is powered by an extremely powerful plant-sourced ingredient, prickly pear oil, that leaves depleted hair feeling strong and supple. An infusion of guar bean helps to smooth the look of frizz while pro-vitamin B5 promotes traffic-stopping shine. We can’t wait for wash-day...

name: Kitsch Recycled Plastic Large Loop Claw Clips Kitsch Recycled Plastic Large Loop Claw Clips
description: The secret to minimalist styling with just a *touch* of quirkiness, the Recycled Plastic Large Loop Claw Clips are about to become the chicest new addition to your hair accessory wardrobe. What makes these particular claw clips just so special? They can be used to style and hold even the thickest of manes (they work brilliantly in curly or coily hair too!), the stylish designs (think: matte black and trendy tortoiseshell) are finished off with a cute bow-like loop on the handle, and as they're made from recycled plastic, they're a more sustainable option too! Oh, and did we mention how much less damaging a claw clip can be to your mane compared to your usual scrunchie or hair tie? Hair breakage? We don't know her.

Formulated with aloe vera to give hair strength and a divine silky texture, honey for deep hydration and moisturising benefits in-between washes and through the styling process and pumpkin seed oil for added hydration, protection and glossy shine that also conditions the scalp, hair and skin for a healthy and balanced environment that creates beautiful, healthy looks.

Nourishing rice bran oil, rice amino acids and shea butter deeply replenish to fortify fragile strands against breakage and split ends. Like all of Pacifica’s formulas, this nourishing wash is made in the USA from the best globally sourced ingredients; this particular blend is infused with pineapple, argan oil, quinoa, panthenol and soy protein to nurture your curls, giving them a new lease of life and enhancing their natural definition and movement. description: Your wash day routine, simplified and streamlined! An all-steps-sorted set for curly and coily hair *waves to all the 3a to 4c hair types*, BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY's kit 1-wash: your wash day essentials has everything you need for a stress-free wash day! name: Hair by Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 30ml Hair by Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 30ml
description: A styler with serious benefits, this defining, de-fluffing and de-frizzing balm deeply conditions every strand it touches — think of this as hair care and a styler in one pretty-in-pink bottle. Best friend to the lazy beauty maven, the Happy Endings Nourishing Balm combines hair care with the styling prowess that Sam McKnight is famed for. In need of a primer to use ahead of styling? This multi-tasking balm perfectly preps your hair and makes light works of styling your ‘do. Is second-day frizz ruining your look? Just a pump or two of this conditioning cream tames flyaways and smooths as you work it through to leave you with perfectly tamed tresses. If your carefully styled curls are lacking definition, fear not, as this powerhouse product adds definition to your waves and curls to keep them perfectly coiffed. Even better? Thanks to ‘Vegabead Microcapsules’ that boost manageability and shine (without adding build-up either), you can re-style and smooth your hair as the day goes on — these shine-boosting microcapsules reactivate whenever you comb or brush your strands… we’re just as impressed as you are!
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry hair, massage 2-3 pumps evenly over the palms of your hands, work into the ends and up through the mid lengths of your hair.

name: BeautyBio GloPRO Scalp Attachment Head BeautyBio GloPRO Scalp Attachment Head
description: Ergonomically designed to hug the contours of your scalp, the GloPRO Scalp Attachment features cushion-flex technology to stimulate your follicles and lessen irritation for a healthy head of hair (with fewer flakes). Best used in conjunction with the Healthy Scalp Serum, this gently – but thoroughly – stimulates growth by awakening follicles to support the hair growth cycle. Waging two-pronged attack on the first signs of thinning and hair loss (whether due to stress, over-styling or postpartum) – as well as persistent scalp itchiness, the needles create ‘micro channels’ for serum to penetrate deeply (and get to the root of the issue). Helping to protect your precious follicles by gradually firming the scalp’s upper layers (these naturally thin as we age), it takes just 60 seconds every day to see a noticeable difference in the strength and health of hair – not to mention an improvement when it comes to widened partings, thinning edges and the damage wrought by too-tight ponytails or overstyling.
how_to_use: Use GloPRO® SCALP on clean, product-free hair. Hair may be damp or dry. Part hair into sections, lightly hold hair taut and in parallel with hair strands, gently glide GloPRO® back and forth over the scalp for about 5 seconds per target area. Continue parting hair and using GloPRO® until all desired areas have been treated. For optimal results, immediately apply the Healthy Scalp Serum (sold separately) or hair-enhancing topicals to scalp. Warning: Do not roll GloPRO® SCALP attachment through loose hair. Do not use the SCALP Attachment on the face, lips, eyelid, eye area or body. For morning and evening use.
ingredient: The SCALP Attachment is just one of GloPRO®’s interchangeable MicroTip™ Attachments; each design and needle length are optimised to target various head-to-toe concerns GloPRO is a cosmetic beauty device which helps improve the appearance of hair with mild to moderate thinning, dryness and itchiness and is not intended to treat or correct severe cases of complete baldness.

name: Living Proof Curl Defining Gel 150ml Living Proof Curl Defining Gel 150ml
description: Curly strands have a mind of their own, so help them to make the right decisions with Living Proof’s Curl Defining Gel. Lightweight and designed to enhance (never suppress!) your natural texture, this leave-in formula gives you complete control. Delivering humidity-resistant lengths (as in, this ensures your style will last a whopping 12 times longer than if you used no product at all in humid conditions), this gel-textured formula helps your curls to form frizz-free, defined patterns – no matter your curl, wave or coil type. Sans the dreaded ‘crunch’ or tell-tale stiffness that can so often be associated with hair gels, this formula won’t weigh down strands and allows for superior ‘slip’ (which just means your hair will remain effortlessly detangled). Safe for chemically treated and coloured hair, this formula doesn’t rely on silicones, parabens or animal-cruelty to develop its real, tangible results.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair from root to tip. Scrunch to form curl groupings. Dry as usual. Use alone or layer with any Living Proof Curl styler.

description: If your locks are looking a little more ‘straw’ than ‘gold’ and don’t suit being over-cleansed, this Victoria’s Secret Angel-esque ‘wash’ is for you. A delicate, ‘recovery’ shampoo for fine, fragile or broken hair that’s coloured or damaged, Angel.Wash gently cleanses while maximising colour retention, protecting against free radicals and inhibiting UVA oxidation. Protecting scalp and strands with a high concentration of natural ingredients, this fabulous formula features sulphate-free surfactants to cleanse without stripping strands, hydrolysed wheat and oat proteins to strengthen, vitamin C-rich rose canina fruit extract to soothe and tangerine peel oil to lock in moisture and enhance natural shine. name: Davines MINU Illuminating Conditioner 250ml Davines MINU Illuminating Conditioner 250ml
description: A perfect, post-cleanse treatment for fragile, coloured hair, Davines’s MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner replenishes, separates and assists with detangling – minimising ‘stretching’ and breakage – while enhancing hair’s brilliance so your colour looks enviably lustrous. Because the dyeing process compromises hair’s health, use this fortifying and revitalising treatment to infuse each strand with precious nutrients and in turn, bolster hair’s resilience. It’s best used in conjunction with the rest of Davines’s ‘MINU’ range – to protect and enhance the health of chemically-treated tresses.

name: Uma Oils Intensely Nourishing Hair Oil 30ml Uma Oils Intensely Nourishing Hair Oil 30ml
description: Delivering much-needed moisture deep within the hair follicle, Uma’s Intensely Nourishing Hair Oil is rich in clarifying extracts of grapefruit and lemon – to eliminate impurities and product build-up from the scalp and in turn, stimulate strands’ natural growth – while simultaneously enhancing elasticity and increasing resilience to prevent breakage and split ends. Hibiscus and yerba de tago then combine to rejuvenate hair weakened by chemical processing, while Indian gooseberry and cypriol work to preserve strands’ precious pigment and prevent premature greying. Grape seed oil regulates oiliness, and a blend of jojoba and moringa deep-condition tresses to enhance shine and control frizz.
how_to_use: Apply 5-6 drops to roots, scalp and hair as a pre-shampoo or overnight treatment. Use 3-4 drops on damp hair before heat treatment for protection and brilliant shine. When applying to dry hair, use 2-3 drops on lengths and ends for all day frizz control, conditioning and lustre.
ingredient: Essential oils of Grapefruit, Lemon, Cypriol, Hibiscus, Yerba de Tago in a base of Grapeseed, Indian Gooseberry, Moringa and Jojoba oils.

This means less flaking and less itching, with pro-vitamin B5 also working to strengthen each hair shaft with an ‘anti-splitting effect’. Suitable for all hair types and textures, this restorative treatment restores sun-exposed hair with a cocktail of hydrating and protective natural ingredients. It's powered by the likes of tamanu oil, certified organic coconut oil and shea butter, as well as palm oils to deliver a wave of shine-boosting hydration. Most importantly, the brand's morikue™ protein actually works to restore weakened locks, while a blend of antioxidants - namely green tea extract, certified organic sunflower seed oil and vitamin E - help to shield against the damaging effects of free radicals. The finishing touch is its light tropical aroma that sparks from infusions of 100% certified organic essences of neroli, ylang ylang and citrus - just inhale and imagine you're on a beach somewhere...

Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. name: Sun Bum Revitalizing 3 In 1 Leave In Conditioner Sun Bum Revitalizing 3 In 1 Leave In Conditioner
description: A word of warning: do NOT leave this hair care hero lying around unprotected. Frequently "borrowed" from bathrooms and beach houses alike, Sun Bum's Revitalizing 3 In 1 Leave In Conditioner has earned the affection of countless trichologistas on account of its detangling capabilities... Proof that washday need not be a thing of dread, this three-in-one detangling, conditioning and protecting formula is will have you running your hands through your hair as easily as Ariel runs a dinglehopper through hers (really, running a fork through wet hair was the most unrealistic part of a story based around mermaids...). Crafted with a special blend of coconut oil, banana pulp and peel, banana leaf, quinoa protein and sunflower seed oil it helps to control frizz, prevent split ends, slow colour fading and will leave your hair silky-smooth and shiny. That's not all, it even protects your hair with antioxidant while enhancing and restoring its natural body. It's no wonder we keep our bottles under lock and key (read: hidden behind our body wash).

Prepare to meet your all-new, favourite hairspray. Color Wow's Cult Favorite Firm + Flexible Hairspray is ultra-lightweight, super fast-drying and allows hair to move naturally while providing UV filter protection for hair too. The reparative formula also features hydrolysed keratin to strengthen fragile colour-treated hair, and hydrolysed silk to fill and smooth hair's surface.

name: WetBrush Go Green Detangling Comb - Charcoal WetBrush Go Green Detangling Comb - Charcoal
description: For beauties that prefer to tackle their mane with a comb rather than a brush — and don’t want to sacrifice the earth for the sake of their hair care routine — the Go Green Detangling Treatment Comb is the answer. A truly pain-free approach to styling your tresses, this wide tooth comb features a special ‘WaveTooth’ design (you’ll spot the slightly zigzagged pins) which helps the comb to slip through your tangles without snagging, pulling or causing unnecessary breakage. To reduce the amount of plastic within your collection, this handy comb is made from a more sustainable bamboo fibre (we love to see it). And finally, to treat your hair as you tease it, each comb in the range is infused with oils and minerals to tackle different hair concerns: ‘Tea Tree Oil’ balances your scalp for a healthier mane right from the root; ‘Coconut Oil’ conditions, smooths and adds softness; and ‘Charcoal’ absorbs excess sebum and impurities from the hair.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.
ingredient: Bamboo fibre.

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) 5-in-1 Styling Treatment 118ml Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) 5-in-1 Styling Treatment 118ml
description: Ticking off a number of boxes in one simple step, this hardworking formula is designed to help treat and style your tresses at the same time. Enriched with the brand's patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), the clever formula repels dirt and oil so hair stays cleaner and protected for longer. This ingenious ingredient also smooths hair weightlessly for easy detangling and fullness, all while sleeking frizz by blocking humidity (cool, huh?). Also in the mix is the brand's other patented ingredient: the Thickening Molecule (PBAE). This proprietary technology mimics the look and feel of thicker hair, by depositing a flexible and virtually indestructible ‘web’ between strands. Hair feels soft and naturally fuller – and you can comb, style and run your fingers through it, without any risk of deflation. These ingredients in unison deliver five benefits in one hit: smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength and polish.
how_to_use: On clean, damp hair, evenly distribute the product from roots to ends. Comb through. For best results, blow dry.

description: Working as a renowned editorial stylist, Kevin Murphy found that, as the day progressed, models’ hair would become heavy, dull and lifeless – so he developed his own line to prevent this from happening, which soon made its way from backstage secret to cult hair care classic. A brilliant detoxifying shampoo, KEVIN.MURPHY’s Maxi.Wash removes unwanted product build-up, soothes irritated scalps, brightens limp, dull hair and prepares it perfectly to absorb the nutrients that follow. Like skin care for your hair, this cleanser features tropical fruit alpha hydroxy acids (derived from papaya) to gently exfoliate the scalp, removing dead cells and breaking down fatty acids to leave your scalp and strands clean and clear, without stripping. Thyme and rosemary extracts provide antioxidant protection to guard against colour fade, grapefruit extract absorbs excess oil and a balancing combination of witch hazel extract and tea tree oil provide a natural antiseptic effect, relieving irritation and detoxifying for a refreshing, soothing effect. Perfect for medium and dyed hair (it won't strip your colour!), make this the first step in your routine and your tresses will thank you.

name: Oribe Moisture Control Deep Treatment Masque 8.5 fl. oz. Oribe Moisture Control Deep Treatment Masque 8.5 fl. oz.
description: Adding more than a touch of luxury to your tress-loving rituals, this Moisture & Control Deep Treatment Masque quenches thirsty curls with its richly hydrating medley of shea and cupuacu butters, coconut oil and almond protein, to name just four of its impressive ingredients... Uniting skin care-grade technology with traditional craftsmanship, natural actives and a firm belief that healthy hair is essential for glamorous styling, Oribe is nothing short of hair care alchemy; take this mask, for example, not only does it deliver a wave of moisture but it even repairs damage and leaves hair shiny, healthy and more manageable. As with all of their formulas, it includes Oribé’s Signature Complex to feed hair with watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower and defend against oxidative and environmental stress alongside the deterioration of natural keratin. Coconut oil then softens and boosts shine; shea and cupuaca butters, as well as murumuru and mango seed butters, seal in moisture and prevent damage by smoothing the cuticle and protecting against breakage; sweet almond oil and almond protein seal the cuticle to strengthen and encourage elasticity. name: Drunk Elephant Cocomino Glossing Shampoo Drunk Elephant Cocomino Glossing Shampoo
description: Formulated with both hair and scalp in mind, Cocomino Glossing Shampoo is a sulphate-free, colour-safe blend of coconut-based surfactants to gently foam, lift away dirt and stubborn styling products without drying, damaging the hair shaft or stripping colour. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it's treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. The rest just grew from there. Formulated with a coconut amino acid blend to add strength and manageability to hair for a glossy, bouncy finish without stripping coluor or damaging the shaft as it lifts away dirt and product build-up, Polyquaternium-10 and Polyquaternium-7 to condition, fight frizz, detangle and add shine between shampooing, as well as marula, sacha inchi seed and argan oil to moisturise, calm irritation add shine and protect against heat styling.

Firstly, it uses a cocktail or nourishing natural ingredients suitable for soothing even the most sensitive of skin. name: invisibobble Slim Hair Tie - True Black invisibobble Slim Hair Tie - True Black
description: Named invisibobble because it leaves no trace in the hair, this next-generation hair tie has already converted hosts of hair care aficionados – and with good reason! Crafted from hygienic polyurethane in a market-leading spiral shape, the invisibobble Slim offers strong hold without leaving a trace of damage in your hair – so you can say goodbye to kinks, snagging and painful tightness. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends).
