name: R+Co SUN CATCHER Power C Boosting Leave-In Conditioner 4.2 fl. oz. R+Co SUN CATCHER Power C Boosting Leave-In Conditioner 4.2 fl. oz.
description: Developed with celebrity stylist and newest R+Co Collective member, Ashley Streicher, the SUN CATCHER Power C Boosting Leave-In Conditioner is a celebration of her Californian heritage: it’s easy, laidback, fuss-free and multi-use. Fragranced with 'Stars Align' (an aromatic ode to the moment when dusk hits, with notes of deep palo santo, white cedarwood, smoky tobacco leaf, fresh pine needles, waterlily), this nourishing and protective leave-in conditioner helps to soften, seal, detangle and fight frizz. It's infused with antioxidant-rich vitamin C to help protect against environmental aggressors and UV damage (as essential for rainy England as it is sunny California!). A helping of hyaluronic acid floods thirsty tresses with hydration while vegetable collage help to fortify and strengthen depleted hair. Finally, vitamin-rich radish root extract helps to improve scalp circulation, and coconut oil extract penetrates the hair shaft to soften and prevent breakage. It's a must for anyone in need of protective nourishment, light hold and shine!
how_to_use: Work through towel-dried hair and style as usual. Re-apply as desired for an added boost of moisture.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Ethyl Macadamiate, Glycerin, Coconut Alkanes, Phenoxyethanol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Fragrance/Parfum, Stearalkonium Chloride, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Stearyl Alcohol, PVP, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, Maltodextrin, Ascorbic Acid, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Malic Acid, Vegetable Collagen, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate.

name: Bouclème Scalp Massager Bouclème Scalp Massager
description: Featuring flexible silicone tips that are soft to the touch, plus an ergonomic, easy-grip handle, the Scalp Massager from Bouclème gently stimulates your scalp to boost circulation and help 'feed' your follicles. Use with your favourite cleanser (we suggest pairing this with Bouclème's Scalp Exfoliating Shampoo) to gently eliminate dirt, product build-up and oil, all the while optimising your scalp's health. Perfect for a weekly indulgent scalp massage....
how_to_use: Massage your scalp in small circular motions using the easy to hold grip.

name: Aveda Scalp Benefits Shampoo 1000ml Aveda Scalp Benefits Shampoo 1000ml
description: An absolute must-have for those with oily hair and product build-up, Aveda's Scalp Benefits Balancing Shampoo helps to rebalance your scalp and create the ideal foundation for healthy hair growth. Beloved in the Cult Beauty offices, Aveda's Scalp Benefits Balancing Shampoo gently cleanses the hair and scalp, so all hair types look and feel healthy. With a nurturing blend including burdock root, echinacea and sage, it helps to cleanse hair down to the root, diminish product build-up and excess sebum production. But it doesn't stop there, this sulphate-free formula also boasts Aveda's own ‘Pure-Fume™ Aroma’ with vetiver, rosemary, cinnamon and other pure flower and plant essences. It’s healthy hair only from here on out…
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair and scalp daily. Rinse.
ingredient: Water\Aqua\Eau , Babassuamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Extract, Echinacea Purpurea (Coneflower) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Root Extract, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Dimethicone Peg-8 Meadowfoamate, Glycerin, Isostearamidopropyl Morpholine Lactate , Polysorbate 20 , Trisodium Sulfosuccinate, Laureth-3, Sodium Sulfate, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Eugenol, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone . Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.

name: Drybar Buttercup Blow-Dryer Drybar Buttercup Blow-Dryer
description: From the hairstyling experts at Drybar comes the Buttercup Blow Dryer, a bestselling tool that seeks to dry and style hair in 20% less time. Formed with an ultra-lightweight design, the innovative hairdryer is equipped with an 1875-watt motor to deliver a powerful and fast-action drying experience. The blowdryer unleashes a world of styling potential as innovative ionic technology seals-down hair cuticles to create the illusion of silky-smooth, manageable lengths. Arriving with two concentrated nozzles and a professional (2.74m) length cord, the innovative hair dryer is suitable for all hair types, offering a customisable blow dry experience.
how_to_use: Blow-dry hair after washing and applying appropriate styling products. Two concentrator nozzles allow for more concentrated airflow. The wider nozzle focuses on a greater area to help hair dry faster. Great for longer or thicker hair. The narrow nozzle focuses on smaller areas for extra intensity and precision styling. Great for bangs or fringe.

name: Philip Kingsley Moisture Extreme Shampoo 75ml Philip Kingsley Moisture Extreme Shampoo 75ml
description: Giving stressed out strands an extreme moisture surge while cleansing, Philip Kingsley's Moisture Extreme Shampoo is a must-have for curled, coiled and afro hair types. A specialist, award-winning formula, this addresses the unique structure, processing, styling and grooming needs of fine, coiled hair, which is often most susceptible to damage given its structure. Effectively cleaning the hair and scalp and removing styling products without dehydrating, this shampoo deposits moisture along the hair shaft as it cleanses, with conditioning cocoa butter and anti-static guar. Suitable for use on relaxed and synthetic as well as natural hair types, this versatile treat is the ideal first step in your hair care ritual. And now this ultra-moisturising superhero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) - because nobody wants to be wrestling with thirsty locks when they should be laying about by the pool.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Lauryl Betaine, Sodium Cocoabutteramphoacetate, Betaine, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Polyquaternium-10, Propylene Glycol, Stearyl Dihydroxypropyldimonium Oligosaccharides, Bis(C13-15 Alkoxy) PG-Amodimethicone, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Amaranth Protein, Potassium Sorbate, C14-15 Alcohols, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Salicylate, Phenoxyethanol, Isotridecyl Acetate

name: Sun Bum Blonde Hair Lightener Sun Bum Blonde Hair Lightener
description: Bringing the sun to your strands by so much as stepping outside, Sun Bum's Blonde Hair Lightener is the perfect way to emulate the way your hair changes when you're on holiday, no matter where you are. Emphasising existing blonde and introducing new streaks, this effective UV-activated formula amplifies the natural highlighting effects of the sun. If you're looking to lighten up, this spray is the way to go. Specifically formulated to permanently brighten your hair by amplifying the natural highlighting effects of the sun, it's infused with Costa Rican pineapples and Meyer lemon to reveal natural subtle tones and beautiful highlights without any brassiness. As if the brightening fruit cocktail wasn't enough, they even added a little hydrogen peroxide so you can see your new blonde strands, stat!
how_to_use: For an all-over lighten and brighten, spray throughout dry or damp hair before sun exposure. For sun-kissed highlights, spray onto select strands. To avoid breakage and over-drying, we don’t recommend using more than once between hair washes.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Hydrogen Peroxide, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Silicone Quaternium-8, Disodium Phosphate, Phosphoric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Coumarin, Ext. Violet 2 (CL 60730).

name: KEVIN MURPHY Everlasting.Colour Wash (Various Sizes) KEVIN MURPHY Everlasting.Colour Wash (Various Sizes)
description: Forget breaking up with coloured hair, this ph-balanced, sulphate-free shampoo is designed to keep hue-tiful hair in check so you never have to part with it. More than your average shampoo, KEVIN.MURPHY has designed this hard-working hair hero to lock in colour from the inside out. Knowing that coloured hair needs that extra bit of TLC, this formula works on a follicle level to build strength from within to reveal stronger, healthier hair. and closes the cuticle to add next-level shine. It also has nourishing and hydrating properties to bring your hair back from the brink of dehydration. A little goes a long way with this lightweight texture and results in hair that feels instantly rejuvenated and colour-revived.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Gently massage into hair and scalp. Rinse and repeat.
ingredient: Water (Aqua) (Eau), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ascorbic Acid, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil*, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Lactic Acid, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, PEG-8, Polysilicone-19, Inulin, Glycol Distearate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Trioleate, Steareth-4, PEG-4 Rapeseedamide, Ammonium Chloride, Sodium Phytate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol.

name: ghd Unplugged Cordless Styler - White ghd Unplugged Cordless Styler - White
description: The ultimate foil to drooping curls, rain-ruined lengths and post-gym strand fiascos, ghd's Unplugged Hair Straightener brings the styling prowess of their traditional tools to your adventures out in the world; fully charged in just two hours, this innovative tool boasts an advanced lithium-ion battery that offers up to 20 minutes of continuous styling at the optimum styling temperature 185°C. Optimum styling temperature, you ask? Leading the way in hair research, from heater technology to maintaining hair health, ghd’s team of scientists have concluded that 185ºC is the ultimate temperature for long-wearing, effortless styles with minimal damage to your precious tresses. Now employed in their first cordless styler (read: the ultimate top-up tool), this styler features dual-zone technology and ceramic heaters to deliver smooth and safe styling with no extreme heat. Accompanied with a high-speed USB-C charging cable and mains adaptor, you can power up from your car, laptop or a traditional socket. Designed for peace of mind, it even automatically switches off after three minutes of inactivity to preserve battery life (and avoid burning your bag...). Psst, the complimentary luxury travel pouch means the compact tool can go with you anywhere — its flight-friendly technology means that it is safe for hand luggage too!
how_to_use: Glide through dry hair for effortless styling.

name: BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour Aubergine Dream BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour Aubergine Dream
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Molton Brown Hydrating Shampoo with Camomile 300ml Molton Brown Hydrating Shampoo with Camomile 300ml
description: Molton Brown's Hydrating Chamomile Shampoo gently cleanses, restores the moisture balance of hair and enhances its shine with the hero ingredient of chamomile extract, all while imparting its subtle herbal scent onto your strands. Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of shampoo is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-hair ingredients that leave lengths soft and cleansed while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on hair all day long. A targeted, hydrating shampoo for medium hair types, this vegan and gluten-free formula will leave your lengths feeling restored with an enviably smooth, silky-soft touch.
how_to_use: Work into a fragrant lather on scalp and through the length of your hair. Rinse well, and follow up with the Hydrating Chamomile Conditioner.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Fragrance/Parfum, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Lactic Acid, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-18 Glyceryl Oleate/Cocoate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Polyquaternium-7, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone.

name: Molton Brown Volumising Shampoo with Nettle 300ml Molton Brown Volumising Shampoo with Nettle 300ml
description: Lengths falling more flat than ever? Allow us to introduce you to Molton Brown's Volumizing Nettle Shampoo. Crafted especially for fine hair types, this targeted shampoo will help you achieve bouncy locks that look as if you were born with them! Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles (now made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic!) with embossed lids, each shampoo is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-hair ingredients that leave lengths soft and cleansed while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on hair all day long. Enriched with fresh nettle, this refreshing formula weightlessly boosts your hair, giving the impression of fuller, healthy-looking strands!
how_to_use: Work into a fragrant lather in scalp and through the length of your hair. Rinse well, and follow up with the Volumising Nettle Conditioner.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Fragrance/Parfum, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Lactic Acid, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Polyquaternium-7, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Peg-18 Glyceryl Oleate/Cocoate, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Slip Pure Silk Glam Band - Leopard Slip Pure Silk Glam Band - Leopard
description: Want to keep hair out of you face while you ace your base? Upgrade from that towelling hairband and invest in Slip's Glam Band. Available in two colourways and featuring an easy-to-use, lightweight design, this promises to keep hair in tip-top condition without kinking, creasing or damaging hair during use. Made from the highest grade pure mulberry silk, this headband will glide across hair without causing friction or frizz and effortlessly holds in place while you remove or apply make up. Available in two chic colourways, pick from ‘Black’ or ‘Leopard’.
how_to_use: Slip the band under your hair, at the back of your neck and lift up to meet at your forehead and push together to secure.
ingredient: Slipsilk™ is specially-commissioned and made to Slip’s exacting standards, developed and refined over ten years to provide the ultimate combination of shine, thickness, softness and durability. Slip uses the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme and enforces the strictest quality guidelines, including non-toxic dyes.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY UN.TANGLED Leave-in Conditioner 40ml KEVIN.MURPHY UN.TANGLED Leave-in Conditioner 40ml
description: If your hair’s tied up in knots, don’t panic, reach for KEVIN.MURPHY’s Un.Tangled, a leave-in conditioner formulated with a complex of nourishing natural extracts that detangles, strengthens and restores your main to its rightful magnificence. Six Australian fruit extracts – including kakadu plum and desert lime – offer a hydrophilic effect, meaning that they absorb moisture from your surroundings. Tasmanian pepper soothes and softens, aniseed myrtle enhances strength and elasticity, while wild rosella flower and lactic acid absorbs into the hair shaft to fight oxidation and repair the hair’s surface. Offering heat protection up to 200°F/93°C too, this is the perfect concoction to reach for when you’ve emerged from the shower with wet, tangled locks.
how_to_use: Spray onto wet hair, comb through and leave-in.

description: If your locks are feeling limp, lacklustre or prone to falling flat, defy gravity and do away with flyaways via KEVIN.MURPHY’s Anti.Gravity Spray. A weightless non-aerosol spray, this space-age spritz enhances shine, adds texture and reinforces volume, swiftly restoring life and vibrancy to your strands, from scalp to tip. The formula also nourishes hair while it adds volume and body (another tick on our hair care ‘must’ list), enriched with Manuka honey, a natural emollient that seals in moisture and softens hair to add flexibility, as well as grapefruit extract, which contains high levels of vitamins C and E to benefit dry, damaged hair. description: Looking to add a little more life to your locks? Then ghd's The Smoother Hairbrush is your new best friend – it's a versatile tool that delivers either a full-bodied or smooth blowdry to short to mid-length tresses. The latest design to leave the hair haven’s HQ, this must-have brush is clearly designed by professionals. The 35mm diameter barrel (ideal for controlled styling) is coated with natural bristles which offer a smoother finish whilst a smart, non-slip handle ensures maximum tension with every brush stroke. Wondering what you can expect? A salon-worthy blowout in minutes and compliments in abundance.
how_to_use: Working with small to medium sections, place the brush into the root area and direct the heat from your dryer at the barrel. Keep the tension as you move the brush through your hair, directing heat at the barrel as you go.

name: Living Proof Curl Enhancer Travel Size 100ml Living Proof Curl Enhancer Travel Size 100ml
description: Weightless – that’s how your hair will feel after treating it to Living Proof’s Curl Enhancer. Formulated to boost naturally wavy heads, this conditioning style enhances natural texture without compromising on weight. Working to moisturise and provide protection against frizz while helping you to regain control of disobedient flyaways, the Curl Enhancer won’t weigh heavy on your head – even when used from the very root! Using the brand’s ‘Healthy Curl Complex’, this formula ensures effortlessly soft, shiny and healthy waves – all while helping to improve wave definition. Safe for coloured and chemically treated lengths, the Curl Enhancer is cruelty-free and doesn’t include any silicones, parabens, phthalates or sulphates. *Hair flips*
how_to_use: Start with a small amount and add more as needed. If you have coarse, wavy hair, you may prefer the medium conditioning benefits of the {Curl Definer}. For added hold, we recommend finishing your style with {Curl Defining Gel}. For added shine, we recommend finishing your style with {Curl Moisturizing Shine Oil}. Curl Enhancer does not make straight hair wavy as it was designed for naturally wavy textures. If you're looking to add waves to naturally straight hair, try the Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler.

name: Sun Bum Revitalizing Conditioner Sun Bum Revitalizing Conditioner
description: It's no secret that the sun, sea and pollution can strip essential moisture from our hair, leaving our strands decidedly 'meh'. Don't panic though - Sun Bum's Revitalizing Conditioner is here to help! This daily hydrating conditioner harnesses the likes of coconut oil, banana and sunflower seed oil to flood your hair with nourishing hydration, making it appear enviably sleek and healthy. Crafted with all hair types in mind, this conditioning formula is the first step towards near-mythically soft, mermaid hair. Deeply hydrating, it's a must-have for disobedient and hard-to-manage hair that makes washday a thing of dread. The special blend of coconut oil, banana pulp and peel, banana leaf, quinoa protein and sunflower seed oil helps to restore lost moisture and repair damage, while powerful antioxidants provide UV protection to prevent your colour from fading. This way *flexes arms* to super smooth, shiny, and happy hair!

Use sparingly on scalp and rinse with cold water for extra shine."

It’s a definite must-have addition to your hair care arsenal (and it looks très chic in your bathroom cabinet/desk drawer/handbag…). Starring the brand’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology – a cocktail of marine algae extracts which works to enhance strand-strength, suppleness and shine – this mimics the bed-head effect of the spritz, to create texture and body without adding weight. Perfect for all hair lengths and textures, but especially those with fine, ‘slippery’ hair that needs ‘tszuj’, this smooths strands and locks in precious moisture whilst granting that enviable, just-back-from-the-beach bounce. description: A 2-in-1 wonder, frank body's Caffeinated Hair Mask softens while promoting healthier hair over time. Infused with moisturising comfrey root, scalp-balancing coffee as well as niacinamide and hydrolysed keratin to improve hair's overall health, this non-greasy and lightweight treatment is just what the hairdresser ordered... Here to help keep every inch of your skin and hair look and feel its best, frank body's Caffeinated Hair Mask is a must for emergency SOS treatments or sumptuous Sunday evenings full of self-care. Finally, hydrolysed keratin coats and penetrates the hair shaft to help reduce breakage, frizz and soften hair without filling your head with nasties.

name: Living Proof Restore Conditioner Travel Size 60ml Living Proof Restore Conditioner Travel Size 60ml
description: Daily shampooing, heat styling, chemical processing, colouring and UV exposure all wreak havoc with hair strength, health and resilience. Over time, strands become brittle, dry and more susceptible to breakage – which is why we often reach for short-term synthetic cover-ups, which only exacerbate the problem. Oils and silicones are effective ‘quick fixes’ but only temporarily disguise the underlying damage – which is why Living Proof have developed a targeted range of reparative products, to fortify strands from the inside out. Their innovative silicone and oil-free solutions star the brand’s patented OFPMA – the proprietary technology that coats each individual hair with an ultra-thin, non-greasy shield that smooths, corrects and protects from root-to-tip, whilst re-establishing moisture balance and delivering UV and thermal protection up to 235°C. With regular use, hair is proven to become up to 20 x more resistant to split ends, as well as more glossy, lustrous and reassuringly envy-inducing.

name: Color Wow Dream Smooth Kit Color Wow Dream Smooth Kit
description: The Dream Smooth Kit is a 3-piece kit to take with you anywhere and everywhere to maintain healthy-looking, glossy hair. First up, the Color Security Shampoo is carefully crafted without sulphates, hair-stripping and depositing ingredients – so it won’t clog your follicles or dull your hair. Perfect for coloured or thinning hair and extensions, this gentle formula leaves your hair and scalp clean and ultra-fresh. The Color Security Conditioner nourishes and softens hair, leaving it feeling smooth and all the more manageable for styling; it also infuses their colour-shielding Sealicon Complex to keep your colour locked in. Last but not least, the Dream Coat Supernatural Spray seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish.

Reapply after 2 to 3 shampoos.

description: Brush up your hair styling regime with ghd's Paddle Brush. Perfect for mid-length to long hair, it detangles effortlessly with minimal tugging or pulling and without generating static. name: Kitsch Satin Pillow Rollers Kitsch Satin Pillow Rollers
description: Making every TikTok trend easy, use the Satin Pillow Rollers for perfect heat-free curls every time - no socks, bathrobe belts or pencils required! Coated in Kitsch's luxurious satin, which is known for its gentleness that won't snag strands or cause breakage, these rollers are the perfect alternative to hot tools, traditional rollers or uncomfortable trends doing the rounds online. Just 'roll and snap' to create flawless waves without any discomfort or heat damage. Even comfortable enough to wear in bed, these rollers work with wet hair to give a long-lasting and natural-looking curl.
how_to_use: With slightly damp hair, take a section of hair and start rolling up from the end upwards towards scalp. Tuck hair securely so that the tip of your hair does not stick out. Roll upwards until completely rolled against scalp, fold the roller and snap the button clasp at the top of your head. Continue with the next roller, but this time link it through the first roller before you snap it together. This ensures that the rollers will stay in place. Continue this process until all rollers are in place and secure. Wear overnight or allow hair to fully dry. Remove and style to enjoy beautiful heatless curls! Care instructions: Hand wash in cold water. Air dry. Do not wring. Do not bleach.
ingredient: 20% Satin Polyester, 70% PE, 5% Aluminum, 5% ABS

name: Sachajuan Dry Shampoo Mousse 200ml Sachajuan Dry Shampoo Mousse 200ml
description: The humble dry shampoo – pretty much everyone’s handbag beauty staple since time immemorial – has been given an exciting update by super-chic Stockholm hair salon, Sachajuan. A new kind of mousse, this dry shampooing incarnation dries super quickly, giving hair a fresh, clean feel without residue – or, of course, water! Take time to massage it into your roots and it will absorb excess oil and impurities, leaving zero residue in its wake – only a clean, volumised, shiny finish, with extra ‘oomph’ to guarantee a good hair day.
how_to_use: Spread evenly over the whole hair or focus in areas that need refreshment. Restyle.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Alcohol Denat., Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Butane, Isobutane, Distarch, Phosphate, Polyquaternium-4, Ceteareth-60 Myristyl Glycol, Laureth-4, Propane, Magnesium Stearate, Coco-Betaine, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Soytrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Parfum, Linalool, Limonene, Cetrimonium Chloride, Geraniol, Citronellol

name: Sachajuan Anti-Pollution Conditioner 250ml Sachajuan Anti-Pollution Conditioner 250ml
description: Our hair puts up with A LOT and we think it shouldn’t have to be weighed down by pollution on top of everything else. The great minds at Sachajuan agree. Designed to enrich and protect your hair, the Anti Pollution Conditioner formula creates a protective barrier that layers your lengths. Barring a build-up of environmental toxins and mineral residue from hard water, it keeps your hair from being weighed down and your scalp from being clogged. Apart from this specialist protection, it even holds its own as a conditioner that softens your hair, making it super manageable and easy to style. If that doesn’t seal the deal, then maybe the fact that it’s vegan will!
how_to_use: After cleansing with Sachajuan's Anti Pollution Shampoo, comb through a small amount of this conditioner, leave for 1-2 minutes and then rinse in warm water.
